name: Ample parkside apartment Kreuzberg
description:
Spacious, bright, artistically furnished apartment in the middle of the lively, colorful Kreuzberg, in a relaxed street with restaurants and sidewalk cafes. Right on the park, within walking distance to the banks of Spree and Landwehrkanal. Ideal for a relaxed and inspiring city holiday.

The space
85 sqm: 2 large, sunny, south-facing rooms, large kitchen with dining area, sunny balcony with ample view over the Görlitzer park. Artisticly and lovingly furnished, dishes, linens, towels, washing machine, dishwasher, microwave and Thermo mixer, Wifi, piano and guitar, as well as bathtub, high-quality toys and board games for children and adults available. Bicycles can be additionally rented by arrangement.

Perfect for 2-4 persons (2 king size beds, 1king-size bed-sofa and one single-sized bunk bed in our "dollhouse".

Guest access
Whole apartment

Other things to note
We have two cats, Zazou and Pierrot, who w
neighborhood_overview: The apartment, located at the Görlitzer Park, is quiet and yet in the midst of a lively and diverse neighborhood in Kreuzberg. In the house next door is a newsagent and bakery, 5 minutes walk through the park is a swimming pool with wave pool, 5 minutes walk to a children's animal farm, several playgrounds in the immediate area, 10 minutes walk to the charming bank of the Landwehr Canal, 15 minutes to the banks of the Spree, and many cafés, restaurants with affordable and delicious lunch and bars right in the street as well as in the surrounding neighborhood. There are small shops and supermarkets as well as two vegetable markets nearby, one specialized on organic food.
host_about:
This is what I am particularly interested in...
dancing tango Argentino, improvisation theater, action theater, contact improvisation, arts, especially performance art, firewalking, sustainability, Spanish language and culture, Buddhism, transformational learning, social entrepreneurship, social sculpuring, all around the process of innovation and creativity, meaningful conversations and good food.

description:
This beautiful first floor apartment is situated at Kollwitzplatz.
Its ideal for 2 but can comfortably accommodate 4 with the extra double bed in the living room.

PLEASE INQUIRE FIRST BEFORE MAKING A BOOKING. THANKS

The space
1st floor (68m2) apartment on Kollwitzplatz/ Prenzlauer Berg.

It's ideal for 2 but can sleep comfortably an extra 2 in the living room. (Please let us know in advance if you are 2 people sleeping separately that we can bring extra sheet for you.)
Kids are welcome and for smaller visitors we can arrange baby cot and high chair.

The front room is spacious and open plain with a large dining table, parquet flooring and a simple yet stylish décor.
You can relax in an Indian easy chair or simply lounge on the daybed.

The kitchen area has everything from frying pan to coffee maker, an electric oven and stove, refrigerator.

To the back of the apartment is the bedroom with a lar
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is famous for its variety of international eateries, pubs, restaurants, cafés, galleries and little shops.
The bakery next door is open everyday from up 7 am, which makes warm croissants for breakfast very tempting.

On Sundays don't miss the traditional flea markets on Arkonaplatz and in the nearby Mauerpark for special treats and souvenirs.


check out our travel guide and please let us know what your highlights were so we can add them for future guests

name: Sunny Room in Beautiful Apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
Welcome to my home, up high, away from the street, there's a wide view of the sunrise over Friedrichshain & Kreuzberg. The quiet bedroom faces west into the courtyard, with the sunset and a calming orchestra of chirping birds. I live with my lovely flat mate & singer song writer Cindo, and we will share a large kitchen, & a bathroom filled with plants. My home is queer friendly and a safe, relaxing space for all people. Looking forward to sharing it with you.

The space
I have a large, 3 room 'Altbau' apartment (90sqm), with old wooden floors and a very spacious layout. Your room is next to mine, and it's quiet. It has an office chair and a big working table. The bed is a comfy futon. The room is around 17 sqm and has a large window to the west, with the sunset between 4-7pm, and a courtyard with chirping birds. The rest of the apartment faces east, with a wonderful view of the sunrise every morning, which floods all shared living spaces with energy and light.
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the heart of Kreuzberg right by the Spree, we are very happy to be living in one of the most tolerant and versatile areas in the world.

Food:
*********
Eisenbahnstrasse is home to the popular 'Street Food Thursdays' in 'Martkhalle 9', with special programs almost every weekend. Friday's there's also an outdoor market on Lausitzer Platz (4min by foot).

Within 5min walking distance we have some of the best restaurants in the city, both very affordable and a bit more expensive. We are happy to help you find what you like. We possibly have the best middle eastern street food in europe all within a 10 min walk. Also excellent Italian, Indian, Vietnamese, & Burger Joints all over our neighborhood. Supermarkets Netto, Lidl & Aldi are open late and are all 5 minutes away.

20min by foot towards Neukoelln is a beautiful small canal with walk ways and sunny picnic spots on the water. Tuesdays and Fridays there's an all year, outdoor Turkish
host_about: Hello and welcome to my home. We are queer friendly and my home is a safe space for all people. I've worked and studied in wonderful Berlin for many years as a DJ, event producer and visual artist. I speak german, english, and a some french. I love to cook, listen to music and celebrate life.

name: STAYINTOWN - Apartment in Berlin
description:
The space
The apartment is located on the ground floor of our house in the "green area " Pankow-Weissensee in a quiet side street.
The next bus stop you find 50 meters from the apartment. The Berlin public transport system is exelent. Using public transport one can get to Berlin-Alexanderplatz within thirty minutes. The perfect place to explore the city from.
The property is surrounded by many small gardens and fields, great for walks and sporting activities. A golf course (Pankow) is also located closeby (1.5 km).
Bicycles can be parked on the property, ans directly in front of the house there are ample car parking places.
The accommodation consists of a living room with kitchenette, a bedroom and a bathroom with shower. It can sleep two comfortably, and three maximum .The floor are tiled throughout the apartment and underneath have underfloor heating.

Living room / kitchen area

- Sitting and dining area for four peo

ich bin Dirk und vermiete ein sehr schönes Apartment in Berlin.

Many nice coffee places, diverse restaurants and little parks and squares make it one of the most liveable neighbourhoods of the city, witnessed by the many families who live here.

name: Beautiful flat 95m² in Berlin Mitte
description:
The space
Large (95 sqm), stylish and perfectly located apartment. There are many galleries, cafés, bars and nightclubs around. A park (Weinbergspark) to chill is only 3 minutes away.

The house was built around 1850, has been completely renovated in 2011 and was equipped with a lift.

You may enjoy breakfast on the balkony with a beautiful view at the close TV-Tower, or just stay in the large livingromm/kitchen at the long table (2,20m).

Public Transportation is very close: Rosenthaler Platz (U8) and Rosa-Luxemburg-Platz (U2) are each in a less than 5 minutes walking distance.
Tourist attractions like Dom, Museumsinsel, Alexanderplatz, Kollwitzplatz or Hackescher Markt are also in walking distance (10 min). The apartment is perfect for 1 to 4 persons, but a fifth one may sleep on a mattress, if required. It´s quiet and not on a big street. There´s a children´s playground literally next door, so perfect for families as well.
host_about: I´m a musician who loves to travel, meet new people, have a coffee once in a while and explore life.

name: Cosy Flat in Kreuzberg 36!
description:
The space
Cosy and freshly renovated 2 rooms flat in the heart of Kreuzberg 36: definitely the most trandy, alive and multicultural area of Berlin!
Many bars, cafes, restaurant, and galleries are all in walking distance from the flat. The next metro station (Kottbusser Tor U1/12 and U8) is at 100 mt from the flat, as well several bus station and a taxi station.
The atmosphere in the streets of the multicultural neighbourhood Kreuzberg is very exciting, friendly and alive. You will meet artists as well as people from many different cultures which are going to give you a real authentic Berlin experience.
A few words about my flat:
The flat fully furnished and freshly renovated, it can host up till 5 people in 2 comfortable double beds and a single bed. The kitchen is fully equipped with all kitchen props, fridge, toaster ecc. There is a nice balcony, toilette with shower.
We provide for fresh bed linen and towels.

The space
FridayBerlin is a cosy studio of 35 m2, with three large windows that provide plenty of light throughout the day. With one double bed and souble sofa bed FirdayBerlin becomes a perfect accommodation for up to 4 people. In the fourth top floor, no elevator, but instead quiet and with views. Everything for your short stay: stove, refrigerator, freezer, kettle, microwave, coffee maker, kitchen, TV, Wi-Fi, hair dryer, iron and ironing board, and on request cot and baby chair ... and of course linen and towels.
Supermarket open until late just across the street, other small supermarkets open almost all night, plenty of bakeries, koffee shops and restaurants just few steps away.

Other things to note
Groups of young people under 25 years old are not accepted.
neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain. Next to the districts Prenzlauer Berg and Kreuzberg. Althought Friedrichshain lacks of sights it has its special atmosphere. Countless bars, pubs and restaurants, still growing and offering every time more entertainment. There is a famous flea market taking place every Sunday morning.
There is plenty of places to visit, enjoy, surprise and discover…
host_about: I would like to welcome you in my beautiful apartment in Berlin and wish you a great stay. The area is so vibrant and green that I am sure you will enjoy and wish to come back.

description:
'RATED EXCELLENT' tripadvisor
'WINNER, Top Vacation Rental, Berlin' (Hidden by Airbnb)
'One of the most popular holiday apartments of the region' (Hidden by Airbnb)


BEST LOCATION (city center near Checkpoint Charlie, most famous sights can be reached by foot), MOST BEAUTIFUL HOUSE OF THE AREA (downtown city landmark of most legendary street, Friedrichstrasse), TOP CONDITION (total restoration 2014), QUIET (no drive through, because pedestrian zone starts 200 meters away).

The space
MAGICIANS, THE GREENS, BANKERS, LAWYERS AND FILMMAKERS
Gutschow House, built in 1895, fully restored in 2014, an important work of historicism (Neo-Gothic and Neo-Renaissance), is the symbol of southern Friedrichstrasse, one of Berlins most famous streets. It is in Kreuzberg, also known as X-Berg, a district famous in the 80ies for its alternative lifestyle and squatters; a national heritage monument due to elaborate façade design, its location, its h
neighborhood_overview:
THE BEST CENTRAL LOCATION BECAUSE:

most sights are within walking distance: 2 minutes to Checkpoint Charlie (the most famous symbol of the Cold War); Jewish Museum (the most significant example of contemporary architecture) is our immediate neighbor; 15 minutes to Martin Gropius Bau (main showroom); 20 minutes to Potsdamer Platz (most popular attraction of the New Berlin); 15 minutes to the Gendarmenmarkt (one of the most beautiful marketplaces); 30 minutes to the Brandenburg Gate (the symbol of reunification) and the Reichstag (most famous landmark); 30 minutes to the Museum Island (UNESCO World Heritage Site) with: Old Museum, New Museum, Old National Gallery, Bodemuseum and Pergamon Museum. At Hallesches Tor (3 minutes) is the dock for Berlin's most popular boat tour: the bridge tour.

Art, beauty, multicultural

Is the new center of the Berlin art galleries at this point. Here is the line between alternative and multicultural district of Kreuzberg and
host_about: Trained as a filmmaker (NFTS). Lived, studied and worked in Bucharest (Romania), Berlin, London, Lodz (Poland) and Kishinev (Moldova). name: Designer Loft in Berlin Mitte
description:
Bright and sunny condo with two balconies in a stunning location in Berlin Mitte/Prenzelberg!

The space
A 100 qm fancy and bright designer loft condo, in the heart of famous Prenzlauer Berg, partly exposed brickwork and fire place.

2 bedrooms plus huge living space with kitchen. 2 TVs, one in the master bedroom including a dvd player, and one in the living room. Washing machine plus dryer included
The loft is in the 5th floor (with elevator). Fantastic view down the Kastanienallee and to the television tower (Alex).

By foot you have several bars, clubs, little shops (books, art, fashion) theater and independent movie theatres, right around the corner. The Kastanienallee is one of the most vibrant spots in Prenzlauer Berg, and leads you to the famous Mauerpark with its attached big flea market on sundays.

Public transportation like the Tram M1 is just a few meters away, which leads you directly to Hackescher Markt, through
neighborhood_overview: Fantastic vibe in the middle of the popular Kastanienallee with lots of cafes, bars and restaurants. Easy to get around and just two stations with the  tram to Berlin Mitte (East Centre).

The space
We are specialized in families. Please ask for the familyprices. Air bnb does not make any difference between kids and adults. We do.If you tell us the age of your kids we can calculate the right price for you!

The appartement is situated in a nice neighbourhood north of berlins center. The appartement is perfect for a groop of up to 9 adults or up to 14 people if you travel with kids.2 - 4 people will have a very luxuruious and huge accomodation. The size of the apartment is about 1800 square feet.

host_about:
I am an artist and a mother of 4 kids. We live underneath the apartement. If there is anything our guests need, we can organize it anytime. My husband is a carpenter and he is an artists as well. name: CITY STUDIO WEST@ Kurfürstendamm(monthly discount)
description:
The space
This very cozy STUDIO APARTMENT (30 sqm.) is very bright and quiet, on the 6th. floor (2 elevators).
The Windows with southern exposure have sun-blinds plus black-out blinds installed. ( in case you want to sleep during the day)
There is 1 single bed and 1 Leather Couch, a coffee table, side-table and a dining table/ desk with seating for up to 3 people.

* Cable-TV (32" flat screen) with English language news channels (BBC and CNN)
* Home Theater System with FM-Radio, CD and DVD, WiFi ADSL internet connection. (free of charge)
* Bed Linen and Towels are provided.(free of charge)
* The bathroom has a walk-in Shower, WC and Wash Basin.

Respectful of all races/religions/genders and sexuel orientations.

If you have any question please don't hesitate to ask us.

Guest access

* The KITCHENETTE is fully equipped with a complete set of Kitchenwa
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the City Center West (where the district of Charlottenburg borders with Wilmersdorf) - just a few steps off the famous "Kurfürstendamm" boulevard, where you will find a wealth of international restaurants and designer stores, as well as bakeries and supermarkets (some of them are open 'til midnight and some are open 24/7)
To visit the world-renowned SCHAUBÜHNE theater - you simply cross the street.

This safe neighborhood in the City Center West is so sought after that even the former mayor of Berlin has chosen to live here !
host_about:
After having worked in New York City for decades,we retired and moved to the vibrant city of Berlin. The cozy studio apartment we are offering used to be our own vacation home while we were living in NYC.
In our free time we love to take advantage of Berlin's extensive offerings of cultural life - museums, theaters, concerts etc. We also love to ride our bikes to explore the city and its surrounding forests and many lakes.  If you like, we can give you a tour through the very dynamic city of Berlin - on foot, on bike or using its excellent public transportation system.
We would also be interested in exchanging/switching apartments with other airbnb hosts in our favorite travel spots NYC and Barcelona-Sitges or Gran Canaria.
Please, feel free to contact us if you would like to know more about us and the apartment.

name: Sunny Boutique Studio in the city center
description:
Experience Berlin from its most beautiful side in this sunny studio apartment. It is located in one of the most popular areas near Kollwitzplatz and Kastanienallee, where you can find many cafes, restaurants and shops. The apartment has been renovated with great attention to detail and offers you everything you need for a pleasant stay.

The space
Enjoy the beauty of a restored historic building on the side wing’s second level. The apartment is bright (facing south) and has a wonderful view of the open and spacious green backyards.

The apartment is fully equipped: bathroom, toilet, kitchen, wooden floor and furniture. The large double bed (160x200 cm) can also be used as two single beds. There is also a cozy sofa bed (160x200 cm) for another guest.

The modern kitchen invites you to cook and enjoy: it has a refrigerator, a dishwasher, an induction stove with two plates, a kettle, a coffee machine and more.

You have free access to fa
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located on Hagenauer Str., just a few steps away from the subway station Eberswalder Straße. Nearby you will find everything you need: restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs, ice cream parlors, organic market, supermarket (Rewe), second-hand shops, designer boutiques and much more. The neighborhood is one of the most popular residential areas with a creative international flair.

Around the corner there is a laundromat and a dry cleaner.

And if you are here on Sunday, you should not miss the famous flea market at Mauerpark. It is only a short walk from the apartment.
host_about:
Love to travel to all the remote places in the world. Real wilderness in untouched natural habitats are my favorite. What does not stop me from visiting exciting cities around the world. 
Outdoor sports like Telemark ski, hiking, back country ski, kayak, etc is what really relaxes me in my free time.
I love Berlin, the city where I live because of the freedom of choices you have here. Berlin still is not so much about earning as much money as possible in the shortest amount of time. It also offers space for alternatives, arts and culture, because you can be here on a low budget without missing anything. Come here and experience this amazing city!

name: Apartment in the heart of Berlin
description:
Beautiful and calm apartment in close vicinity of the Viktoria Park, Bergmannstrasse and the western centre of Berlin.

The space
News:
Minimum stay: 60 nights
The apartment has been completely renovated in December 2015.
Brand new flatscreen television (not the one on the pictures anymore :-) )

Short details:
- Apartment size: 50 m²
- 2 room(s)
- maximum of 4 persons (exceptions for children up to 5 years)
- apartment located on 1st floor in a beautiful silent courtyard
- 1 double bed
- 2 single beds

Furnishing:
The apartment is located on the corner of Möckernstraße/Kreuzbergstraße in Berlin's Kreuzberg district. It is in the side wing of a renovated traditional Wilhelminian Berlin tenement.

The flat has 2 rooms:
- One living- and one bedroom, a small kitchen and a bathroom. The bathroom has a bathtub.
- The kitchen has a dining table for 2 people. The fully equipped kit
neighborhood_overview:
Description:
A stone's throw away you'll find the Viktoria-Park, for Berlin people known as the "Kreuzberg", with a lovely waterfall. An oasis of relaxation with a very nice and large children's playground next to a little Biergarten (Golgatha) and a high monument from where - weather permitting - you can enjoy a spectacular view over the city.

The Bergmannstraße with it's many cafés, bars, restaurants, second hand shops is just a couple of walking minutes away. There are wine dealers, supermarkets, pharmacies and one of the three last remaining historical market halls in Berlin. South of Bergmannstraße in the small side streets (Chamisso Platz) you'll think you've gone back to centuries past: Cobblestone streets and Wilhelminian style tenements with stucco decorations.

The closest supermarkets are Kaisers (corner Großbeerenstraße), ALDI, Lidl and Getränke Hoffmann on the western end of Kreuzbergstraße. The Kaiser´s supermarket in Bergmannstraße is even open
host_about:
Hi,
I was born and raised in Berlin in this area. I´m pleased to welcome you in the coolest area of my home town. :-)
Cheers, Tanja

name: Quiet 2 rooms next Helmholtzplatz
description:
This charming apartment located in a building built at the beginning of the 20th century, is in the center of the trendiest area of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg. And next to the famous square "Helmholtzplatz".

The space
The apartment, is on the 2th floor (without elevator) of a building built at the beginning of the 20th century and can welcome up to 3 persons.

In the kitchen, you will find all cooking amenities (pans, toaster, coffee machine, electric kettle, refrigerator-freezer) as well as a dishwasher.

Both bedrooms comprise approximately 25 sqm each. In the first one, there is 2 single beds (100x200) and a commode. The single beds can make a double bed, if you prefer.
The other room is furnished with a double bed (160x200). You can also use this room as a lounge: there’s a couch, a flat-screen television, DVD and a small hi-fi system. There’s Internet (WIFI) in the apartment.
We can also supply you a baby-bed without extra cost.
neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts of the city.
It embodies Berlin’s cultural heritage from diverse historical periods, proletarian and middle-class styles of the fin-de-siècle, just as the imprint of socialism.
What is more, there has always been a tradition of resistance and opposition giving birth to the spirit of creativity that incessantly surrounds you here.
The architecture should hold attention because in spite of the galloping renovation since the fall of the Wall, it still retains some of scars from the Second World War.
host_about:
I'm french but I have been living in Berlin since 18 years because I love this city....I am looking forward to welcome you in one of my apartments and to meet people from all over the world.
See you soon!

name: PEACEFUL FLAT WITH VINTAGE TOUCH IN PRENZLAUERBERG
description:
Right in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, possibly the nicest neighbourhood in town, this apartment has a special character, with its mix of design objects, vintage furniture and wooden green doors.

Free and fast Wi-Fi (400 Mbit/s)

Subway/supermarkets 100m away!

Super easy check-in 24/24 through the private door with code, no keys pick up is needed!

The space
Situated in the heart of popular Prenzlauer Berg, this attractive Berlin apartment makes shopping and sightseeing a convenient pleasure during your short stay.

The beauty of the interior lies in the original combination of vintage and new. Opal white walls combine with wooden floors, elegant dark-green doors and retro furnishings (no Ikea!), mid-century design lamps and porcelain switches to create a universal charm.

The walls of all rooms are decorated with vintage polish posters designed for operas and circus shows.

With some superb nights
neighborhood_overview:
Neighbourhood and location:

The über-cool Prenzlauer Berg neighbourhood of Berlin is a hit with Berliner locals for its superb gastronomic offer and vintage shopping, Mauerpark's famed flea market, and brunch cafés. Countless restaurants, cafés and little shops create a unique atmosphere, unravelled in the rest of the city.

Central, yet quieter than Berlin Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg is also one of the prettiest neighbourhoods. Much of it escaped damage in the second world war and post-war redevelopment.


Public Transportation:
Excellent public transport connections take you to Mitte in just a few minutes, where you can visit main Berlin attractions, such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island or Hackescher Markt. Nearby S-Bahn: Prenzlauer Allee S9 , Ringbahn , S8; Nearby U-Bahn: Schönhauser Allee (U2). The apartment, although apparently far on the map, is also well connected to the fair Berlin-Messe, which can be reached with line 42 in just 25 minut

host_about:
Berlin war für mich Liebe auf den ersten Blick!

Das war vor über 25 Jahren und die Veränderungen seit dem Mauerfall haben diese Stadt noch attraktiver werden lassen. 

Seit 2005 freue ich mich, Gästen aus aller Welt,  italienische Gastfreundschaft in Berlin in einem besonders schönem und zentralem Kiez, anbieten zu können.

Gerne helfe ich und meine Familie Ihnen mit praktischen Tips um Ihnen den Aufenthalt in Berlin und Schöneberg so angenehm wie möglich zu gestalten! 

Benvenuti a Berlin

Antonella

name: Private Ferienwohnung in Berlin
description:
The space
Ihre Berliner Ferienwohnung ist ein 70m2 großes, sehr komfortabel ausgebautes Dachgeschoss mit einem großzügigen Wohnzimmer, an das sich der offene Essbereich und die geräumige Küche anschließen.

Im Eingangsbereich gibt es eine gemütliche Ecke mit einer zusätzlichen Couch für kuschelige Lesestunden am Fenster mit Blick ins Grüne.
Der Schlafraum beherbergt ein Doppelbett sowie zwei Einzelbetten und hat außerdem genug Platz für ein Kinderreisebett. Im Badezimmer finden Sie eine Badewanne mit Dusche sowie eine Waschmaschine und einen Trockner. Haustiere sind nicht gestattet.

Ihre Ferienwohnung in Berlin-Treptow ist mit allem ausgestattet, was das Herz begehrt und ein gelungener Aufenthalt benötigt.

Wir bieten Ihnen eine nagelneue, traumhaft schöne Dachgeschoss-Ferienwohnung mit viel Platz, erstklassiger Einrichtung und einer Top-Lage genau zwischen der brummenden Metropole und der erholsamen Königsheide.

Ihre Berline

name: Southeast of Berlin - fantastic apartment
description:
517 ft² large 4-star-duplex apartment for 2 persons (1 extra bed possible), excellent connection to public transport. Local transport, 5 minutes to Schönefeld Airport by car, to WISTA-Adlershof and to the highway. Perfectly suitable for tourists and business travelers.

The space
A friendly hello to all non-smokers on Planet Earth - we are offering a 517 ft² large duplex apartment in a detached house for 2 persons with the possibility of 1 extra bed. Bookings are welcome from 3 nights at the basic price, for 1 night = 100% and for 2 nights = 30% premium in order to cover the incidental expenses and final cleaning which are both included in the price. Kitchenette, bathroom with comfort shower, on each floor there is a WC for you alone, cable TV/ radio in both rooms, calls for free within the German landline network with an own number, access to garden, free WiFi, comfort sauna, well-connected to public transport. 5 minutes away from highway and airport by car, cent
neighborhood_overview: Anyone who has business at the scientific and media location Adlershof, will love the short distance. Being a good starting point for discovering the southern parts of Berlin and the Spreewald, many tourists feel attracted to this area.
host_about:
Wir sind ein Rentnerehepaar und haben unsere Freude daran, wenn es uns gelingt, dass Haus und Garten auch anderen zur Freude gereichen. Unsere Freizeit wird im Wesentlichen ausgefüllt von unserem ehrenamtlichen Engagement in einer Wohlfahrtsorganisation. Der Rest gehört dem aktiven Sport im Verein und der Gesundheitspflege. Innerhalb dieser Tätigkeitsfelder unternehmen wir Reisen in die nähere Umgebung und einmal im Jahr auch in die weite Ferne.
Wir sind uns bewusst, dass unsere Urlaubs-Gäste sich auf nachhaltige Erlebnisse freuen, wenn sie zu uns kommen und deshalb tun wir alles in unseren Kräften stehende, um ihnen den Aufenthalt so angenehm wie nur irgend möglich zu machen. Das gilt natürlich auch für Dienstreisende. Leider sprechen wir fließend nur deutsch und ein ganz wenig englisch. Von unseren 10 bis 12 Jahren russisch ist leider auch nur ganz wenig übrig geblieben. Zur Not müssen wir googeln.
Nennt uns freimütig Eure Wünsche und wir versuchen alles, um sie zu erfüllen.

name: WONDERFUL ROOM for a bubble in Berlin Central
description:
Great apartment in the style of a typical late 19th century Berlin house. 200square meters in total. Located directly in the center of Berlin, between Schoeneberg and Kreuzberg, very near to Gleisdreieckpark, close to Mitte, the galleries at Potsdamer Strasse, bars and restaurants. Public transport in all directions two minutes walk only.

The space
You get up by stairs, second floor (no elevator). The room ( "R3") has a desk and double bed. Depends which room, see floorplan and photos.

We would prefer an adult person, who comes for a kind of working situation to Berlin. WLAN/WiFi, washingmaschine, dishwasher etc.. 24 hours shop next door, friendly house, great neighbours.

The bathroom is in the rear part of the apartment and a grotto. The 19th century ceiling is traditionally low. If you are taller than 183cm (72inch) you must bend while brushing teeth, and perhaps use a chair while you shower :))

You are welcome!
neighborhood_overview: Although very central the area is quite traditional "West-Berlin". David Bowie lived around the corner. Unlike other areas like Mitte, Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain gentrification has not started to destroy the character of the neighborhood. We have graffiti in the house, and they get more.  Almost all neighbors in the house have been living here for more many years, we keep a very friendly atmosphere, say good morning or good evening and have brief chats when we meet.
host_about:
Its about 20 years now that I moved to Berlin from Cologne, Brussels and London. After working at universities, tourism and bookpublishing in England, Italy and Spain we are operating a Berlin based agency called photomarketing.

Feel free to ask and I am happy to help, to make everything possible in Berlin.

name: The Berlin Artist Apartment.
description:
A large art filled two bedroom holiday apartment sleeping up to four. In the heart of a famous Simon Dach street, in Berlin's hip Friedrichshain district, the apartment has many cafes, markets & bars just outside the front door. Situated close the leftovers of the wall, 02 stadium, and great public transport links - the perfect base to explore Berlin. The holiday apartment is officially registered, so there will be no last minute cancellations.

2nd level (no lift), beautiful mansion block.

The space
We can only take 90 days a year so get in touch early. You can also see more on info at artistshouses with a com

An art filled 74.7m2, two bedroom holiday apartment rental in Berlin's hip Friedrichshain district, in the former East Berlin. The apartment is situated in the heart of the famous Simon Dach Strasse, a vibrant tree-lined street filled to the brim with street cafes, restaurants and great bars. Walk to the 02 stadium, walk to the large
neighborhood_overview:
The Berlin Artist Apartment is situated in a pre-war apartment building in the heart Berlin's Friedrichshain district, east of Alexanderplatz. It is perhaps the last resort for Berlin's famous alternative subculture. The streets culture is colourful and vibrant: Left over artist squats merge with imposing monumental Stalin-era buildings. Late-nineteenth century apartment buildings, galleries, alternative bars, clubs and cafes permeate the streets. Simon Dach Strasse is a popular spot with students, artists, young families as well as young Berliners.

The front of the apartment building has a liquor and convenience shop, a fantastic bakery, café and icecream shop. Nearby Boxhagener platz hosts the fantastic farmers market on Saturday, and the famous flea market on the Sunday. Reveler Str flea market is at the end of the Street. There are a range of supermarkets nearby.

Many more cultural, sporting and shopping options are also within walking or cycling distance. A
host_about: We love airbnb - We travel the world staying in airbnb rentals, so we know what makes a great holiday rental, so you will love our abodes.  I am an artist. My husband, Matthew Wild is a chef. Our son, Pablo Wild is nearly 15 and sees the world as his home. Our little one Hugo is loving the adventures. We travel the world a lot, probably over 100 countries now - we are big believers in world schooling - but when we are not nomadic, we live between Beautiful Port Douglas, Wonga Beach, Goa in India and Amazing Berlin. Come and stay in our charming homes oozing art, soul and creative vibes. Our homes are created with love, lots of hard work, and a passion of collecting and creating.  We search the world for items we love. As much as possible, we recycle building materials, and upcycle furniture. Our houses aren't fussy or pretentious, but they are all about charming you, inspiring you, and celebrating the creative spirit. We love to create homes that create beautiful conversations, and spaces that inspire warm heartedness, lots of laughter and precious memories. We hope we get to share our homes with you!

name: Cottage in the city with garden
description:
Nice modern cottage for 1- 5 people with garden, BBQ, fireplace, animals dom. for 10€ per day. We have bicycles for renting. Near the house is a beautiful forest and fresh air. You can go jogging or strolling with your dog.
Parking is free. In sommer time we have a swimming pool. By arrival please pay city tax , facilities for gas, water and electricity (about 3€ pro person ans day).

The space
Our house and the cottage are in Berlin-Karlshorst. It is very calm. Within 5-10 min by bicycle from the house you can rich the train station (S-Bahn S3 /RE to the city centre (Alexanderplatz or Friedrichstraße) within ~15 min, and the Hauptbahnhof (main station) within ~25 min. The way to S-Bahn is 15-20 min and to the Tram 10 min. To the tram you go by foot 10 minutes, to urbane line 15-20 minutes
All around the residential area in Karlshorst, in fact just behind the house, is a forest wherein one can walk the dog, go for jogs, etc. There are cafés, pups, resta
neighborhood_overview: I like this accomodation because it is near Center of Berlin and you have a beautiful garden. It is an arbor filled location. You are the Feeling like on the village, but you are in few minutes by car or train in the metropolitan life. You can see in Berlin-Karlshorst a lot of historical places, Horse races, museum of kapitulation...
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus der ganzen Welt und spreche außerDeutsch etwas Englisch, Russisch und ein wenig Polnisch. Demnächst wird auch noch Französisch dazukommen. Diese schöne Sprache lerne ich gerade. Ich spiele Klavier und habe auch 2 Geigen, die auf Spieler warten.
Als Lehrerin für Deutsch kann ich euch helfen, diese Sprache zu verbessern.  
Meine Fächer sind außerdem Chemie und Biologie. 
Ich helfe Abiturienten oder auch jüngeren Schülern mit Nachhilfeunterricht in Deutsch und Nawi.
In unserem großen Garten können wir Tisch-Tennis spielen oder am offenen Kamin träumen.
Das hängt natürlich ab von der Jahreszeit ab. Allerdings haben wir es schon geschafft, eine Sibirische Gartenparty zu feiern.

Und denkt daran: Der frühe Vogel fängt den Wurm!

name: Luxurious 2BR in prime location
description:
check in and check out after agreement.

The space
This Apartment is on the 2nd floor of a pre-war building on a tree lined street in the lovely Halensee neighborhood with plenty of restaurants, cafes, bakeries and shops in walking distance and easy access to public transportation. While retaining its old-world charm with high ceilings and original hardwood floors, the space has been completely remodeled and offers a luxurious and cozy home away from home to discover the exciting city of Berlin. The neighborhood is located in the former American Sector of Berlin, nestled between the Grunewald area with its elegant mansions and expansive woodlands and the bustling West Berlin city center with the Ku’damm as its main shopping boulevard. It offers easy access to the museums and major tourist attractions of the West and East Berlin city centers as well as the ICC convention center and the Tegel airport, and is ideal for families and couples as well as single tourists

description:
The flat is located in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain. If you step out of the house, you're surrounded by restaurants, bars and clubs. But the flat is quiet and peacfull, because it's in the rear house.

The space
Hello, I'm renting out my flat when I'm not at home. You'll sleep in a big room with a double bed 180x200cm. Bedlinen, towels and WiFi-Internet is included. The flat is perfect for two people.

It's an old style building with high ceiling, wooden floor, a big courtyard and it's very quiet in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain.

neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Fiedrichshain is a friendly and vibrant district for families, couples and singles. There are lots of little shops, cafes, restaurants just around the corner. At weekends there is a market and fleemarket at Boxhagener Platz (5 min walk). You also find nice parks for sport-activities, some cinemas and clubs (Berghain, Suicide Circus, Watergate, Süß war gestern, Kater Blau, Wilde Renate etc.) in that area. Berlin-Mitte with its museums is the next district and just 20 min away by public transport.
host_about: Hi, I'm Robert. I'm from Rostock (north Germany, at the baltic sea) and live in Berlin since 2005. I studied economics and work for an energy-supply- company at the moment. I love Berlin and want to show it other people by renting out my room when I'm not in town :) I also like to travel with airbnb, especially to places where I can go kitesurfing. I already met a lot of nice people and stayed in fantastic places.

Every Thursday and Saturday, you can enjoy the local farmer's market at Kollwitzplatz which is just two blocks down the street. Or go to nearby Mauerpark for the Sunday flea market and karaoke shows. You can also shop on and around Kastanienallee, which is just a 10 minute walk away.

With wooden floors, high stucco ceilings and a balcony, the flat is equipped with a large kitchen, washing machine, dish washer and WiFi. There are 2 bathrooms, one with a bathtub and the other with a shower. The flat is very quiet and located on the first floor. Fresh sheets and towels prov

A bright, green and very quiet atrium allows you an undisturbed sleep and a recreative time. You could go for a walk at the idyllic lake Lietzensee, to the Charlottenburger Castle or shopping on the Kurfürstendamm, Wilmersdorfer Strasse, Savignyplatz or other interesting locations in Berlin.

You could easily explore the town with public transport or enjoy the manors (german: Kiez) with the numerous restaurants in the surrounding area. Our Hauptstadt-Domizil (holiday flat) is ideal for trade fair guests, because trade fair area is within walking distance.

name: 130 sqm with a view on Mauer Park
description:
An apartment of 130 sqm right in the heart of East Berlin, located next to the beloved park of Prenzlauer Berg, Mauer Park.

The space
Consisting of two big bedrooms, a kitchen, a huge lounge, two bathrooms with bathtube and shower, the apartment can welcome 4 persons. The apartment is on the 4th floor with elevator.

Since 2014, the tourists in Berlin have to pay a city tax (5% from the rent) so I will ask you to pay this tax in cash the day you will arrive.

The lounge has a great view on Mauer Park and has all what you need: flat screen TV, DVD player, internet (Wi-Fi), Hi-Fi system. And a balcony.

The first bedroom has a double bed (180x200) with a private bathroom (Toilets, bathtube and separate shower) and a balcony.

The second bedroom has two singles beds (100x200) . The second bathroom has a shower, a toilet, a washing machine, a dryer, an iron and a hairdryer.

The kitchen has all what you need: dishwash
neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts of the city.
It embodies Berlin’s cultural heritage from diverse historical periods, proletarian and middle-class styles of the fin-de-siècle, just as the imprint of socialism.
What is more, there has always been a tradition of resistance and opposition giving birth to the spirit of creativity that incessantly surrounds you here.
The architecture should hold attention because in spite of the galloping renovation since the fall of the Wall, it still retains some of scars from the Second World War.
host_about:
I'm french but I have been living in Berlin since 18 years because I love this city....I am looking forward to welcome you in one of my apartments and to meet people from all over the world.
See you soon!

name: Happy-haven in the heart of Berlin
description:
Right in the middle of everything, this quirky place is a real home made in Berlin.

The space
Voller Energie und Ausstrahlung, steckt diese gemütliche 2-Zimmer-Wohnung in einem schönen Altbau. Der perfekte Ausgangspunkt für all deine Stadt-Aktivitäten in Berlin. Sie liegt mitten im Herzen des Geschehens, im berühmten Bezirk Berlin Mitte - in der 'zentraler geht es nicht'- Gegend. Cafes, Bars, Clubs, Kinos, Theater, Galerien, Restaurants, Sehenswürdigkeiten, Supermärkte, Geschäfte und öffentliche Verkehrsmittel in Hülle und Fülle, sind im Handumdrehen erreichbar.

Die Wohnung ist mit viel Komfort ausgestattet: WiFi, Badewanne, Spülmaschine, Queensize Bett, Schlafsofa, Balkon ... und alles riecht gut, weil die Gastgeberin nicht raucht und dies auch von den Gästen erwartet.

Von dem kleinen Balkon hast du einen reizvollen Blick auf die schöne Linienstraße und ein schickes Café gegenüber mit einer angeschlossenen Fahrradvermietung.
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin Mitte ist das Herz im ehemaligen Ost-Berlin. Von hier aus kann man fussläufig alle Sehenswürdigkeiten zu Fuß erkunden: Das Brandenburger Tor, der Reichstag, das Bundeskanzleramt, die Museumsinsel etc.
Nördlich erstreckt sich der Kiez des Prenzlauerberg mit der größten zusammenhängenden Gründerzeit-Architektur Europas.
host_about: A restless reporter interested in people, their countries,  languages, lives and sense of humour

name: Room w/ balcony and private bathroom in nice area
description:
I´m offering a guest room with balcony in my apartment with 3 rooms. You will have a private bathroom and share the kitchen with me. The house is centrally located close to station "Schönhauser Allee".
There are many restaurants, coffee shops, supermarkets, a mall and a gym in walking distance.
Usually there is space for two people on a comfortable sofa bed.

The space
The spacious guest room has a sunny balcony and provides a comfortable sofa bed. There is a desk if you want to work.
You will have your own private, recently renovated bathroom with a washlet (asian style toilet). The kitchen is to be shared with me.
Besides a washing machine and tumble dryer, a dish washer and coffee maker are also available.

Guest access
You can use the guest room, private bathroom and kitchen.
The other bedroom and the living room are my private rooms.
You can enter the house and the apartment without keys using your phone.
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood "Prenzlauer Berg" is centrally located. It is a green area with parks and old houses.
A big supermarket that closes at 23:30 is located around the corner and there is another small 24/7 shop in the street.
A shopping mall and a Fitness First gym can be found at the station. A big indoor swimming pool is only three stations away and open until late evening. There are many restaurants and coffee shops in the area. The popular "Mauerpark" is only 10 min away.

The subway station ("Schönleinstraße") is a 3-minute walk away and the subway (U8) takes you to the city center / Alexanderplatz in 8 minutes.
Twice a week (Tuesdays and Fridays) a mainly Turkish fabric and food market is held right outside the door, starting at 10am and ending around 6pm. neighborhood_overview: The 'Kollwitzkiez' is one of the hippest districts Berlin has to offer. The streets in our neighborhood have the charm of Parisian boulevards and encompass a wide range of trendy bistros, bars, cafes, restaurants, and grocery stores. There are also other mod cons - pharmacy, bank, coffee shops, ATMs, post office, boutique stores, live music, cinemas etc - - all within easy walking distance (no more than 15 mins). Anything else you desire should be with a 20 minute radius if you take public transport.

You will find excellent shopping (180 m), Berlin's most beautiful adventure playground (600 m), forest and beach (6, 5 km), indoor swimming pool (2, 5 km), disco (2 miles).
Parking in front of the house at any time freely available. Shops are very good. Berlin's largest shopping mall is just 5 subway stations from here. An excellent starting point for tours to Potsdam and the Spreewald.

name: Quiet studio in Prenzlauer Berg near Mauerpark
description:
Central and quiet apartment in period house in the heart of the Prenzlauer Berg. Perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic and relaxing Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods.

The space
The studio apartment is located in the rear building of a typical "Berliner Altbau". Built in 1910 it still has lofty high ceilings and windows.

The main living area has a comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), a dinner table with chairs and a spacious wardrobe.

All our duvets are single duvets.

The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle.

There is tea, coffee, salt etc. in the kichen.

The apartment does not have a TV, that's why we recommand bringing a laptop.

The bathroom has a bathtub with a shower curtain, toilet, washbasin,
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving café and art gallery culture.

In the Prenzlauer Berg you will find plenty of restaurants, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars. The popular Kollwitzplatz and Helmholzplatz are only a leisurely 10-20 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops, nightlife and a free museum about life in the DDR. Not far from there are the Berlin wall walk and Berlin wall memorial.

If you are in Berlin on a Sunday, don't miss the nearby Mauerpark with its large flea market and renowned outdoor karaoke. A must see, especially on a sunny day!

Not too far from the apartment is “Volkspark Friedrichshain”. This large and popular park, with a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer gardens, is a nice place for hanging out in the summer. For those who prefer a more active holiday it offers facilities for jogging, beach volleyball, bouldering
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple. 
We moved to Berlin about 13 years ago and are really loving it here.
It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.

We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 

We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

description:
The apartment is located in the middle of the old barn district of Berlin. Within walking distance to the Museum Island, Hackesche Höfe and Friedrichstraße. Surrounded by galleries, nice bars, cafes and restaurants.

The space
As I live in this apartment too, let me first tell you something about myself:

My name is Martin, I have been living in Berlin for about over a decade.
I am working as a cameraman and photographer and I do music.

Within the last years I used to rent out my guest room for friends and friends of friends who had short term stays in Berlin for work, study, holiday and other reasons; normally they were staying here for a couple of months; sometimes longer, sometimes even shorter.

The Location:
The location itself, the Linienstr., is a lively street in the heart of Berlin Mitte; there are lots of cafés, bars, galleries and little shops in walk-by distance. As well, many of Berlins famous locations, such
host_about:
Hi,

I´m a creative person working as art director, multi media professional and music producer.
If there is any time left, I like to meet with friends, do music and really like to travel.
I´m living in Berlin since 2004.

Hope to see you soon!

###
P.S.: Due to the current regulations, my offer is not aimed at tourists, but rather at people who move to Berlin to work and need accommodation for the period of time.

The apartment has a combined living- and bedroom, a kitchen, a bathroom, and a hallway.

The Alcantara sofa-bed in the main room offers a 200 x 140 cm large sleeping surface when unfolded. A nightstand with storage space and a radio-controlled alarm clock is at hand. Decorative lights and luminaries can be operated from either side of the sofa bed. Two chests of drawers comprise all necessary linen including pillows and provide space for your personal items.

BATHROOM
In the bathroom, you will find a bathtub with a shower, a sink, and a washer. A shelf and a mirrored cabinet provide storage space and contain bathrobes, towels, and bath sheets.

KITCHEN
Tea, coffee or coffee beans, spices

name: Chimaysaberlin B&B Front Double Bed
description:
A well-situated furnished shared apartment in Charlottenburg, located in west Berlin, 5 mins. walk to UB Richard Wagner Platz, Bus M45 to any destination in the city or outskirts. BER Airport is 40 mins with train connections to SB Charlottenburg or Zoologischer Garten. My apartment is situated in the center west with restaurants, supermarkets, along a busy road, so noise is unavoidable. Guests who look for party atmosphere, please look elsewhere, this is mainly residential area.

The space
My flat is a short walk to Charlottenburg Palace.
Jogging enthusiasts will be surprised to discover the Spree River.
The room has a double bed, with shared bathroom.
Bed linens with couvette and pillow are provided.
Transportaton:
It takes 5 mins. walk to the nearest underground station, Richard Wagner Platz, 10 mins. with bus M45 to Zoologischer Garten, and 10 mins. to Tegel or SB Charlottenburg with bus 109.
Schloss Charlottenburg, Museum Berggr
neighborhood_overview:
Charlottenburg has a very famous castle which is a few mins. walk.
Museum Bergruen, Heimat Museum, Rathaus Charlottenburg, Charlottenburg Pottery are within walking distances.
Stadtbibliothek near the Rathaus and underground station offers free wifi access from 11am to 7pm.
All the other sightseeing places are easily reached by underground station U-7 Richard Wagner Platz, or Bus M45 which goes to Zoologischer Garten, Technical University, etc.
Bus 109 goes to Airport Tegel within 10 mins or the S-Bahn Charlottenburg.
Everything is very convenient, there is even a supermarket downstairs.
host_about:
I do love to travel when I get the chance to get away for a few days or weeks visiting different continents with my backpack and roller (luggage). My best stays have been spent at bed and breakfast at different countries. I always learn something new by staying with guest families and hosts, they are my best teachers to immerse oneself into the local culture. 
My best cooking recipes have been taught by the locals and the best sightseeing trips organized by the host families.
I am looking forward to meet you and wish you a great stay in Berlin!

Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin, just a few blocks away from public transport and inmidst great restaurants and bars.

The space
Lovely one bedroom apartment in a beautifully renovated house from the early 19th century in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, one of the most popular and lively areas of Berlin.

The apartment has one bedroom with a double bed (1,60x2,00m), so it's perfect for two people, a fully equipped spacious kitchen, a comfortable bathroom (with a bathtub and a sperate shower) and a balcony. It is on the 4th floor, there is an elevator (just a few more steps to walk up).

The neighborhood is very safe at day and night, the metro and train station Schönhauser Allee is just a 5 mins. walk away, the famous "Mauerpark" (where the wall used to be) with its exciting fleamarket is just around the corner and there are
neighborhood_overview: Our holiday apartment is located in a lively area of great variety – not only in a culinary sense: you can find Vietnamese, Korean, Indian, Mexican, Spanish, American and German restaurants in walking distance. The famous Mauerpark flea market is just a short walk away, in the park you can also visit parts of the infamous Berlin wall. You can go running on the nearby track, watch football games in Friedrich-Ludwig-Jahn stadion or concerts and sport events in the Max-Schmeling-Halle. During summer days you can have a picnic in the little park at Falkplatz.
host_about:
Wir würden uns freuen, Sie bei uns in Berlin willkommen zu heißen. Für alle Ihre Fragen stehen wir Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung. Herzliche Grüße!

We would be happy to welcome you to Berlin. Please don't hesitate to ask us, if you have any questions. Best wishes!

Imme & Thorsten von "Apartment in Berlin"

description:
Welcome to one of the coolest districts of Berlin Mitte - MOABIT!

This area is a great mixture of everything Berlin has to offer. It's so different and really surprising everywhere you go!

The space
This apartment is situated on a quiet and perfectly accessible street, just between the two metro stations of line U9 (Birkenstraße and Turmstraße).

It consists of one large and well lit bedroom with living space, cozy kitchen with sit-in area, bathroom with bath and great balcony. First floor with elevator (unfortunately not suitable for handicapped).

This clean and non-smoking apartment offers its guests plenty of free parking down the street. It's surrounded by grocery shops of every kind, supermarkets, galleries, cozy cafes, great restaurants (some of them serve amazing Sunday brunches), bakeries, banks, post office, library, park for jogging, even beautiful lake with sandy beach if you come in Summer.

Our apartment is
neighborhood_overview:

neighborhood_overview:
The neighboorhood "Mitte" is a perfect starting point to see the neighborhood!
The Rosenthaler Platz is known for its bars and restaurants.
If you walk 15min. north, you will get to Bernauer Str. with the park and the former Berlin wall monument. If you walk 15min. east, you are in the famous Prenzlauer Berg with nice cafés to have a coffee and observe the locals. If you walk 15min. south, you will find yourself at Alexanderplatz with the famous Tower and lots of shops.

The space
Rent one of the rooms as single traveller or accommodate a whole bunch of people!
Shared commons include fully equipped kitchen, 2 large and modern bathrooms, a meet´n´greet and dining area with wooden table and a large lounge with free wlan access.

Completed in 1913, the building that houses this Berlin loft apartment started life as a printing factory. Today, the stunning fourth floor loft, which retains some of the quainter industrial features such as exposed brickwork, and incorporates found and hand-crafted items, is a uniquely renovated urban environment for short stay visitors and film shoots.

name: Great value studio in Prenzlauer Berg. StayBearlin
description:
Centrally located studio perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods.
Free public parking is available about 500 meters away from the apartment. The train and tram station and two supermarkets are only 200m away.

The space
This lovely studio apartment is located on the ground floor of a typical Berlin period building and has its own private entrance.

The main living area has comfortable queen size bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a double bed (184x196), and a wardrobe.

All our duvets are single duvets and the bed has two single matrasses.

The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, microwave, toaster, french press coffee maker, espresso maker and kettle. There is also a bar with 4 bar stools where you can sit comfortably and enjoy your breakfast.
There is usually some tea, c
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in a residential area of the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving café and art gallery culture.

In the Prenzlauer Berg you will find plenty of restaurants, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars. The popular Kollwitzplatz and Helmholzplatz are a leisurely 20-25 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops, nightlife and a free museum about life in the DDR. Not far from there are the Berlin wall walk and Berlin wall memorial.

If you are in Berlin on a Sunday, don't miss the nearby Mauerpark with its large flea market and renowned outdoor karaoke. A must see, especially on a sunny day!

Not too far from the apartment is “Volkspark Friedrichshain”. This large and popular park, with a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer gardens, is a nice place for hanging out in the summer. For those who prefer a more active holiday it offers facilities for jogging, beach volle
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple. 
We moved to Berlin about 13 years ago and are really loving it here.
It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.

We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 

We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

Historical.Villa, romant. Home, garden with barbecue, children welcome, four persons

name: Within the city, calm and leafy
description:
Our flat is located in an old charming house from the year 1876 in "Prenzlauer Berg".

The space
The flat (32sqm) is in the first floor of the side wing and comes with central heating and hot water generation.

The kitchen (with gas cooker) and the corridor are tiled. The living/sleeping room is with timber floor and King Size Bed (180x200). The bathroom is with tub and shower curtain.

Other things to note
Arrival with car: Our area is on-street parking controlled. From Mondays to Saturdays (9am-midnight) parking costs 1€/hour. On Sundays and red-letter days parking is free of charge.

A parking garage nearby is at "Kulturbrauerei" (Mo-Sa; 7,50,-€/day).

Guests arriving with a car will need an environmental sticker. Stickers can be issued by the vehicle registration office, technical certification organisations and authorised repair workshops. This applies to foreign vehicles as well. The vehicle registration
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin's attractions, such as the Brandenburg Gate, Hackescher Markt, Reichstag, Museum Island as well as shops, restaurants, cafés are easily reached by foot or public transport.

The ideal own flat for Berlin tourists, night owls or relatives to visit in an urban oasis with nice tenants.

We look forward to seeing you!
host_about:
Wir freuen uns über entspannte, organisierte & natürlich freundliche Gäste.

In Kürze bieten wir Euch auch tolle Übernachtungsmöglichkeiten unweit des Spreewaldes. Bleibt neugierig!

2 large rooms, kitchen with breakfast bar and balcony, very bright, 2 bathrooms.
Design furniture and lighting design.
For discerning travelers.
We rent it for long or short stays.
Registration Nr. 02 / Z / ZA / 005795-17 (Bezirksamt Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg)
The price does not include the city tax (5%) that must be payed at arrival.

The apartment is very quiet and lightly, has one bedroom with double bed, a separated dressing room, two bathrooms one with bathtub and bidet, the other with shower. It has a new Bulthaup Kitchen connected to a balcony and a dinning room. The living room area has a flatscreen LCD TV and a Designklassiker daybed. Solid oak floor, roof high cupboards, big mirrors and high quality illumination with Po
neighborhood_overview:
It is in the heart of Friedrichshain, where you will find plenty of restaurants and bars. The apartment is very quiet and you have a nice view from the balcony.
A supermarket is at 3 blocks.

name: F43 - your base for Berlin
description:
Living, working, cooking, sleeping in a fully equipped apartment.
Oberbaum-bridge, East Side Gallery or tasty and affordable food in one of the many restaurants of our neighbourhood.

The space
Apartment F43 is centrally located, sunny, quiet and inexpensive.
Our stucco-studio has 36 sqm. It has got a double bed and a bed sofa that may alternatively serve as single or double bed. A second table offers space for a tiny home-office.

The kitchen provides a 4-plate-glass-ceramic-plate, dish-washer, washing-machine and everything else you could ask forwhile working in Berlin.

If you have to prepare for an elegant dinner or an important business meeting you will find ironing equipment and a blow-dryer.

Enjoy your time at F43!

Other things to note
We are on fourth floor plus ground floor and there is no lift. Some like that because it is quiet and sunny up there some don't because it is too much strain.

The space

the multi-family flat has an historic background of formerly being a barn-house for carriage drivers in 1906. It is located in the gorgeous and very safe siting of Berlin Wannsee. The area of Wannsee, in which the two apartments lie, offers a beautiful variety of landscape, spreading from forest, to lakes and to culture. name: nettes Einzelzimmer 1.3 (1. Etage)
description:
Das Haus liegt im historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf mit zahlreichen Cafés, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Freizeitmöglichkeiten in der nahen Umgebung.
Wir sind Teil der Bewegung „Gib Antikommunismus keine Chance!“, 2020 vom "Internationalistischen Bündnis gegen Rechtsentwicklung, Faschismus und Krieg" initiiert.
AAngebot: sachkundige Stadtspaziergänge zu entsprechenden Themen, auch zur Umgebung oder touristischen Highlights. Gruppen bis 8 Personen 20 Euro, jede weitere Person 2 Euro.

The space
Das abschließbare Zweibett-Zimmer liegt in einer Gästewohnung im 1. Stock. Küche mit Herd, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle, Dusch-/Waschräume und Toiletten sind Gemeinschaftsräume.
Insgesamt bieten wir 3 Wohnungen mit Einzel-, Doppel-und Dreibettzimmern und eine Ferienwohnung an. Die Ferienwohnung für maximal 4 Personen befindet sich in der 2. Etage und verfügt über ein Zimmer mit TV, Bad, Küche und eine Waschmaschine.
Paare, alleinreisende Abenteurer
neighborhood_overview:
Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld.
In Berlin bieten sich zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, historische und moderne Kultur besuchen, sich zu erholen, das Zusammenwachsen von Ost und West intensiv und lebendig erleben. Besondere Anziehungspunkten sind der historische Stadtkern mit dem Brandenburger Tor und der Straße unter den Linden sowie dem angrenzenden Regierungsviertel, einzigartige Museen, eine traditionsreiche Industriekultur, moderne Architektur oder die städtischen Naherholungsgebiete.
Auf Wunsch gestalten wir Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis 8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.
host_about:
Herzlich willkommen in meiner Unterkunft in Berlin Neukölln

Ich würde mich freuen, wenn Ihr Euch für meine Wohnung entscheidet und stehe Euch gerne mit Tipps zur Seite.

name: Gorgeous Home in the Heart of East Berlin
description:
Spacious, beautifully furnished apartment, perfectly located in central Friedrichshain, one of the city's most vibrant, hip neighbourhoods. 15 minutes from Alexanderplatz and East Side Gallery. Explore Berlin in style, enjoy the balcony views, or Netflix & chill on rainy days.

The space
The heart of the spacious living room is the lounge area with an ultra comfortable three-seater sofa, several lounge chairs, a 55 inch 4K Ambilight TV with Netflix and Apple TV. Customisable mood lighting projects the TV colour ambiance into the room, or allows you to set your own mood. The vintage wood desk doubles as a dining table for up to 4 people, and the house bar is well equipped with all the tools you need to make yourself some proper cocktails and start your evening the Old Fashioned way. The living room also has a small adjacent balcony that can be used for a cozy breakfast for two, or smoking breaks.

The quiet bed room faces the inner courtyard and features
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is perfectly located only two minutes away from Boxhagener Platz and the Simon-Dach-Kiez, with countless bars, cafés and restaurants in the direct vicinity, but just where it starts to get a bit quieter, so you won't have hordes of people in front of the house all weekend.
host_about: I'm Kai, and I love traveling just as much as you do, as well as the creation and enjoyment of great food & cocktails, cinema, parties, shows, making new friends... :) Some of my last adventures took me to Myanmar, Ko Lanta, Paris, Hiddensee, Istanbul, Copenhagen, Cuba and South Africa.

Insgesamt bieten wir 3 Wohnungen mit Einzel-, Doppel-und Dreibettzimmern und eine Ferienwohnung an. Die Ferienwohnung für maximal 4 Personen befindet sich in der 2. Etage und verfügt über ein Zimmer mit TV, Bad, Küche und eine Waschmaschine.
Paare, alle
neighborhood_overview:
Die Unterkünfte liegen im Bezirk Neukölln mitten im 1737 gegründeten historischen Arbeiterviertel Böhmisch-Rixdorf. In unmittelbarer Umgebung: Cafés, Bars, Einkaufsmöglichkeiten, Neuköllner Oper, Kinos, zahlreiche Galerien, Volkspark Hasenheide und Tempelhofer Feld.
In Berlin bieten sich zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, historische und moderne Kultur besuchen, sich zu erholen, das Zusammenwachsen von Ost und West intensiv und lebendig erleben. Besondere Anziehungspunkten sind der historische Stadtkern mit dem Brandenburger Tor und der Straße unter den Linden sowie dem angrenzenden Regierungsviertel, einzigartige Museen, eine traditionsreiche Industriekultur, moderne Architektur oder die städtischen Naherholungsgebiete.
Auf Wunsch gestalten wir Stadtführungen mit sachkundigen Stadtführern. Hierzu beraten wir Sie gern. Für Gruppen bis 8 Personen bieten wir Führungen für 20 Euro an, jede weitere Person 2 Euro. Die Nutzung des Berliner Nahverkehrs kostet extra.

Die 3 Zimmer Wohnung in der Kalckreuthstraße 3 ist eine 80m² große Wohnung mit eigenen Wannenbad und einer komfortablen Küche gelegen im Erdgeschoss mit Blick in einen ruhigen grünen Innenhofgarten.

The space
Es ist eine renovierte Altbauwohnung in einem repräsentativen typischen Berliner Altbau, ruhig im Erdgeschoss des Seitenflügels zum Hofgarten hin gelegen.
Alle 3 Zimmer sind ausgestattet mit Betten, Schränken und Nachtischen. Im großen Zimmer ist ein großer Esstisch mit Stühlen und einem Fernseher.
Das Bad des Appartements ist gefliest und mit einer Badewanne versehen. Es fließt wahlweise Kalt-/ Warm- oder Heißwasser auch mit hohem Wasserdruck. Waschmaschine und Trockner sind vorhanden.
Die Küche mit kleinen Essplatz, Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Geschirrspüler und Elektroherd mit Backofen lädt zur Selbstverpflegung ein.

Guest access
Sie mieten die gesamte Wohnung. Niemand anderes hat Zugang. Sie haben ein eigenes Bad mit
neighborhood_overview: Die Kalckreuthstraße ist eine ruhige Anliegerstraße mit Bäumen und Antiquitätengeschäften. Sie liegt zwischen den U-Bahn-Stationen Wittenberg- und Nollendorfplatz. Man wohnt zwischen dem Kurfürstendamm und dem Potsdamer Platz, der Mitte West und der Mitte Ost in der Nähe des Tiergartens mit seinen Erholungsmöglichkeiten und dem Botschaftsviertel. Mittwochs und samstags ist auf dem nahe gelegenen Winterfeldtplatz ein über die Grenzen Berlins hinaus bekannter Markt. Die Berliner Innenstadt ist sehr weitläufig und deshalb zu Fuß nur teilweise erkundbar. Die Parksituation ist für Berliner Innenstadtverhältnisse recht entspannt.

This spacious bright bedroom (25 sqm), with a large terrace and a sliding glass wall of windows, has a double-bed, a wooden desk and an antique wooden closet.

neighborhood_overview:
This is the most socio-politically diverse neighborhood I have ever seen. A place where you can literally sit down and talk with a sandalmaker, a surgeon, and an anarchist from three different countries over a burrito.

It has restaurants, cafes, punk bars, undefined performance spaces, graffiti, squats, lounges, boutiques, skate shops, green parks, clubs, stalinist architecture, live music, and bookstores.

name: LOVELY APARTMENT - CENTRAL - QUIET
description:
Newly redone furnished apartment, very central - apartment is situated within walking distance from public transportation: only some min. to Potsdamer Platz, Kurfürstendamm & Zoologischer Garten or lovely Winterfeldtplatz in Schöneberg.

The space
Newly redone furnished studio-apartment in the middle of the so-called Schöneberger Insel, a traditional and typical Kiez (neighborhood) of Berlin. We are centrally located - the apartment is situated within walking distance from public transportation, railway and bus station : 7 min. to the Winterfeldtplatz, 15 min. to the Kurfürstendamm & Zoologischer Garten (City West); 6 min. to Potsdamer Platz (City East).

Tree lined streets with small shops and cafes among old turn of the century stucco apartment buildings make up this small neighborhood in Southern Schöneberg, only minutes away from Winterfeldplatz, Akazienstrasse, Crellestrasse in Schöneberg or the bustling Bergmannstrasse in Kreuzberg.

Quie
host_about:
Motto? Maybe in those days:.... „It's better to burn out than it is to rust“
But then -  finally growing  older and exposed to decay, and some rust - 
and seeing my family and friends getting older and rust is... great!

Dear guest, welcome to our wonderful city and marvelous and interesting district ‘Schöneberg‘. You are looking for a cozy and central apartment? You are interested in places off the beaten path? So please do not hesitate to ask us. However - we are always happy to help with all your questions and your satisfaction is important to us!

name: Bright, Charming and Modern Altbau
description:
The rare and much sought after Altbaus of Berlin are a joy to experience! These are the grand apartments from before first world war with high ceilings and Flur that leads to each and every room. Come-in and enjoy this unique experience! All-inclusive pricing, completely flexible cancellation and no check-in/out restrictions... we travel a lot and hence, we know what we expect when we are the guests! :) PS: Our nightly price is all-inclusive, no extra cleaning fees, no additional charges!

The space
Altbaus in Berlin are a speciality (as most were damaged or destroyed during the world wars). This ground-floor apartment (no stairs to climb!) is in the building that dates back to 1910.

The apartment is located in Wilmersdorf (a premium west Berlin neighborhood) with easy access to public transportation through S-Bahn (41, 42, 46), U-bahn (U3) and multiple buses. The freeway A100 is at 2-minutes driving distance (exit of Meclenburgische Str / Detmold
neighborhood_overview: This is the prime residential area of old West Berlin (American Sector).  Lush trees, clean and well maintained cobblestone roads and footpaths, beautiful apartment blocks splashed with gardens, parks, restaurants and pubs... Big Aldi is just 2 minutes walk away.
host_about:
Hi there!  I am Prasad and I live in three countries ... India, Germany and USA... I come from India and have job in USA and a home in Germany...over time, have made all three countries my home bases.  I love music, books, travel and capoeira!  I am married and have a lovely wife and two sons, 15 (ready to get his own car...yikes!!) and 6.  Our dog is Lucy - a loving, silly and energetic yellow Lab who turned 1 year old in April 2019...

As  guest, I like simple and clean accommodations that offer a unique perspective of the location.  Tips from the host on local restaurants, beaches, treks and shops make my day!

As host, I like guests that keep my apartment neat and clean. I also enjoy to get to know my guests and hear about their travels.  I try to offer all amenities and flexibility that I find useful as a guest while traveling.

In my travels and hosting adventures, I hope I am making this world a little bit better than before...

name: Zu schön um wahr zu sein - Berlin Friedrichshain!
description:
Ein schönes und ruhiges Apartment inmitten von Friedrichshain - und ein ruhiger Ort zum Entspannen.

The space
Ein schön und gemütlich ausgestattetes Apartment in einem Haus von 1905, im Zentrum von Friedrichshain.
Das Apartment liegt im Vorderhaus und hat einen kleinen begrünten Hof vor den Fenstern , wo es einen Tisch und Stühle gibt - ideal für Raucher!
Das Apartment hat eine Deckenhöhe von 3,50 m - und sowohl Gardinen wie auch Rolläden, die absolut licht-undurchlässig sind, was gerade im Sommer morgens wichtig ist.
Das große Zimmer hat einen Dielenboden, die Küche einen Boden mit alten schönen grün-weißen Fliesen.
Die Dusche des Apartments wurde vor Jahren in die Küche eingebaut (was früher in Berlin nicht unüblich war in der Zeit wo man begann, Wohnungen mit Bad oder Dusche auszustatten). Haarfön und mehrere Shampoos werden bereitgestellt.

Die Küche hat:
- einen Tisch sowie 2 Stühle,
neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain ist bekannt für sein ausgiebiges Tag-und Nachtleben, seine Bars und Restaurants, aber auch der Wochenmarkt am Samstag und der Flohmarkt Sonntags auf dem Boxhagener Platz sind großartig. Der Bezirk ist zum Besuchermagneten geworden - zum Glück ist es ein schöner Tourismus und kein Ballermann.
Und die Friedrichshainer lieben ihren Bezirk abgöttisch und sind sehr heimatverbunden - ausserdem: Wo bitte gibt es soooooo viele vegetarische Restaurants, soooooooo viele vegane Produkte - natürlich nur in Friedrichshain - Sie können hier sogar vegane Kleidung und vegane Kopfbedeckungen kaufen.
Ausserdem stört sich hier keiner daran, wenn jemand beim Kauf eines Schmuckstückes dieses im Sortiment des Geschäftes auspendelt und sich dann entscheidet, ob er/sie es kauft.

Gleich um die Ecke ist die imposante Frankfurter Allee, erbaut Anfang der 50er-Jahre als 'Stalinallee', mit Plattenbauten, Wohnblöcken und Türmen in einem Stilmix aus Sozialistischem Klassizismus
host_about:
Hello, I'm Apostolos. I like to welcome you in my beautiful apartment in Berlin-Friedrichshain and I wish you a great stay. 
Yes, I know - you will like the place and this area in Berlin.

Blue jewel in a green district.

The space
We welcoming you to our quiet apartment in Berlin-Johannisthal.
In December 2010 we have renovated the 52 square meter apartment,
so our guests will feel at home.
The living room is equipped with TV, stereo, safe, oak floors and 2 sofa beds offer a sleeping option for 2 people. These sofa beds provide excellent sleeping comfort.
The bedroom has a180 cm wide double bed (two mattresses) and is equipped with high-quality wool carpeting.
The bathroom with tub and shower and separate guest toilet allows 4 people "conflict free" bathing and showering.
The mini kitchen is combined with a spacious dining hall and its granite surface cools in summer and keeps the feet warm in wintertime.
Suitcases will find a place in a small storeroom.
You always find parking space right in front of the house.

You will enjoy jogging and walking in the forest K
host_about:
Hallo zusammen! 

Ich bin Katharina und wohne seit 1975 in meiner Wahlheimat, Berlin. 
Ich habe viele Jahre im Ausland gelebt und würde mich freuen viele internationale Gäste bei mir aufnehmen zu können! 

Zu meinen Hobbies zählen Pferde, Wanderreiten, Hunde, Bücher und Politik.

Viele Grüße!

A lovely and spacious room with a balcony in our beautiful airy and light-filled apartment in the Kollwitzstrasse. Sleeps two. We share the well-equipped kitchen, bathroom and utility room.

The space
Our home has been home to Airbnb guests since 2012. Centrally located in a peaceful family-friendly inner-city neighbourhood, the relaxed atmosphere put you in a holiday mood. The apartment building is located on the fourth floor of a building built in the 1870s and refurbished in 2002. Hanno + Zaki moved in right after. Their daughter Suraya joined them more than 14 years ago. Suraya is a well-travelled teenager and is very used to being a host herself.

Surrounded by cafes, restaurants, bakeries, playgrounds and street-level shops of all kinds, one does not need to venture far. Even the adjoining neighbourhoods are similar with well restored turn of the century residential and commercial buildings. We are also a stone's throw away from the lovely parts of
neighborhood_overview: We are surrounded by a great variety of restaurants and cafes, public squares with playgrounds and street-level shops of all kinds. On Saturdays, the Kollwitzplatz market boasts a range of exquisite stands, that offer fine foods, organic fruits and vegetables, handmade wares and much more. A highlight here is a stand specialising in a finer version of the renowned Berliner Currywurst. On Thursdays, the Kollwitzplatz organic market offers a smaller selection, which nevertheless covers all your needs. The well-known flea market, open on Sundays, at the Mauer Park is also walking distance.
host_about:
HaZaSu is Hanno, Zaki and Suraya. We, Hanno and Zaki, are media professionals. We both teach media and develop our own projects, very often with our 12-year-old daughter Suraya. 

We love to travel for work and to visit friends elsewhere on this earth. Suraya has been on the move since she was six months, accompanying us when we are researching and working. 

It has been a wonderful experience getting to know so many people from around the world. We are good at figuring out how much privacy or support our guests wish for.

BEMYGUESTBERLIN
hosting management service
Hi my Name is Rudie .
Born in the Netherlands, I moved to Berlin beginning of the eighties (West-Berlin a city surrounded by the Berlin wall).
