I studied citytour guiding and Museum guiding and I started my agency bemyguestberlin. 
Apart from my work as a museum guide at the DDR (GDR) Museum
I am taking care of subletting eather private properties or guest apartments often owned by my former Artist collegues  when they are on tour, on hollidays or working in another Country on a  new Project.

I love to be a host and Meeting People from all over the world.
I love to tell them about the Location and about Berlin.
Help them with finding Food places, bike Rentals and sustainable second hand stores.


I love good Food.
I have a dog.
I am a Yoga teacher.
Love good exhibitions.
Love Fashion and life style.
Speaking german, dutch and english fluently.

name: Urban Apartment Berlin
description:
Comfortable and cosy Apartment in a very nice district of Berlin Kreuzberg in the center of Berlin.
Because of it´s central location in the city, the apartment is for all those, who want to visit Berlin for it´s touristic attractions as well as for it´s nightlife the right place to begin their journey.

The space
Welcome to the center of Berlin. Since January 2012, you can explore the city from this central, convenient and nevertheless calmly located domicile. Or as a business traveler you plan your dates from our tasteful furnished apartment. Whether Bar, Theater, Club or Opera – this reconstructed and fully refurbished landmarked Gründerzeit building offers an ideal starting point to reach nearly every destination of Berlin in a short time. Even for longer stays the flat is best fitted with washing mashine, dishwasher, DVD-Player, Internet (Lan and W-Lan) etc. The holiday apartment is located at the Landwehrkanal in the beautiful Graefekiez in Berlin Kreuz
neighborhood_overview:
Who wants to experience Berlin is here in the right place.
Berlin as a microcosm: lively, colorful and multicultural - this is the area between the Landwehr Canal and the Hasenheide called Graefe-Kiez. Here you will find about 100 attractive shops for good shopping possibilities and the gastronomic offer of cafes, bars and restaurants is extremely divers. Those who prefer to relax alone or with your partner on a longish walk can do this extensively on the banks of the Landwehr Canal, which provides on both sides long hiking trails. This route is also popular among joggers. The public park Hasenheide in turn provides an open-air cinema, a small zoo for children and large areas for relaxation. The former Tempelhof Airport, now called Tempelhofer Freiheit, is Berlin´s largest park area and within walking distance from the apartment.
And because of it´s central location in the city, the apartment is for all those, who want to visit Berlin for it´s touristic attractions as well as

name: Stylish lodge in the heart of Kreuz
description:
The space
In a prime location

Immerse yourself in a Berlin living with his typical flair and enjoy in the vibrant Kreuzberg is a stylish home from home right on the Spree.

This quiet apartment in a former jam factory was established in January 2012 with a keen sense of love and beautiful interiors. Relaxed beach bars, trendy clubs and great restaurants are just around the corner. Right in the front building is a first-class Frenchman with an excellent wine cellar. Countless real Berlin pubs have are open all night and the appetite for it in between with kebab takeaways, pizza and homemade burgers first quality. Five minutes and you reach the Bethany House of Artists, ten minutes to the "bathing ship", a swimming pool with a floating pontoon on the River Spree, from which to admire your great passing ships.


Quickly blown away

Transport links are perfect. You have 300 meters to the underground, 800 m to the S-Bahn

name: Apartment: Grazer Gärten in Berlin
description:
Central location, sunny, quiet, comfortable, WLAN-flatrate, optional car parking space. Beautiful old building apartment in a listed building ensemble from the 30's of the 20th century.
Parking space and bed linen and towels can be booked optionally.

The space
3-room apartment, 66 m² for max. 6 persons, living room, 2 bedrooms, kitchen, bathroom, balcony. Very nice, bright apartment, on the 4th floor with a view over Schöneberg into the greenery. You enter the apartment through a spacious hallway with wardrobe. The living room with cable TV , DVD player, stereo, WLAN -Flatrate has a dining area for 6 people, a comfortable sofa bed, as well as a bookshelf with Berlin information and exciting literature for rainy days. On the large south-facing balcony is a sitting area. There is a cozy, spacious bedroom with a double bed and large closet, as well as a smaller bedroom with a comfortable sofa bed and 2 closets. The kitchen with breakfast area is fully equipped
neighborhood_overview: Within walking distance you can reach many small stores in the area. Steglitzer Schlossstraße, one of the largest and most modern shopping streets in Berlin is about 1.5km away. Nearby: Summer outdoor pool and Berlin Planetarium at the Insulaner. The southern area, a former marshalling yard, which was "forgotten" until the 80s. Old signal boxes, rails leading to nowhere, locomotives, weathered engine sheds and a water tower have been reclaimed and overgrown by nature. In between, artists have (exhibited) their works, a total work of art that is unique in Europe. Those who climb the 78m high disused gasometer behind Südbahnhof are rewarded with a breathtaking view over Berlin. Other Schöneberg highlights: The lively Winterfeldmarkt, which takes place every Wednesday and Saturday. The KaDeWe department store on Wittenbergplatz with a gourmet floor. Akazienstrasse and Goltzstrasse: lots of small stores with delicatessen, fashion, accessories, junk, antiques, cafés and restaurants.

host_about:
About 15 years I´m offering my Apartments for guests from all over the World. As well as  I like to travel, I know about the issues at travelling and like to offer them in my Apartments!
I would be glad to offer my Apartments with people from abroad or traveling to Berlin. I will be happy to advise you about the best activities in the city and help you having a great time in Berlin, the open minded capital..
Around the corner you will find my small antiques shop, where you can find a lot of collectibles from the “old” always young Berlin.
I like good food and wine, travelling and searching collectibles.

Seit 15 Jahren freue ich mich Gäste aus aller Welt in meinen Apartments begrüßen zu können.
Selber weit gereist, weiß ich um die Notwendigkeiten die eine Ferienwohnung bieten soll. 
All dies bieten meine beiden Wohnungen hier in Berlin, der toleranten Haupstadt.

Da beide Wohnungen  in einem Haus liegen sind sie auch gut geeignet für kleine Gruppen.

Meine Vorlieben sind gutes Essen und der richtige Wein dazu, Reisen und Sammlerstücke finden.

Ich selber betreibe gleich um die Ecke einen kleinen Antiquitätenladen in dem Sie viele Dinge des vergangenen Jahrhunderts aus dem "alten", ewig jungem Berlin finden können.

Ich freue mich auf Ihren Besuch

Alex

name: Apartment Berlin Kreuzberg
description:
Looking for an apartment in central Berlin for a while – for a few days or more? A stylish place with all the mod cons and the right atmosphere?
In beautiful listed brick buildings?

The space
Looking for an apartment in central Berlin for a while – for a few days or more? A stylish place with all the mod cons and the right atmosphere?

Well, you’ve come to the right place. Our apartment is on the grounds of the old Urban hospital in Kreuzberg: beautiful listed brick buildings in car-free gardens lined with plane trees, by the banks of the Landwehrkanal and in the heart of the Graefekiez, one of Berlin’s most popular neighbourhoods.
Shops, cafés, bars and restaurants are just a stone’s throw away, and public transport is easily reached: the M41 bus, which goes to central station, stops just around the corner and the subway lines U8, U7 and U1 are just a short walk away.
The maisonette apartment was completed in October 2011. Its desi

name: Modern Room in a nice Environment
description:
The space
Location Description:
The house is beautifully located in Spandau on the western outskirts of Berlin, near the fairgrounds, the Olympic Stadium and the airport Tegel. Here are the Havel River, lakes and fields, as well as the historical Old Town. Transport links are very convenient, whether by car, train or public transport.

host_about:
About 15 years I´m offering my Apartments for guests from all over the World. As well as  I like to travel, I know about the issues at travelling and like to offer them in my Apartments!
I would be glad to offer my Apartments with people from abroad or traveling to Berlin. I will be happy to advise you about the best activities in the city and help you having a great time in Berlin, the open minded capital..
Around the corner you will find my small antiques shop, where you can find a lot of collectibles from the “old” always young Berlin.
I like good food and wine, travelling and searching collectibles.

Seit 15 Jahren freue ich mich Gäste aus aller Welt in meinen Apartments begrüßen zu können.
Selber weit gereist, weiß ich um die Notwendigkeiten die eine Ferienwohnung bieten soll.

Da beide Wohnungen  in einem Haus liegen sind sie auch gut geeignet für kleine Gruppen.

Meine Vorlieben sind gutes Essen und der richtige Wein dazu, Reisen und Sammlerstücke finden.

Ich selber betreibe gleich um die Ecke einen kleinen Antiquitätenladen in dem Sie viele Dinge des vergangenen Jahrhunderts aus dem "alten", ewig jungem Berlin finden können.

Ich freue mich auf Ihren Besuch

Alex

The apartment has everything necessary for a comfortable stay. The large living room has a sofa bed (sleeps 2 people), a table for 4 people and a door leading onto a balcony equipped with a table and chairs. The bathroom has a bath with a shower, and there is als
neighborhood_overview:
There are numerous shops and cafés nearby, and many restaurants offering a wide choice of cuisines.

At the weekend, the flea market at the nearby Boxhagener Platz is a great place to pick up some retro fashion, furniture or some old vinyl records.

On saturdays a food market includes plenty of small stands selling fresh seasonal, organic fruit and vegetables, plus other speciality stands including a turkish stand making fresh bread and a marshmallow stand..

Within walking distance is the East Side Gallery and Karl Marx allee with its Stalinist style buildings.

From Warschauer strasse s-Bahn station, you can reach Alexanderplatz and the TV tower in 6 minutes, you are also only 10 minutes away from the central Friedrichsstrasse shopping area. To get to the airport Schönefeld is under 30 minutes away and Tegel Airport is under 40 minutes away.

neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain-Kreuzberg, the heart of night life in Berlin. The flat is located at walkable distance from famous night clubs as Berghain, Watergate, Katerblau.
Also Mercedes Arena and Universal Studios are at 5 minutes walk.
The East side Gallery with its famous murales are around the corner,
as well as the famous RAW area of revaler strasse.
However the area is also quiet with restaurants and bio markets nearby.
Boxi flea market on sunday is a not to be missed for the lovers of vintage and antiquites that dont want to suffer in the overcrowed mauer park

host_about:
I live in a huge old flat (100% original berliner altbau) and travel a lot for work and holidays.
When I travel you have the chance to rent the all flat for yourself, when I am  here I love to host and meet new people from all over the world.

I am a photographer and a tango dancer. I am very open minded, I have been living and working in Rome, London, Paris, New York.
My girlfriend often helps me in the flat.
We are very calm and quiet and silent, and I like that atmosphere in the flat.
Please only book these rooms if you are able to enter and respect someone's else home and being able to interact with strangers.
Those who are looking only for a cheap accommodation during their crazy weekends in Berlin, please go to a youth hostel.

name: 2 room Apartment Schöneberg
description:
The space
The Apartment:

This wonderful two room apartment is located in the idyllic backyard of an old building and is therefore also a quite place to stay and enjoy a green view in the backyard. The apartment features classic design and offers all imaginable comfort, thus catering for a truly homey feeling. A spacious bathroom with a huge bath tub allow for relaxing moments after a long day in the city. The kitchen is remarkably well equipped to do one own's cooking during a longer stay. A large flatscreen TV and wireless internet are both available in the apartment, as is a washing machine and a dryer.

name: Friedrichshain/Oskreuz !!
description:
The area of Berlin where there is a perfect mixture between the old and the new Berlin. You can still feel the roughness with all its graffiti and street art, the mixed audience, the many coffee bars and restaurants. It's also a very green area..

The space
Hands up who can imagine them self snuggled up on that sofa. Thought so! This apartment is nothing if not cosy. And the interior is evidently the work of someone with an eye for design. Rich colours – not least in the anime artwork – give every room a cheery touch. We like those varnished wooden floors. And there’s even a cheeky balcony thrown in too.

The apartment is located at a quiet point in Freidrichshain this means no tramline orso in front of the house and this will assure you to sleep in absolute quietness...

the main S-bahn station Ostkreuz is at 5 minutes walking distance..And has a direct line to the airport.

A tram station is only 3 minutes walking ....
Simon D
neighborhood_overview: We love the mix of real Berliners and foreigners here. The many cafe's, bars, parks and restaurants surroundig the area. The Graffiti and street art that surrounds us. Yet it's quiet and a good place to relax.

name: CUTE´N´COSY - HAPPYSTYLISH - CENTRE
description:
The space
Welcome to your cute, crazy, happy and cosy home!

We offer a romantic and really beautiful bedroom with a small balcony, a cosy and stylish open plan kitchen/living room, and a bathroom.

You'll have all the comfort of a hotel room (towels, sheets, hairdryer etc), as well as being able to feel at home and cook - but we recommend: don't cook! There are so many great places to eat, including of course fantastic traditional German restaurants.

The apartment is perfectly located:

* 30 seconds walk to the park at the Wasserturm, which is surrounded by restaurants and nice shops
* 2 min walk to the beautiful Kollwitzplatz and its gorgeous Saturday food market and restaurants
* 10 min walk to the vibrant Kastanien Allee and Oderberger Str which leads to the thriving (and huge) Sunday flea market
* 5 minute tram ride to Alexanderplatz and historical Mitte.
* Taxi stop directly in front of the door

name: Berlin Designer Apartment Marlene
description:
The space
Welcome in the house of birth of the famous Marlene Dietrich.

What is now Leberstrasse 65 in Berlin, is the place of birth of legendary Marlene Dietrich. To this day, this part of Schöneberg is know to most Berliners, and is also known as "Rote Insel" (Red Island).

In the rear building of this house, the apartment is located on the 3rd floor. It was extensively renovated in a style that combines elements of industrial, modern and 50's looks with original elements.

The apartment has 45 sqm (484 sqft) and is a mostly open space. Only the bathroom is separated from the rest by an illuminated glass wall. The shower has changeable lighting, with alternating or fixed colors, as you prefer it.

The dining table seats three, but seating is extendable to six. An open kitchen with gas stove and kitchen hood is integrated in the living space.

The bed is on a podium, from where you can oversee the whole place. I

Roof terrace flat with elavator and a stunnig view over Berlin.

A small supermarket is only 30 seconds away where you find everything for a good start.
Opposite is a bakery, coffeeshop & healthfoodstore.
Charming small boutiques and Cafes are everywhere
The S-Bahn station Charlottenburg with buses and taxi are only 3 minutes away. It takes you only minutes to the center of Berlin.

I like to share this  experience with guests that come to my homes or flats in different places. It is a pleasure to welcome friends and guests and I am happy when they enjoy this too and treat these places like their own. name: Truly Neukoelln (Minimum stay 3 months)
description:
Bright, comfortable. fully equipped and right in the heart of Neukoelln. Minimum stay 3 months.

The space
The bright and spacious apartment has a living room, a bed room, kitchen, bathroom and small balcony towards the south. Even in autumn and winter there is a lot of light in the flat which has been completely renovated, while I tried to preserve the old elements like a wooden floor, high sealings, old wooden doors with figurative elements as well as the old oven (still works but obviously central heating is easier to use). It is fully furnished with partly old, partly new furniture that gives a very individual touch to the place. The kitchen is fully equipped and there is also a washing machine, towels and bed sheets are provided. Moreover it has WiFi access.
It is located close to Richardplatz, a quite well known square with restaurants and bars. People from all over the world live in Neukölln which creates an open atmosphere and makes especially young p
neighborhood_overview: When I moved to Neukoelln in the 90ies of the last century :) I rather avoided mentioning where I lived. It was not considered a good address. I thought to myself "good they don't know, rents will stay low". Years later it became known that Neukoelln is full of charme, beautiful architecture and a wonderful mix of people. It has a lot of green and very special locations that still seem to be beyond the tourist route. Just to mention a few: Koernerpark, Comeniusgarten and old Rixdorf, the Sunday flea market on the Obi parking space, the Saalbau etc., etc.
host_about: Hi, my name is Baerbel. Apart from my mother tongue German, I speak English, Spanish and Polish. I work in the cultural field in the public sector.

Our large, light-flooded 100m2 apartment at the banks of river Spree, fully furnished with high standard design and contemporary art pieces is an oasis of tranquility in Berlin-Mitte.
Included is 1 bedroom with 2 double beds; a shared livingroom/kitchen/bathroom. Spacious enough for up to 4 adults or a family, 1 balcony, very central.

The space
1 Bedroom and a shared living-room in a beautiful, very bright and large 3-room apartment, 1076 square feet (100m²), tastefully furnished, within sight of the river Spree in the Hansaviertel (northern Tiergarten) 4th floor front building without elevator. High quality historical building with high ceilings (3,80 m) and old style wooden floor, in a very clean and quiet house. We have many paintings and art objects on the walls. The view over the roofs of the neighborhood is gorgeous. Although the apartment is located in the city center, it has a very quiet ambiance with no street noise.
In the shared living-room
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the quiet and clean Hansaviertel (northern Tiergharten), next to the river Spree, with many architecturally interesting buildings from the 1959 exposition (Le Corbusier, Oscar Niemeyer etc.). We also love the immediate neighborhood Moabit, there are nice cafés, bars, restaurants, art galleries: Good shopping facilities, as the Moabit Market Hall, a health food store around the corner, and supermarkets. The banks of the Spree at the door, and at 10 min. walk the “Berlin Central Park” Tiergarten (for jogging, recreation), the Academy of Arts, the Siegessäule.
host_about: Hi, I am Michael. Me and my wife Salomé work as medical doctors in Berlin hospitals. We live with our 3 kids in Moabit-Tiergarten. Looking forward to accomodate whoever wants to explore Berlin, and needs a beautiful & quiet home base.

name: Zimmer NY, EFH, Pool, Garten, Terrassen
description:
The space
Ein schönes Zimmer im 1. OG mit Internetanschluß. Neben dem Doppelbett (160x200) kann noch die Couch für eine zusätzliche Person als Schlafplatz genutzt werden. Im Zimmer befindet sich ein TV und Internetanschluß.
Natürlich gibt es einen Kleiderschrank mit Spiegel.
Das geräumige Bad steht den Mietern unserer zwei Zimmer allein zur Verfügung.
Im Sommer kann auf eigene Verantwortung der schöne Pool
(6,23 x 3,60 m) und die beiden Terrassen selbstverständlich mitbenutzt werden.
Gartenmöbel wie Liegen und Stühle sind ausreichend vorhanden.
Auch kann man hier im Sommer natülich den Grill benutzen und somit schöne Abende am Pool genießen.
Im Haus befinden sich zwei Katzen, welche sich aber sehr viel außerhalb des Hauses aufhalten.
In ca. 25 Minuten ist man mit Auto sowohl in der City West wie auch City Ost.
Der Spreewald und das Tropical Island sind durch den sehr günstigen Autobahnanschluss ebenfalls schnell erreichbar.
host_about:
Hallo,
wir sind ein nettes Paar, welches sich immer über nette Gäste freut.
Viel Spaß bei uns.

name: Gorgeous room in Prenzlauer Berg!
description:
The space
The room is fully furnished (with a huge, luxurious original 5-star Hilton bed and a super comfy couch) and there is enough space for 2 people if you are travelling together. You'll be sharing our very beautiful, bright and spacious 2-bedroom flat on the top floor with me and my dear lovely sister Kati. Kati works in the music industry, I'm a singer-songwriter and voice therapist. We've been living in Berlin (and loving it!:-) all our lives.
We'll be happy to share our recommendations for a perfect Berlin trip anytime :-). Our flat is equipped with a cozy, super mordern kitchen (incl. dish washer, stove/oven, large fridge freezer, blender etc.) and a large, clean bathroom (incl. tub, power shower). There also is WiFi in the flat.

The apartment is located in the heart of Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg, directly in the Kollwitzkiez, which is a unique, stunningly beautiful area of Berlin. There's a huge variety of restaurants, bars and clubs right at your d
host_about:
Hello dear Airbnb guests and hosts,

My name is Jay and I'm from Berlin, Germany. I'm an airbnb host myself and I absolutely adore travelling as well as hosting other lovely people from around the world. I recently moved back to Berlin from London, where I lived for 5 years to study for a BA Hons Commercial Music. I love making music, travelling, acting, languages, (re)discovering nature, quality parties as well as hanging out and cooking with friends. I'm a fan of adventures and always open to new experiences :-). I really look forward to meeting you and finding out more about your culture and home countries! All good wishes from Berlin, Jay

name: Charming studio in Prenzlauer Berg by StayBearlin
description:
Centrally located studio perfect for couples and people who are looking for an authentic Berlin experience in one of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods.
Free public parking is available 500 meters away from the apartment. The train and tram station and two supermarkets are only 200m away.

The space
The main living area has double bed (160x200), a stylish couch that can be converted into a single bed (120x192), and a wardrobe.

All our duvets are single duvets

The big-tripple-glazed windows overlooking the street are equipped with electric shutters that you can close during the night in order to make the room dark.

The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need, including an oven and hub, a toaster, coffee machine and kettle. There is also a bar with 3 bar stools where you can sit comfortably and enjoy your breakfast.
There is tea, coffee, salt and sugar.

The apartment does not have a TV, that's why we
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is located in a residential area of the beautiful and trendy Prenzlauer Berg district, known for its thriving café and art gallery culture.

In the Prenzlauer Berg you will find plenty of restaurants, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars. The popular Kollwitzplatz and Helmholzplatz are a leisurely 20-25 min stroll away, same as the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops, nightlife and a free museum about life in the DDR. Not far from there are the Berlin wall walk and Berlin wall memorial.

If you are in Berlin on a Sunday, don't miss the nearby Mauerpark with its large flea market and renowned outdoor karaoke. A must see, especially on a sunny day!

Not too far from the apartment is “Volkspark Friedrichshain”. This large and popular park, with a fairytale fountain, film showings and beer gardens, is a nice place for hanging out in the summer. For those who prefer a more active holiday it offers facilities for jogging, beach volle
host_about:
We are a laid back Irish-Polish/German couple. 
We moved to Berlin about 13 years ago and are really loving it here.
It's an amazing city and we are looking forward to sharing our favourite Berlin spots with you.

We have prepared an extensive guide book for all our guests with many tips on what to do in Berlin, where to eat and where to go out in the evening. It also has a section for parents and tips for the winter and for the summer. 

We are looking forward to hosting you in our apartments!

name: Gorgeous Deluxe Apartment near Kudamm, KaDeWe
description:
This designed delux apartment has a nice balcony and is situated right behind Wittenberg Platz and the famous KaDeWe, the big shopping mall right in the beginning of Kudamm street, Berlin's main tourist attraction and shopping area. So the location could hardly get any more central or fun to stay at. Besides having a dreamy location, I invested a lot of thought and energy to create this beautiful, modern and comfortable get away for your vacation needs.

The space
The location of this apartment is increadible - 1 minute walk from Wittenberplatz, Ku'damm (Berlin's main shopping streed) and the KaDeWe. The address is Lietzenburgerstrasse no. 1. Access to public transport is excellent, 2 minutes walk to U1, U2, U3, and U4. It's a two minute walk to Nollendorfplatz, a 7 min walk to Zoologicher Garten station, from which you can get to other cities and to the airport. Also many busses stop close by.

The intention was to have the apartment feel like a hote
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood, in my opinion, is great - it's right between two very cool and touristic areas - Kudamm, the sopping street where all the tourists go, and Nolendorf platz, which is the gay area and it has some of the best restaurants and cafes I know of in Berlin, as well as a cool chocolate shop and a great wine shop.
host_about: Hi guys, this is Amit, I hope you have a great time in my flat:)

name: "Alt Britz" - a centrally located metropolis oasis
description:
rural - idyllic - quiet - central. "Alt-Britz" is also ironically called the Beverly Hills of Neukölln ;-)

The space
PRICES include CITY-TAX!!! 2 room apartment (60 ms ²), at first floor of a single-family dwelling, quiet surroundings. You are alone on the upper floor. The bedroom is equipped with 2 single beds (90 x 200). Living room : sofa, couch table, 2 armchairs, TV ( no cable TV, german channels only) and CD Radio; standard W-Lan ( no high speed). The high-quality fitted kitchen is equipped with: 4-ceramic stove top with oven, fridge, coffeemaker, toaster, water cooker, dishes, pots and an openable wooden table and 2 chairs. The bathroom with WC has a bathtub with shower curtain.

The garden can be used if you like to. You find free, public parking lots in the small, quiet street in front of the house. There is a food market and a baker at approx. 5 minutes of distance. You will live in an area with rather smaller houses in the former villag
neighborhood_overview: The idyllic village core in the middle of the metropolis is great. The exhibitions at castle Britz and Neukölln museum are charming. So are as well the musical events on the open-air stage and in the theaterhall of castle Britz. The Indian temple (new building) nearby is worth a visit just like the famous "horseshoe settlement" (Hufeisensiedlung) in the immediate vicinity.

name: Gästeappartement in Rudow (App. 2)
description:
The space
Komplett ausgestattetes 1-Zimmer-Gästeappartement/Ferienwohnung, ca. 25 m², in gepflegter privater kleiner Anlage im Souterrain eines Mehrfamilienhauses, separater Eingang, Gegensprechanlage, Briefkasten, Aussenjalousien, feste Betten mit verstellbaren Kopf- und Fußteilen (90x190 cm), DU/WC, Haartrockner, Duschgel, Seife, Reinigungsmittel für die Zwischen- und Endreinigung, Singleküche mit 2-Plattenelektroherd, Kühlschrank mit Tiefkühlfach, Mikrowelle, Wasserkocher, Toaster und Kaffeemaschine, CD-Radiorekorder, TV, Wecker, Telefon gegen Gebühr, WLAN-Gastzugang

maximale Belegung: 2 Erwachsene

Nichtraucher, keine Haustiere, öffentliche Parkmöglichkeit, ruhige Grünlage,

inklusive Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Küchenpaket

Reinigungsmittel für die eigene Zwischen- und Endreinigung

Waschmaschine im Haus gegen Gebühr nach Absprache
auf Wunsch Zwischenreinigung gegen Gebühr
Ein Staubsauger wird nach Absprache
neighborhood_overview:
Rudow ist der südlichste Ortsteil von Neukölln und liegt fast an der Stadtgrenze. Im Ortskern mit Einkaufsstrasse endet die U-Bahn-Linie 7, die längste U-Bahn-Linie der Stadt, der Flughafen Schönefeld liegt von hier nur wenige Busminuten entfernt. Viele Einfamilien- und Reihenhäuser prägen das Ortsbild. Wer hier wohnt, schätzt die stadtnahe und ruhige Lage.
Im romantischen Altstadtkern findet man alles für den täglichen Bedarf, Friseur, Supermärkte, Fleischer, Bäcker, Blumengeschäfte, Bioladen, Schuster, Optiker, Ärzte, Apotheken.
Rudow zeichnet sich durch seine gute Infrastruktur und die zahlreichen weitläufigen Park- und Grünanlagen mit hohem Freizeitwert aus.
Ein großes Angebot an Kinderbetreuung und Schulen sowie zahlreichen Ärzten und Sportvereine in direkter Umgebung machen den Stadtteil zu einer beliebten Wohngegend. Rudow-ein Ort mit Lebensqualität
host_about: Im Grunde sind es die Verbindungen mit Menschen, die dem Leben seinen Sinn geben. Wir laden Sie ein,  unsere Gäste zu sein. Verbringen Sie einen unbeschwerten Aufenthalt in einem ruhigen kleinen Mehrfamilienhaus in einer eigenen abgeschlossenen Einheit, in grüner Umgebung.

name: In the middle of the action in Berlin
description:
The space
Small, bright room (12 sq m) for rent with a view of the inner courtyard garden in a flat in an old building (120 sq m) in a quiet location. Shared bathroom. The room has a sofa bed which is enough for two people who like it cozy, a table, chairs and a bookshelf are available.
Bed linens and towels will be provided. You will be able to prepare coffee or tea, however, nothing more.
You can reach Potsdam Square by foot but it is better to go by bike to the Brandenburg Gate and the Reichstag building. You are within five minutes walking distance to two subway stations, one street car station and one bus/night bus stop.
The Berlin landmarks, such as the Brandenburg Gate,
Hackesche Höfe, Reichstag building, Museum Island and much more can be well reached with public transport.
Parking spaces are difficult to get during the day but you can get them in the evenings without problems.
I'm a sociable person myself and have already tra

host_about:
Mein Name ist Rita Unruh, gebürtig komme ich aus Schleswig-Holstein, aber ich lebe schon sehr lange in Berlin. Meine Hobbies sind: Lesen, Tanzen, Reisen.
Ich bin ein geselliger Mensch, treffe mich gern mit Freunden zu Hause oder in der Kneipe. Gern gehe ich in Restaurants oder ins Kino/Philharmonie/Theater. Und von all dem bietet Berlin so viel, daß ich mir nicht mehr vorstellen könnte, woanders auf Dauer zu leben.

Die sonnige Unterkunft befindet sich im Dachgeschoss eines Hauses in Berlin-Frohnau. Dieser ruhige Ortsteil im Bezirk Reinickendorf gehört zu den beliebtesten Wohnorten Berlins und eignet sich perfekt für einen erholsamen Aufenthalt.

Der farbenfrohe, helle Wohnraum bietet ein großes Bett für 2 sowie eine ausziehbare Schlafcouch für 2 weitere Personen. Im abschließbaren Zimmer gibt es außerdem einen Fernseher mit DVD-Player, Aufbewahrungsmöglichkeiten in Form von Kleiderschrank und Regal, sowie einen großen Schreibtisch, der viele Ablagemöglichkeiten bietet. Ein Wasserkocher, Geschirr und Besteck und ein Kühlschrank sind auch im Zimmer vorhanden. Auf Anfrage können, Backofen und Mikrowelle in der Küche des Hauses für schnelle Gerichte mitgenutzt werden.

Zum Dachgesc

name: Light and quiet apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Light and quiet apartment for a good rest after exploring the city. Available for you is a spacious bedroom, plus a separate kitchen and a bathroom. Great, easygoing and safe neighborhood, with lot's of cafe's and places to eat within walking distance. -- please note that evening check-in after 7 pm is currently not possible.

The space
The room has a surface of about 20 sq. meter. It has a nice wooden floor, a double bed (140 x 200 cm ), a small table with a chair to work, lots of books you can browse through, plus some basic furniture. As it is on the 4th floor there is a lot of natural light. Next door is the kitchen with a table where you can have breakfast or cook a meal.

The bathroom provides a good hot shower and has a small bathtub. Shampoo and soap is available.

There is a wireless internet connection (bring your own device).

Guest access
The apartment is on the 4th floor, please note there is NO elevator,
neighborhood_overview: Location is the easy going district of Prenzlauer Berg, a safe and friendly part of town with lot's of options to go out. The nearest good coffee place is around the corner, 1 minute walk, then further café's and restaurants can be reached in a ten minutes walk, for instance on Helmholtzplatz or on Danzigerstrasse. A bit further on Kollwitzplatz you find every Saturday a nice market, and the Sunday Mauerpark flea market is also within reach.
host_about: I'm a writer and art critic based in Berlin. I travel a lot for my work and prefer to stay in places of locals, rather then hotels.

Ideal für eine Person die kurze Zeit in Berlin verbringen will, sei es privat oder beruflich. Das Zimmer, das ich in meiner Wohnung vermiete ist klein aber fein. Die Wohnung liegt in einem ruhigen netten Kiez mit vielen Cafes gelegen. U-bahn und Bus Anbindung sind ideal und in 5 Minuten Laufnähe.

The space
Meine Wohnung ist gemütlich und sehr ruhig im Hinterhof gelegen. Aber gleich um die Ecke ist das Akazienkiez mit vielen Cafés und angenehmer Atmosphäre. Die U-bahn ist nur 5 min zu Fuß weit weg. name: Lovely flat in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
A lovely, spacious and sunny flat with two balconies.

The space
Our flat is situated right in the heart of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg, which is one of the most trendy neighborhoods in town. It is a generous place with many great features: the living room/kitchen measures about 40 square meters and has got a fully equipped kitchen and a large, comfy sofa. Flatscreen, Wireless Internet, Apple TV, Playstation 3 and a good selection of DVDs are providing ample possibilities for entertainment on rainy days. A south-facing balcony with lots of plants invites to chill and sunbath. We've got two bedrooms, one of them has a queen-size bed, the other room has an adult-sized bed. There is a bathroom with shower as well as a washing machine in the kitchen. The single bedroom has also a beautiful balcony opening to our backyard-garden.

The building has been constructed 6 years ago by us and ten other families , it is a so called "low-energie-house" using solar panels
neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg, also called "Prenzlberg", first became a trendy district after reunification, then a well-off family district, and is today one of the most popular neighborhoods in Berlin. Many young people, families and artists have moved in. Facades of the old buildings were painted in bright colours and gave the district and the city a new face.
You can now find many quality and high-end shops, and organic markets like the one at Kollwitzplatz with local producers from Berlin and Brandenburg. The area is full of cobbled shopping streets, including Huflandstraße which is known for its artistic and deco shops, small colourful second-hand shops, delicious vegan restaurants and the Volkspark Friedrichshain with sunny and beautiful terraces.
host_about: Hello, I'm choreographer and, together  with my wife Altea, who is from Costa Rica, we run our own Dance and Yoga Studio in Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg called Caramba tanz&co (Just (Hidden by Airbnb) Caramba and tanz). We've got three lovely girls, the eldest has already left home and is studying abroad. I love to cook and, having worked in France many times, I appreciate the magic  of fresh ingredients and try very hard not to ruin them. Living and working abroad is an important part of my life. I have seen many hotels and grew to like the personal touch of a private home instead, so I think airbnb is a great idea! When I am in Berlin, I love to take trips to the lakes and to our garden in Potsdam or I just enjoy sitting in my favorite café, reading the newspaper and having a chat with friends passing by. Prenzlauer Berg is a bit of a village within the city of Berlin, you quickly get to know each other and you'll soon find your own favorite spots. Berlin is a very exciting place to be right now, things are still on the move, great artists, new architecture and lots of room for improvement and for your own ideas!

name: Charming 2 rooms next to Mauer Park
description:
This charming apartment located in a building built at the beginning of the 20th century, is in the center of the trendiest area of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg. And next to the famous Mauer Park. The apartment is on the 3rd Floor without elevator.

The space
This 70 sqm apartment consists of a fitted kitchen, one big sleeping room, a lounge and a bathroom with a bathtub.

In the bedroom, there is a double bed (160x200) and a commode.
You can ask for a baby bed if you want.

In the kitchen: there's a dishwascher, toaster, electric cooker, coffeemachine and a washingmachine...

The lounge is furnished with a sleeping couch for 1 person, a flat-screen television, DVD, a small hi-fi system and a table and chairs for 4 persons.

There’s Internet (WIFI) in the apartment. You will also find towels, sheets, an iron and ironing board there.

Other things to note
If you come with the car: the parking in the str
neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg is no doubt one of the most mythical districts of the city.
It embodies Berlin’s cultural heritage from diverse historical periods, proletarian and middle-class styles of the fin-de-siècle, just as the imprint of socialism.
What is more, there has always been a tradition of resistance and opposition giving birth to the spirit of creativity that incessantly surrounds you here.
The architecture should hold attention because in spite of the galloping renovation since the fall of the Wall, it still retains some of scars from the Second World War.
host_about:
I'm french but I have been living in Berlin since 18 years because I love this city....I am looking forward to welcome you in one of my apartments and to meet people from all over the world.
See you soon!

- cosy 47 m2 apartment
- accommodation up to 4 people
- typical wilhelminian building, wooden flooring
- situated on the 4. floor in the quiet `Gardenhouse`
- many bars and restaurants in the surrounding area
-great access to public transportation (tram, S-Bahn, buses)

The peaceful, 47 m2 apartment is designed to accommodate up to 4 people and is situated on the fourth floor of a typical Berlin building (without a lift!) in a quiet courtyard behind the house. In the living and sleeping area there is wooden flooring.

You will love this beautiful furnished apartment both for its wonderful décor and for its fantastic location. Experience the authentic side of Berlin!
The apartment is located in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, a trendy district in Berlin with its numerous cafes, bars and restaurants in the surrounding area. It takes only 5 minutes to get to the f
host_about:
Hi, I´m Mark! 

I love Berlin and I´m really looking forward to to make sure my guests have a fantastic experience too. 

I also enjoy travelling to other major cities or some remote destinations: this could be in the mountains, somewhere on a beautiful beach or even making firewood in the deep scandinavian nature.

My cosy home welcomes you!









Hallo, ich bin Mark!

Am besten erhole ich mich vom Alltag, wenn ich im Urlaub und Freizeit etwas komplett anderes als sonst mache. 
Das kann ein Kurztrip in eine europäische Metropole sein, ein feiner Strand, oder die Ruhe und Abgeschiedenheit beim Holzhacken in skandinavischer Natur. Am Prenzlauer Berg schätze ich die imposante Mischung aus Großstadtdjungel und Gründerzeit.

name: Studio-apartment in Kreuzberg.
description:
Due to AirBnB lack of any support after an issue with the last guest, l can not offer a safe nor comfortable stay at the moment.
It is very disappointing, but thanks everybody for the interest.
Paolo

The space
This is a beautiful, spacious and bright apartment with loft feeling in a noble house build in 1873 in the middle of Berlin Kreuzberg, with a view on the TV tower.
Over 120 mq, sleeping room, living room, dining room, bathroom with shower and hottub and a kitchen with balcony.
As you can quickly see in the photos, you won´t find a sterile flat with standard furniture, but a real warm and welcoming flat: this is my home and also my atelier. So you´ll fin it perfectly clean but might have a few canvases and paintings lying around, a few tools, brushes and lots of books.. This means you can enjoy a really comfortable home, and taste directly the flair of living and working as an artist in Berlin. Also, it means l need you to be extre
host_about:
I live in Berlin since 1999, I´m an architect and a painter, l love this city and neighbourhood and l am looking forward to get to know you, and have you stay here when l´m out of town, in what is my beautiful home and beloved studio.
I´m sure you will enojoy this space as l do, and l hope this will be the chance for an interesting exchange!

description:
A quiet double room in Neukölln/Kreuzberg - The most amazing and trendy neighborhood in Berlin - close to the center.

The space
DESCRIPTION-
The 65 sqm flat is on the 3rd floor, and it receives enough sunshine through the window throughout the day.

- Wireless internet (WiFi)

- Washing Machine with detergent

- Towels and Linens

-THE NEIGHBORHOOD-
The Kreuzberg neighborhood is legendary. It is a multicultural lands
host_about:
I come from Slovakia and I'm 38 years old. I studied economies in Prague and Berlin, where I have lived since 2003. At the moment I work in a young internet company. I have lived in my present flat since 2007 and I really love its slight historical touch.
I like to spend my leisure time meeting friends, doing sports or relaxing after a long day at work. I also love travelling to foreign countries and visiting my friends all around Europe.
I want your stay to be as comfortable as possible so you can relax and experience the special culture and unique atmosphere of Berlin.
I look forward to hearing from you! Stefan

maximale Belegung: 2 Erwachsene

inklusive Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Küchenpaket

Reinigungsmittel für die eigene Zwischen- und Endreinigung

Ein Staub
neighborhood_overview:
Rudow-ein Ort mit Lebensqualität
Im romantischen Altstadtkern findet man alles für den täglichen Bedarf, Friseur, Supermärkte, Fleischer, Bäcker, Blumengeschäfte, Bioladen, Schuster, Optiker, Ärzte, Apotheken.
Rudow zeichnet sich durch seine gute Infrastruktur und die zahlreichen weitläufigen Park- und Grünanlagen mit hohem Freizeitwert aus.
Ein großes Angebot an Kinderbetreuung und Schulen sowie zahlreichen Ärzten und Sportvereine in direkter Umgebung machen den Stadtteil zu einer beliebten Wohngegend.
host_about: Im Grunde sind es die Verbindungen mit Menschen, die dem Leben seinen Sinn geben. Wir laden Sie ein,  unsere Gäste zu sein. Verbringen Sie einen unbeschwerten Aufenthalt in einem ruhigen kleinen Mehrfamilienhaus in einer eigenen abgeschlossenen Einheit, in grüner Umgebung.

The space
A two room apartment, 87mq, 1st floor (belle etage), loads of light, in a building built in the late 1800'. There are several supermarkets of all kinds (Low price, Bio etc). There is also a closed food market near by. there is also a bike shop in the same building where one could rent a bike. Gorlitzer park is just accross the street.

name: Steps from the metro and from Tempelhofer Park
description:
1 min walk from the metro and 5 to Tempelhofer Park, this quiet, bright studio, located in one of Berlin's hippest districts, is the ideal accommodation for short stays. A supermarket is literally across the street. Within a 5min walk from the flat, are shopping malls, two parks, the Kindl Centre for Contemporary Art, tons of international eateries, the artsy rooftop club Klunkerkranich and a 1910 cinema turned hipster bar.

The space
Due to its conveniently structured space, the ~39 sqm studio is perfect for a single person but also great for a couple. It features a big, comfortable double sleeping couch, a desk for working with your laptop, a dining table and a fully equipped kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer, microwave, toaster, kettle, pots, cooking utensils, silverware and... wine glasses. You'll find also condiments (oil, salt, sugar, ketchup, mustard, spices and so on), bathroom stuff (towels, soap, shampoo and so on) and washing liquids, and a basket of f
neighborhood_overview: Neukoelln, a traditionally working class district, has undergone a radical transformation in the last decade, and now counts among Berlin's  most hip districts.  A young, cosmopolitan crowd of international students, artists and hipsters now roams its streets, crowding up the numerous art galleries, typical Berlin bars and international eateries, side by side with the local - predominantly Turkish - population that originally settled here in the 60s and 70s. This multitude of cultures and subcultures mingle while still maintaining their identities and insofar arguably make Neukoelln - especially its northern part next to Kreuzberg and closest to the center - the most authentic expression of Berlin's postmodern character. Among other things, within a 5 minutes walk from the flat, you´ll find supermarkets and shopping centers, the parks Hasenheide and Tempelhofer - the former airport turned into a one-of-a-kind, open, green leisure area -, the Kindl Centre for Contemporary Art, the artsy
host_about: I'm an Italian visual artist living in Berlin since over 10 years. When I'm away, I rent out my  home. I deeply value the flat-sharing experience, as a guest and as a host, and the personal connections that come into being in the process.

name: Beautiful Spacious Berlin Flat
description:
Our beautiful airy flat is available while we're away from January 24th until February 6th. We ask for a minimum stay of 8 nights.

The space
The flat is very large (104 square meters) and divided into 3 large rooms (a dining room, a master-bedroom, and the third room (with balcony) can function as either a living room or bedroom depending on the number of guests). Plus there's the kitchen and bathroom. The place is newly renovated. It has white-stained hard wood floors, 3.4 meter high ceilings, and is in a nice old building built around 1904. The kitchen is fully stocked with dishes, pot/pans, blender, toaster, microwave, dishwasher, freezer, etc. The master bedroom has a large king-size bed (180x200cm). The flat is ideal for a couple, but the living room can also be set up as a bedroom with a queen-size (140cm) mattress and now has sliding doors for privacy. There is also a single mattress (90cm) in an elevated loft space which is semi-private. There's a laundry
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is called Wedding (a sub-section of the Mitte district). It's a lively place, with lots of cafés and restaurants. The main street nearby is Müller Straße. The flat is located a 5 minute walk both the U6 and U9 subway lines, which connect to Zoologischer Garten (7 minutes) and Friedrichstrasse (9 minutes), as well as the M13 tram line and several bus routes. There are countless grocery stores nearby: LPG Naturkost, Bio Company, Kardstadt (good wine selection), Real (which is really big), Bolu (Turkish), Vinh Loi (Asian), Lidl, Netto, Kaufland, etc. There's a Turkish market nearby on Wednesdays and Saturdays. The flat is a 15 minute walk to nice nice little lake (the Plötzensee) which is good for swimming, as well as a large park (Rehberge). It only takes about 25 minutes (on the U6 and TXL bus) to Tegel Airport.
host_about: We work together as visual artists and are both originally from Canada.

name: TAUTS HOME Hufeisensiedlung Berlin
description:
Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Hufeisensiedlung (Horseshoe Estate) by famous architect Bruno Taut. Rentable house of the 1920s with garden for design lovers: restored true to the original, frequently awarded and mentioned in press and media.

The space
Suitable for up to four guests, "Taut’s Home" is a real-life experience of design history with the character of a museum.

For outstanding contributions and excellence in monument preservation Taut's Home received the "European Union Prize for Cultural Heritage / Europa Nostra Award 2013", which is considered as the "Oscar" for monument preservation.

The house is located in the famous "Horseshoe Estate" designed by Bruno Taut in 1925-30 - probably the most outstanding example of innovative German town planning. In 2008 the estate in the south of vibrant Berlin was awarded UNESCO World Heritage status.

"Taut's Home" was frequently appreciated by the press, since it gives
neighborhood_overview:
Only a few hundred meters from Taut’s Home and the famous Horseshoe Estate stands Schloss Britz, a handsome classicist building in leafy surrounds with a manor and farm converted for cultural events. In the one-time stables you’ll now find two recommendable fine restaurants and two museums. What is more, is that the hip districts of Neukölln and Kreuzberg are just a few subway stations away. To go to the Centre (i.e. to Bahnhof Friedrichstraße or Alexanderplatz) takes about 20-25 minutes. For more info please see:
www.tautshome.com/umgebung (about the environs)
host_about:
TAUTES HEIM ist ein Projekt von Liebhabern für Liebhaber: Katrin und ich sind privat und beruflich stark im Bereich Architektur und Denkmalschutz engagiert und wurde für Tautes Heim mehrfach ausgezeichnet. Wir haben bei Renovierung und Ausstattung unseres Kleinods selbst viel Hand angelegt und hoffen durch die Vermietung diese Arbeit irgendwann refinanzieren zu können. Wir wohnen einige Straßen weiter und kennen uns vor Ort hervorragend, aber auch vielen anderen interessanten Ecken Berlins ganz gut aus. Wenn Du/Sie/ihr im Tauten Heim zu Gast sein wollt – Wir freuen uns immer, interessante Menschen oder auch neue Orte kennen zu lernen ...

Taut‘s Home is a place specially designed for architecture lovers. This is our personal and professional passion, too. And it was our motivation for creating this very unique place that has been frequently awarded. The rent helps us to refund our expenses for something that comes quite close to a type of museum that was still missing in Berlin. Katrin and I are living just a few blocks away and have very good knowledge about the estates history and a bunch of other places worth seeing in Berlin. We would be glad to have you as our guests and are always eager to meet new interesting people or discover special places ourselves ...

name: My home in Berlin might be yours !
description:
!!! COVID PRECAUTIONS: the apartment is cleaned after each visit according to the process recommended by Airbnb and the medical authorities !!!

Hello, I am Yves, french guy living in Paris and Berlin and I rent my berliner flat when I'm not there : located in the heart of Friedrichshain, the apartment is quiet, bright, central, ideally connected to the most central areas of town.
It will be all yours when I am away from Germany. I hope you’ll love it as much as I do.

The space
BEAUTIFUL, BRIGHT 3-ROOMS APARTMENT IN A QUIET AREA OF FRIEDRICHSHAIN, BERLIN.

In the heart of Friedrichshain, it is a ground floor, newly renovated, three rooms apartment in a typical Berlin Altbau 1900 with its high ceilings and a door opening directly on the street : it will give you an ideal access to the area every day life and hopefully you’ll get to know my neighbourhood.

Located in a residential street of the northern section of Friedrichshain,
neighborhood_overview: See Travelers ressources
host_about:
I made my first trip to Berlin in dec. 1988, just one year before the wall fell down. I started to go there more regularly 10 years ago and it soon became obvious that I needed my own place there : stressless life, friendly and open minded people, solidarity and kindness in every behavior, I found there exactly what I needed after 17 years living in Paris (…).

I bought my apartment end of february 2012 and started to renew it all by myself. It is not yet fully decorated, but already comfortable and I’m proud of what I made of it. If you come several times, you will notice the changes all through the years.

I any case, I’ve tried to make it the more comfortable I can, for myself, but also for my guest, so that we can all have a real home while discovering Berlin.

Hope to hear from you soon.
Yves

description:
The space
This small Apartment is situated right in the center of Berlin.

Alexanderplatz and Brandenburg gate are not far away and the subway (U8, station: Heinrich-Heine-Straße) will bring you to your desired destination in Berlin.

Via www. bvg .de you can plan your routes through Berlin and also see the costs.

There are many attractions and sights nearby. If you like to party, Berlin is the right place to be and some of the most famous clubs are within walking (but not hearing) distance. You can also chill in one of the parks arround the house.

While you're enjoying the convenience of the central location of the apartment you will also notice the quietness within the bedroom.

Right behind the building is a small green park protecting the beedroom from street noice.

The apartment is equipped for nearly everything you can imagine.

looking forward to hear from you
Martin

The space
A cozy and stylish studio apartment.
the apartment is located in a small quiet street in the famous Graefe Kiez and Hasenheide park.

name: Simple & smart in Neukölln 2
description:
A simple & smart 34qm apartment, designed to make you feel comfortable for short as well as a long stay with space conservation in mind.

Due to local restrictions in short term apartment rental we are only able to accept booking from tenants who are coming to Berlin for either work, study or medical reasons, and wish to stay for 1 month or more.

The space
The apartment provides a relaxed cosy environment, situated in the vibrant district of Neukölln. It is most suitable for a single guest due to the size.

The fully-equipped kitchen has all amenities needed (if there is anything missing just let us know)

Guest access
There are no areas with restricted access.

Other things to note
WARNING: by making a booking the guest agrees to avoid either uploading or downloading any illegal torrent content. German law strictly prohibits such activity and fines are frequently issued.
neighborhood_overview:
"Neukölln" district is the creative and alternative heart of Berlin, standing for diversity and creativity.

The best way to describe the area: alternative, international, multicultural, accepting, rich in bars, rich in restaurants, full of "lazy-morning-cafes", pubs, electro clubs, events (Heimathafen theatre), young and vibrant, green and quiet at the canal... you will discovering a perhaps more authentic Berlin.

The apartment lies between Neukölln liveliest main streets "Sonnenallee" and "Karl-Marx Strasse" and is hidden in a quiet street.
Just a jump away from the "Tempelhof" - a unique large recreational area, formed out of the old Tempelhof airport is just 900 m walk away.
A good connection to cultural and gourmet venues of Neukoelln, Kreuzberg district.

Weserstrasse - 300 m
Hermannplatz - 1 km
Kreuzberg - 2 km
Treptow - 500 m

host_about: Seit 7 Jahren vermiete ich in Berlin Ferienwohnungen. Dies bereitet mir große Freude. Schön ist jede Bestätigung für mich, wenn ich eine "gute Ware geliefert" habe. Der Service und die Verfügbarkeit müssen allerhöchste Prioritet haben. Außerdem arbeite ich als Lehrer an einer deutschen Privatschule in Dänemark. Landwirtschaft mit der Aufzucht von Fleischrindern ist mein Hobby und meine Freude. Auch hier ist es mir äußerst wichtig eine gute Ware abzuliefern, denn sie ist der beste Garant für einen festen Kundenstamm, der über Jahre stabil bleibt und stetig weiter wächst.

The space
You are looking at a modern and comfortable apartment close to the city. It is perfectly suited for families visiting Berlin. It comprises around 60 square meters and fits up to 10 people. 5 persons fit in the sleeping room that includes 2 bunk beds (4 single beds). In the dinner and living room is a couch, enabling sleeping space for a further guest.

Furthermore, the place offers a fully equipped kitchen and a tiled bathroom with standard equipment, as well as a washing machine. For entertainment guests have access to fast internet (cable and wifi), cable TV 50" flat LED screen and hifi.

To Berlin Mitte it takes merely 20 minutes using the tramway or bicycle.
Cars do not need green plate.

name: Cosy Room in Quiet Neighborhood
description:
The space
Get the opportunity to stay in a beautiful and very bright space in Berlin.

Berlin is full of cheap eating places and just around the corner from the house you will find some very cozy streets to have a relaxing walk to enjoy the nature of this beautiful city. You can as well take the bike with you to have a trip to nice lakes and through natural forests.

Just 7 minutes walk away is the bus route 195 which is the most used bus route as it is so well connected to the nearest underground station U5 and the city train station S5 (both are direct lines to the city centre). For night owls I recommend the night bus N5, going from Alexanderplatz directly to my house.

The house is located in a quiet area with a familiar neighborhood. There is sunlight all day in the space. You can use your room, the kitchen, the bathroom, the living room, the winter garden (especially eating breakfast is so nice in there) and the garden. When it's
host_about:
Wir  - das sind:  die Gastgeberin Cordula , die Tochter Amira ( geb. 2001) und die Ragdollkatze Bonny.
Unsere Lieblingsreiseziele sind Schottland,  Island , Österreich, Canada, Cornwall, Frankreich und Lappland. Äußerst gern sind wir am Meer, doch ebenso lieben wir die Berge. Selbst das Flachland hat seine Reize.
Es ist sehr schön ein Land zu erkunden und dabei die Menschen in diesem Land näher kennenzulernen. Ebenso genießen wir die Aufenthalte unserer Gäste und den Austausch mit ihnen.

Es liegt uns am Herzen , mit unserem Zuhause einen Ort der Ruhe und  Behaglichkeit zu schaffen. Deshalb ist es uns wichtig, den Innen- und Außenbereich unseres Hauses individuell und harmonisch zu gestalten. Wir mögen den Landhausstil im shabby-Look und sind dafür selbst gern kreativ tätig.

name: Charming and Cosy P-Berg Haven
description:
The space
Beautiful, cosy, modern and well equipped flat in a quiet street of Prenzlauer Berg!

Perfect for singles and couples, it's a great area with excellent cafés and amenities (top tips in the guestbook): 5 mins walk from the Mauerpark and with excellent transport links (S Bornholmer Str. 6 mins, Schoenhauser Allee 10 mins, Gesundbrunnen 10 mins).

Ground floor, in the back yard with a small terrasse... a very quiet house, you'll sleep like a dream.

Fast wireless internet connection, and free calls to all European fixed line (landline) numbers included. Parking in the street is still free, and when I am not around my good friend Sonja lives in the same house and will welcome you. I also have an excellent cleaner well worth the charge.

The eat-in kitchen is beautiful and extremely well equipped, there is a bath tub, and very good heating for those cold winter days. Washing machine too. Towels and linen provided.

description:
The space
This newly renovated historic Berlin apartment is located in an entirely remade house, only 5 minutes from the overground train station (S-Bahn Station) "Plänterwald", directly in a side-street adjacent to the wonderful "Treptower Park".
The apartment features lovely wooden floors, a large open-plan kitchen and light-flooded rooms throughout.
The furnished private room has to offer: TV, free fast wireless internet (WLAN), a comfortable double-bed with "tempur mattress", and (via folding doors) can also be extended to 2 rooms and 4 sleeping spaces. (In case the entire apartment should be required, a total of 6 people could be accommodated). Furthermore, the apartment has a washing machine, a dishwasher and everything one needs to cook up a great meal.

name: Big and cosy room in Neukölln
description:
Our spacious, bright and comfy flat has everything you need for a pleasant stay: living room, fully equiped kitchen, bathroom with tub, etc. Your room is 27m2 with double bed, desk, couch, plenty of space and super cosy!

The space
The flat is very spacious and comfortable. It has everything you need for a pleasant stay. It is on a 4th floor with no lift but that is pretty normal for this part of time (also a great chance to work out ;)


The kitchen has all you need as my flatmate is a great cook. The bathroom has a nice bathtub you can relax on after cold chilly Berlin nights.

The room you'd be using is pretty big (around 27m2) with a double bed, desk with chair where you can work on and a couch corner to sit down with a glass of wine, etc. It has two big windows -which make it very sunny-. It is cosy and comfortable.

We do have wi-fi and you can smoke as my flatmate sometimes do so.

You will be sharing the flat
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located in the heart of Neukölln, one of the most vibrant areas of the city.  Lots of bars, restaurants and supermarkets close by. Great nightlife scene, lots of charming quite coffee places where to work or read a book and plenty of tasty international food around. Neukölln is well know for being multicultural, dynamic and very young spirited.
host_about:
Hi all, I'am a town planner and passionate urban cyclist working at a research institute in Berlin and trying to enjoy and discover this city as much as I can. I cannot live without a bike, music, newspapers -I'm highly interested in politics-and well..travelling of course. 

I have used this web only a couple of times but everything that involves getting to know people who actually live and know places makes me being interested about it. It`s all about sharing :)

Parking is almost always available in front of the house. Around the corner there are numerous restaurants, cafés, several late night convenient stores and two movie theatres .In a few minutes walk you can reach Schönhauser Allee.

A very large living room with side access to the balcony (with a beautiful, unobstructed view), a small bedroom, kitchen with induction stove and dishwasher, natural stone bathroom with Bathtub, washing machine and window). name: Above the roofs of Berlin Neukölln!
description:
A bright welcoming resort, with panoramic sunrise view over the roofs of Berlin´s most upcoming district. located in its old historic centre...where neukölln began...Enjoy the mixture of upliftig night life nearby and downscaling relaxation inside

The space
Bright, cosy, cute flat to rent!!! Especially for families, lovers or good friends!!
We have one big and sunny "living & sleeping" room, with an antique sofa, huge wooden table and optionally equipped with it´s own bed ( as you need for one or for two). This rooms opens a wide wooden door to the balcony with sunrise view and fresh herbs! lots of sun and daylight!

The big bedroom has a comfortable bed for two- situated right next to the window that opens to a huge old chestnut tree in the silent backyard. There is also a piano if you like playing.

In case you are many or you travel with kids, you can additionally rent a very silent second sleeping room with another double bed plus ch
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is the old historic center of Berlin´s most upcoming district, Neukölln, here you can enjoy multicultural food and living as the world mingles in this district in a special manner. There´s hipster nightlife, turkish and arab food and music oportunities, as well as familiy athmosphere on the nearby food and flee markets on the weekends. The abandoned airport Tempelhof, with its huge inner city leasure area is just two  stops by train away

name: In the Heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Explore the lively Kreuzberg and Neukölln from this quiet home base.
Since we're travelling, you'll have the place to yourself.

The space
It is a beautiful old building with 2 rooms in the heart of Kreuzberg.
The apartment is on the 1st Floor and the old sliding glass doors are to fall in love with.

Guest access
You'll be renting the surfer and skater son’s room with a comfortable pullout sofa. There is also a living room with a dining table and piano. There is another sofa there. You'll probably have the kitchen and bathroom to yourself - since we usually only rent out when we are travelling.

License number
02/Z/AZ/010006-19
neighborhood_overview: Parallel to our street is the popular Oranienstraße with countless restaurants, cafes, bars and pubs. A hamam for women is just around the corner in the Mariannenstraße. The corner bakery is usually open way into the night/early morning hours. There are two arthouse cinemas in walking distance and the famous theatre Ballhaus  ist just across the street. Walk along the canal or to the nearby Neukölln.
host_about:
Living in Berlin as an art therapist and artist is exciting and fun but often I find myself missing New Orleans and Tasmania...  I love to travel!
I also love music, misty rain, tabasco and I enjoy art with an element of humour. 
Poetry is medicine!

name: Exquisite townhouse in Berlin-Mitte!
description:
A green oasis in the midst of a world-class city!
Central yet quiet, chic yet family-friendly, luxurious but affordable!
What more could you want?

The space
LOCATION! LOCATION! LOCATION!
The apartment is located smack-bang in the middle of where you want to be!
There's no need for a car. Hire a bike or take reliable public transport or just walk!

THE APARTMENT-
A stunning, townhouse in the trendy "Scheunenviertel" area of former east Berlin.

Filled with lots of natural light thanks to the floor to ceiling, massive windows, this modern and stylish apartment is perfect for 4 adults or a family with school children.

Spread over two floors, the ground floor has an open space with a luxurious living area that joins to an open, stunning kitchen with all modern appliances,
a bathroom with a zen window and a unique wooden home office space.

The other side of the living area opens out to a bea
neighborhood_overview: Strolling the "Scheunenviertel" or Barn Quarter, it's hard to imagine that this web of crooked lanes was a down-at-heel East Berlin barrio until 1990. Now a buzzing shopping, eating and entertainment zone, it has also become the darling of the city's creative class, its cafes and bars filled with iPad-toting media execs, black-clad fashion designers and bespectacled actors.
host_about:
I am an Australian filmmaker living in Berlin since 2007. 

I spend my time as a film director, voice artist, actor, screenwriter, mother, and teacher.

I have travelled to every continent except Antarctica.

My love for travel hasn't changed despite having kids although my mode of travel may have adjusted! Now we look for chic, luxury style family-friendly accommodation where we can enjoy long family meals on a terrace and relaxing holidays.

I can't live without the internet...and meditation.... and coffee.

The connection to public transport is perfect, just a 2min walk from the apartment you can find the underground (U8 Rosenthaler Platz) & Overground, 10min walk the S-Bahn Oranienburgerstrasse, 15min S-Bahn Hakescher Markt and 20min Alexanderplatz.

The space
It is a real Berlin flat "old building" with high ceilings, large windows and wooden floors throughout the apartment (except for the bathroom). neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauerberg es uno de los barrios preferidos para vivir por los berlineses, por su calidad urbana, la casa está al lado del Mauerpark  y de la Arkona Platz y Kastanienallee, una calle de tiendas, cafés y restaurantes, tiendas vintage y de comida organica
host_about:
I think visiting Berlin is best when you stay in a real neiborhood and our Loft is in Prenzlouerberg, one of the best of the City
I love travelling, meeting new people, trying restaurants. I considere myself low key, organized and quite easy to get alone.
I love introducing my guest in Prenzlouerberg, please feel free to ask me any questions about what to do, where to eat, things to buy and so on. I shall do my best.
My interaction can be as much or as little as you wish, after all it is your vacation!

- 108 qm loft suite built with love for details
- Highest quality natural stone floors with marble and travertine ornaments

- Luxurious bathroom with walk-in shower

- Loggias overlooking the green area
- fully furnished
neighborhood_overview: Berlin Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf is one of the most sought-after residential and business locations in Berlin. Everything is more elegant, stylish and traditional than elsewhere in Berlin. This is noticeable in the upper middle-class houses in the side streets. The world-famous boulevard in the west of the city, called Kudamm for short, which is within walking distance, is not only a promenade, but also architecturally and culturally interesting. It is one of the most famous streets in the world and the lifeline of the City West and the number one promenade in Berlin. On the wide sidewalks you walk along elegant shop windows or settle down in one of the numerous cafes. Around Kurfürstendamm, large department stores and fashion stores line every corner, and towards Olivaer Platz, well-known brands present their exclusive offerings. The famous Savigny Square with its rustling treetops and flowering bushes and shrubs offers plenty of tranquility in the midst of the pulsating City West. <

The space
Welcome to our beautiful old smithy in the heart of Berlin.

Years ago we found this jewel of a back yard and rebuilt and designed it according to our own ideas. The modern interior design deliberately contrasts with the morbid charm of the old brick walls and is what makes this unique accommodation so special.
In summer, guests can sit comfortably outside in front of the house and have breakfast in the garden surrounded by 4 meter high brick walls.

You live on 2 floors, each with a bath and a shower, a modern kitchen, 2 bedrooms, a studio with a double bed, a small office and a living / dining room. From the top you can look into the studio over a parapet, but the sleeping area below is not visible. Especially because living in the middle of the cit
neighborhood_overview: In our area around Potsdamer Straße, you will find galleries and designer shops that are popular with art lovers and local visitors. The Kulturforum at Potsdamer Platz includes several state museums and the Berlin Philharmonic. The new National Gallery, Cultural Forum, Philharmonic Hall, State Library and Potsdamer Platz can be reached on foot in 5 - 10 minutes. You can reach the Tiergarten, one of the largest and most beautiful parks in Berlin, by bike in no more than 5 minutes. Another park is the Park am Gleisdreieck, which offers beach volleyball fields, a skate park, playgrounds and natural gardens. Culture and subculture are closely related in this area. Shrill bars like the Kumpelnest 3000 and hip fashion designers in the building complex of the former TAGESSPIEGEL publishing house shake hands. The Winter Garden on the other hand inspires visitors with constantly changing shows. Right next to it, in a beautifully restored old Berlin building with fantastically designed courtyard
host_about:
Me and my husband live and work in these beautiful studio houses. We work with art and have been hosting many lovely guests who appreciate the estetics and atmosphere in our spaces. We are looking forward to host you.

Unsere zwei liebevoll ausgebauten Atelierhäuser vermieten wir schon seit einiger Zeit an Gäste, die auch einen Sinn für Ästhetik haben. Individualität und Kreativität ist unser Credo, Menschen, die damit etwas anfangen können, sind sicher gerne unsere Gäste.

name: *** Exclusive Design Apartment ***
description:
--- Minimum stay 6 months / No rental to tourists ---

Live in "Stalin's Living Room" equipped with modern design furniture!

The space
The design apartment is located in the district of Friedrichshain, in the impressive buildings of the former "Stalin Avenue". The street and the houses were built during the 1950s as a monumental socialist boulevard for East Berlin. Today it's the longest monument of the German Capital and is considered to be one of the most exciting spots of the city for architecture enthusiasts.

Enjoy the modern and comfortable atmosphere in this urban design apartment which was completely refurbished beginning of 2013 offering everything you need for a great stay in Berlin.

The apartment has a size of 60 sqm with two separate rooms and a central hall, kitchen and dining area. The kitchen is fully equipped with coffee and espresso machine, kettle, toaster, dishwasher, washing machine, fridge, induction hob, microw
neighborhood_overview: Trendy Friedrichshain is one of the most upcoming areas in Berlin. Within walking distance you find numerous cafes, restaurants, bars and shops in the famous "Simon-Dach-Street" area. Discover the various range of culinary delights from Ceylonese curry soup, Iraqi-Lebanese falafel, traditional Danish hot dogs to french Crêpes in the neighbourhood. Get to know Berlin's vibrating night life in one of the many bars and clubs in Friedrichshain, Mitte and Kreuzberg.
host_about:
I love traveling a lot and I've been to some great spots around the world. However, I always feel "at home" when coming back to Berlin as I love its laid-back atmosphere.

I am glad to offer these truly special apartments in the historical "Stalin buildings" to travelers from all over the world. I hope this location will make their stay in Berlin very special by giving them the feeling of stepping back in time to former East Germany. Inside, the apartments have been completely refurbished offering a comfortable place to stay paired with modern interior design.

description:
Family friendly loft in trendy Kreuzberg. Subway and bus stations around the corner, bikes included, free parking!

This apartment is located directly at the nice Landwehr Canal at the border of Kreuzberg and Underground Neukoelln. Within 20 minutes you are in the very city center.

neighborhood_overview:
Kreuzberg is the place to be! Live amongst original Berliners, artists, families, students and foreigners alike with stylish clubs and cool underground bars just nearby. Nowhere else in Berlin is it as colourful!

Dozens of original restaurants and clubs, supermarkets, bike rentals, delicious bakeries and cozy coffee shops are just a few steps away.
host_about:
Meine Frau Julia und ich sind in Brandenburg groß geworden und Anfang der 2000er-Jahre nach Berlin gezogen. 

Die Leidenschaft, Gastlichkeit und Hingabe, die wir während unserer Reisen durch die ganze Welt erfahren durften, haben uns inspiriert, selbst Gastgeber zu werden. Zuerst in Berlin, unserer neuen Heimat. Und als die Geburt unserer Kinder den Blick aufs Leben änderte, die Reisen in die Ferne weniger wurden, da lernten wir Brandenburg neu kennen.

Wir haben viel darüber gelernt, was Urlaub mit Kindern bedeutet und dass es oft die kleinen Dinge sind, die den Unterschied zwischen Urlaubsstress und echter Erholung ausmachen.

name: For the quite global individualist
description:
The space
Individually designed small single room with a very comfortable italian bed and attached bathroom in the ground floor of a beautiful modern ecological wooden house, 11 sqm, w-lan.
The hosts Sabine and Hanns are widely travelled and lived for many years in Brazil, Mexico and India. They speak fluently English, Portuguese, Spanish and Hindi!
The room is situated in the green Kiez Niederschönhausen (Pankow) which was during GDR time a very important area for the political life of East Berlin. The site is full of old GDR history. The castle of Niederschönhausen, Majakowskyring and the beautiful Bürgerpark are in walking distance (3 tram stops).
Our place is ideal for the not so young Berlin visitor who likes to have a relaxed sleep in nice atmosphere after an inspiring day in Berlin.

The loft is located in an old building in a very calm house.

Guest access

description:
The perfect place to stay if you attend the FU University (5 minutes walk), work or study in Berlin but also if you want to explore the metropolitan city and take a vacation (10 minutes to Berlins famous Grunewald with recreational lakes), only 15 minutes by subway to Berlins famous shopping mile "Ku-damm". close by: bus stops, train station and subway stations
My guests can use the kitchen (from 8 a.m. until 8 p.m.). Towels and bedsheets are provided.
Looking forward to hear from you!

The space
BUILDING & LOCATION

It is located in Berlin Dahlem only 5 minutes walk from the Berliner "Botanical Garden" and very close to the famous "Grunewald" with its refreshing and relaxing forest and lakes - such as "Krumme Lanke", "Grunewaldsee" etc. The famous Wannsee lake - a relaxing tourist area especially in summer time is also located in southern Berlin. It can be reached by City Train within app. 30 minutes.
The appartment is located in a very
host_about:
I love to travel and work. As an actress I travel a lot. I love children. I do not smoke or drink. I prefer warm countries like Africa and the West Indies and love to meet people to learn from their culture and traditions. I always try to learn a little bit of the language of the country I am travelling in. And I sure love to try different types of food.
I have a very strong believe in GOD which keeps me balanced and happy. Therefore my house is a home, peaceful, quiet and comfortable - relaxing in Berlins green nature close to Wannsee and Grunewald but also just 10-20 minutes away from the centre to experience the city of Berlin. Come and enjoy the variety Berlin has to offer. 

"Home is not just a location, home is a feeling"

The space
Welcome!

The apartment is located on the famous KASTANIENALLEE, also called casting allee (because of the young, trendy, beautiful people) in the Mitte/Prenzlauer Berg area.

It is directly facing trendy Kastanienallee and close to famous Mauerpark, Arkonaplatz, Hackescher Markt, etc.! Public transport with U8 Bernauer strasse/Rosenthalerplatz and U2 Eberswalder strasse make for easy and quick access.
