neighborhood_overview:
In a few meters you are in the middle of the beautifully landscaped Chancellor's Garden. The residential area originally built for members of the Bundestag is ideal for relaxing walks along the Spree. The path on the left leads past the Chancellery directly to the main train station, on the right it takes a few steps to Bellevue Castle Official seat of the Federal President.

The supermarket Penny and Aldi are on the way to the train station. For urgent shopping on Sundays, you can do so in the basement of the main train station. There is a REWE supermarket, which is also open on Sundays.

name: Breathtaking apartment in the middle of Kreuzberg
description:
The space
Whole appartment in Berlin Mitte right on the boarder to Kreuzberg. One bedroom with a double bed and a spacious living space with sleeping-sofa for 2 people (usable as double bed or even with 2 separate beds), TV, music equipment. Integrated open kitchen with all necessary cooking equipment. Balcony with 4 Chairs and a table, the balcony has sun the whole day as it is facing south south-west. New spacios bathroom. Wireless internet. Washing machine.
The appartment was build in 2012 in a quiet street in Mitte, right at the boarder to Kreuzberg. Within 5 minutes walking distance there is Oranienstraße, one of the most lively streets in Kreuzberg with many restaurants and bars. 10 minutes walking to the river at Maybachufer and the famous market. Metro stations (Kottbusser Tor, Moritzplatz and Heinrich-Heine-Straße) are very close. It is 2 stations to go to Alexanderplatz. The appartment is perfect both to do sightseeing as well as for the nightlife.
neighborhood_overview: In the middle of Kreuzbergs center Oranienstraße and only 3 metro stations from Alexanderplatz.

The space

name: Cozy Boutique Cinema Flat in Winskiez Long Term
description:
65 sqm quiet and stylish apartment for cinema and photography lovers in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, few minutes away from Kollwitzplatz, Alexanderplatz and Mitte.
Perfect for long stays and working from home!

The space
My newly renovated flat has Oak parquet throughout the place, as well as high speed WIFI.
There is a spacious white bedroom with a double bed 1.6x2, with design furniture and a luscious velvet chair, a bathroom with shower and a washer-dryer machine, a large living room featuring a Danish Design Bookcase, collectors photography books, a flat Tv, Blue Ray cinema system and also a Movie Projector!
So you can enjoy watching films in case one evening you decide to take a break from the Berlin nightlife. DVDs are provided too, as it is illegal to stream or download content in Germany!
The stainless steel kitchen is fully equipped (Dishwasher, Nespresso machine, boiler, mixer, toaster, oven, etc). and it has every tool to help you
neighborhood_overview:
The area is the famous Winskiez, in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg and very close to Alexanderplatz, as you can walk there in 15 minutes. The closest metro stations are Alexanderplatz and Greifswalder Strasse.
The flat is located in Immanuelkirchstrasse, a very nice street full of cafes in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, few steps away from Kollwitzplatz and it's lovely market and design shops.
Volkspark Friedrichshain, the oldest park of Berlin, is very close too, and it is perfect if you wanna go running or relaxing in a beautiful green environment.

The building is very quiet, but you can find many restaurants in the street (Indian, Fusion, Vietnamese, Italian), very nice wine bars, a brand new supermarket open until midnight and a Bio Market, everything just around the corner.

The tram M2 and M4 are at both the beginning and the end of the street, as to reach Alexanderplatz in only 3 stops or the famous Torstrasse and the Soho House in less than 10 minute
host_about:
Berlin, Baby!

I was born in Italy, I grew up in different places, I studied cinema which is still my biggest passion, I travel a lot and I work with my best friends at the handbag brand TL-180.

name: art-space loft with terrace. bikes!
description:
If you want to live in an amazing location, where you are practically in the sky,
all above the roofs of Berlin, seeing the most beautiful sunsets of the city...
the art- loft is your location.
It's no simulation of a hotel room or a bourgeois flat, but an art loft with a bohemian touch, with lots of space and light (from many windows and 3 light domes on the ceilings) with an unbeatable view, where you can enjoy the most beautiful sunsets in Berlin. Tempelhofer Park just around the corner!

The space
If you want to live in an amazing location, where you are practically in the sky,
all above the roofs of Berlin, seeing the most beautiful sunsets of the city...
the art- loft is your location.


It is on the last floor, having a terrace which is facing the TV tower on Alexanderplatz, as you may see on the photos... the flat is 90 square-meters large and except one sleeping room there is just one big space ,which I use,
neighborhood_overview:
And nearly the most exiting fact: the flat is just 2 walking minutes from 2 big parks: one is the park Hasenheide, with lots of trees and lawn, and the other is the former airport Tempelhof, now transformed to an original park, in which you may rollerblade or bicycle on the slopes, that ones where used by airplanes. Or one can just hang around on the enormous lawn or have a grill party!
since the neighborhood (Kruezkölln) has become very trendy and lots of artists and young people are living there.
Still my flat is in a very calm location.
In the same house is a bicycle-shop, wish provides you good bikes for only 4 Euros a day. You have to say my name ( Nina) and you will get them without showing or leaving any documents.
host_about: i am a dancer and visual artist, teaching also sometimes in switzerland mathematics and languages. this seems to be a big contrast but i like to switch from one mental or physical theme to another...

name: Furnished apartment Corbusier house
description:
A design apartment in Le Corbusier's Unité d'habitation with panoramic view of Berlin's city west. In order to respect the calm neighbourhood, I only let to professionals working in Berlin, not to tourists or students. Minimum stay 92 days

The space
An apartment in Le Corbusier's Unité d'habitation in Berlin, built in 1958, was renovated and restored to nearly its original condition. The owner, a Berlin based editor of an architectural magazine, offers the furnished apartment for rent. Enjoy the panoramic view of Berlin's city and be part of the community in the famous „Corbusier house".

The 33-square-meter apartment has a fully equipped kitchen with oven and ceran field, a balcony with view over Berlin and a bathroom with toilet and shower. The apartment hosts up to 2 adults on a high quality sofa bed (140 x 200 cm). On request additional folding mattress (70 x 200 cm).

The space
Very Central!!!!
metro 2 Min walking. !!!!!

host_about:
It's central, has easy acces, a great view...We are quiet and friendly people. You will feel welcome and at home as soon as you enter.
 I`m from Germany and lived in several country in the world.We`re well traveled and really enjoy commounicating with our guest who come from all over the world. Because of the corona virus (COVID-19), additional safety and hygiene measures have been taken at this property.
We love our Kreuzberg Neighborhood.Kreuzberg is the most diverse borough in Berlin.Where we live is a vibrant community made of many people around the world. Plus a lot of students and young people living here.We would Love to have you stay with us! 
Please do you not contact us...If you are Intolerant of people of differing races or religion / or .......We love our Kreuzberger Neighborhood and only want guest will have the same appreciation.
Welcome
We tend to have varied interactions with guests based on their schedules and reasons for visiting GR. We are sensitive to their privacy as well as our working lifestyle. Some guests we have never met and some we have shared meals with. It really depends on the day or week. That said, we sincerely enjoy getting to meet new people!
A map and directions are in the description when you have booked.
For over 6 years I've been a host to foreign exchange students coming to learn german and to visitors attending UCB, workshops and conferences while exploring  Berlin. I love conversing, discovering and learning about people, things and places. Friendships cultivated during these times offer wonderful unforgettable memories.
We are waiting for you
P.S
We practice reuse, recycle, compost and water conservation in our daily lives, i.e., short showers, . A washing machine/dryer is available, and ask for instructions....Free washer(Washmaschine) only for guests staying 7days+) ! Also turn off the Lamps when you are leaving the house.Thanks alot!
Make sure everyone feels safe. Bullying of any kind isn't allowed, and degrading comments about things such as race, religion, culture, sexual orientation, gender or identity will not be tolerated.
Respect everyone's privacy!
Dies ist eine große 3-Zimmer-Wohnung mit einem Badezimmer Loft von Berlin.
Sie haben ein privates Zimmer mit einer großen Bett. Das Zimmer hat eine Stabile Große Kleiderstange und viele Fächer zum verstauen.
Du hast Zugang zur Küche und kannst alle Teller, Tassen, Besteck verwenden, die du brauchst. Achte nur darauf, dass du schmutzige Gegenstände in die Spüle legst, wenn du mit ihnen fertig bist. Du kannst den Kühlschrank mit Gefrierfach, den Herd mit Backofen, den Toaster, die Kaffeemaschine und den Britta-Wasserfilter im Kühlschrank verwenden.
Es gibt nur ein Gemeinschaftsbad. Für jeden Gast stehen saubere Handtücher, Toilettenpapier, Handseife und flüssige Badeseife zur Verfügung.Das Bad wird mehrmals gereinigt!
Ich habe auch eine Waschmaschine im Gerät. Sag mir einfach Bescheid, wenn du sie verwenden musst, wenn du länger als7 Nächte bleibst. Der Trockner ist nicht in der Einheit, also müssen Sie entweder mit dem bereitgestellten Trockengestell an der Luft trocknen oder sich wohl fühlen, wenn ich Ihre Wäsche zum und vom Trockner bringe, wenn ich zu Hause bin. Du benötigst dein eigenes Reinigungsmittel. Es gibt auch einen Waschsalon in der Nähe. 

Ich bin kein Homeoffice

The Leopold Kiez is a typical West Berlin workers' neighborhood that has been in the focus of young people, artists and students for several years.

There are some new cafes, bars and restaurants and old-established quaint shops.

name: Gästezimmer Berlin-Pankow
description:
Unser Gästezimmer befindet sich im Dachgeschoss des von uns im Erdgeschoss bewohnten Hauses im Norden Berlins. Der Zugang zum großen geräumigen Zimmer erfolgt über das gemeinsame Treppenhaus. Ein Badezimmer und Kochecke befinden sich ebenfalls im Dachgeschoss. Somit ist ein ungestörter Aufenthalt garantiert.

The space
Wenn Ihr eine anspruchsvolles Ambiente sucht, dann wird Euch unser Gästezimmer sicherlich gefallen.

Es verfügt über eine integrierte Küche und einen kleinen Balkon. Der Blick aus dem Fenster geht in die umliegenden Gärten.

Der Raum ist mit einem Doppelbett und einer Schlafcouch ausgestattet.

Rauchen auf dem Balkon ist möglich, in der Wohnung jedoch nicht.

Guest access
Schnelles WLAN ist vorhanden.
Der integrierte Küchenbereich ist normal ausgestattet.

Wir haben zwar keinen offiziellen 24/7 Check-I

neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Westend is an old and safe area of Berlin. There are many villas and old houses in the area. You find nice little shops and restaurants in Reichsstraße, which you can reach within walking distance. Every week there is a nice market just one road away.
host_about:
Ich bin in Deutschland geboren und aufgewachsen und lebe seit etwa 40 Jahren in Berlin. Ich bin verheiratet und habe zwei Kinder. Als Journalistin war ich bei diversen TV-Sendern, u.a. RIAS TV, Deutsche Welle TV, n-tv tätig. Jetzt arbeite ich als Pressesprecherin bei einer internationalen Hilfsorganisation. Ich reise gern und hierbei faszinieren mich besonders die asiatischen und afrikanischen Länder. Lesen macht mir Spaß und hierbei fesselt mich ein guter Krimi genauso wie Sachbücher über politische Themen, ausländische Kulturen und Menschen. Im Fernsehen schaue ich mir am liebsten Dokumentationen über fremde Länder und Kulturen an. Aber auch ein guter Spielfilm bereitet mir Vergnügen. 
Mir ist es wichtig, dass meine Gäste sich wie zu Hause fühlen. Wenn es Probleme gibt oder irgendwas fehlt - ein Anruf genügt. In meiner Abwesenheit kümmert sich mein Mann Michael um alles. 
Ich selbst habe bereits mehrfach über Airbnb gebucht und ich finde, es ist eine einmalige Gelegenheit, Land und Leute kennen zu lernen. Kein Hotel dieser Welt bietet solch eine Gelegenheit. 
Herzlichst Silvia 
ENGLISH
I was born in Germany and I'm living in Berlin for about 40 years now. I am married and have two children. As a journalist, I worked for various TV channels, e.g. RIAS TV, Deutsche Welle TV, n-tv news-channel. Now I'm working as a press officer for an international charityorganization. I love traveling and I'm fascinated particularly from Asian and African countries and their people. Reading a book is fun and I'm either fascinated by a good thriller as well as non-fiction books on political issues, foreign cultures and people. On television I mostly watch documentaries about foreign countries and cultures. But a good movie enjoys me as well.
I find it important that my guests feel at home. If there are problems or something is missing - just call. In my absence, my husband Michael takes care of everything. I also booked accommodations via airbnb and it is a fantastic possibility to get in good contact with people and their town. No hotel can offer this possibility.
Warm regards and you are very welcome. Silvia

description:

Thats why we offer only 3 beds and two rooms). You can use wireless LAN, TV and a piano. The apartment is in the fourth floor with an elevator. Our daughter is nine, so we have everything children that age need and like.
There are playgrounds, restaurants and supermarkets very close by.
Enjoy your stay.

name: The Berlin stork's nest
description:
Welcome to the Storch's nest. In a very berlinerlisch manner my elderly neighbours named the apartment after its location - sitting on top of the building, like a nest. Within walking distance you will find public transport like S-Bahn or underground to reach all sightseeing spots in just a few minutes.
5 minutes to Potsdamer Platz or 15 minutes to Alexander Platz? No problem!

**** As a woman and nonsmoker, renting a room in a private accommodation, not a holiday apartment.

The space
The apartment overlooks the Gasometer Schöneberg and is located on 'Akazien' neighborhood in Schöneberg. It is very bright and on the 5th Floor of the house (no lift), that is why they call it the Storch's Nest. Being in the center of Berlin the apartment is very quiet (except for the Sunday church bells).

The guest room (10 sqm) is located on the sunny south-west side. It has a modern new daybed that can be enlarged to a double bed, a bedside table, a ch
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in the in the heart of Berlin very near Potsdamer Platz. It's a quite neighbourhood with nice restaurants, co-working spaces and the Schöneberger Rathaus, where Kennedy said: I am a Berliner. :)
host_about: Hi, I am very happy to welcome you in the heart of Berlin and my top floor stash called Storch's Nest. Since 20 years I am living in Berlin and am working in the music business. I am happy to give some hints to explore real Berlin, for sightseeing, the best restaurants and where to dance Tango or Swing. Have a great stay in Berlin! Cheers, Rosita

name: Stay the Berlin - Friedrichshain
description:
The space
In the middle of Berlin, Friedrichshain, centrally located with good connection to public transport like S-Bahn, U-Bahn, Tram, and to the Berlin nightlife, good for shopping and for eating in fine restaurants and so much more....
A nice and bright room in a Berlin Altbau (build in 1914), 21 sqm, air bed size 120*200, electric kettle for making tea or coffee, WLAN, Radio, CD-Player, bathroom vis-a-vis (co use) with a bath tub, fridge can be used and if you are in the mood for cooking, there is an oven and two hot plates

You will share the apartment with me, three cuddly cats and maybe the lodger of the Berlin Zimmer.

Friedrichhain is hip, colorful, fancy, funny and loud. The famous Simon-Dach-Strasse is about 20 min to go, cosy shops, restaurants, bars, a shopping mall and much more.
15 min by subway to Alexanderplatz
A travel guide is available

freundlich, aufgeschlossen, tolerant, reise gerne und helfe darum anderen beim Reisen, liebe Musik, Bücher und stricke Socken....

The space
Beautiful, large and light-filled room (27m2) in quiet 'Altbau' apartment. High ceilings, wooden floor, a balcony and a view on to a little park. Sorry, some of the fotos are outdated: The piano is not there anymore, but there is a nice, practical desk now!

We are registered at the Berlin city council, so you can be save to rent a legal place.

neighborhood_overview: The 'Kollwitzkiez' is one of the hippest districts Berlin has to offer. The streets in our neighborhood have the charm of Parisian boulevards and encompass a wide range of trendy bistros, bars, cafes, restaurants, and grocery stores. There are also other mod cons - pharmacy, bank, coffee shops, ATMs, post office, boutique stores, live music, cinemas etc - - all within easy walking distance (no more than 15 mins). Anything else you desire should be with a 20 minute radius if you take public transport.

The Friedbergstrasse is so quite and you are close to public transport which takes you to whichever corner of Berlin and Potsdam you fancy.

The space
You can spend your holidays in a bright room, that is almost a grand salon, in Berlin-Charlottenburg. It´s close to the Lietzensee, there are tapas bars and indian restaurants around the corner. It´s easy to get from the airport to the flat. The bus 109 drops you there in 20 minutes. See the pics and you get an idea.

If there are two of you the second person would pay 15 Euros/day additionally.

neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg is a quite neighbourhood with buildings from the beginning of the 20th century. You only have to walk 200m to get to the Lietzensee which is surrounded by a beautiful park. You can chose between Indian, Italian, Japanese and other food in the surroundings. The S-Bahn (Charlottenburg) is 700m away, the U-Bahn, U2 Sophie Charlotte Platz 1000m, the U7 Wilmersdorfer Straße 1100m away for you to have the best connection to Berlin-Mitte and other places.
host_about:
Freiberuflich, Coach für Kommunikation und Persönlichkeitsentwicklung. Deutsch-Brasilianerin in Brasilien und Argentinien aufgewachsen. Portugiesisch, Spanisch und Deutsch als Muttersprachen. 
Ich kann nicht leben ohne Musik, ohne Bücher, ohne in Kontakt sein mit Familie und Freunde. Ich liebe den Dichter Rumi, Yoga, Sushi, peruanische Küche und Schokoladenkuchen. Ich reise am liebsten, in dem ich beruflich mit Freunden zu tun habe. 
Mein Lebensmotto: Be the change you wish to see in the world.

name: Charmantes Zimmer im Grünen mit eigenem Balkon
description:
Du wirst von dieser charmanten Unterkunft bezaubert sein. Das Zimmer befindet sich in einem Haus mit wildem Garten im grünen Norden Berlins.

The space
Das Haus wurde in den 30er Jahren gebaut. Die Türen und der Boden quietschen manchmal. Das Zimmer liegt im 1. OG und hat einen eigenen Balkon. Das Bett ist 140 cm breit. Du hast einen Schreibtisch und einen Kleiderständer. Das Bad liegt auf gleicher Ebene, Du wirst es mit anderen Gästen teilen und es kann sein, dass eins unserer Kinder die Toilette benutzt, wenn das Bad im Erdgeschoss besetzt ist.

Guest access
Du benutzt den gleichen Eingang wie wir und gelangst über die gemeinsame Treppe in das 1. OG. In unserem Haus ist es manchmal sehr unordentlich, weil die Kinder überall spielen.

Other things to note
Unser Haus müsste mal wieder renoviert werden. Das Bad hat die Vermieterin in den 90er Jahren eingebaut, dem entsprechend ist die Dusche schon sehr klapprig und oll. <
neighborhood_overview: Berlin-Waidmannslust ist sehr grün und ruhig. Nachts kann man die Eulen hören und ab und zu läuft ein Fuchs durch den Garten. Manchmal hört man Kinder oder Jugendliche auf der Straße. Die S1 ist zu Fuß in nur 7 Minuten erreichbar. Nach 20 minütiger Fahrt ist man im Zentrum. Gleichzeitig gelangt man in 5 Minuten in den Wald. Der Tegeler See ist in 15 Minuten mit dem Fahrrad erreichbar.
host_about:
Zusammen mit meinem Ehemann, meinen drei Söhnen und den beiden Kindern meines Mannes lebe ich im schönen grünen Berlin-Waidmannslust. Ich arbeite gern in meinem wunderschönen Garten und koche gern. Ich bin sehr an anderen Menschen und Kulturen interessiert. 

Mein Mann und ich sind Ärzte (Neurologie und Psychiatrie). Oft fahren wir zu unserem Hof im Wendland, an dem wir gern herumwerkeln. Wir sind sehr an Design, Architektur, Kunst, Musik, Kultur im allgemeinen, Sprachen, an Astronomie, Geologie und physiologischen und psychischen Phänomenen interessiert. Wir treffen und gern mit anderen Menschen und verreisen gern (insbesondere in Europa). Wir versuchen uns möglichst ökologisch zu ernähren. 

Ich spreche deutsch und englisch und habe Grundkenntnisse in französisch.
Mein Mann spricht deutsch, englisch, norwegisch. Er hatte Latein und Altgriechisch in der Schule. 

Mein großer Sohn ist schon 18 Jahre alt und viel unterwegs. Er interessiert sich für Technik und Informatik und trifft sich gern mit seinen Freunden.  Elian ist schon 20 Jahre alt und nur selten in Berlin. Er lebt überwiegend in Witten, wo er Medizin studiert. Annina ist 17 Jahre alt. Sie ist eine passionierte Zeichnerin und Gestalterin. Sie wird auf jeden Fall etwas künstlerisches studieren! Ausserdem ist sie sehr sprachinteressiert. Sie spricht fließend englisch und französisch. Ausserdem lernt sie grad koreanisch. Unsere beiden kleinen Jungs heissen  Maksim (6 Jahre alt) und Jonah (5 Jahre alt). Sie hören gern Geschichten und spielen im ganzen Haus und im Garten.

description:

Guest room (10 sq m) in the centre of Berlin (district Tiergarten, near Central Station) with day bed "Ikea Beddinge Håvet" (2.00 by 1.40 m), private bath (with shower tray), TV, regal, guest fridge, coffee machine, water heater, various teas and coffee, cutlery and coat rack in the hallway, further use of kitchen possible by appointment. name: Bright Top Floor Flat with Terrace
description:
The space
Welcome to Friedrichshain, one of the hippest neighbourhoods of Berlin and located in the very heart of the German capital city!

*Location
Besides being located in Boxhagener Straße which is one of the most lively streets in Friedrichshain, the flat is in close proximity of public transportation. The Sbahn station Ostkreuz is only three walking minutes away, from where the rest of the city can be easily reached, also due to its connection to the circle line transportation (Ringbahn): Alexanderplatz and Schönhauser Allee in 10 minutes, Hackescher Markt in 12 minutes.
Further, there is a bus and tram stop (Bus 240 and Tram 21) directly in front of the house.
In the streets of the neighbourhood mainly pubs, bars and restaurants can be found. Additionally, there is a huge selection of small boutiques, second hand shops etc. For this reason Boxhagener Straße forms with the other popular areas like Boxhagener Platz (8 minute walking distan
host_about:
Hi there,

Allow me to introduce myself: André, 26, Friedrichshainer.
I've been living in this wonderful neighborhood since nearly four years and I don't wanna miss one single day! Of course, there have been times where I complained about noisy people right under my window outside at night or about my favourite bar being fully-packed, but everytime I'm walking down the streets in my beloved neighborhood with its interesting-looking people coming from all over the world and the huge selection of bars and restaurants, I'm glad to be part of it! It's so relaxing to know that you get everything you want 24/7 and that you can easily meet up with friends in the park nearby, although you're not perfectly dressed up because people do not give a F*** here! :)

I came to Berlin four years ago due to my bachelor university program "International Business". I started looking for an own flat because of some unpleasant flat sharing experiences before and I found this sunny top floor flat in the heart of Berlin. Now I alreday finished my bachelor's degree and continued with the master's programm. Besides studying marketing, finance or accounting, I'm pretty easygoing and love spending time with my friends, especially in Friedrichshain , Kreuzberg or Mitte.
Further, I do enjoy swimming, visiting concerts, dancing or chilling in the park.
When you guys arrive, I will personally hand over the keys and will be glad to give you further information on my favorite places in Berlin and all other stuff like public transportation, shopping, museums etc...
Maybe we can also meet up for drinks and you guys can already report about your first impressions of my flat, the neighborhood and your time in Berlin.

Can't wait to get to know you ;)

Best,
André

Berlin mon amour... is a mini apartment (28 sqm), with kitchen and private bathroom. It is on the second floor of a 'gartenhaus' in a quiet street in Mitte-Wedding, a three minute walk from Leopoldplatz. It has an independent access, next to our door. neighborhood_overview:
Mitte-Wedding is one of the most multicultural neighborhoods of Berlin. It is changing very fast: is attracting more and more students, young artists and designers, couples with children. In its streets born cultural spaces, nice cafes and restaurants, design workshops and shops. The neighborhood has a vibrant art scene which finds its center in the Silent Green Kulturquartier, Savvy Contemporary, Gerichtshof. Nearby there are two large parks (Schillerpark, Rehberge), a lake (Plotzensee), swimming pool. In a few minutes from here there are a children farm and many great playgrounds for children and adventure playgrounds for teenager.

Services: three minutes from the house is the Müllerstrasse, commercial street where there are many supermarkets, shops, pharmacies. Close to home there is one of the finest turkish markets of Berlin: mountains of fruit and colorful vegetables blend the colors of the customer and the voices of the sellers. On Leopoldplatz there is a farmers´ mar

Es gibt KEINE gemeinsam genutzten Räume!
Jeder Gast erhält bei
neighborhood_overview:
Obwohl die Wohnung sehr verkehrsgünstig und innenstadtnah liegt kann man sich in Ihr sehr gut von der lauten + hektischen Stadt sowie den eigenen anstrengenden Stadterkundungen erholen.

Hervorzuheben ist dabei das niedrige Preisniveau der Restaurants und Gaststätten in der Umgebung der Wohnung. Hier zahlt man keine "Touristenpreise" in der Pizzeria oder Kneipe!

In unmittelbarer Nähe erreichbar sind u.a. Supermarkt, Bäcker, Gaststätten, Imbisse , Apotheken, Restaurants + Polizei.
In nur ca. 8 Gehminuten Entfernung befindet sich eine große Einkaufsstraße mit allen gängigen Geschäften.

An Ihr liegt auch das Einkaufszentrum „Tempelhofer Hafen“, Berlins einziges Shopping-Center direkt am Wasser.

Ca. 15 Gehminuten entfernt befindet sich die über 300 Hektar große „Tempelhofer Freiheit“ (der ehemalige Zentralflughafen) mit umfangreichen Sportmöglichkeiten wie Inlinern, Surfen, Skateboarden, Joggen und Grillmöglichkeit.

Tempelhof

name: 11D Landmark /Checkpoint Charlie/121m2/2BATH/3BR
description:
The Downtown Landmark near Checkpoint Charlie.
A HOLIDAY HOME IN A NEW over 120 YEARS OLD CENTRAL MONUMENT !
The only place that 100 percent survived the 2nd world war in this central area, with a preserved history.
BEST LOCATION (city center near Checkpoint Charlie, most famous sights can be reached by foot), MOST BEAUTIFUL HOUSE OF THE AREA in the legendary street Friedrichstrasse, TOP CONDITION, QUIET (no drive through, pedestrian zone starts 200 meters away).

The space
MAGICIANS, THE GREENS, BANKERS, LAWYERS AND FILMMAKERS
Gutschow House, built in 1895, fully restored in 2014, an important work of historicism (Neo-Gothic and Neo-Renaissance), is the symbol of southern Friedrichstrasse, one of Berlins most famous streets. It is in Kreuzberg, also known as X-Berg, a district famous in the 80ies for its alternative lifestyle and squatters; a national heritage monument due to elaborate façade design, its location, its history and the only hou
neighborhood_overview:
THE BEST CENTRAL LOCATION BECAUSE:

most sights are within walking distance: 2 minutes to Checkpoint Charlie (the most famous symbol of the Cold War); Jewish Museum (the most significant example of contemporary architecture) is our immediate neighbor; 15 minutes to Martin Gropius Bau (main showroom); 20 minutes to Potsdamer Platz (most popular attraction of the New Berlin); 15 minutes to the Gendarmenmarkt (one of the most beautiful marketplaces); 30 minutes to the Brandenburg Gate (the symbol of reunification) and the Reichstag (most famous landmark); 30 minutes to the Museum Island (UNESCO World Heritage Site) with: Old Museum, New Museum, Old National Gallery, Bodemuseum and Pergamon Museum. At Hallesches Tor (3 minutes) is the dock for Berlin's most popular boat tour: the bridge tour.

Art, beauty, multicultural

Is the new center of the Berlin art galleries at this point. Here is the line between alternative and multicultural district of Kreuzberg and
host_about: Trained as a filmmaker (NFTS). Lived, studied and worked in Bucharest (Romania), Berlin, London, Lodz (Poland) and Kishinev (Moldova). Originally restored all the apartments they we rent for our family that lives in the same house. Are very grateful to discover the beauty of our world also with the support from our guests.

name: Cozy Apartment in Heart of Berlin
description:
My cozy appartment is at the 4th floor facing the courtyard: that's way there is so much light and it's so quite.
Lovely neighbourood very well connected with Alexanderplatz: from here you can go everywhere! 10 minutes walk from trendy Mitte.

The space
What I love in my appartement is that it is warm and cozy, but also full of light and open. Almost every piece of furniture has his own, long story to tell.

Guest access
Wi-fi, washing machine, stereo amplifier+speakers, fully equipped kitchen, double bed

License number
03/Z/RA/003507-18
neighborhood_overview:
My lovely neighbourood, the Winzkiez, is the quintessence of Berlin: 15 minutes walk from Berlin's most representative symbol, the Television Tower in Alexanderplatz, but far away from the crowded tourists.routes, 10 minutes walk from the trendy and lively bars on the Torstrasse and Rosenthalerplatz, but very quite and safe.
The Museum Insel, with it's Pergamon Museum, the Altes Museum (with the stunning egiptian collection and the Nefertiti) are just two bus stops from Alexanderplatz.
A 7to24 supermarket is just 5 minutes walk, there are a bio supermarket and many nice cafes where you can enjoy a lovely brunch before starting to explore the city!
On Saturdays you can go to thre lovely local products' market in Kollwitzplatz: you can shop fresh fruit and vegetable, and also enjoy a meal or a drink at the market: stawberries prosecco is my favourite ;-)
host_about:
Hallo! I'm Sonia, i live in Berlin since 2009 but i moved a lot before coming here!
Travelling is for me a life-style, so from time to time i rent my home and leave for a while: i love to explore new cities,go to museum and festivals, or just fly south and lie down in the sun. 
Family and nature is what makes me feel at home - thats why my little cozy Berlin appartment is furnished with vintage family pieces and a lot of wood and natural materials.

name: Cozy, quiet, bright room | Perfect location
description:
A private room in shared flat, suitable both for traveling families and backpackers. Located in the vibrant, hip and artistic neighborhood Neukölln and very well connected with the rest of the city!

*Old house with high ceilings, stucco and wooden floors - and with renovated kitchen and bathroom!
*The street has some of the nicest and most popular bars, cafés and restaurants in the entire city.
*The popular neighourhood Kreuzberg with for example Görlitzer Park is also a 10 min. walk away.

The space
IT'S ONE ROOM NOT THE WHOLE APARTMENT, I live in another room of the apartment :)

The room is 15 square meters (161 square feet) large. Even though the neighborhood has a lot of nightlife the room is very quiet because it is facing the back yard. It gets lots of light and has old wooden floors, high ceilings with stucco. The room of course also has furniture and I provide bed linens and towels so you don't have to worry about that.
neighborhood_overview:
SEE MY AIRBNB GUIDEBOOK! :) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1236282/guidebook

The vibrant, diverse and creative neighborhood of Neukölln has been very trendy and popular since a couple of years and it has been compared to "New York's lower east side in the 1980s", or to Brooklyn today for that matter, the apartment is situated in it's very center!

Neukölln has a bit of everything, a nice selection of different restaurants, an amazing bar culture, parks, gallery spaces, little cute shops, special food supermarkets, cinemas, markets on the weekends and lots of interesting people from all over the world who have chosen to settle here!

Many different bars and cafés as well as second hand stores, record shop and restaurants are just a few minutes away from the house, two different art house cinemas are ca 15 minutes away, the beautiful Landwehr-canal is 5 minutes away and is wonderful to take walks or jogs along. The popular Görlitzer park is also at walkin
host_about:
Hello,
 I'm originally from Sweden, I currently study Fine Arts at the Berlin University of the Arts, I mainly work with photography and film, previously I have studied and worked with traditional film making and also studied Sociology. I work as a translator to pay rent. I can give you advice on art galleries/events and museums and/or the party scene if that's your thing. I like to read a lot and I'm sure you will find a book to your liking at my house. I'm very easy going I would say!

name: Sunny, central, clean & equipped apartment
description:
Fantastic, fully equipped two-room prewar apartment in heart of Berlin's most dynamic neighborhood. Surrounded by cafes, bars and restaurants, shopping for all needs, and public transit just outside the door. Lots of sunshine and balcony!

The space
My apartment is a gorgeous, two-room space with full kitchen, bathroom and sun-facing balcony. Size: 60 sqm/645 sq. ft. Fully renovated in a prewar building (the original molding is still on the ceiling). Plenty of room for 1-2 people, either as a couple in the bedroom or with one on the living room sofa that pulls out into a comfy double bed.

The apartment is always clean with towels, sheets, wifi, stocked kitchen, cleaning supplies, washing machine, dish washer, empty drawers to unpack ... everything you need to feel right at home during your stay.

The kitchen floor has brand new hardwood and the bathroom was renovated this year with a new bathtub.

Guest access
The apartme
neighborhood_overview:
Neighborhood: Can't be beat. If you don't know Neukölln, you're in for a great time. A dynamic and diverse neighborhood full of students, young professionals, foreigners from all over, working-class families ... a true urban melting pot.

Whatever you need is within a stone's throw: grocery stores (both big chains and mom n' pop), drug stores, shopping of all kinds, parks, the Berlin canal, and cafes, restaurants and nightlife for every budget and taste.

name: Concrete sky cabin Hackescher Markt
description:
The space
This studio is part of a high-rise apartment building erected during DDR times as a place for high-level officials and privileged intellectuals. Now, it suddenly found itself in the center of the vivid new Berlin-Mitte. We designed the studio by blending a bit of East German design (see the ceiling light "Sputnik", for example) with current design from Berlin (Moebel Horzon) and Scandinavia (e.g., Muuto). The photograph shows a famous event taking place in East Berlin in the Seventies. The walls display raw concrete, and the floor has a beautiful naturally-oiled parquet. We hope you'll like it!

This studio in the middle of Berlin-Mitte, 100m away from Hackescher Markt, 300m from Museum Island, Humboldt University and close to a myriad of attractions like the TV tower, galeries, boutiques, cafes, clubs and bars, and many more. If you want to be in the very center of the new energetic part of Berlin with places such as top-notch galeries, cutting edge

name: Cosy and bright with views +balcony
description:
My bright apartment is situated in the third floor of a building directly at Boxhagener Platz. It has a living room with a double sofa bed (135x195) , kitchen space and dining area, and a separated bedroom with a double bed. Smoking is allowed only on the balcony.
The apartment is very centrally located and well connected with public transport. The young and dynamic neighbourhood is full of small shops, galleries, cafés and restaurants.

The space
Bright, cosy and absolutely affordable, this is the perfect place for a couple or a family with small children. The apartment has a bedroom with a double bed and a living room with a comfortable bed-sofa, a table for 4 and a small, well equipped kitchen.

I travel a lot and when I'm not in Berlin I offer my home to people from other cities and countries. It is a small apartment, but it is very lovely. Smoking is not allowed, but you can have a cigarette on the balcony, where you can even have breakfast (t
neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain is young, hip, active. Many painters and artists work and live here and show their creations on Sundays on the well known flea market of Boxhagener Platz.
Around Boxhagener Square you will find plenty of cafés and international restaurants.
On Wühlischstrasse and Gabriel Max Strasse there are plenty of small, beautiful and interesting shops.
Friedrichshain is a neighborhood with lots of different places, and Boxhagener Square is the place where everyone meets.
host_about:
I grew up in Germany, but later I went to Spain with my parents. Now I work in Barcelona, visit frequently Majorca, where my parents live, and spend a lot of time in Berlin, a city I love and where I have many friends. 

My apartment in Barcelona is perfect for short-term-stays (and even long stays), and I spend a lot of time thinking about how I can make the stay of my guests even more comfortable.

My second home in Berlin is situated in the former city centre with many cafes and restaurants and excellent public transport. 

I will make sure that you feel comfortable and have a wonderful stay in Barcelona or Berlin. If you have any question, feel free to ask!

Looking for a beautiful place? In one of the most vibrant cities in the world? In one of Berlin's most intercultural areas?

At Huttenstraße 39 in 10553 Berlin, in Berlin's quarter of Mitte-Tiergarten, calmly and quietly located in the backyard house.

name: Stunning Rooftop Friedrichshain Apartment
description:
A stunning rootop appartment with a huge private rooftop terrace overlooking Berlin. Large open living spaces, second balcony & bathrooms, espresso machine. In the beating heart of Friedrichshain with cafes, bars, local markets, resturants, transport and shops on the doorstep. The room is setup with high speed wifi, a working desk with a widescreen monitor, plenty of space for storage and clothes. The appartment is shared with 3 other people. All very freindly, generous and conciderate people.

name: Charming 2 room flat w. Balcony | Perfect location
description:
A cozy, quiet & perfectly situated 2-room flat on the central street of the vibrant neighborhood Neukölln. Well connected to the rest of the city and suitable for traveling families and backpackers alike. With a beautiful green balcony, turn of the century charm, high ceilings, stucco and wooden floors - and with renovated kitchen and bathroom! Within a few minutes are some of the nicest bars, cafés and restaurants in the city. Kreuzberg and Görlitzer Park is a 10 min walk away.

The space
The big room has a bed (140 cm) which fits ca 2 people. The room also has a comfortable couch(not for sleeping). There is also a desk, lamps, Books and interior decoration.
This room also has a lovely balcony with view as well as privacy! The balcony has a little table a comfortable recliner chair with cup holder, a bench and chairs, perfect for breakfast or a glass of wine in the evening! It also has light that can be turned on at night, both electric and via lanterns wit
neighborhood_overview:
SEE MY AIRBNB GUIDEBOOK!

AREA; BARS, PARKS:
The area Neukölln is probably the trendiest and most interesting area to be in Berlin right now and has been compared to "New Yorks lower east side in the 1980s", the apartment is situated in it's very centre at the beginning of the famous and very nice and cost central street Weserstrasse, lined with ambient bars and nice restaurants. There is a bike rental shop just around the corner on Pannierstrasse 13. The lovely canal is a few minutes away and breakfast at one of the places by the canal is my personal top tip.

A wide selection of cosy "Berlin style bars" (typically decorated with retro furniture), as well as second hand stores and restaurants are all just around the corner, two different art house cinemas are ca 15 minutes away, the beautiful Landwehr-canal is 5 minutes away and is wonderful to take walks or jogs along. The popular Görlitzer park is also at walking distance. The Kindl center for contemporar
host_about:
Hello,
 I'm originally from Sweden, I currently study Fine Arts at the Berlin University of the Arts, I mainly work with photography and film, previously I have studied and worked with traditional film making and also studied Sociology. I work as a translator to pay rent. I can give you advice on art galleries/events and museums and/or the party scene if that's your thing. I like to read a lot and I'm sure you will find a book to your liking at my house. I'm very easy going I would say!

name: French flair in lively Xberg-  3 months rent
description:
Calm and bright charming studio in a green backyard in Kreuzköln, in the center of Berlin, a cosmopolitan, alternative and lively district, with its cafes and restaurants along the landwehrkanal.
Ideal for a long-term rental, up to two people because fully equipped.
Arriving independently while staying in touch when you arrive and throughout your rental.
Very well served by public transport.

The space
This charming 33 sq.m. one-room apartment is located in the center of Berlin, at the bank of the Landwehr canal. Walk along the romantic pathway on which it is pleasant to stroll around. You will be in the trendy and alternative district of Kreuzberg, crossroads of cultures which make of Berlin a unique city in the world: its cafes, its bars, its restaurants, its cinemas, its improvised happenings according to the mood of its inhabitants make of this place a real experiment. Do not miss the Regenbogen Fabrik, many Biergärten (literally “gardens of bee
neighborhood_overview: A lively and colorful neighborhood, cosmopolitan, constantly changing. Many bars and restaurants as well as parks and greenery, the canal, boules, wave pool, shops, cinemas, bookstores, terraces as well as the oriental market on the Maybachufer on Tuesdays and Fridays.
host_about:
Alsacienne dont le cœur bat désormais outre-rhin, je vis l’Europe au quotidien entre la région transfrontalière Strasbourg-Ortenau et Berlin, en espérant peut-être un jour devenir une vraie berlinoise. Mais c'est quoi au juste une berlinoise ?
Entre ici et là-bas, seule, en amoureux ou avec mes enfants, Berlin reste le lieu d'espaces de liberté nouveaux, de découvertes à faire et à refaire, de surprises et d'inspirations nouvelles alimentant mon quotidien et les projets du futur.
Les temps de mes absences, j'ouvre mon précieux chez-moi berlinois à quelques hôtes de confiance pour leur faire partager ce qui dans cette ville me fait vibrer...J'ouvre désormais également mes portes à Kehl sur la rive du Rhin pour faire profiter de manière authentique et simple les voyageurs de passage de la qualité de vie de ma région transfrontalière. Et j'espère bien être là pour vous y accueillir en personne !

name: BigBedroom inGroundflat with Garden
description:
Between KottbusserDamm(U8 Schönleinstrasse) and lovely green LandwehrKanal, this quiet 18m²Bedroom with Piano welcomes you in a big 100m arty flat with open kitchen, large bathroom and a wonderful sunny Garden with huge lime tree. Enjoy Kreuzberg-Neukölln area and creative life!

The space
This flat is occupied by my flatmate who is a friend, Theodor, 50 years old, he's an artist, writer, painter and performer, originally from California, living in Berlin for 30 years and is now German. And Meliton, a hungarian man who sleeps in Theodor's atelier is also an artist. He is quiet and has a good soul.
My room, next to the big bathroom (without lock, only curtain) is isolated from the living area by a long gallery corridor full of art works. The whole space is arty, colorful and warm.
Our private garden is unique in Berlin! Quiet, cosy and isolated with a huge lime tree, there're a small table, garden chairs, different plants, flowers and home compost! The s
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in North Neukölln or as the natives call it, 'Kreuz-Kölln' because we border Kreuzberg. The street is residential, planted with trees, calm but alive, with cafés, bars, creative shops. The whole neighbourhood has many faces between the hectic boulevard Kottbusser Damm and the peaceful promenade along the Canal that you can reach in less than 1 min.'s walk. Nothing is really far: Kottbusser Tor, Hermannplatz, Hasenheide (Park), Görlitzer Park... The  farmers's market (on Tuesdays and Fridays) along the canal is only 5 min walk, as well as the flea market on Sundays. Nearby, you'll find the BSI (Berliner Sprache Institute) renowned private language school. It is an inexpensive and recommended school to learn or improve your german.
host_about: Often on tour, travelling for work, artistical residencies around the world, I'm a contemporary dancer based in Neukölln, Berlin. My room often remains free, longing for visitors! I like books, art in general, music (piano, clarinet, electro...), costumes, relation with nature, cities and architecture. New encounters playing respect and flow are always welcome.

name: Sensationeller Blick
description:
Unsere Wohnung bietet den ganzen Comfort einer Stadtwohnung im Zentrum Berlins. Sie liegt in der 5. Etage ( ohne Aufzug). Ihr werdet aber von einer Oase der Ruhe, einem umwerfenden Blick, viel Licht, Sonne, mitten im Zentrum Berlins, belohnt!
Es gibt ein grosses Schlafzimmer, eine amerikanische Küche, ein großes Wohnzimmer, ein Bad, Gästetoilette, einen großen Balkon und einen umwerfenden Blick auf Siegessäule und Potsdamer Platz.
Kleiner Hund oder Katze erlaubt!
Mindestaufenthalt ist 5 Tage.

The space
Die Wohnung hat eine hervorragende Anbindung, direkt U- Bahn Nollendorfplatz ( U-Bahn Linien Nr. 1, Nr. 2, Nr. 3 Nr. 4. ) und liegt in einer ruhigen Seitenstraße.
Da die Wohnung im Gartenhaus im Dachgeschoss liegt, ist sie sehr ruhig !
Es fahren regelmäßig Busse zum Flughafen Tegel/ Schönefeld und der nächste Taxistand ist 5 Minuten vom Haus entfernt.
Meine Registriernummer lautet: 07/Z/AZ/011573-21

host_about: Ich bin Berlinerin.Ich liebe diese Stadt und wohne sehr gerne hier. Meine zweite Leidenschaft ist das Reisen. So oft es geht verreise ich und wohne dann auch in Privatunterkünften.Ich mag gerne Menschen, von hier und auch aus fernen Ländern und freue mich viel von Ihnen zu erfahren.

The home is located in a quiet green village on the eastern outskirts of Berlin.

Guest access

Other things to note

neighborhood_overview:
Berlin-Marzahn is a part of the Municipality Hellersdorf-Marzahn. Known the place is its prefabricated housing, less known by its historical village, the old village church and the green plant between the prefabricated buildings and its housing estates.
An important attraction are the gardens of the world in the Marzahn Recreational Park

Sights Surroundings:
- Gardens of the World with countries thematic cultures
- Castle and Castle Park Biesdorf
- Wuhletal trail
- Alt-Köpenick with the Museum of Decorative Arts in the Castle
- "Gründerzeitmuseum" in Berlin-Mahlsdorf
host_about:
Wir freuen uns darauf Sie ganz herzlichst in unserer wunderschönen Ferienunterkunft begrüßen zu dürfen.

Die Einrichtung der Ferienwohnung erfolgte mit Möbeln im kolonialen Stil. Bei uns finden Sie mit Schnitzereien verzierte Massivholzmöbel, die noch nach überlieferter Handwerkstradition gefertigt wurden, und handbemalte Möbel aus kleinen Handwerksbetrieben aus der Region Rajasthan in Indien.

name: Welcome to our home :)
description:
The space
Hello! Guten Tag! Welcome!

We would like to host you in our guest room. It can be arranged as 2 single beds, or 1 double bed.

Other things to note
About us: We are originally from California, though both of us have lived in Asia for a significant part of our lives. Jeremy is a writer and Celine is a scientist. Rico (our dog) is a professional napper. When we lived in the US, Rico worked in the hospital as a therapy dog to cheer up sick people. He is very well behaved and he knows over 70 tricks (and would love to eat treats while showing you!)

Collectively we speak English, Cantonese, Mandarin, Dog, and a little bit of Spanish. And, of course we are (slowly) learning German :)

We look forward to meeting you!
neighborhood_overview:
We are right in the center of town (Mitte), walking distance to many attractions (Museum Island, Bundestag, Brandenburger Tor, Tiergarten, Friedrichstadt-Palast, Deutsches Theater...) We are only 600m to Berlin Hbf. (the main station) and 700m to Friedrichstr Bhf. There is a direct bus to just the other side of our block from Tegel Airport (TXL).

We have a grocery store and bakery just one block away, and several cafes/restaurants nearby.

When the weather is nice you can go for a stroll along the Spree or in Tiergarten. We also have a lovely courtyard with a small playground (including swings!).
host_about:
I love french fries!

We are originally from California, though both of us have lived in Asia for a significant part of our lives.  Our current adventure is in Berlin, where we will live for 3 years.  Jeremy is a writer and Celine is a scientist.  Rico (our dog) is a professional napper.  When we lived in the US, Rico worked in the hospital as a therapy dog to cheer up sick people.  He is very well behaved and he knows over 70 tricks (and would love to show you!)

Collectively we speak English, Cantonese, Mandarin, Dog, a little bit of Spanish and Japanese.  And, of course we are (slowly) learning German :)

name: gemütliche Altbauwohnung / Cozy Flat in Friedenau
description:
Meine Unterkunft ist in der Nähe von U-Bhf Rüdesheimer Platz. Du wirst meine Unterkunft lieben wegen der tollen Gegend. Meine Unterkunft ist gut für Paare, Geschäftsreisende und Familien (mit Kindern).

The space
Unsere Wohnung ist 136 qm gross und befindet sich in einem typischen Berliner Altbau. Die Wohnung befindet sich im 2. Obergeschoss .

Die Wohnung verfügt über 5 Zimmer. Die beiden straßenseitigen Zimmer (Wohn- und Arbeitszimmer), sowie die Wohnküche sind mit sehr schönem und originalen Fischgrätparkett und Stuckdecken ausgestattet. Vom Arbeitszimmer geht der Balkon ab. Das Wohnzimmer und die Wohnküche sind durch eine Doppelflügeltür verbunden.

Im "hinteren" Teil der Wohnung sind das Badezimmer, Schlafzimmer, Gästezimmer und das Kinderzimmer.

Die Küche ist ausgestattet mit einem Gasherd (5-flammig) und einem Geschirrspüler. Im Badezimmer befindet sich eine Waschmaschine.

License number
07/Z/RA/010
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung befindet sich in Friedenau (gehört noch zu Schöneberg). Mit der U-Bahn (U9 Friedrich-Wilhelm-Platz, U3 Rüdesheimer Platz) ist man in ca. 10 Minuten am Ku´Damm. Typisch für Friedenau sind die schönen Altbauten. In der Nähe gibt es fußläufig alles was man braucht: Supermarkt, Bäcker, Reinigung, Apotheke, Zeitungsladen, u.v.m. Zu Fuß erreicht man in 10 Minuten die Schlossstraße - eine Shoppingmeile mit Einkaufscentern und vielen Geschäften.
host_about: Hallo, wir sind Michaela, Michael, Frida und Lennart. Wir sind waschechte Berliner und würden uns freuen Euch in unserer Wohnung willkommen zu heißen. Gerne stehen wir Euch mit Rat und Tat vor und während Eures Aufenthaltes zur Verfügung.

neighborhood_overview: I love the colorful, pulsating and international touch of my neigborhood. The apartment is situated near the "Boxhagener Platz" where you find a lovely market during the weeke-ends. Nearby several cafes, restaurants, charming shops, yoga studios and bookstores as well as bio supermarkets, cinema and playgrounds.
host_about: Ich heiße Julia und ich bin Yogalehrerin und Therapeutin. Mein Herz schlägt seit  mehr als 25 Jahren für Berlin.  Reisen und Menschen sind meine große Leidenschaften. Ich mag die schönen Dinge des Lebens: eine nährende Umgebung, wohltuende Menschen, gutes und gesundes Essen, Kunst und den Yoga als wichtigsten Wegbegleiter. Mein Mann Ist Musiker und beruflich viel in Berlin.  In unserer Wohnung haben wir es gerne klar, aber gemütlich, mit vielen charmanten Details, die eine Wohnung zu einem zu Hause machen- einem Ort des Seins.

name: Kreuzberg Oasis, bright & calm, corner Paul-Lincke
description:
Design oasis in the heart of Kreuzberg. Light and spacious with high ceilings, original plasterwork and special pieces, it sits in Kreuzkölln – metres from Paul Lincke Ufer and the vibrant canal area of cafes and restaurants on the border between Kreuzberg and Neukölln.

The space
I´m passionate about restoring old things which means my renovated 1895 flat and the pieces within it have retained much of the story of their history. It´s a cool space – original plasterwork, lamps restored to former glory and a mixture of interesting design pieces from the various cities I´ve lived in. My space is calm, cosy and beautiful – I invite you to call it home.

Guest access
Fresh linen and towels, a large parquet dining table and eight chairs for work or play, TV, WiFi, washing machine, dishwasher, oven and fridge, all crockery and normal basics such as tea and coffee.

License number
First name and Last name: Katherine Taylor
neighborhood_overview:
Kreuzkölln has a lot going on. Endless cafes serving excellent coffee. Lots of little bars and restaurants ranging from a Michelin starred establishment right around the corner to the best Japanese noodle bar in Berlin on Paul Lincke Ufer to Hotel Bar and Esel serving their incredible home-made ice cream during the hot Berlin summer to an organic food supermarket and a couple of 24 hour shops for emergency purchases just up the street.

There are at least 5 lovely movie theatres within walking distance, live music venues, discount, standard and Turkish supermarkets within a stone´s throw.

It´s a vibrant area of town with lots going on – and there's a lovely calm oasis to come home to at the end.
host_about: I'm a designer who's lived all over the world and now calls Berlin home, I travel a lot and love to stay within cool neighborhoods getting to know the quirks and specialties of the area while living in a lovely space.

name: Fabulous Location Rosenthaler Platz
description:
Our chill 2-rooms apartment is very quiet yet greatly central. You will have the entire space to your own as we sublet our home while we're traveling. Located on the border of Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte, in a tiny little street running just next to fabulous Kastanienallee, makes a perfect kick-off point in the heart of almighty Berlin.

The space
Inspired by our own AirBnB guest experiences back in 2013 we ever since love to welcome guests in our space and offer them as much care, comfort and inspiring experience as possible.

Our guests will be treated like at home with the whole house at their disposal. Guest bedroom with pillow top queen bed is a nice comfy space so you can relax after a colourful busy day. It will be perfect for single person as well as a couple.

Additionally, there is a beautiful spacious fully equipped kitchen with a living room, a bright spacious bathroom and a balcony. If you need a place to sleep for a 3rd person this
neighborhood_overview:
Welcome to Berlin's coolest diverse, walkable hotspots: Rosenthaler Platz and Kastanienallee, linking modern Mitte with charming Prenzlauer Berg.

Within walking distance are most famous Berlin's cafes. Our favourite is of course our own - "OAK & ICE" - cozy interiors with a wide selection of natural ice cream, coffee, cake and warm-hearted breakfasts! Other than that, Napoljonska or Galao, are great breakfast spots or the ecologically friendly collective Morgenrot or some of our other beloved places with amazing food from all around the world like Yumcha Heroes or W der Imbiss.
host_about:
My name is Kinga, I come from Poland and I've been living in Berlin since 2010.

I love travelling with my husband and exploring new places, especially from local cuisine's perspective :-) We're keen to try new sports and continue some of them regularly, such as skiing, climbing or surfing. Discovering wild nature out of civilisation charges our batteries to live in the city. :-))

Having tried Airbnb as guests in the US and Spain, we try to be good hosts and guides to many friends visiting Berlin all over the year!

name: loft atelier studio 200 sqm
description:
200 sqm quiet, light loft space (studio and living) in a central district (Mitte/Kreuzberg) of Berlin. This is my own working and living space and I only rent it out while being abroad for longer. For that reason I usually prefer to rent it out to one party during for the whole period, (so I don´t have to organize transitions in my absence). But of course it is also possible.

The space
The studio is part of an old turn of the century building complex situated on the 4th floor in east- west direction and has an elevator. It  basically consists of one large space which is divided by walls of shelves, cupboards into living and working areas and a bathroom / toilet unit with bath tub and shower. As part of an old factory with ceiling heigt of 3,5 meters it is quite light due to five large windows and 6 Meter windowfront towards the west.
Note: This is a not an apartment made to look like a loft space. This is an old Berlin factory building that now hosts mostly
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is strange even though this is changing now. This used to be a run down industrial area with lots of factory ruins around. you can walk down to the river in 2 minutes. Although very central it was a no mans land, because in this area used to be the border between East and West.  Now it is an example of gentrification versus squat culture. At this point you can still see both. Since I have moved in here residential and commercial buildings have been mushrooming all around my place. At the same time there is still Tipiland, an alternative tent settlement at the river, the Köpi, one of the oldest still existing squats a few meters down the road and a couple blocks south you are in the heart of northern Kreuzberg (SO 36) but there is also a park nearby with a pond where I skate when the ice is frozen (Engelbecken). As the place is situated on the edge between Friedrichshain, Mitte and Kreuzberg no neighbourhood (including prenzlauer berg or neukölln) is really far away. A

name: Quiet and fine in Friedrichshain
description:
Make yourself comfortable in a beautiful modern apartment, return from the outside world, museums, shops and whatever - or your day and night adventures in Friedrichshain around Boxhagener Platz or elsewhere in the city - and simply relax.
Here you will find the quitness and you will relax and gain new power and energy for the next day/night. 

The space
New furnished apartment in recently high standard renovated old building from 1905.
The apartment is on the ground floor, situated to a green and quiet courtyard with a small garden in front of your windows.

The studio provides all you need to stay here:
  - a refrigerator
 - a kitchenette with stove, 
- a sideboard with sink and fridge,
- a microwave,
- a water boiler,
- kitchen towels 
- toaster and 
- plates, glasses, knifes and forks,
-  bottle opener, tin opener

And:
- tea and filter coffee, Nescafè
- condensed milk and ve
neighborhood_overview:
Friedrichshain is a very interesting neighborhood, where you find numerous bars and cafés, a food market on saturdays and the gorgeous flea market on sundays at the Boxhagener Platz!
Friedrichshain is famous for its nightlife, its bars and restaurants. Right around the corner you find the famous Frankfurter Allee - the former Stalinallee - a historic housing project of the East Germany - correctly German Democratic Republic, now also a good place to see a lovely sunset, if you look to Alexanderplatz direction!
The apartment is in house number 6 - in number 2 is a bakery - opposite the house number 6 a very good ice-shop. In Frankfurter Allee 57-59 - round the corner - is one supermarket NETTO where you can bye very cheap all things you like to eat or drink up to 10 p.m. Denn`s organic food supermarket in Boxhagener Street 113 round the corner provides you, too, with delicious things to eat - and now for the first day in the apartment you have all you need.
host_about:
Hello, I'm Apostolos. I like to welcome you in my beautiful apartment in Berlin-Friedrichshain and I wish you a great stay. 
Yes, I know - you will like the place and this area in Berlin.

name: *Modern Berlin - City - Apartment*
description:
5 minutes to Potsdamer Platz or 15 minutes to Alexander Platz? No problem!
Witin walking distance you will find public transport like S-Bahn or underground to reach all sightseeing spots in just a few minutes.

**** Rental by women or couples, non smoking, only. You are renting a private, inhabited accomodation, not a holiday apartment. We speak German, Spanish, English and French.

The space

Kitchen is fully equipped with whatever you need for a nice dinner. Appliances such as a microwave, toaster, water kettle, a coffee machine, rice cooker etc can be found in the kitchen. There is a dining table in your bedroom and a dresser.

Accommodation includes:
- WIFI
- bed sheets and bedding (plus an extra set to change) but I encourage you to buy your own
neighborhood_overview:
Calm and secure neighbourhood. I, as a female have been living here for 12 years and there has never been one incident that made me feel unsave.
There is a huge supermarket (Kaufland) a 7-min-walk away and a discounter supermarket called LIDL a 5-min-walk. There is a veggie and fruit vendor nearby and the BEST COFFEESHOP on the other side of the street. A hospital right opposite where I live in case of emergencies ;D
host_about:
Hi folks of airbnb !
My name is Gee and I am a passionate traveller, a very responsible and respectful guest, who doesn’t party. 
As a host I love to host a few dinners with 1-2 friends but would not overstep the boundaries of your comfort zone. 

I’m one of the few Berliners you scarcely meet on your travels through the city. Besides of three languages such as English, German and Vietnamese I speak a little Spanish and maybe French... 

I am not a cleaning freak but like to keep the common areas such as kitchen as bathroom neat, nice and tidy. No matter if I'm host or guest. 
I have been in my smokefree apartment for almost 15 years now (of which I actually only lived 9,5 full years in since I have lived in Vietnam, the U.S., the UK and Costa Rica meanwhile as well). My home is my sanctuary and I love to keep it as that. And I wish for every guest I am hosting to treat my place as it was their home as well! In good and bad times :)

name: Light, central & quiet flat
description:
Quiet bedroom in a beautifully light and spacious flat in a residential part of the centre of Berlin, Berlin Mitte.

Convenient location for touristic sights, bars and restaurants; only a few minutes walk from the underground station and close to restaurant mile Torstraße.

The space
You will be living in my bedroom - a room which faces the back of the building and is hence quiet and sheltered. You will also have full use of the living room - a very light room facing south with a central table, sofa & comfy chairs, plants and a desk. The flat is furnished fairly minimalistically and the light wooden floor and large windows give it a very warm feel.

The bedroom bed is a super king mattress on the floor - I point this out here because I find this the most comfortable arrangement but it may be unexpected (I use the flat when I am not traveling). The bed in the additional room is a normal double bed. Please note that this room is not usually used
neighborhood_overview:
The neighbourhood is residential and calm, and only a short walk from popular bars, cafes and restaurants.

Opposite the flat is a small park with a playground, a Sunday flea market and an organic food market on Fridays.

There are several grocery shopping options around: A large supermarket (Kaisers) is 2 minutes walk away, an organic food supermarket is minutes away and a small organic food shop is 1 minute walk away.

There are several cafes on the Arkonaplatz square and further cafes, bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walking distance.

Within a 5-minute walk you can reach Zionskirchplatz, Oderberger Straße and Kastanienallee, with many more restaurants, cafes and bars; and in 10-15 minutes you reach Torstraße, with some of the most known restaurants in Berlin and a favourite evening location among many Berliners.

The space

Feel free to use our fully equipped kitchen/dining room with all the spices and toys to enjoy your meals. You´ll find everything you'll need. You'll sleep in a comfortable double bed (140x200cm), and in the living room, there's also a large sofa for another guest.

name: Prenzlauer Berg
description:
New apartment in trendy quarter Prenzlauer Berg has a distinctive Bauhaus architecture style dating back to 1930 with beautiful backyard.12 min by tram to centre of Berlin (Hackescher Markt).

The space
The apartment is 50 square meters and is so organized: living room with sofa bed, bedroom with double bed, separate kitchen, bathroom with tub.
The apartment is very quiet. There is also a playground in the backyard.

Guest access
No smoking

neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg is characterised by old buildings, the majority of which come from the turn of the 20th century (1889 to 1905). Over 80% of all housing in this area was constructed before 1948, with the oldest building still standing being from 1848 at 77 Kastanienallee. In the second World War, relatively few buildings were destroyed in comparison to other areas of the city. The area was neglected in the time of the German Democratic Republic, and the last ruins were cleared away only at the beginning of the 1970s. After the fall of the Berlin Wall and subsequent German Reunification, the dilapidated structures in many areas were rehabilitated, and since the middle of the 1980s empty lots have been closed up.
360°-Panorama of the intersection of Schönhauser Allee with Danziger and Eberswalder Straße. From left to right: junction of Eberswalder Straße, Schönhauser Allee toward the north (with elevated train track), Pappelallee, junction of Danziger Straße, Schönhauser Allee toward

name: Luxus apartment with view to TV tower in centrum
description:
Two-2-room-apartment, 46 square meters, completely furnished, heated floor in all rooms, second floor location with elevator and W-LAN internet. Living room with sleeper couch, kitchen, bedroom with 2 beds, bathroom with shower, bathtub, washmachine.
By arriving you have to pay 3€ per person for energy per day(1 person 4€) and the city tax for all accomodations in Berlin is:5% of the cost.
Parking is in the garage in basement of this house available; 12 € please.
You can rent bicycles;7,50€ /d

The space
Top location in the center of Berlin with green courtyard inclusive fountain. 24 hour security with concierge. Exclusive interior complimented by a light and cheerful architecture make this object special.

Sunny 2-room apartment with Loggia and floor to ceiling windows, 46 square meters, completely furnished, heated floor in all rooms, second floor location with elevator and W-LAN internet. Lovely living room with sleeper couch, kit
neighborhood_overview: It is so nice because it is quiet and you have a beautiful courtyard inclusive fountain.  24 hour security with concierge. Parking is possible in the Garage. It is a top Location because you are in few minutes in Center of metropolitan with all the markets, Sightseeings, churches, TV Tower etc
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf Gäste aus der ganzen Welt und spreche außerDeutsch etwas Englisch, Russisch und ein wenig Polnisch. Demnächst wird auch noch Französisch dazukommen. Diese schöne Sprache lerne ich gerade. Ich spiele Klavier und habe auch 2 Geigen, die auf Spieler warten.
Als Lehrerin für Deutsch kann ich euch helfen, diese Sprache zu verbessern.  
Meine Fächer sind außerdem Chemie und Biologie. 
Ich helfe Abiturienten oder auch jüngeren Schülern mit Nachhilfeunterricht in Deutsch und Nawi.
In unserem großen Garten können wir Tisch-Tennis spielen oder am offenen Kamin träumen.
Das hängt natürlich ab von der Jahreszeit ab. Allerdings haben wir es schon geschafft, eine Sibirische Gartenparty zu feiern.
Mein Leitspruch ist: Tun und Ruh'n in rechtem Grade.
Und denkt daran: Der frühe Vogel fängt den Wurm!

name: Amazing Balcony Flat overlooking Teutoburger Platz
description:
Stylish apartment in old historic building (1872), balcony overlooking Teutoburger Platz, renovated in 2014: over 90sqm luxury, unique balcony, designer-kitchen, sunny living-room, modern bath with bath-tub, elevator, wonderful views, heart of Prenzlauer Berg (metro: 2min, Alex: 10min), top neighborhood with galleries, bars and cafes, officially licensed for AirBnB.

The space
I recently moved back to Berlin and finished my beautiful place in the heart of Berlin. Since I am travelling a lot myself I sometimes rent out the place to reliable guests who value this unique home. This apartment is something very special. Perfectly located on top of Prenzlauer Berg, overlooking one of the most beautiful squares in Berlin (Teutoburger Platz), with stunning views from an exclusive balcony, the ateliers of famous artists Olafur Eliason and Ai Wei Wei in the backyard, this place is simply wonderful. The apartment is fully furnished and it hosts a maximum of two people (one E
neighborhood_overview: I don't want to live anywhere else. The neighborhood is a wonderful mix of residential everyday life and latest Berlin style, attracting artists, tourists and international ex-pats to make this area so special. Just ten minutes from Berlin main station, next to metro-station Senefelder Platz (2 min) and in walking distance to Alexanderplatz or Hacke'scher Markt you can easily discover the touristic Berlin or just stay in the hip neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg, spending all day in Cafes near Kollwitzplatz, shop the small fashion labels at Kastanienallee or discover the new club scene at Torstrasse or Kulturbrauerei.
host_about: I feel home anywhere in the world. I work for an international organization and travel to many exciting places all over the world every year. I love traveling and so often it simply felt like coming home thanks to incredible hosts I met in so many different countries. There is nothing better than feeling comfortable while traveling which why I will try everything making you feel home when you come to my beautiful apartment in the heart of Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg.

name: Stilvolles Apartment in bester Lage
description:
The space
Hallo liebe Gäste,

meine Wohnung liegt in einer der schönsten und aufregendsten Gegenden in Berlin Mitte!

Von hier aus kann man zahlreiche Sehenswürdigkeiten - wie den Alexanderplatz, Hackeschen Markt und den Berliner Dom - innerhalb weniger Minuten mit der U Bahn erreichen.

In direkter Nähe liegt der Mauerpark ( 3min Fußweg), der jeden Sonntag zum beliebtesten und bekanntesten Flohmarkt der Stadt einlädt.(Ein absolutes Highlight!)
Außerdem liegt die Wohnung direkt am Mauerweg - der Bernauer Straße - wo sie noch heute die damalige Geschichte sowie ein Stück der erhaltenen Mauer kostenfrei und originalgetreu! besichtigen können.

Desweiteren findet man viele tolle Cafes, Restaurants und kleine Geschäfte. Bekannte Straßen wie die Oderberger Straße oder die Kastanienallee sind fußläufig in wenigen Minuten zu erreichen.

Meine frisch renovierte Wohnung liegt im 4. Stock ( leider ohne Aufzug) jedoch dafür wunde
host_about: Meine große Leidenschaft sind Design und die Gastronomie. Mir ist es wichtig, dass sich meine Gäste bei mir so wohl fühlen, dass Sie nach einem anstrengenden Tag gut erholen können. Ich freue mich über viele nette Gäste :-)

name: THE BEST FLAT OF NEUKOLLN, BERLIN!!
description:
The flat is located in WESERSTRASSE, one of the most trendy and lively streets of Neukölln. You will be living in the quiet backyard of the building, and the street is filled with restaurants, cafés, bars, clubs, galleries and shops.

The space
L'appartement est situé dans l'arrière cour très calme d'un immeuble situé dans l'une des rues les plus vivantes et trendy de Neukölln. Vous trouverez à qq mètres seulement restaurants, bars, clubs, galleries et boutiques (vintage, design, disquaire)

Cet appartement est un très beau travail d' architecture d' intérieur et de design.
Nous avons voulu créer ici un endroit spécial influencé par le design nordique et le minimalisme allemand, afin de proposer à nos guests une expérience unique et le meilleur séjour possible dans notre quartier préféré: Neukölln.
Cet appartement, combinaison parfaite d' un confort luxueux, du design et d' architecture, est parfait pour les voyageurs exigeants.

L' a
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located in one of the most famous and lively streets of Neukölln. You will be living in the quiet backyard of the building, this block is surrounded by restaurants, cafés, bars, galleries and shops (designer shops, vintage, recordshop etc...).
To be clear, this area of Berlin is called the "Brooklyn of Berlin". Now, you get the picture!
Neukölln is one of the most appreciated part of the german capital, the epicenter of hip. Embeded between cosmopolitain flair and alternative art district…

name: Quiet & central apartment in BERLIN MOABIT
description:
Our apartment (72qm) is located in quiet neighborhood, but close to a vivid food district.
It´s very central as you get to Berlin Main Station (Hauptbahnhof) in 12min and to Tegel Airport in 8min from our nearest station (S-Beusselstr S41/S42,10min by walking). U7 & TXL bus are also in walking distance & help to get around very easily. Living in Moabit means beeing close to the east (Mitte) and the west (Charlottenburg) of Berlin & having a lot of Green parks, nice bars and restaurants nearby.

name: Industrial Design Apartment in heart of MItte
description:
Location location location. This Delux Apartment has a perfect location, lying in a part of Mitte that is just close enough to the hotel area but also in a cool street with lots of new cafes and restaurants that makes you feel like a real Berliner. I'm very close to the U6 station, two stations away from Friedrichstrasse, so transportation is easy. The apartment was renovated in 2013 by an architect and furniture were bought in high end shops.

The space
This apartment is a spacious studio apartment in the heart of Mitte, designed by an architect with brand new kitchen, floor, walls and furniture.
The bed is queen size and there's a TV (which can work through the WiFi as well), a sofa that opens up to a single bed, and all the kitchen utilities.
The apartment is on the 2nd floor and there's an elevator. It is very quiet.
The Location is perfect, in the heart of Mitte, close to Hauptbahnhof, U6 station Naturkunde Museum and Nordbahnhof. The Oranie
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is very trendy, and there's an influx of new restaurants, bars, and other points of interest. This is Mitte, so things are quite central - worth noting is how close Hauptbahnhof is (Berlin's main train station), also the Hamburger Bahnhof, one of the most important modern art museums in the world, is a 10 min walk. Another museum that's a five min walk is Berlin's Natural History Museum.

For eating my favourite places around are Bonfini (an italian restaurant nearby), also Chicago WIlliams BBQ serves an amazing meat menu and is quite near. Nightlife wise I recommend Reingold, which is not far away in novalis strasse, and has a 20's theme - all the waiters and bartenders are dressed like 20s bartenders and the place is lots of fun.
host_about: Hi guys, this is Amit, I hope you have a great time in my flat:)

name: Ferienappartement im Bergmannkiez
description:
Die Ferienwohnung befindet sich zentral in Berlin im angesagten Bergmannkiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg (X-berg), in einer Nebenstraße zur berühmten Bergmannstraße. Hier ist man ruhig untergebracht, aber mit ein paar Schritten mittendrin im Leben von Berlin und kann die Kultur, die Sehenswürdigkeiten, Restaurants, Bars und - wenn man möchte - auch das Nachtleben genießen. Auch der Victoria-Park, das riesige Tempelhofer-Feld oder Berlin-Mitte sind in der Nähe.

The space
Das Haus ist ein sanierter Altbau und die Ferienwohnung liegt ruhig im Innenhof im Souterrain des Gartenhauses. Das Appartement ist sehr hochwertig und komfortabel eingerichtet. Es sind zwei komfortable Doppelbetten (je 1,80 m x 2,00 m) vorhanden sowie eine voll ausgestattete Einbauküche mit allen Geräten (Herd, Ofen, Geschirrspüler, Kaffeemaschine etc.) und Zubehör. Das Bad ist mit WC und zwei Duschen ausgestattet. Ebenso vorhanden ist eine Waschmaschine und Trockner. Bettwäsche und Handtücher sind inklu
neighborhood_overview: Eine der besten Lagen Berlins: Das Ferienappartement im befindet sich mitten im Bergmannkiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg (X-Berg) in einer Nebenstraße zur Bergmannstraße.
