name: Quiet Loft in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Quiet Loft in the heart of Kreuzberg

The space
Bei uns wohnt ihr in einem wunderschönen 120 qm Loft im ruhigen Hinterhof eines sanierten alten Industriegebäudes.
Die Wohnanlage verbindet die Reichenbergerstraße mit dem Paul-Lincke Ufer.
Die Höfe sind kunstvoll gestaltet und es gibt einen Concierge.
Da sich die Wohnanlage über 6 Hinterhöfe erstreckt, bietet diese inmitten des vitalen Kreuzbergs eine sichere Oase der Ruhe.
Tritt man aus der Wohnanlage heraus ist man direkt am Kanal des wunderschönen Paul-Lincke-Ufers, wo man Boule spielen, flanieren, essen, einkaufen oder auch einfach nur einen Kaffee in der Sonne trinken kann.

Der U-Bahnhof Görlitzer Bahnhof, Schönleinstrasse oder Kottbusser Tor sind in ca 10-15 min fußläufig zu erreichen . Direkt vor der Tür fährt der Bus M29, der einen beispielsweise direkt zum Kurfürstendamm (Ku'damm) oder dem Potsdamer Platz oder dem Checkpoint Charly fährt.

Es gibt am Kanal und im K
host_about:
Hey we are Steve and Vivienne,

from Berlin and Luxemburg. 
Vivienne studied in Berlin at the University of Art Fashion Design and Fine Arts and graduated a few years ago.
Vivienne was living a while in Copenhagen and now she is back in Berlin her home City, where she grew up. Now she is working as an artteacher.

Steve is a social worker born in Luxemburg, stranded in Berlin 7 years ago.
He is currently working as social worker in a primary school in Kreuzberg.

name: Ferienremise-Berlin
description:
Four separate, stylish apartments, large common area for cooking, dining and conference, 4 bedrooms + 2 interconnecting rooms. 4 double bed, 2 sofa bed, 4 mattresses; max. 16 people. For families, groups, business trips, workshops, dinner parties

The space
In a lively inner city district around an intimate inner courtyard are located:
-4 independent, stylish apartments (exact distribution s. ​​Below)
-separate common room on the ground floor (43 m2) with well-equipped common kitchen, foosball, fireplace, dining table
-green patio with sitting area (joint use)
-Bistro In basement (Thurs to Mon 5 pm to 11 pm and on request),

Bed linen / towels can be booked separately (10.00 EUR per person) and is not included in the price.

equipment and layout of the apartments and beds:
-2 large apartments (3-5 sleeps, 46 m2)
-2 small apartments (2-3 sleeps, 32 m2), a total of 10 regular bed; including extra bed max. 16 people.<
neighborhood_overview:
There are numerous cafes, restaurants, bars, boutiques, wine shops, specialties, markets, cinemas, spa services, late shopping and much more in the surrounding area and just outside the door
Special highlights are the former central airport Tempelhof, the Liquidrom in Möckernstr 10, Akazienstr, Golzstr
and the weekly markets:
Winterfeldplatz Wed + Sat 8 am to 4:00 pm.
Rathaus Schöneberg Tue + Fri 8 am to 1 pm
Crellestraße Wed + Sat 10 am to 3 pm
host_about:
Mit viel Liebe fürs Detail und viel Sachverstand für historische Objekte haben die namhaften Berliner Architekten Peter Hapke und Andreas Zerr die besondere Herausforderung angenommen, die Ferienremise zu einem ganz besonderen Ort zu machen. 

Das Ergebnis ist eine Urlaubs- und Eventlocation, die die ganz besondere Charakteristik eines Altbaus mit modernen Designelementen verbindet und dadurch einen außergewöhnlichen Charme kreiert, der den Besucher in seinen Bann zieht.

Das Architektenduo war nach den Jahren der deutschen  Teilung an vielen Projekten beim Entstehen des neuen Berlin beteiligt.

Gestaltung und verantwortliche Planung und Leitung wichtiger Bauwerke:
- Sanierung Schillertheater für Daniel Barenboim und die Deutsche Staatsoper
- Aussichtsturm Dokumentation Berliner Mauer in der Bernauer Straße
- Errichtung des Denkmals Bücherverbrennung nach den künstlerischen Ideen des   Bildhauers Micha Ullmann
- Sanierung und Umbauten an der Komischen Oper Berlin
- Sanierung und Umbauten am Kinder und Jugendtheater an der Parkaue
- Verantwortliche Leitung bei der Errichtung vieler Kunstwerke in Berlin
- Wettbewerbserfolge: Kunst am Bau Olympiastadion, Volksoper in Wien und   Dokumentationszentrum in Ramstein

name: Large, light, stylish apartment
description:
The Toast House is a lovingly created, bright, period apartment, on Prenzlauer Promenade. You get the whole thing, no companions.
The apartment is in a quiet location with fantastic transport links right outside the door. You can get to the heart of Prenzlauer Berg in 6 minutes and to Alexander Platz (the centre of Berlin) in 12 minutes – door-to-door. Or you could just walk around the corner and go to the Brotfabrik (The Bread Factory), an arts centre with its own cinema, theatre, bar, restaurant and gallery or pop in to the lovely Italian deli, Nemo.

As for the apartment itself, it is stylish, spacious and homely. If you're thinking of cooking on some days there is a brand-new fully functioning kitchen installed and a large family dinning table. The Kingsize bedand double glazing certainly make for a good night sleep too!

The space
Suitable for one person, a couple, or a family with 2 children.

Not suitable for friends staying togeth
host_about: Friendly, diligent, responsive. You know... the kinds of things you want out of a host :)

name: 100sq mtrs Renovated Wrangel kiez Altbau
description:
Right in the heart of the Wrangelkiez, our renovated altbau flat is perfect for young professionals or young families. Closer to the park - rather than near the restaurants - means we're on the quieter end of the Falcke, but still close to everything the kiez has to offer.

Things like:

- Resturants, cafe's, bars
- Görlitzer Park
- Kitas and Schools
- Supermarkets, Bio-shops, and Weekly Farmer's markets and stands
- 300mtrs to U-bahn (U1, Schliesches str)
- Close to Ostbahnhof

The space
Live in a fully furnished, newly renovated alt-bau flat in Kreuzberg 36, end of October '16 til March '17.

We're heading overseas during that time, so we're renting out our fully-furnished and renovated 112 sqmtr alt-bau flat, with Balcony, on 1st floor in Wrangel-kiez, Kreuzberg, Berlin.

We'd like to rent out the flat for the entire time we are gone, but we're open for shorter requests of 2, 3, or 4 months.
host_about:
Australian designer for AJ&Smart, living in (mostly) sunny Berlin for the last 8 years with my young family of 4... aside from designing things, I sing and write music.

Schöne Grüße

name: Beautiful Apartment in Berlin
description:
Our beautiful holiday apartment is in the private residence. The house has good parking availability and is conveniently located in the very green and very safe residential neighborhood of Steglitz, in South-Westen Berlin.

The space
Our beautiful bright holiday apartment is located in the very safe green residential area / neighborhood of Steglitz. There is plenty of convenient parking within walking distance of "Freibad Insulaner" (a public swimming pool). The pool is open from June to August and has a lovely landscaped area with shade trees, lawns and enough space to enjoy the pool for a very pleasant Summer experience. We also have a planetarium close by with a program that also includes music, literature and theater events.
Our apartment is 50 m2 with one double bed in private residence.
Our kitchen is equipped with an electric stove, refrigerator and a dinning corner. The bathroom is tiled and has a shower.


We look forward to
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin is the greenest city in Europa.
We often see various birds like grosbeaks, redstarts, nuthatchs, woodpeckers, jays etc. in our garden. You can see squirrels hoping from branch to branch almost every day. Sometimes hedgehogs drop by in the evening. In the autumn we are often visited by foxes.
host_about:
Happy to meet you!
We will be happy to provide you and assist you with a place to be in Berlin.
We keep our home clean using mostly eco friendly detergents. We also compost and recycle.

You should feel like at home, but also please treat it with respect.

name: Moabit apartment
description:
The apartment is located in the center of Berlin and puts you in the middle of the cultural life of the city. On the other hand, you will find this a quiet place to relax from a strenuous day.

The space
The one-room-apartment opens onto the courtyard, so it's very quiet! Wooden floorboards throughout and the walls are plastered or exposed brick. This not only creates a particularly friendly and cozy atmosphere - the living space is also absolutely perfect for allergy-sufferers. A large, very comfortable double bed promises peace and relaxation after long sightseeing trips. Integrated in the living room are a small kitchenette and a sitting area. Above the bathroom there is another spacious sleeping area, which can be reached via a ladder. Three people can sleep comfortably.

Guest access
The apartment has free Wi-Fi.
You will also find various brochures and literature about Berlin.
The apartment has smoke detectors and a fire e
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the middle of Berlin in the lively and still very authentic Moabit district: Quitzowstrasse directly borders Westhafen, but is also near Birkenstrasse, where there are plenty of nice cafés and restaurants. There are shops and a bike rental just around the corner, the river Spree and the zoo can be reached on foot. Moabit itself has a very nice old market hall and many small shops, galleries and small parks.

name: Charming appartment Charlottenburg
description:

Beautiful and modern apartment just next to the Castle Charlottenburg in the back house, 4th story (no lift), wooden floor, 1 bedroom and 1 very big and comfortable sleeping couch (no problem at all to sleep 2 grown-ups), bath with shower and bath tub, very well equipped kitchen for full usage, very quiet and light, yet central. Perfect public transport access: Airport Tegel: 10 Min. by bus, S-U Bahn (Metro) across the street (50m). Bus stop: 50 m. Motorway: 500 m. Kids very welcome! We supply: Babybed, High chair for eating, lots of toys in excellent condition + a set of kids cutlery incl. bibs for eating and more gimmicks for our little guests. Restaurants and pubs in walking distance, chalet Charlottenburg across the river and the fair (Messe Berlin) very close (best by underground). Museums just across the park. Olympiastadion and Messegelände (fairs) just a few stops by subway. Color tv set, CD & DVD player including a vast choice of music and films for your
neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg is one of the most popular suburbs of Berlin: Very central and yet very quiet, safe and green.
host_about: German citizen, having lived in Burgundy/ France for 11 years and taken on the second nationality (French). Travelling ever since I left school and enjoying new experiences around the world. Flexible, open-minded person living with both feet on the ground and with my mind in outer space.... My family consists of my wife and 3 children, who are very well behaved and lovely personailties. We like exploring the world together whenever we can.

name: Stylish Kreuzberg sanctuary 100sqm
description:
A beautifully restored, two-level apartment in on of the best corners of Berlin. The space is fully furnished with all you need and includes a nice dose of mid-century Danish furniture which gives it a beautiful sense of style. A massive, sun-drenched kitchen is a dream for those who love to cook and the oversized tub is a perfect way to warm up during the cold winter nights. neighborhood_overview: Treptow Park across the river is ideal for biking, jogging, walking, fly-fishing and of course boating on the river & nearby lakes. The famous Zenner Biergarten is easily accessible. Treptow Stralau ist green and more or less like a park. It is surrounded by water and a lovely place to live. Also shopping is not far: The mall "Park Center" has a comprehensive selection of shops, banking and a post office, along with many eating opportunities. Take-away food is plentiful in and around the Treptow Park S-train station and the shopping center. Although ours is a peaceful residential location you don't have to go far to experience everything Berlin has to offer.

description:
Wohnung (55qm) im Dreieck Treptow-Neukölln-Kreuzberg. Ruhig, aber nah bei der Schlesischen Str. und Pannierstr. Direkter Bus von SXF!

Apartment in Neukölln, calm but close to various cool corners with clubs, bars. etc. Direct bus to SXF airport!

The space
Das Haus steht direkt an der ehemaligen Mauer und hat eine besondere Geschichte: Hier im Keller wurde einer der "erfolgreichsten" Fluchttunnel aus Ost-Berlin gegraben.

The apartment is located literally at the former wall, and the house has a touching history: From here in the cellar, one of the most "successful" escape tunnels from east to west Berlin had been digged.


Die Wohnung hat ein Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett, ein großes Wohnzimmer mit Esstisch, Schlafcouch und weiterem Sessel zum Ausziehen, es können also 5 Leute unterkommen.

The apartment has a sleeping room with double bed, a big living room with dinner table, sleeping couch and one extendable chair, so
neighborhood_overview:
Im Dreieck Neukölln - Treptow - Kreuzberg gelegen, kommt man von der Wohnung in wenigen Minuten z.B. in die Schlesische Straße (Bars, Clubs, Restaurants), die Pannierstr, zum Kanal, Görlitzer Park und Treptower Park. Ein paar hundert Meter entfernt ist das Einkaufszentrum in der Elsenstr. mit allem, was man so braucht.


You are staying within the triangle Neukölln - Treptow - Kreuzberg, so you quickly get to Schlesische Straße (bars, clubs, restaurants), to Pannierstr, to the canal, to Görlitzer Park and Treptower Park. Some hundred meters away, there is a shopping mall providing you with everything you possibly need.

name: Centre Quiet 2 Room Flat WiFi, Anmeldung
description:
A very quiet apartment in the historical centre of Berlin, ca. 8 min. walk to the Main Railway Station (Hauptbahnhof). Several main museums in a walking distance. One bedroom, 50m²,old building.Huge garden. Excellent transportation! No stairsclimbing

The space
beginning from 01.05.2016 it is not possible to rent the apartments legally for less than 60 days. We are not going to violate any laws, that is why from the 1 May 2016 only the long term bookings with at least 7 months of stay are accepted. We also looking forward to rent the apartment for 1 year or longer.

2 room apartment (50 m²): a cosy bedroom with a double bed and a spacious living room with a big couch. The apartment is ideal for a single person or a couple.
Modern kitchen is equiped with oak tree tables, a large fridge (with a freezer), a dishwasher, washing machine. Bathroom with a day light.

Guest access
Our guests can enjoy a free unlimited WLAN (DSL 50 00
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in historical part of the very centre of the old city. The 3 stories buildings around the area were originally designed for the army veterans of the French-Prussian war, mostly for those, who couldn't afford to pay the rent to stay in the city. Later the area was populated with the doctors, nurses and students of the Charité, the medical faculty of the Humboldt University of Berlin.

Most of the most important museums (Museum Island, Brandenburger Gate, Hamburger Bahnhof, Reichstag) are located within 5 to 30 min. walking.

In 70 meters distance from the house it used to be the boarder between East and West Berlin.

In case of medical emergency - 24h/7d ER of the University Clinic Charité is in 5 minute walk.
host_about:

According to the new rules of the government of Berlin, being inforced from the 1th May 2016, we cannot rent the flat for the period of time less than 120 days. In the past we were accepting stays of at least 7 days, so we collected a lot of references, that you are more than welcome to read.
Our intention in the moment are the longer term contracts.

name: Single room, confortable / Kreuzberg
description:
Simple and confortable room of 10m2 in an classic Berlin apartment of 60m2. Excellent location in Kreuzberg. The neighborhood is very friendly, multicultural and very well connected to rest of the city.

The space
THE ROOM
The guestroom includes:
-Confortable single bed
-Desk and chair with W-Lan internet
-Private wardrobe for storage
-Towels, bed linens, etc.

THE APARTMENT
It’s on the 1st floor of a classic Berlin wooden floor building. Apart from the room offered to rent, the apartment has another room, a bathroom with shower, and a spacious living room with open kitchen which functions as common space.

THE NEIGHBORHOOD
Kreuzberg is well known for his cultural diversity and has many options and landscapes. Just around the corner you can find:
-organic/biological food market (Tuesday and Saturday) and supermarkets
-charming and diverse bars and restaurants
-art galleries and unique fashion
host_about: I had the chance to travel around the world and decided to live in Berlin in 2006, in this multicultural neighbourhood of Kreuzberg, a special corner of the world for many reasons. I'm a language teacher (spanish, french) but besides i play music and enjoy very much simple things like travelling, cooking, sports... I also like to meet different people who like to travel, that's one of the reasons sometimes i rent a room. I hope you can feel at home while you enjoy Berlin!

name: Hidden Gem in Charlottenburg
description:
Welcome! I have a bright, spacious guestroom for rent in my charming flat, in a central, green, and quiet Berlin Kiez, full of flair and history. We share the fully equipped kitchen and the bathroom. Non-smokers only, women preferred. The room is perfect for experienced travelers, researchers, or conference attendees.

The space
Welcome to my 2 BR condo, located in a Berlin home of 1913 in the heart of Charlottenburg near Ku'damm!
My spacious room for rent, 24sm is not just a room... Until 2013, it was room 129 of Hotel Bogotá, and I saved its entire interior, in the style of the 60s, as it perfectly fitted my - or your - guest room! So you'll be "sleeping in holy halls" (Newton)... The room has a queen size bed, with a glass-topped desk, leather swing chairs all from the era, a 1920s wardrobe, beech hardwood floors, a large window, and beautiful artwork on the walls. The room looks over a quiet green courtyard with an old and magnificent chestnut tree tellin
neighborhood_overview:
What I love about my neighborhood? Everything!!!
With the hype of some Eastern neighborhoods fading people flock back to where life has always been cosmopolitan and urban at its best - in the City West. Charlottenburg is one of the neighborhoods least affected by the fall of the Berlin wall, simply keeping its charm and elegance. Dubbed the New West when it was built in the early 20th century, ever since it has been a culturally rich, tranquil, green yet central area. In the Golden 20s, this was Berlin's trendiest neighborhood and attracted actors, artists, writers alike. Today you're surrounded by tons of restaurants, movie theaters, galleries, bars, parks, boutiques, farmers' markets, shopping malls from high-end to convenience store and two of the cities best jazz clubs are nearby. Streets are tree-lined and keep the beautiful modernist gas lamps for which Berlin is also famous...
host_about: Hello, I love hosting friends and guests and meeting new people from everywhere! Some envy me as I used to have a travel job - with lots of international research and search for smart, innovative, digital solutions in health care policy.  I lived and worked in many places outside Germany, with many favorite locations. I'm  nostalgic about San Francisco and the Bay Area - wonderful people, great weather, the best restaurants ever, but Berlin's only a two hour flight away from Italy. Or Spain. Or London...

Spacious apartment in a typical old Berlin building from the beginning of the 20th century. Schöneberg is located in the old West Berlin, it is a very charming quiet but still lively neighborhood.

The flat is located very close to the famous Akazienstrasse / Goltzstrasse and Winterfeldplatz with several bars, restaurants and local shops. Also, grocery shopping with Turkish, Asian supermarkets and Bio Company, Aldi, Edeka, Kaisers is only 5 min away. Further, you can reach the beautiful "Kiez" around Winterfeldplatz in a 15 min walk with several bars and restaurants.

On Saturdays and Sundays you can visit the lovely flea market at Rathaus Schöneberg and have a walk at the Wilmersdorfer Volkspark.

The closest public transport are:

U7 Eisenacher Strasse (5-7 min walk)
S1 Julius-Leber-Brücke (10min walk)
Bus "Albertstrasse" (2 min walk)

It is about 1 hour to Flughafen Schönfeld and 30 Minutes to Flughafen Tegel. To get to the main train station Hauptbahnhof, there is a direct bus that takes around 20 min.

To get to the city center, i.e. Friedrichstrasse and Potsdamer Platz / Brandenburger Tor is only 11 min by the S

name: Lovely apartment with view on the Berlin Tower
description:
A lovely two-room-flat very central located, surrounded by a lot of green and parks, very close to the main attractions and party area but also very well connected to the airport and the main station. The public transportation is only five minutes walking distance. It will take you to Alexander Platz in about 10 minutes. If you walk down the Bötzowstraße you will feel immediately the typical Prenzlauer Berg air with its Cafes, organic markets, design shops and ethnic restaurants.

The space
THE BEDROOM: the bedroom is fully furnished with a double bed, an armchair, some shelfs and a table with some chairs.

THE LIVING ROOM: The living room has a double bunk-bed, a sofa bed and a very lovely balcony with a nice view on the Berlin tower.

THE KITCHEN: you will find everything you need for cooking! The kitchen is fully equipped and ready for you to use! Cool stuff like a coffee machine, a sandwich maker, a mixer, a microwave and many more!!
neighborhood_overview: The flat is situated in a quite street with a lot of green! In the area there are three parks for any kind of activities like running, beach volleyball, barbecue and so on. There are also a lot of different super markets (also bio markets), and on sunday there is a weekly markt offering food and crops of the region.  In the area you will also find a lot of bars, pubs, restaurants (italian, turkish, thai, german...), Spätkaufe (shop 24h open) and so on! There are also a beautiful small lake jus 15 minutes away where you can also take a bath!
host_about:
hallo!
I am Virginia, born in the Italian Alps, grew up in Berlin and lived in Taiwan for a while. I am an engineer, a design thinker, music lover and traveler. 
You can write and speak with me in English, German and Italian.  I know this city very well and I would love to share with you some of its hidden gems.

name: Cosy Sleep inn ~ Great area ✨
description:
My place is perfect for short stays and allows full privacy:

- Large, calm and comfortable room in a typical Berliner "Altbau" (ancient construction)
- Pretty neighborhood of Schöneberg, peaceful but very animated: restaurants, cafés, bars, supermarkets in walking distance
- Many bus and metro stations: 4 subway stops away from Potsdamerplatz and Brandenburg Gate
- Clean and clear bathroom, fresh sheets, towels and soaps
- Lots of informations in the room about Berlin and the neighborhood

The space
A home away from home...

My "Altbau" apartment (of ancient construction) is cosy and welcoming.
The building was built in 1903 and is very typical of Berlin; high ceilings with nice plaster moldings, warm wood floors and typical double windows.
It stands on the first floor (ground floor for the British;) which is very practical if you have luggage to carry.
The apartment was a shop before. Still has his typi
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is amazing! I fell in love with it first time I saw it.
First, it is not too far from the Center: in my good days it takes me 15 minutes by bike to go to Potsdamer Platz. It is only 4 S-Bahn Stations away!
The street is very quiet and crowned by the extraordinary Gasometer (I love this Gasometer more than the Eiffel Tower!;) There's almost no cars passing by and still the neighborhood is unbelievably alive and animated a few minutes away;
There are many green spaces around and trees everywhere, it smells so good in the summer!
Everything is 2 steps away: subway and bus stops, shops, restaurants, bars and cafes, many Art galleries, outdoors markets...
For me (I experience it every day) Schöneberg is one of the best neighborhood of Berlin. Beautiful, charming, full of life and tolerant people... Here lived Marlene Dietrich and David Bowie and was born Albert Einstein ;) Here, John Fitzgerald Kennedy once said: "I am a Berliner!".
host_about:
I'm french and come from the suburb of Paris. After a few visits in Berlin something in me fell for this town... I decided to move here. I like to leave aboard, I spent a few years in America when I was younger, most of the time in New-Orleans. 
Other things I like... staying up late when everybody's sleeping, sing and play guitar, read with my cat while drinking tee... 
Wine with friends, good food and spiritual conversations....

I take pleasure preparing the room for a new traveller, make him comfortable and welcome. It's always a surprise to discover a new personality especially that you people come from all over the world!
As an Hostess I'm never the same, I guess cause I adapt myself to you: If you want privacy that's fine with me, if you need some help or a little chat I'm here for you too!

Liebe Grüße und bis bald!

host_about:
Je suis Européenne parlant français, allemand et anglais. Professionnellement je suis journaliste, grand reporter. J'ai vu pas mal de pays et j'aime les villes comme Londres, Zurich, Pétersbourg, Berlin, New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Buenos Aires, Budapest, Prague, Cracovie... J'aime recevoir des gens de tous les pays. J'aime aussi partager mon enthousiasme pour Paris qui est ma ville d'élection.
J'habite le quartier du 19ème arrondissement de Paris depuis bientôt 40 ans et j'ai vu  sa transformation de zone artisanale en quartier "bo-bo", où les petits artisans ont cédé la place aux restaurants, aux boutiques, aux cinémas et bars à concerts, où des arbres, espaces verts et pistes cyclables longent maintenant le Canal devenu aire de loisirs.
Ma devise de vie est "FAIRE ET EN FAISANT SE FAIRE". et la vôtre?

name: Penthouse-Traum im Prenzl. Berg
description:
NEW RENOVATED AND NEW DECORATED

ENGLISH-VERSION below:

Mit einem Fahrstuhl gelangen Sie in die attraktive 75 m2 DG-Wohnung im Herzen des beliebten Prenzlauer Berg, 5 Gehminuten vom Kollwitzplatz entfernt, direkt im Winzkiez.
Eine Toplage!

The space
Die bodentiefen Fenster mit Zugang zur Terrasse geben der Wohnung eine luftige und lichtdurchflutete Wohlfühlatmosphäre. Der italienische Steinfußboden verfügt über eine Fußbodenheizung. Herrlich im Winter!

Bestechend sind die edle Möblierung und die offene Wohnatmosphäre. In dieser Penthousewohnung leben Sie in einem offenen Wohnbereich. name: Charming Apartment in Kollwitzplaz
description:
Our beautifully decorated apartment next to Kollwitzplatz and Kulturbrauerei will offer you the most pleasant stay in the trendiest neighbourhood of Berlin. We will peronally welcome you and will be happy to help you explore Berlin!

The space
This stylish fully-furnished apartment is situated on the 1st floor of a beautiful historical building, near the famous Kollwitzplatz and Kulturbrauerei, just a 3 minute walk from subway station Eberswalder Straße. Its spacious living room which serves as a bedroom as well, has wooden floors, a king sized double bed with two single mattresses -the bed can be separated from the rest of the room with a thick curtain-, a comfortable sofa bed with a double mattress and a modern, industrial style dining area in front of the large window which overlooks the green courtyard. The apartment is very quiet and fully equipped with fast wireless internet access, cable 32’ TV, DVD player, CD player/radio, iron, hairdryer. It has a bathr
neighborhood_overview: Hagenauer strasse is one of the most exemplary streets of the lively Prenzlauer Berg, an area full of trendy coffee shops and restaurants, clubs and bars. It is just a few steps away from the beautiful Kollwitzplatz - where a big market takes place every Saturday and a biological market every Thursday - as well as from the well known Kulturbrauerei - with a big supermarket open Monday to Saturday from 08.00 to 24.00, a big cinema, a tourist information point and all day and night long events. Also, a big flea market - very attractive for tourists - takes place every Sunday close to the Mauerpark at Eberswalder Strasse, which is only a 10 minutes' walk away.
host_about: Hello, we are Aris & Ari and we love travelling!

name: Charming, sunny, 3 room Apartment in Kreuzb/Nkölln
description:
Centrally and perfekt located between Neukölln, Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg, this beautifull altbau flat includes a full kitchen and a big balcony for you to enjoy alday Long in the sun.

The space
Bright apartment with sunny Balkony in the heart of legendary Kreuzberg/Neukölln neighbourhood. Classic Berlin style building with high ceilings and hardwood floors.
There are 3 rooms and a kitchen with a table insight for dinner, so almost 4 rooms.
One bedroom and 2 Living- rooms,u can separat this rooms thou u have one extra bedroom or u open the doors and then u have a really lovely and huge tipical berlin-altbau living space. Sun is al day there.
Landwehr Canal as well as subway and buses are just around the corner.

Guest access
Wifi
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is beautifull. It has Pubs, Cafes, normal and wholegrain bakeries, grocery stores, many restaurants, a health food store, and a shopping mall all within  a few minutes walk. . A 5 min walk down the canal and you are in the hip Kreuzkölln area wich  is legendary, The colorful streets of Kreuzberg are filled with amazing bars, international & organic/biological food markets, charming restaurants, art galleries, unique fashion botiques, parks and squares. Just a few minutes' walk in any direction can bring you to something worth seeing or experiencing: picnic in the beautufull green Treptower Park sitting at the Spree or a cold beer in vibrant Görlitzer Park, take a bike ride along the tree-lined Landwehr Canal, shop at the Maybachufer Farmer's Market, or get a little lost on the streets of NeuKoelln and discover your own hidden corners.   Couple of train stations away is the famous club Berghain and many others.
host_about: Ich komme ursprünglich aus Paderborn und wohne seit 8 Jahren in Berlin. Zurzeit befinde ich mich  in der Ausbildung zur Psychotherapeutin. In meiner Freizeit bin ich gerne mit Freunden zusammen, mache Musik, gehe liebend gerne Bouldern und wenn das Wetter es zulässt bin ich draußen .

name: Gesamtes Hinterhaus
description:
Ihr wohnt hier in einem gemütlichen Anbau am Stadtrand von Berlin in Spandau.
Hier habt ihr die Möglichkeit Hinterhaus zu mieten, welches modern ausgestattet ist.

The space
Das gemütliche kleine Häuschen, welches sich im hinteren Teil des Gartens befindet, hat einen gemütlichen Kamin und eine bequeme Sitzecke. Außerdem gibt es eine Küche sowie ein eigenes Bad mit Dusche und WC. Der Wohn- und Küchenbereich sind unten, der offene Schlafbereich befindet sich direkt darüber und ist über eine Leiter zu erreichen. Fernseher stehen unten in der Sitzecke, als auch oben am Bett zur Verfügung. Ein Kamin sorgt für gemütliche Stunden zur kalten Jahreszeit.

Eine eigene Waschmaschine ist vorhanden. Außerdem gibt es für die heißen Monate eine Klimaanlage.

Rauchen ist nur draußen vor der Tür erlaubt. Dort befindet sich aber ein elektrischer Heizpilz.

Ein Parkplatz kann nach Absprache direkt in der Einfahrt zur Verfügung gestellt werden.
neighborhood_overview: Eher eine ruhige Ecke von Berlin. Man ist schnell im Wald oder am See.

name: SUNNY hideaway BALCONY lovely area
description:
Welcome to this gorgeous newly renovated one bedroom apartment in the tree tops!

Located on the vibrant and leafy border of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg it's the perfect location for a Berlin getaway. Travel slowly and live like a local!

The space
The apartment is located in a quiet side street just one minute walk from the vibrant Kastanien Allee and its many independent bars, cafes, restaurants and shops.

The furniture is a colourful mixture of contemporary, retro style and recycled design. The open plan kitchen is brand new and includes a dishwasher, 4 burner hob and oven/microwave as well as lots of appliances.

We have a wireless Sonos sound system - just download their app onto your phone or tablet and play your music - or any internet radio - wirelessly.

Sip a glass of wine on the balcony. Enjoy your meals at the colourful table made from old Berlin floorboards (made by us!). Drink a morning tea in the sun on the
neighborhood_overview:
• 1 min walk to Kastanien Allee and its many independent shops, restaurants and cafes/bars
• 10 min to the grand and leafy Kollwitzplatz and its charming Saturday farmers market
• 9 minutes to Rosenthaler Platz and its vibrant restaurants and bars
• 20 minute stroll down to the Hackescher Markt shopping area with brand stores and the river.
• 3 minutes to Weinbergs Park - enjoy the afternoon stretched out in the sun on the grass or try the terrace at the Swiss restaurant Nola's.
• 6 min walk to a 2 story organic supermarket.
• 30 seconds walk to our posh "späti" - (corner store) for handy last minute needs.
• 4 min walk to Lidl
• 5 min walk to the best Foccaceria ever
• 3 min walk to the magnificent and historical Zionskirche where there's a mini farmers market every Thursday
host_about: I'm a German/Turkish architect based in Berlin. I love Berlin and hope I can infuse your visit with insider tips on where to eat, drink, shop and experience Berlin like a local!

neighborhood_overview:
In a few meters you are in the middle of the beautifully landscaped Chancellor's Garden. The residential area originally built for members of the Bundestag is ideal for relaxing walks along the Spree. The path on the left leads past the Chancellery directly to the main train station, on the right it takes a few steps to Bellevue Castle Official seat of the Federal President.

The supermarket Penny and Aldi are on the way to the train station. For urgent shopping on Sundays, you can do so in the basement of the main train station. There is a REWE supermarket, which is also open on Sundays.

name: Home Wilma Apt. Singer  No Party
description:
Spacious, quiet apartment with everything you need. Close to Alexanderplatz and located in the center of Berlin. Well equipped for families.

The space
Please note that this apartment is part of a quiet, family-friendly residential complex. Treating your neighbors with respect is very important. Any loud activities, parties or events are not allowed. Please respect the nighttime peace after 8 pm.

Ease for you, too: Relax in a convenient and large old school apartment with a living room, kitchen and two bedrooms. At Home Wilma, we provide you with internet (WLAN, WiFi), sheets (freshly made beds for you!), towels, dish towels, organic liquid soap also for showering, dishwashing detergent, and of course toilet paper.

For some it is really important: There is an espresso maker in the kitchen. We have board games for you in the living room. And there is a hair dryer in the bathroom.

It is on the 2nd floor. The building has an elevator.

I love my family and Ultimate Frisbee which is a great team sport.

name: Charming Apartment near Mauerpark
description:
Our freshly renovated apartment in the heart of the famous district Prenzlauer Berg offers you the true Berlin feeling: located in a charming old building on a cobbled street, famous historic sites and beautiful cafés are just around the corner. The wifi is fast and the apartment works fine as a homeoffice as well.

Important to know: Regardless of the current regulations, we apply 2G plus (vaccinated / recovered + rapid test), because we want to protect our guests and cleaning staff.

The space
CORONA UPDATE: Because of Corona, we have made a number of arrangements to make your stay as safe and enjoyable as possible. We follow the recommendations of the Center for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Among other things, they see before that ...
- 24 hours between two stays
- the apartment is sufficiently ventilated
- Surfaces are cleaned and disinfected
- We wear disposable gloves when cleaning and wash the laundry particularly high
neighborhood_overview: We've been living and working in Prenzlauer Berg for many years and can't imagine a better part of Berlin: creative people, young families, artists and restaurateurs live here - in one of the largest contiguous areas of old buildings in Europe. Not only do you get great food, but you can also relax with walks across Helmholtzplatz and Kollwitzplatz (weekly market on Saturdays) - and go out in the evening on Kastanienallee.
host_about: We are a young couple from germany living in Berlin and Husum. We love travelling and hosting – and we just enjoy creating our guests a very special time and share all the insights from the places we love.

name: Mid-Century Gem close to Alexanderplatz
description:
144m2 flat bathed in sun, with amazing views onto Strausberger Platz, walking distance to Alexanderplatz, Volkspark Friedrichshain, and the Spree. At the intersection of Mitte, Prenzlauerberg, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain and with the U5 directly in front of your door, you will live in the center of the city with all its pleasures easily within your reach.

The space
The flat is located on the 3rd floor of a historic landmark tower on Berlin’s iconic Karl-Marx Allee Boulevard, is accessible via elevator, and is decorated in a stylish, yet comfortable combination of original mid-century modern furniture, eclectic found objects, and original artwork from local and international artists.

The flat contains two bedrooms: a master bedroom with a king size bed and a second bedroom currently set up as a home office with a desk, flat screen TV and sofa which can be flattened into a comfortable double bed.

For additional guests, there is a double pull
neighborhood_overview: Strausberger Platz is located at the meeting point of 4 of Berlin's most vibrant neighborhoods: Mitte, Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg & Prenzlauerberg.  All are literally 500m from your door, depending on which direction you go.
host_about: I am a world-travelled lover of languages and cultures who strives in everything I do to open and integrate my perspective on how to live a fulfilled, meaningful life.  I love to entertain, meet new people and share and challenge new ideas.  I look forward to welcoming you into my space in Berlin or meeting you on one of my journeys!

The space
Recently renovated modern apartment in the Center of Berlin Prenzlauer Berg at the corner to "Schönhauser Allee".

The apartment has one Living-/Bedroom, separate bathroom and a big kitchen. The kitchen is well equipped with a big dining table, washing machine, dishwasher, fridge/freezer, coffee machine, toaster, water boiler, microwave, all cooking ware like plates, pans, glasses etc.. There is also an iron that will come in handy when you want to get dressed up for an exciting night in Berlin clubs and fancy restaurants.

Linen and 1 hand towel + 1 bath towel per guest are included.

The Living-/Bedroom has a queen size bed with one large matress. In this big room you will also f
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a typical Berlin "Altbau Kiez". There are pretty renovated old houses. Its very quite, clean and safe.
host_about:
Hi mein Name ist Moe, ich bin in Berlin geboren und aufgewachsen, also kann ich das behaupten, was schon John F. Kennedy sagte: 

"Ich bin ein Berliner..."

Ich liebe diese Stadt, weil es einfach die coolste Stadt (Deutschlands) ist. Aber dennoch bin ich neugierig und versuche so oft wie es meine Zeit zulässt andere Städte und Länder zu bereisen.

Und auf meiner Liste gibt es noch haufenweise Städte, die ich noch nicht besucht habe. Also auf gehts, es gibt noch viel zu tun...

Ich bin ein Fan der Rockabilly Music und des 50's Lifestyles und deshalb gilt:
"Rock´n Roll rules!"

description:
Welcome!

The space
Flat in Berlin

***** NO ANMELDUNG*****

Nice ONE ROOM apt in Berlin-Neukölln, one of the most lively areas of the city!

name: Charming Renovated Old Flat for 2
description:
The renovated apartment is placed in the first floor of a very well kept Art Nouveau style building. It is accessible through the original preserved staircase or a beautiful wrought-iron lift.

The space
The apartment is divided into 3 bright rooms, all of which have parquet flooring, plus a roomy eat-in kitchen with timber-piling and one spacious bathroom. It is completely furnished with handpicked design-classics and antique-furniture.
You will find a flat screen in the living room and furthermore a cable junction, dsl and free wifi. The fitted kitchen in the dining room includes a dishwasher, microwave and induction cooker while a washer-dryer and the luxurious shower can be found in the bathroom.
The office room has an additional sleeping couch (150x200cm) for guests; a lushy bed (180x200cm) and an ample wardrobe are placed in the bedroom. All rooms are individually accessible through the hallway.
You can live here with up to four persons. Be

name: Typische Berliner Altbauwhg im Kiez
description:
In meiner schönen Berliner Altbauwohnung mitten im Friedenauer Kiez fühlt man sich gleich zuhause! Man merkt, hier wird gelebt und nicht nur vermietet!

The space
Die große typisch Berliner Altbauwohnung mit ihren zwei hohen Altbauflügeltürzimmern läßt Platz zum Leben! Die besonders große Küche ( 28 qm mit 4 Flammen Gasherd und Backofen), lädt ein, den Sightseeing Tag am Abend genüsslich beim Wein ausklingen zu lassen.
Im gemütlichen Wohnzimmer steht ein Euch ein Fernseher und DVD Player, Stereoanlage und ein Clavinova ( E Piano) zur Unterhaltung zur Verfügung! Im Schlafzimmer/ Arbeitszimmer gibt es ein Stereosystem um Euren IPod / IPhone anzuschließen und Eure Musik zu hören!
+ Freie WLAN Nutzung
+ Handtücher und Bettwäsche frei
2 bis max. 3 Personen können beherbergt werden.
Das Balkonzimmer ist das Schlafzimmer mit dem Doppelbett für 2 Personen ( 1,60 m breit)
Im Wohnzimmer kann die Couch für 1 Person als Bett dienen ( 70 cm breit)
neighborhood_overview: Ich wohne im Malerviertel einem typisch Berliner Friedenauer Kiez. Die Cranachstraße ist eine 30km/h ruhige Straße, die aber durch ihre Ladengeschäfte einen ganz bestimmten Charme hat! Jedes Haus hat einen Laden, so gibt es  von 2 Apotheken, über Friseure, Kosmetik/ Nagelstudios, Blumenläden, Aldi  und Lebensmittelladen, Fahrschule, einem Antiquariat, Bäckereien etc.bis zum Pizza Lieferservice, Restaurants, Cafés und Feinkostlädchen alles was man zum Leben so braucht!
host_about: Ich liebe es zu reisen und andere Städte zu erkunden. So habe ich mit Airbnb bereits viele andere Großstädte kennengelernt. Da mir das Wohnen in den Privatwohnungen einen ganz anderen Zugang zu der jeweiligen Stadt geschaffen hat, wollte ich genau das in Berlin anbieten. Ich bin aus beruflichen Gründen viel unterwegs und da steht meine typisch Alt Berliner Wohnung immer leer! Ab jetzt hoffentlich nicht mehr, denn ich hoffe das meine persönlichen 4 Wänden meine Gäste Berlin hautnah erleben lässt!

name: Große Wohnung mit Garten, 2 Min. vom U-Bahnhof
description:
Unsere Wohnung ist perfekt gelegen, die Nachbarschaft ist ruhig und mit der in 3 Minuten entfernten U-Bahn ist man schnell in Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte oder anderen Stadtteilen Berlins. Ausgestattet ist die Wohnung mit einer modernen Küche und 2 Bädern. Wegen des Gartens ist sie vor allem für Familien mit Kindern geeignet.

The space
Unsere Wohnung ist eine 135 qm große Maisonette Wohnung im EG und 1. Stock eines 2012 gebauten Mehrfamilienhauses. Der Wohn-/Essbereich mit offener Küche hat eine sehr schöne, angenehme Atmosphäre auch aufgrund der 3,45 m hohen Decken, des Eichenparketts und der Fensterfront zum Garten. Die Nachbarn im Haus sind sehr nett, es wohnen hier einige Kinder, für die es in einem Gemeinschaftsbereich im Garten auch einen Sandkasten und 2 Reckstangen gibt. Im OG befinden sich drei Schlafzimmer und ein Bad, im EG befinden sich der großzügige Wohn-/und Essbereich und ein kleines Bad. Die Wohnung hat eine Terrasse und einen Garten zur Südseite, in d
neighborhood_overview: Die Wohnung ist sehr ruhig in Pankow-Süd gelegen. Ganz in der Nähe gibt es mehrere Supermärkte, Bäckereien, einen Metzger, Blumenläden, die beste Eisdiele (Hokey Pokey), Spielplätze, einen Biergarten, eine Pizzeria, eine Apotheke, Blumenläden usw. Man ist aber auch schnell im belebten Prenzlauer Berg  mit Cafés, Bars und netten Geschäften z.B. am Helmholzplatz oder in der Kastanienallee.
host_about: Hallo! ich bin Julia und lebe sehr gerne in unserer Wohnung in Berlin. Wir wohnen hier zu fünft, mein Mann Berend, unsere drei Kinder Ada, Marian und Romy und ich. Im Sommer fahren wir sehr gerne in die schöne Umgebung von Berlin zu den vielen tollen Seen in Brandenburg. Wir verbringen auch viel Zeit in unserem Garten, der direkt ans Wohnzimmer anschließt.

name: Great Flat in Berlin city center
description:
Nice and cosy typical german Altbau flat, situated on the 3rd floor of the backside building. Charming and quiet area, 2 minutes walk to the river Spree or to the Tiergarten. You can join the city center by public transportation in 10 min.

The space
The flat is fully equiped with a big , all furnished Kitchen , a nice Living Room and a Mezzanine Bed!
It can host 2 people, who do want to sleep in the same bed! :)
Really cosy and well located, you can have a great time here and easily visit Berlin.

Guest access
The whole appartement is for rent, me not included!

Other things to note
Looking for people who stay minimum 1 Week!!
neighborhood_overview:
The Moabit- Tiergarten Area is a quiet and green district in Berlin, slowly coming out. It is an authentic, mixed area, where you might find the last real Berliners living!! Family and Nature friendly :)
Well situated, between the Spree and the big Tiergarten, between West and East, you can have long walks along the river and join the Brandenburg Gate or go through the Parc and visit the Zoo. If you feel more like city center, the transportations is 5 min walking from the house!

name: Cozy Neukölln-Apartment with private Garden
description:
Welcome to our beautiful 95-m2-apartment! The place is ideal for a family with up to two kids. There is a parentsroom and a sleepingroom for children (with a cot, if you wish). If you travel as a group of adults, there is another doublebed with the size of 1,60x2,00. The place is situated in "Schillerkiez", which is one of Neuköllns most lively neighborhoods with cafés, bars and restaurants. The big "Tempelhofer Feld"-Park is just 100 meters away, the private garden makes the apartment unique.

The space
The apartment has three rooms (sleepingroom, childrensroom and livingroom), a bathroom and a big kitchen, where you can as well sit and eat with four adults. In the childrensroom, which we could rearrange, so it looks a little bit less like kids, could as well sleep two adults on a 1,60x2,00 meters Queensize Bed. The garden has about 75 m2 and is just for your private use. Behind the garden, there is a park, so if you open the windowblinds, you look to the greens
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln is a pulsating, young, multicultural neighborhood with lots of cultural offers. But at the same time, this part of Neukölln, which is called „Schillerkiez“, has quite a lot peaceful corners, parks and the huge „Tempelhofer Feld“ directly around the corner. Next to the apartment, there are the metrostations „Hermannstraße“ (S41/S42/U8) and Leinestraße (U8). From here, you reach for example Alexanderplatz and Mitte in 20 minutes.

name: Spectacular Neukölln Penthouse
description:
Join us in a spacious and perfectly located rooftop penthouse overlooking Neukölln in walking distance to beautiful Landwehrkanal and buzzing Weserstraße, one of Berlin's favorite hangouts. You are living in a 200 square meter Loft with a 80 square meter living room. Your private room is very stylish, we got 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies with lots of sun, and 2 great flat mates - all you need :)

The space
In the backyard just behind a park is our old factory house from 1890 with our penthouse on top.
The 200 m2 apartment is spacious and welcoming with balconies to the north and west with a >80m2 living room, two bathrooms and a large and well-equipped kitchen. You stay in a nice private room with 18 m2, fully furnished including an oversized kingsize bed (220x200) with a brand new "Tempur" mattress.

Guest access
We share the bathrooms, kitchen, balconies and the living room - your room is of course your private retreat.
neighborhood_overview:
I have travelled the world, but Kreuzkoelln is for me the best place in the world. Why? Kreuzkölln is the liveliest, most diverse and dynamic part of an anyhow exciting city, nestled between the picturesque Paul-Lincke Ufer and Tempelhofer Feld. You are where these wonderful Berlin magic summer nights happen. The streets just in front of you are full of coffee shops, bars and restaurants. When you are here, you feel directly like home.
The apartment is perfectly located in the Reuterneighborhood and a perfect starting point to explore this upcoming part of the city. You are in 3 min. at the Landwehrkanal, where everybody is running, taking a boat tour or hangs out after work for a beer, 2 min. to Pannierstrasse with more than 15 cuisine nationalities in one street and 1 min. to buzzing Weserstrasse, the night spot in berlin with all kind of bars. Main grocery stores as also local farmers stores are around the corner. So all great spots are within 10 min. Walking distance. And wh
host_about: entrepreneur, surfer & addict explorer

name: Typical Berlin Apartment in X-Berg
description:
This typical Berlin apartment is situated right in the new hip Berlin called "X-Kölln" where a lot of bars, restaurants and coffee places opened up. There is a sleeping room, a living room with a sleeping couch in it, a kitchen and a bathroom.

The space
This pretty apartment in unique Berlin style with the typical wooden floor and the new big balcony to the back yard has one big room with a nice sitting spot, a library, a closet, a desk and a sleeping couch in it and a living room with an open kitchen that also has a sleeping couch for two in it.
In the kitchen there is all you need to cook or bake even though you might prefer the restaurants and bars of Berlin in walking distance.

Guest access
In the apartment there is free internet - WLAN - and TV. The bath room has a bath tub but you can also take a nice shower. For the time you stay here the apartment is used only by you, so it will really feel like living in Berlin.
neighborhood_overview: About my neighborhood there is little to say because it has a lot to offer: there are a lot of bars, coffee places, restaurants in every kinda style. There are also restaurants mentioned in the Lonely Planet around here even though I bet you will find better places when you stay here! every here and there between the gastronomic highlights there are little unique shops where people just realize there dream but also some start ups of the creative scene. What you can still see here is the changing city: the walls tell and sometimes even scream their history at you while  right next to it there is a vegan burger place. You still see a lot of real "Berliners" mixed in the new urban hipster multicultural city scene. When you take a couple of stations by the metro or the bike you will be at Charly´s Checkpoint really fast and by looking at the naive pavement and the couple of wall rests you can only imagine what it means for a city to have been divided by the former two big super powers. <br

name: Design-Apartment in Mitte/PBerg
description:
The space
A modern, light-flooded apartment with bathroom and kitchenette in the heart of Berlin, between Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. Just a few steps away from Kollwitzplatz and Kastanienallee with a variety of cafes, restaurants and art galleries. The subway stations Senefelder Platz (U2) and Rosenthaler Platz (U8) are just around the corner. Alexanderplatz, the Pergamon Museum and the Berlin Wall Documentation Centre are convenient walking distances, as is Hackescher Markt with its artsy boutiques and unique shopping experience. The famous Sunday fleamarket is also nearby at Mauerpark. There are many places to rent bikes and to start exploring the city by bus or by foot. The neighborhood is a focal point of Berlin’s unique nightlife.

The apartment is decorated in white and 27 squaremeters large. Giorgio, an Italian architect, has designed it and exhibits simple, clean lines. The bathroom with toilet, stylish sink and shower meets highest demands. The kitchen
host_about: Hi, io sono Giorgio. I am an Italian architect living in Berlin.

name: Luxury Penthouse, 2 BDR, 2 Baths, AC
description:
The penthouse is on the 6th floor with elevator. It has two bedrooms and two fully equipped bathrooms, living room with an open kitchen, a 15sqm terrace, a free parking spot and air-condition. The apartment is 1,1 km or 15 walking mins south of KDW.

The space
Welcome to my fully furnished luxury penthouse condo. Nestled amidst the treetops of Berlin, it is conveniently located only 15 walking minutes to the famous KaDeWe shopping center and 5 minutes (390 meters) to the next subway and gas station.
The condo is elegantly furnished with modern splashes of color, 3,5 meter (11 feet) high ceilings, and lots of natural light spilling in to greet you every day. You will enjoy the private terrace for sunrise breakfasts or afternoon pleasures. And if it gets too hot, cool down with the automated awning for instant shade.
The condo has a spacious and cheery open floor plan with high end furnishings throughout, complete with granite countertops in the kitchen
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is a quiet residential area. At Prager Platz, ca. 250 meters, you will find three supermarkets, a pharmacy, hairdresser, drugstore and a newspaper stand. There are coffee shops, an Italian, Vietnamese and a Greek restaurant, and several others nearby. A gas station is 390 meters away, just next to the subway station Güntzelstrasse.  The famous KaDeWe shopping center is about 15 walking minutes/ 1 kilometre towards the north.
host_about: My life motto is: treat people the way you want to be treated, and do it first. So I like to host people and provide a safe, clean and interesting visit to Berlin. When I am out of town I can also leave the whole apartment for families with children or two couples, for example. My travels have brought me to almost all over Europe, the US, Caribbean, Australia, Asia, Africa and even to the sub polar Region of Russia, where we experienced a chilly -44 Celsius in Yakutsk in January 2008. In my free time I work as a volunteer in care giving for dying people in a Hospice-network in Berlin as well as being an extra in dozens of movies made in Berlin. My biggest "role" was a little scene in "The queens gambit" together with Anya Taylor-Joy.

Modern and comfortable apartment in the most vibrant part of Berlin!

The space
Cosy and freshly renovated 2 rooms flat in the heart of Kreuzberg 36: definitely the most trendy, alive and multicultural area of Berlin!
Many bars, cafes, restaurant, and galleries are all in walking distance from the flat. The next metro stations are Kottbusser Tor U1/12 and U8 and Prinzenstrasse U1, is at 100 mt from the flat, as well several bus station and a taxi station.
The atmosphere in the streets of the multicultural neighbourhood Kreuzberg is very exciting, friendly and alive. You will meet artists as well as people from many different cultures which are going to give you a real authentic Berlin experience.
A few words about my flat:
The flat fully furnished and freshly renovated, it can host up till 6 people in 2 comfortable double beds and 2 single beds. The kitchen is fully equipped with all kitchen props, fridge, toaster,washing machine ecc. The f
neighborhood_overview:
Kreuzberg is known for its vibrant cultural life. Here you can experience the true feeling of Berlin: a endless variety of cultural experiences! Kreuzberg is a multicultural melting pot: from the most underground art galleries to concert halls, historical sites,outdoor events, dance club, designer and crafts markets and much more. The neighbor offers a variety restaurants: German, Middle East ,Korean, Japanese and so many more.
Of course the nightlife is colorful and exciting but our flat is in a quiete spot so no worries about having a good night sleep!
But Kreuzberg can be also relaxing and romantic, here we have beautiful parks and canals for walks and picnics.

neighborhood_overview: The area is up and coming, has shops, galeries, and a theater. Lots of green and a little stream to have quiet walks is in 100m distance. Shared 2-bedroom flat in a pre-war building with typical East-Berlin flair next to the war-struck clock tower as last remainder of the church Bethanienkirche. 20mins to Alexanderplatz and Hackesche Höfe. 10mins by foot to the small lake Weißer See.

The space
Shared 2-bedroom flat in a pre-war building with typical East-Berlin flair next to the war-struck clock tower as last remainder of the church Bethanienkirche. 20mins to Alexanderplatz and Hackesche Höfe. 10mins by foot to the small lake Weißer See

The room you'll be staying in is 25sqm and features a desk, wooden bed and a newly fitted fireplace, french balcony and part of the original plaster decor on the 3,50m high ceiling.

The bed is a 140 x 200 cm double bed and fits two people comfortably. Additionally, a Japanese futon is available in order to accommodate another person.

You will have access to the fully equipped shared kitchen (gas stove, fridge and freezer) and bathro
neighborhood_overview:
Not far from the vibrant heart of Berlin the flat is situated in the pitoresque part of Weißensee (in the 1920s famous Filmtown), with it's lake, lido, open-air stage and one of the oldest cinemas in town.
There are a variety of cafés and shops around the corner.
There are several dance opportunities around the area - swing dancing at the lido (email hidden).

host_about:
I am living in Berlin since more than 30 years now and most of this time I have spent in Kreuzberg. I appreciate its diversity and normality. Every now and then I like to share or  lent my home to someone from somewhere else. 
If wished for I can provide you with informations and tips concerning Berlins sights, history and my personal favorite places. 
Being curious about your discoveries and looking forward to your visit!   

Seit über 30 Jahren lebe ich  in Berlin und die längste Zeit hiervon in Kreuzberg. Mir gefällt die Vielfalt und Normalität hier. Hin und wieder habe ich Lust mein Zuhause mit jemandem von woanders her zu teilen bzw. es "auszuleihen". 
Falls gewünscht gebe ich gerne Infos und Tipps zu Sehenswürdigkeiten, der Geschichte Berlins und meinen persönlichen Lieblingsplätzen. 
Bin gespannt auf Deine / Eure Entdeckungen. Ich freue mich auf Deinen Besuch!

description:
Welcome to Berlin!
This small, simple room is located in Berlin Mitte (Moabit), near the river Spree and one of the most famous sights of Berlin,the Victory Column(Siegessäule). If you enjoy walking you can even take a stroll to Brandenburg Gate (30mins)

The space

neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in Moabit, Mitte. The area is wonderful, close to Tiergarten (the big park)and River Spree, perfect for walking,jogging or just enjoying the nice views. The street is quiet, calm and safe and has a few restaurants, a café, bakery, pharmacy, ice cream parlour etc. There is a Supermarket within a five minute walk.

2 subway stations within 7 mins walk. One stop to Zoologischer Garten.

Bus stops just a minutes from the flat.

Many famous sights like Siegessäule, Schloss Bellevue, Reichstag, Brandenburger Tor are within walking distance.
host_about:
Hi, I´m a german guy who lives in Berlin since 2007. Originally I´m from a small village two hours from Berlin. 

Traveling and getting to know different countries and cultures with all their facets is one of my biggest passions. 

Besides travelling I like reading, riding my bike, yoga, swimming, nature, museums etc.

At my place, I want you to feel completely at home & make sure you have a wonderful stay in beautiful Berlin! See you soon :)

Willkommen in Friedrichshain! Unsere großzügig geschnittene, sehr helle Wohnung bietet dir und deinen Freunden den idealen Platz für eine tolle Erfahrung in Berlin! Direkt vor dem Haus und in unmittelbarer Nähe findest du Restaurants, Kioske, Cafés und alles andere wichtige. Ubahn 3 min entfernt. Perfekte Lage, 2min bis SimonDachKiez!

name: Colorful, cosy flat in Kreuzberg
description:
AS I WILL BE AWAY I FIRST HAVE TO CHECK IF THERE WILL BE SOMEONE WHO CAN LET YOU IN IF YOU REQUIRE A STAY BETWEEN THE 24th - 28th.

---

While I'm away, I would love to welcome you to enjoy my sunny and cosy 2 room apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg.
Only a few steps away you will find uncountable bars, restaurants, clubs and the best public transport connection (U8, U1, Bus 140...)

The space
Urban, typical berlin concrete building with a cosy, colourful, detail loving interior.

While I'm away, I would love to welcome you to enjoy my sunny and cosy 2 room apartment in the heart of famous Kreuzberg and center of Berlin.
It´s a urban, typical berlinese concrete building built in the sixties with a cosy, colourful, detail loving interior. It´s full of light and has a sunny balcony facing the garden and a big tree. In summer you will find the balcony stuffed with flowers and herbs which you can - of course - use for cookin
neighborhood_overview:
My place is situated in the geographical center of berlin.
My neighborhood is Kreuzberg. The trendiest neibourhood besides Mitte and Neukölln.
It is a urban, exiting and constantly changing neighbourhood, where you find countless cafes, bars, organic shops, daily markets, flea markets, clubs (Ritter Butzke, Prince Charles), record shops, designer stores and more.

The famous Oranienburgerstrasse is only 5 min away. Also just a 5 min walk to the idyllic Maybachufer, a canal dotted with restaurants and bars, where you can visit the vibrant Turkish market every Tuesdays and Fridays. As well as a 2 min walk to the famous urban gardening place "Prinzessinnengärten".

Only a few steps away you will find uncountable bars, restaurants, clubs and the best public transport lines (U8, U1, Bus 140 ...).

To "Mitte" and all the famous attraction you can catch a tube (3-4 stations away).
To "Neukölln" you catch the same tube (U8) in the other direct
host_about:
Hey there,
I am a curious, vivid, detail and color loving designer from Berlin who loves to travel, meet new people, discover new things and places.

I am a passionate host too and while I'm away I rent out my cosy home in the middle of Kreuzberg.

name: MINI LOFT:  2 Bedrooms + Living-bedroom + balcony
description:
A 60 sq. mt flat tastefully renovated, with bright colours and a spacious feeling. Sunlight all around. Minimal and yet friendly character, with a loft like atmosphere. On the fourth floor, with views to the trees below on both sides of the apartment and nice panorama view to the Prenzlauer Berg Park. After trips in the city you can relax on the balcony with sight to the green court. There is double glazing for a real quiet nights sleep and privacy, and warmth in winter.

The space
Facilities:
The whole flat can host 6 people max. Ideal for couples, families or 3 students.
The living room - kitchen can also transform into a bedroom via the sofa into a double bed and a thick curtain to separate it from the rest of the flat. In this room you can enjoy the sunny balcony.
Additionally there are two private rooms:
The Green Room with a double bed, desk, mirror, wardrobe, chairs and side table,

The Yellow Room has also a sofa transformabl
neighborhood_overview:
The flat lies right in the border between three main colourful neighbourhoods: Lichtenberg, Friedrichsain and Prenzlauer Berg. So it is easily reachable to all three., besides to the city center in 13 mins. Friedrichshain has some interesting attractions: there is the EAST SIDE GALERY, the OBERBAUMBRÜCKE and BOXHAGENER PLATZ flea market every Sunday.

You also have O2 World or even the Velodrom nearby for sporting events or concerts

It is just in front of the beautifully wild Prenzlauer Berg Park from where you can see the whole of Berlin at its top. And a walking distance form Friedrichshain VolksPark for the berliner sun bathing, picnics or BBQs.

neighborhood_overview:
Even in Cold War times, students, cultural initiatives and intellectuals shaped the image of Prenzlauer Berg. Since the Wall came down, Prenzlauer Berg has developed into a trendy district and is known for its lively nightlife and numerous pubs, cafés and clubs.
The commercial center of the district is located at the Schönhauser Allee urban train station (five minutes from the apartment), where the "Schönhauser Allee Arcaden", a typical East German shopping center from the years immediately following reunification, attracts customers from the original Pankow district.
Prenzlauer Berg is characterized by numerous small independent shops, in each side street, especially in the Kastanienallee (ten minutes away), known locally as "Castingallee".
These days Prenzlauer Berg consists almost entirely of old buildings. There are more than 300 protected buildings. Isn't that great?!

name: Große Altbauwohnung Kreuzberg
description:
Wir vermieteten unsere 67qm große 2-Zimmer-Altbauwohnung in Berlin-Kreuzberg, die genügend Raum für vier Personen bietet. Was die Wohnung auszeichnet, ist die große Küche und die super Lage. Im Sommer ist die Nähe zu den Parks mehr als attraktiv.

The space
Was unsere Unterkunft einzigartig macht? Da wäre zum Beispiel die große helle Küche, die schon häufig Schauplatz für unterhaltsame Konversationen war. Das größere von beiden Zimmern (27qm) kann nicht nur als Schlafmöglichkeit gesehen werden, sondern laden die gemütlichen Antik-Möbelstücke zum Verweilen ein. Für diejenigen, die gern meditieren, werden die thailändische Meditationsmatte, der Bonsai und der Efeu sicher von Vorteil sein.
Aber auch das zweite Zimmer (20qm), das durch eine Trenntür mit dem anderen verbunden ist, bietet ausreichend viel Platz.
Generell bekommt man durch die hohen Decken nie ein beengendes Gefühl.

Guest access
Da wir unsere komplette Wohnung vermieten,
neighborhood_overview:
Was unsere Gegend auszeichnet ist die zentrale Lage.
Wir haben den wunderschönen Victoriapark direkt bei uns um die Ecke. Zeitgleich erreicht man ebenso den Park am Gleisdreieck, der perfekt ist um sich sportlich auszupowern.

In 5 min zu Fuß erreicht man ebenso den Bergmannkiez, der unsere Meinung nach zu den schönsten Plätzen Berlins gehört.
Hier findet man unzählige Restaurants, Bars und Shops.
Zudem ist wohl berühmteste Döner Berlins, und zwar " Mustafa´s Gemüsekebap" , in 2min zu erreichen.
Zusammengefasst kann man sagen, dass es einem in dieser Gegend an nichts fehlt.

name: 64 qm im Norden mit Stil
description:
Diese 2-Zi-Wohnung hat Wohlfühlambiente.
Sie liegt verkehrsgünstig und in einem ruhigen Mehrfamilienhaus im Falkentaler Steig in Bln-Hermsdorf. Schlafzi., Wohnzi. mit Erker, große Wohnküche.
Gerne erweitere ich das Inventar nach Wunsch.

The space
Diese 2-Zimmer-Wohnung ist eine Unterkunft mit Wohlfühl-Ambiente.
Die verkehrsgünstig gelegene Ferienwohnung befindet sich in einem ruhigen Mehrfamilienhaus im Falkentaler Steig in Berlin-Hermsdorf mit offener und freundlicher Nachbarschaft.
Die Wohnung hat ein Schlafzimmer und Wohnzimmer mit Erker. Die Wohnküche mit ca. 12 m2 kann gut als Aufenthaltsraum genutzt werden. Bad mit Badewanne, und Diele. Die Küche hat alles, was man zum Kochen braucht. Wohnzimmer, Schlafzimmer und Diele haben Alt-Berliner abgeschliffene Dielen.
Es ist nicht weit zum S-Bahnhof Hermsdorf ( 25 Minuten ins Berliner Zentrum) und mit dem Bus 125 (direkt vor der Tür, in 10 Minuten zum U-Bahnhof Alt-Tegel) und mit dem Auto

Newly renovated vacation apartment/studio with a beautiful garden in a quiet, but central area in Berlin.

The space
The apartment has been renovated and newly furnitured in 2012 and is located in quiet family area. It is well connected to public transport which can bring you within 20min into the city center of Berlin.
The 33 square meter studio is stylishly furnitured including a double bed, an open kitchen with dining area as well as a separate bath room with a ground level shower and toilett. A front porch facing south can be reached from the living area and includes garden furniture and a sunshade.
For more chilled sommer days, the underfloor heating can be used.

Guest access
A carport at the property can be used to comfortably park the car.

Other things to note
Berlin has an overnight tax of 5% per overnight price which has to be paid upon arrival directly at the landlord.

________________

my name is Maikel and I am 24 years old and am currently working at a health-tech startup in Berlin. I am an open-minded and friendly person. My interests are economics, sports and I am a piano player. I enjoy very much to discover foreign countries and cultures. Therefore travelling is one of my greatest passions. In my trips to different coutries airbnb was a great help, which I am now giving back to others by offering my own apartment and making your stay in Berlin as perfect as it can get.

I speak German, English, Russian and French.

neighborhood_overview: Fascinating, excellent quality apartment in the heart of Berlin, just 2 km from Brandenburger Tor and Reichstag . Housed within a beautiful historic building, in typical Berlin "Altbau" style dating back to the early 1900s, with a themed ornamental façade, it truly encompasses all expectations of apartments from that period. Completely refurbished, situated in an excellent location in one of the best areas in Berlin(the new Mitte), this is now one of the most fashionable district in Berlin. In Tiergarten, behind the façades of many of the stucco-clad buildings, are hidden inner courtyards with delightful and extraordinarily beautiful gardens. The area is very well connected via public transport, with two underground stops close by, U9 Birkenstrasse , which give you access to Berlin's attractions and most memorable spots. Just a 10 minute walk away is the Tiergarten park,and the Hauptbahnhof

name: Neukölln Flat
description:
Beautiful, freshly renovated appartment in the green heart of hip Neukölln neighborhood, two minutes walking distance from Tempelhof Park (former airport).

The space
Me and my girlfriend are going on a holiday, so we thought we would let somebody else enjoy our beautiful appartment while we are away. The place was newly renovated and is ideal for couples with a huge bed (seriously, it is tall as a fairy tale bed) in the sleeping room and a living room where you can choose to work (we have fast wifi and a big desk, tons of books and the odd berlin tour guide) or play. The bathroom has both a bathtub and a shower and there is enough space in the kitchen to sit and chill properly and everything you need to cook, should you choose to do so. Finally, we have a nice balcony with a green view where you can have a breakfast in the sun or plan your Berlin adventures for the day.

Guest access
There will be crisp, freshly washed linen and towels wait
neighborhood_overview: The appartment is located in the very hip neighborhood of Neukölln, just a two-minutes walk away from Tempelhof, the former airport now turned into an enormous park. There is also an ice skating rink just across the street. It is the place to spend the summer for Berliners and transplants alike, whether grilling, kite flying, rollerblading or drinking is your thing. It is a very green and quiet area, with cobblestone streets, lots of trees and a fabulous multicultural mix of people, flavors and activities. It is a vibrant neighbourhood that has carved its place as the best new thing in a city that never ceases to move on the search for a new cool spot. From dive bars to fine dining, pop-up galleries to farmer’s markets, if it’s hip in Berlin it is in Neukölln and now you get a chance to experience it the local way.

name: Bright, Central One-Bedroom
description:
Centrally-located along the U5 and a grand boulevard in former East Berlin, this light-filled one-bedroom is the heart-filled home of two artists.

The space
The apartment is filled with light and warmth, located on the top floor, accessible by elevator. The building is historically significant and smacks of socialist luxury, with a bust of Karl Marx stood just outside. Unlike many offerings, this is our full-time home, available only when my partner and I are both out of town. The space is lovingly and intentionally curated with art, small treasures, and plant friends throughout. I carefully selected details when renovating in 2014, creating a homey but highly stylish habitat, with raw walls framed in black and white, smoked oak floorboards, and light switches that clack when you flip them. I've since added several bright Moroccan carpets, deepening the texture and color here. We love and care for our home and hope you do, too!

The kitchen is fully sto
neighborhood_overview:
Karl-Marx-Allee is a monumental boulevard built by the GDR between 1952 and 1960 and begins at Strausberger Platz at the border of Mitte and Friedrichshain in central Berlin. It has been called "Europe's last great street," and East Berlin is exemplified by the impressive apartment structures that run along either side, reaching eight stories high in a Soviet wedding-cake style. You'll find a walking tour marked with plaques along the almost 2 km length, providing details about the historical and architectural significance of the area.

Café Sibylle, one of the first to open along the boulevard, is an 8-minute walk east and still serves homemade cakes and coffee. 5 minutes further brings you to Briefmarken Weine, a small but well-stocked Italian wine bar with great ambiance. In the direction of Alexanderplatz, you'll find Kino International close-by, an impressive, historical film theater that regularly hosts premieres. All along the boulevard, you'll find renowned art galler
host_about: I'm a musician, teacher, and designer, originally from California, living in Europe since 2010. In 2014, I bought and renovated my first home, a one-bedroom apartment in central Berlin that I rent out when traveling. I am continuing a strong family tradition of hosting by offering my home here. We acted as a host family for many foreign exchange students over the years and welcomed many friends, friends-of-friends, and of course family, as well — and friends who've become family! I take pride in offering a special space, my home, not a soulless four walls, and I of course take special care as a guest, as well. When traveling, I get to the ocean or sea whenever possible and particularly love to visit anywhere I have a connection, however tenuous. You never know where you'll find new friend-family!

name: Artist LOFT in backyard shed
description:
The loft is 80 sqm. Double bed with wardrobe in the bedroom, double sofa bed in the living room, comfortable sitting chairs and charred Style table for 10 people in the living room.
Fully equipped kitchen for cooking and shower/WC with glass mosaic.

The space
The 80-sqm loft is located on the 1st floor of the Kronberg Remise in Berlin, in the district of Prenzlauer Berg in close proximity to the Gethsemane Church in the Stargarder Strasse .
The beautifully renovated brick building is located in the quiet and green courtyard of a typical Gründerzeit-period multi-storey residential building. A small garden is part of the house .
 
The loft has a typically high ceiling and is thus very light. The 60 sqm living room gets its special flair from contemporary art paintings, photographs and sculptures.
The designer furniture and the bathroom equipped with a glass mosaic enhance the artistic touch .

The living room is provided with a g
neighborhood_overview:
Perfect location:
Stargarder Street, just 200 meters from the "Schönhauser Allee" Train and Metro Station. Stargarder Str. has evolved in recent years to a trend-mile.
You can find all kinds of restaurants, bars and individual shops right outside the door.
Near the Schönhauser Allee station is located a shopping center with several supermarkets and shops for everything your heart desires. You can quickly reach the famous Mauerpark, the Kulturbrauerei, the Kastanien Allee, Kollwitzplatz and Helmholtzplatz, the Berlin Wall Memorial, the Oderbergerstraße, the water tower, etc.
host_about:
Ich lebe zwischen Südtirol/Italien und Berlin und arbeite in den Bereichen Kunst und Design und als Netzwerker im Baumanagement. Zudem betreibe ich eine Agentur für Kunst & Kultur & Design und verstehe  diese als interaktiv – reflexives Labor. 
In Berlin arbeite ich temporär in der Kronberg Remise und betreibe diese auch als Ort der besonderen Begegnungen. 
Meine  Leidenschaft ist der  argentinische Tango, mountainbiken und die Natur.
Meine Kinder sind 28 und 31 Jahre alt. Die Jüngere arbeitet im Bereich Kommunikation und Pädagogik in Barcelona (E) und die Ältere arbeitet als Physiotherapeutin in Zürich (CH).

Beautiful, very bright penthouse near Mauerpark (3min walking distance) with 2 sunny balconies. Have breakfast on the eastern balcony in the morning and enjoy a glass of wine while watching the sunset on the western balcony.

The ENTRY HALL is the heart of the apartment with its large dinner table for up to 6 people.

The LIVING ROOM offers a large, comfy couch that can sleep 1 person as well as a projector with access to most streaming portals. You can access the western balcony from here.

The KITCHEN is newly renovated and offers everything you mi
neighborhood_overview:
Mauerpark is in walking distance, so are various bars and restaurants. The M10 will take you directly to Warschauer Straße (20min ride) with lots of clubs and cultural attractions. The "ringbahn" will take you around Berlin in no time and is just 5-10min away.

There is a bakery right downstairs for fresh bread or breakfast and there is a supermarket across the street in case you need groceries etc. There are also a few "Spätis", the Berlin version of kiosks which are open until late at night to buy some food or drinks.
host_about: Hi, ich bin Sebastian, 37, ursprünglich aus der Nähe von Frankfurt und nun seit 8 Jahren in Berlin. Mein Geld verdiene ich durch "irgendwas mit Medien/Internet" - bin also ein "Web Nerd" (der guten Sorte) und verbringe sonst meine Zeit mit Musik (Gitarre/Klavier) oder Fotografie.
