name: Cozy double room for 1-2 persons in Kreuzberg
description:
Double bedroom with queen bed.

Notes:
- in Nov ONLY Alex is at home
- Check-in: Between 08:00 and 11:00. It can be discussed via message

The modern & spacious flat is on the 3rd floor (no lift).

The flat is in the lovely Graefekiez (Kreuzberg), a safe, green & lively area.
- 6 mins to the Hermannplatz & Schönleinstraße underground stations
- 12 mins to the canal
- 1 min to Haseneide park
- Bus stop/bike rental downstairs
- Tons of cafes and restaurants

The space
The flat is literally equipped with anything you might need :-)

Guest access
Common spaces include:
- the kitchen (fully equipped with many cooking appliances like microwave, smoothie maker, mixer, oven, dishwasher, etc.)
- the bathroom with shower, washing machine, hair dryer, etc.

You can use anything in the flat, with care.

If you are not at home, feel free to use the balcony
neighborhood_overview:
Kreuzberg is home to any possible human facets: hipsters, students, professionals, different cultures and nationalities, eclectic artists, but also very normal people.

Parks, restaurants and cafés are scattered across the area:
- 1 minute walk to the Hasenheide Park.
- 12 minutes to the Landwehr Canal for brunch or café (The Ankerklause, a ship-shaped café-club around the corner, has the best breakfasts in town!)
- 6 minutes to a large supermarket and shopping mall in Hermannplatz.
host_about:
Hi, We are Chiara and Alex :-)

I work as a communications and events manager in an environmental research institute. Basically, I give my 2 cents for a greener world! Alex is crrently writing his first book.

We love Berlin and its never-ending energy. Work, friends, sport and swing dance are our daily bread. 

We are very seldom at home, but we will do our best to make the flat and your stay as comfortable as possible :-) So, take your chance and jump on board!

Cheers, 
Chiara & Alex

Centrally located but still quiet, you can hear a lot of birds in the Morning

On Saturdays you will experience the weekly market right outside the door.
You´ll find a nice coardyard with place to sit, eat and relaxe, enough

name: big flat with four rooms
description:
typical berlin flat in schöneberg, first floor, facing a quiete side-street, close to kreuzberg, good connection with buses and S-Bahn. The house entrance looks run down. the bathroom is old. There is a big copper Marakesh ashtray in the salon and a little box with condoms. So if you are looking for the sterile standard four-stars hotel setup, this place is not for you. But there is a functioning piano and good library with a fair selection of German and English fiction and reference books.

host_about: Ich bin eine deutsche Autorin, die zwischen Berlin und Marseille pendelt. Die Wohnung, die jeweils frei ist, vermiete ich über Airbnb. Als Stadtsoziologin interessiere ich mich sehr für das Ankommen in einer bestimmten Stadt. So habe ich meine Doktorarbeit zum Thema verfasst: "Wie man lernt, Berliner zu sein" , gerade habe ich ein Buch über meinen Versuch geschrieben, nach Marseille auszuwandern. Titel: „Blick aufs Meer, Arsch auf Grundeis“ (erscheint bei Penguin). Ansonsten veranstalte ich lustige Sex-Education-Abende für Erwachsene in der Berliner Urania, wie man an meinem Berliner Bücherregal sieht.

The space
Unser Haus liegt genau zwischen Potsdam Hbf. und der Berliner City (West und Ost). Es sind lediglich wenige Minuten zu Fuß bis zum Bahnhof Wannsee. Auch der Autobahnanschluss liegt optimal: Nahe dem „Kreuz Zehlendorf“, direkt an der AVUS. Am Stadtrand Berlins liegt unser Haus mitten im Grünen.

Guest access
Wir vermieten für zwei Personen vom 14. Juli bis (durchgehend) 24.07. Die Schlüsselübergabe besprechen wir telefonisch oder klären wir schriftlich.

Other things to note
Unsere Katze und bei Hitze auch der Garten wären zu versorgen.
host_about: Wir sind sehr froh, hier am Rand einer Weltstadt mitten im Grünen und ausgeprägter Kultur leben zu können. Wir bevorzugen Paare ab fünfzig. Wer bei uns zu Gast ist, bitten wir an heissen Tagen den Pflanzen Wasser zu geben. Unsere Katze braucht in jedem Fall ihre tägliche Versorgung. Hinweis zur eigenen Versorgung: Ein Bäcker befindet sich in Bahnhofsnähe und der nächste Supermarkt ist eine Bahnstation entfernt.

name: Room #1 Messe-, Wald- u. Stadtnähe
description:
Sehr kleines und gemütliches Zimmer. Direkt im Grünen unweit Grunewald, trotzdem nah zur City (S-Bahn oder Bus) .
Berliner Messe- und Kongressgelände, City-Cube: fußläufig in 5 bis zehn Minuten!!
Olympia-Stadion und Waldbühne sehr günstig. Auch ZOB nicht weit. Flughafen mit S-Bahn durchgehend. Ich mache Frühstück - im Preis inclusive! Tageszeitung. Anreise flexibel. English speaking. Nur 1 Nacht 10 Euro extra.Welcome!

The space
3 unterschiedlich große Zimmer in einem 1- Fam.- Haus mit Garten. Badezimmer und WC alleinige Gäste-Nutzung. Grüne, ruhige Umgebung, trotzdem nicht weit zur City. S-Bahn und Bus 10 Min. Frühstück incl. - je nach Jahreszeit im Garten

Messegelände fußläufig zu erreichen: 5 Min. Sportanlagen und Wald für Spaziergänge oder Jogging etc. in unmittelbarer Umgebung. Garten. Gute Verkehrsanbindung, S-Bahn oder Bus. Auch für mehrere Personen geeignet, da zwei der drei Zimmer über Doppelbetten verfügen. Frühstück ist inclusive
neighborhood_overview: Es ist eine grüne Wohngegend mit schönen Häusern, viel Wald und trotzdem nah zur Messe und Autobahn. Gäste schätzen die Stille und glauben immer gar nicht, in Berlin zu sein.  Pizzeria und Café zehn Minuten zu Fuß.
host_about: Ich bin eine aufgeschlossene Frau der Generation 60+, die zwei Töchter großgezogen hat und nun mit Hund und Katze im Grünen wohnt. Ich war als Journalistein tätig.

name: 3 rooms Schöneberg Parking WiFi Park Balkony
description:
In Schöneberg, a 60m2 centrally located apartment with 3 independent rooms, kitchen, bathroom, big balcony next to a beautiful park. My place is calm, full of light, very well connected to U + S-Bahn (Ring), (night) bus lines. Parking available inside the backyard for a small/medium sized car (no extra charge). This renting is approved by local authorities.

The space
Welcome to my home in Berlin-Schöneberg !

As I am not always at home, I rent out my apartment in central Schöneberg, close to Rathaus Schöneberg, the former city hall of Berlin-West, and with excellent access to public transportation.

My home on the 3rd floor (no elevator) is bright, sometimes very sunny, calm, next to a big and beautiful PARK with a small lake (50 m to the park), perfect for jogging and relaxing !

A fast WiFi connection is available.

The 16 m2 LIVING ROOM has an orange sofa-bed with 90 X 200 cm sleeping surface when only half of the sofa
host_about:
Political scientist (IEP Paris & OSI FU Berlin), world traveler, multilingual, warm-hearted and genuinly interested in building a world where borders cease to exist, I'll be happy to welcome you at home in Berlin.

As I'm not always in Berlin, I've decided to rent out my place when I am not there. I hope you'll enjoy my home and the beautiful park next to my house, in central part of Berlin-West, Schöneberg. 

I am passionate about alternative politics, feminism, good documentary films, Russian and Italian opera, delicious vegetarian / vegan cooking, strolling in cities with their history and presence. 

If you are interested in Berlin beyond the usual touristic sightseeing, I'll gladly help you with informations and insights.

name: Spacious+Atypical Loft Pberg-Mitte
description:
This very special modern loft is located in one of Berlin's most desirable neighborhoods. Between Schönhauser Allee and Kastanien Allee, the apartment enjoys a quiet location and yet close to shops, cafes and restaurants.

The space
The great advantage of this apartment of 95 sqm is brightness. With its large windows throughout the log light is diffused. The loft also has a balcony on each side (yard and street). Concrete ceiling and a blue cement floor complement the modern character of the loft.
This beautiful loft is located in a building designed and built by architect Wolfram Popp in 2002 and won several awards for its architecture.

The loft is fully equipped and leaves nothing to be desired.
- spacious 95sqm with more then 3m high ceilings
- 1st floor with elevator
- 2 balconies overlooking Berlin with views to the east and west.
- huge windows, full of light
- super quiet
- internet WLAN
- -a comfortable
neighborhood_overview:
A lovely neighborhood to explore with colorful facades and 19th-century townhouses.

The loft is super centrally located on the border of the center of Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. It is situated next to Kastanienallee, 10 minutes walk to the bustling Rosenthaler Platz, Weinberg Park and Arkonaplatz (the flea market on Sundays is not to be missed! It’s the arty fleamarket of Berlin. It is small but boasts all manner of retro furniture, clothing, records and books. A nice place to relax on a weekend afternoon), 15 minutes to shopping in Hackescher Markt and only 5 minutes to Mauerpark (where every Sunday is a popular meeting place for artists and a great hipster flea market) and Prater (berlin's first beer garden). The Museum island is only a few minutes walk away.
The area has numerous great restaurants, cafés, bars and shops
Other major attractions such as Friedrichstraße, the Brandenburg Gate, Checkpoint Charlie and Potsdamer Platz are also easy to reach with publ
host_about:

description:
Our cosy and bright one bedroom flat in the heart of trendy Neukölln is perfectly situated to explore Berlin. In this leafy area there are many cool bars, restaurants and cafes, as well as the beautiful canal with a market just down the road.

The space
The flat is friendly and very well kitted out with everything you need for a comfortable stay. There are 2 single beds in the bedroom so it's possible to have stay with a platonic friend or get a good nights sleep if your partner has a restless night. :)
There is a sitting room with sofas and writing desk for if you need to do some work or chill out and read a book. The kitchen has a gas cooker (which I find very useful) as well as a grill and whetever else you might expect in a kitchen (except no toaster, because we use the grill)

Guest access
Guests will occupy the entire flat. It is also possible to use my bike.

The neighborhood is very central, but at the same time quiet and with a lot of trees. The high-rise building was built during East-German times. At that time the idea was to leave a lot of space between buildings for tress and relaxation. There are soccer and basketball fields and a number of playgrounds for kids very close-by.
* Shopping: There are numerous supermarkets in walking distance, including Biomarkt Karl-Marx-Alles (next to entrance of U Strausberger Platz), Netto and Edeka Supermarkets in Schillingstrasse (400m on the way to U+S Jannowitzbruecke), Shopping Center Alexa in Alexanderstrasse (700m with Reichelt Supermarket, Mediamarkt, Zara, Shoes, Clothes etc.).
* Restaurants: In walking distance are Cafe Moskau, Kino International, Eiscafe (U Schillingstrasse 500m), Chinese Restaurant (Strausberger Platz), Snacks: Doener Kebap and Pizza (S+U Jannowitzbruecke), more inexpensive snacks keep walking behind Jannowitzbruecke to Brueckenstrasse to eat Vietnamese, Turkish
host_about: I traveled a lot in Europe and Asia and apart from German speak a number of languages (more or less :-), among them English, French, and a bit Portuguese. I work in a marketing agency. I am always happy to meet Internationals.

name: Hip Room @  Neukoelln
description:
Hübsches, individuell eingerichtetes Gästezimmer
Ruhig gelegen in großzügiger Wohnung

The space
Das ca. 20 qm große Zimmer liegt in einer Wohnung im 1. Stock eines Seitenflügels am Karl-Marx-Platz in Neukölln. Die Wohnung verläuft über Seitenflügel und Vorderhaus, ist recht weitläufig und individuell geschnitten. Es ist mit einem 1,40 m breiten Doppelbett und Fernseher ausgestattet. Auf Wunsch kann ich noch ein zusätzliches aufblasbares Gästebett anbieten - das perfekte Zimmer für eine kleine Familie / Dreiergruppe.

Durch den großzügigen Grundriss (sehr langer Flur, Zimmer aufgeteilt in Seitenflügel und Vorderhaus etc.) ist Platz und Privatssphäre gegeben.
Das Zimmer, in dem ich schlafe liegt im Vorderhaus. Es ist jedoch auch möglich, dass ich während der Vermietung auswärts schlafe.

Das Apartment verfügt über eine voll ausgestattete Wohnküche inklusive Nespressomaschine, Kühlschrank, Toaster, Wasserkocher, Essig/Öl Gewürze und nat
neighborhood_overview: Der Richardkiez liegt direkt vor der Haustür mit zahlreichen neuen Bars, Cafes und Galerien. Am Mittwoch und Samsatg findet direkt vor der Haustür ein Markt statt, wo man sehr günstig Obst und Gemüse einkaufen kann. Weitere zahlreiche Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gibt es auf der Karl-Marx-Straße. Zu Fuß zu erreichen sind ebenfalls einige empfehlenswerte Kinos und ein wunderschönes Hallenbad.Außerdem liegt das ehemalige Flughafengelände - das Tempelhofer Feld -  sehr nahe und bietet genug Platz und beste Bedingungen für allerhand Sportarten (Kiten, Skaten, Radfahren, Jogging) und für einen weiten Blick mitten in der Hauptstadt.Der U Bahnhof Karl-Marx-Strasse ist in ca. 2 min fussläufig zu erreichen. Von dort seid ihr z.B. in 10 Minuten am Alexanderplatz.
host_about:
Yvonne is a studied historian and works since several years as an 
self-employed project manager in the international event industry.

Tom is a nurse and grew up in Paris. He just moved recently to Berlin.

We can't live without:
- music
- good food
- beloved people around us.

We love to travel and meet new people.

name: Bright and Spacious, Kollwitzplatz
description:
Our entire apartment is on offer in our absence. Come in, have a look around, make yourself comfortable, we are happy to host you!

The space
What we have to offer you is this lovely spacious 140 sq. m., two-bedroom Berlin apartment in the well-known Kollwitzplatz area in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin. Enjoy the lively shopping and eating atmosphere, at the same time the peacefulness of this neighbourhood and the sycamore tree lined Kollwitzstr. with its wide sidewalks.

The apartment is located on the fourth floor of a building built in the 1870s and refurbished in 2002. Hanno + Zaki moved in right after. Their daughter Suraya joined them in 2006. Suraya is a well-travelled girl and is very used to being a host herself.

The bedrooms are large, each about 20 sq. m. The first bedroom in the side wing, facing south-east, has two single beds, each 90 x 200. It has a small balcony. The second bedrrom has a double 140 x 200 bed, and is on the front side
neighborhood_overview: There are restaurants and cafes, public squares with playgrounds. On Saturdays, the Kollwitzplatz market boasts a range of exquisite stands, that offer fine foods, organic fruits and vegetables, handmade wares and much more. A highlight here is a stand specialisng in a finer version of the renowned Berliner Currywurst. On Thursdays, the Kollwitzplatz organic market offers a smaller selection, which nevertheless covers all your needs. The well-known flea market, open on Sundays, at the Mauer Park is also walking distance.
host_about:
HaZaSu is Hanno, Zaki and Suraya. We, Hanno and Zaki, are media professionals. We both teach media and develop our own projects, very often with our 12-year-old daughter Suraya. 

We love to travel for work and to visit friends elsewhere on this earth. Suraya has been on the move since she was six months, accompanying us when we are researching and working. 

It has been a wonderful experience getting to know so many people from around the world. We are good at figuring out how much privacy or support our guests wish for.

name: Welcome Home, welcome to Kant Strasse 63
description:
Our spacious, warm, fully-equipped, and extremely well-connected central Berlin apartment offers an oasis of calm and period charm in this exciting and vibrant city. Its back courtyard location guarantees a good nights sleep in either the spacious master bedroom or our other bedroom with two single beds. The living room sofa can also be pulled out if you need it, and there is a baby bed. Free Wifi, large kitchen and bathroom, washer / drier, and lovely living / dining room. You will love it.

The space
The 19th century apartment has high ceilings throughout (3m) and period features. Its dual aspect means it is always light and airy, and the fact that it sits between the front courtyard and rear courtyard means it is peaceful and secure. There is loads of storage space for your luggage, books, games, and DVDs, and for the kids there is a great ice-cream shop very near. There are many local amenities including restaurants to suit all pockets, supermarkets, quirky f
neighborhood_overview: One of the most elegant districts in Berlin, Charlottenburg exudes old-world glamour. Named after Queen Charlotte of Prussia, it is stuffed with French-influenced architecture, stylish and ethnic / street food restaurants and cafes to suit all tastes and budgets, shopping streets, theatres, museums and peaceful parks. The area has always attracted Berliners and tourists, from celebrities, artists, and politicians who haunt the famous Paris Bar, to today's young families who have made the area their home. The iconic Kurfürstendamm - the Champs-Elysées of Berlin - runs parallel to Kant Strasse, and there is Charlottenburg Palace, the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial church, Schiller theatre, Deutsche Opera, the list goes on and on.
host_about: Hi, we love Berlin. Although we currently live in Switzerland there is  part of us that is always in Berlin. There is so much history, and so much that is contemporary too. You get the best of both worlds. So, whatever interests you the likelihood is that you ill find it in Berlin. We would love to welcome you to our home in Berlin. We hope you'll love it a much as we do.

name: Light & Beautiful design in Mitte!
description:
Welcome to a luxurious apartment in the best location in Berlin !
Classy and central, quiet with a balcony. Everything is at your doorstep- tourist attractions, art & culture, unique shopping and top restaurants.

The space
The flat is only three minutes away from Friedrichstrasse station with the best connections to BER Airport.

3 double bedrooms , 1 living room, a dining room with open plan kitchen, 2 bathrooms (one room has a bathtub and WC and the second one a shower cabinet and WC).

In a building dating back to 1836, this 140 sqm (1500 sqft) apartment is located on the 2nd floor. Easy to reach with an elevator and some stairs. Elegantly decorated, it mixes antique with modern furniture.
It is fully outfitted for your maximum comfort to ensure a wonderful stay ( dressers, linens, towels 2 per person, iron, hairdryer, fully equipped kitchen, washing machine and wireless internet and central heating).

The apartment
neighborhood_overview:
This part of Mitte is one of the best locations from which to discover Berlin. The surrounding area with great shopping, restaurants. Many different sides of Berlin converge in this area where tourists, students, government officials, creative professionals, old east Berliners, and new hipster imports mix, resulting in an exciting international feel.
The apartment is just a walk away from some of the most famous sightseeings in Berlin: Friedrichstr., BRANDENBURG GATE, UNTER DEN LINDEN street, MUSEUMSINSEL (National galerie, Pergamom Museum, Bode Museum), HUMBOLDT UNIVERSITY, Theater (Berliner Ensemble, Deutsches Theater, Friedrichstadt Palast).

host_about:
Hi there! I'm a Dutch guy who lives in Berlin since 10 years already. I feel very much at home here at can tell you a lot about the city. I studied history as well as historical and modern linguistics. Now I work in a company that offers educational materials to teachers.

I like to travel a lot. In recent years I have mostly been in Eastern Europe, the former Soviet Union, North Africa and the Middle East, but I like to have seen all of the world by the end of my life. When I'm travelling, I  enjoy it to stay with local people. As such, I also like to welcome travellers in Berlin. If you need any advice, just ask! I am there to help.

I like to read, play boardgames, go to the gym, do some self-study (mostly languages) and just enjoy my life at the fullest.

neighborhood_overview:
Home of this pretty accommodation is Friedrichshain, one of the central districs in Berlin, surrounded by Prenzlauer Berg, Mitte and Kreuzberg.
Friedrichshain distinguishes himself as a student and artist district by its young and creative activities. Primarily due to the numerous bars, cafes, restaurants, galleries, theaters and cultural institutions with many really cheap small meal occasions with specialties from around the world.
In addition, there's the spectacular collection of Berlin's best clubs, which are in large part all within walking distance. Because in 200 meters distance, among other things, there is the Berghain / Panorama Bar, which was chosen not only by the New York Times as the "best club in the world".

name: Nice cozy room in Berlin Schoeneberg
description:
Centrally big room in typical Berlin old building surrounded by a lovely neighborhood. To catch up with the berlin lifestyle there is a very good public transport connection. Shopping possibilities are close and a supermarket which is open daily (except for sundays).

The space
The apartment is located in the district Schoeneberg just next to the circular line between the stops S Schöneberg and S+U Innsbrucker Platz. The flat itself is a flat share with my sister.
As I will be travelling, you guys will stay in my room during your reservation period. The room is spacious and bright with sprinkles of sun coming through during the mid-morning time. There is a proper bed for 2 to sleep in.
Additionally, you have a self-made and cozy couch to mingle on after a long day. And if you feel like you also can watch TV.

Guest access

host_about:
Hey everyone, 
my name is Chantal and I am a mechanical engineering student from Berlin, Germany. I am an open-minded, nice and tidy person to have around who loves to meet new people with different cultural background. This had already started when I was quite young since my parents used to travel around with me a lot. Which was also the beginning of my travel addiction and longing for more of getting to know different cultures. 
Besides travelling, I love to do various sports starting from kickboxing to table tennis over to football. Though at the moment I am focussing rather on kickboxing. During the rest of my freetime, I love to hang around with friends and discover new places in my city, as well as going to the movies and reading.

My motto in life: Respect every single person and treat them as you want to be treated yourself.

I am looking forward to stay with you. 
Best regs, Chantal

description:
Unsere bezaubernde, sonnendurchflutete und ruhige Wohnung, liegt absolut zentru(website hidden)ah. In unserer Straße gibt es viele Cafés, kleine Geschäfte, Restaurants und alles was man zum Leben braucht. In zehn Minuten ist man am Alexanderplatz.

The space
Die Wohnung liegt sonnig und ruhig im vierten Stock eines Jugenstilhauses. Wer das Alte und Originale liebt kommt in dieser Wohnung auf seine Kosten. Die Wohnung hat keinen Fahrstuhl. Das Bett ist ein Hochbett und man kommt über eine steile Treppe hoch. Was für viele über siebzig Jährige kein Thema war.

Die Gäste haben alles in ihrer kleinen Wohnung was sie brauchen, außer einem Fernseher und einer Spülmaschine, ansonsten ist alles da.

Handtücher sind vorhanden.

name: THE HACKESCHER MARKT 07
description:
NEW! Top quality one bedroom apartment with a view of the Fernsehturm (TV tower)! Free Wifi!The apartment is situated in the seventh floor of a prestigious building and offers a very large, light living room with an kitchena;bathroom with a bath

The space
Top quality one bedroom apartment (approx. 60m2) with Wifi and SAT-TV. The apartment is situated in the sixth floor of a prestigious building and offers a very large and light living room with an open, modern kitchen, a bright, spacious hallway, and a quality bathroom, equipped with a shower.
It is sunny and quiet, with a view of Berlin’s famous Fernsehturm!

Check In only to 21.00 possible.

Guest access
The living room is furnished with a double bed, a sofa bed, a coffee table, two armchairs, a cupboard, and a TV.
A fully outfitted kitchen is at the guests’ disposal, including an electric stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, coffee machine, and a dining area, bed linen an
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is centrally located, situated right next to Hackeschen Markt.
The local neighbourhood is a renowned nightlife and cultural quarter with numerous recreational offerings, including cafés, bars, clubs, cinemas, galleries, and many more. There are also supermarkets and green spaces nearby.
The apartment can be reached from the central train station (Hauptbahnhof) in ten minutes and Tegel airport is just 30-40 minutes away.
Berlin’s major tourist attractions are also handily located, with Alexanderplatz and the TV tower, Museum Island, the Brandenburger Tor, and the Reichstag all within easy walking distance.

name: Käthe Berlin
description:
Ruhiges 2-Zimmer-Apartment mit Balkon in Prenzlauer Berg / Bötzowviertel. Perfekt für Familien und Geschäftsreisende. Die Wohnung liegt im ersten Oberschoss im Seitenflügel eines Altbaus. Von der Großstadt hört man fast nichts, trotzdem sehr zentral.

The space
Die Wohnung liegt im ersten Obergeschoss eines Altbaus von 1905, hohe Decken, Stuck im großen Zimmer - man fühlt sich sofort wohl. Wenn wir die Wohnung gerade selbst nicht nutzen, weil wir arbeiten müssen, dürfen Verwandte und Freunde kurze Zeit drin wohnen. Unsere Wohnung ist sehr ruhig, obwohl sie sehr zentral im Bötzowviertel/Prenzlauer Berg liegt. Sie hat einen Balkon, den man von der Küche aus betreten kann.

Guest access
Zugang zu allen Bereichen der Wohnung. Im Hof gibt es einen kleinen Sandkasten.
neighborhood_overview: Der Vorteil dieses Stadtteils: sehr nah am großen Volkspark Friedrichshain, zum Erholen - allein oder mit Familie. Sehr nah am Alexanderplatz und am Kollwitzviertel. Bei uns im Bötzowviertel gibt es sehr viele Cafés und gute Restaurants - zur sehr guten Preisen. Wir empfehlen das Café "la tazza" in der Hufelandstr. 18 zum Frühstücken - nett ist aber auch das "Tous les jours" in der Hufeland - Ecke Esmarchstr.
host_about: Wir sind Freiberufler und daher viel unterwegs zum Arbeiten. Damit unsere Wohnung in dieser Zeit nicht leer steht, überlassen wir sie gern freundlichen Berlin-Erkundern :-)

name: Familienfreundliche Traumwohnung
description:
Unsere Wohnung hat viel Platz für zwei Erwachsene und bis zu drei Kinder. Die Küche ist groß und bestens ausgestattet.
Die Wohnung liegt direkt an der Bernauer Straße, der Mauerpark ist in zwei Minuten zu erreichen. Beste Nahverkehrsanbindung!

The space
Die Wohnung ist ideal für anspruchsvolle Familien mit (2-3) Kindern. In den drei Schlafzimmern ist viel Platz für zwei Erwachsene und drei Kinder. Der Wohnbereich (Küche und Wohnzimmer) ist großzügig geschnitten, dank einer großen Fensterfront lichtdurchflutet und lädt zum gemeinsamen Essen ebenso wie zum Entspannen ein. Der Fußboden ist aus Eichenparkett, die Fenster sind stark schallgeschützt, so das die Straße kaum zu hören ist. In den drei Schlafzimmer sorgen außerdem blickdicht Vorhänge und gute Betten mit Qualitätsmatratzen für eine entspannte Nachtruhe. Es gibt zwei Bäder, eine mit Bidet und Dusche, das andere mit Badewanne. Die Ausstattung der Wohnung und insbesondere ist modern und sehr hochwertig.
neighborhood_overview:
Die Wohnung liegt in Berlin Mitte genau an der Grenze zum Prenzlauer Berg und zum Wedding. Im Nachbarhaus befindet sich ein Bäcker (inkl. einer kleinen Auswahl an Artikel des täglichen Gebrauchs), in unmittelbarer bieten verschiedene Supermärkte (ein Bio-Markt, ein Kaisers und ein Discounter) ideale Möglichkeiten zur Selbstversorgung.
Mitte/Prenzlauer sind zwei der In-Bezirke Berlins. Es gibt unzählige Bars, Restaurants und Cafés sowie zig Shoppingmöglichkeiten in den nahe gelegenen Kastanienallee und Oderberger Straße.

name: Quiet and bright in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Be my welcomed guest, in a cozy vintage style apartment - in the heart of Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg. (Pre East-Germany)

If you're looking for a nice and quiet place with some good sleep - you are at the right address. The building is a typical house from the Gründerzeit era. You will rent a cozy, bright and high-ceiling room, in a two-room apartment. The room has its own balcony, a large bed and all necessary facilities to feel homey and comfortable.

The space
The apartment is situated in the back building of a nice, clean and safe neighborhood. The really good public transport connection here a is a huge benefit, as two Tram-Stations are just around the house. A Train- and Subway-Station is in 5 min walking distance. Prime locations like Mauerpark or one of the most beautiful shopping and restaurant alleys are reachable just by walking.

I am an easygoing person who knows the city with its bar and restaurant culture quiet good - just hit me up
host_about: I'm an easygoing, openminded guy who lives since 10 years in Berlin and loves to travel.

name: Villa Hühnchen
description:
Die Ferienwohnung in separatem Haus bietet
Schlafgelegenheit für 3 Personen, Gemütlichkeit und Muße zum genüsslichen Essen in einer Küche mit Blick ins Freie, viel Ruhe und kleiner Sitzgelegenheit im überdachten Eingangsbereich.
Dusche und WC sind vorhanden. Fahrräder können im nahegelegenen Geschäft gemietet werden.
Villa Hühnchen ist ein Sommerhaus - ist also in den Wintermonaten nicht zu vermieten.
Wir wohnen im Vorderhaus.

The space
Villa Hühnchen liegt an einem idyllischen See im Südosten Berlins, umgeben von Wäldern.
So kann man wunderbar die Stadtentdeckung mit aktiver oder passiver Erholung in der Natur verbinden. Schwimmen am Morgen, Radfahren, Windsurfen, Boot fahren oder einfach nur am nahegelegenen Strand ruhen, Wald schnuppern und Vögel beobachten - hier kann man Luft holen und Kraft sammeln, um die vielen Erlebnisse, die Berlin bietet, in vollem Umfang zu genießen. Die Straßenbahn 68 (laut "400 Reisen, die Sie nie vergessen
neighborhood_overview: Das Haus liegt in Wasser- und Waldnähe, man ist aber auch schnell und einfach in der Stadt. Auch nachts gut erreichbar mit Nachtbussen.

name: In the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Hey,
the flat is just a 2 min walk to Kottbusser Tor and you have a lot of beautiful spots near by (water, parks, lots of bars & shops) & with the metro it's just three stations to Friedrichshain and 4 to Alexanderplatz.

The space

name: The best of Berlin !
description:
Located 150m from the Spree river, in a quiet neighborhood between the hype and busy districts of Friedrichshain and Kreuzberg, my fully-equipped studio accommodates 2 (plus 2 occasional guests).
Entirely renovated in 2014 with design furniture.
You will love the place !

Note : as a general rule, minimum 3 months stay (hence the small number of reviews). Ideally 6-12 months since I like to enjoy this flat self from time to time. Ideal for executives.

The space
I have put all my heart in the renovation and furniture of this flat, so that your stay in Berlin will be as cosy and pleasant as possible.

Guest access
Guests have access to the whole flat.

Other things to note
There is a digital piano for those of you who would like to play during their stay.
neighborhood_overview:
In 2 minutes you are enjoying a walk by the Spree with a nice view on Oberbaum bridge, or having lunch in one of the restaurants nearby.
In 10 minutes you have crossed the bridge and you are having a cocktail or a beer in a Kreuzberg bar.
In 15 minutes you are downtown Mitte doing some shopping in a fashion shop !
host_about:
I am a French engineer and composer living in Paris. 

A lover of Berlin and Montpellier, I own flats in these two cities. 
In Berlin I enjoy the cultural and night life of the city. 
In Montpellier, the quality of life in the historical center, that I experienced personally during the Covid lockdowns, the amazing light and the sea just a few minutes away. 

I have developed a passion for mixology that translated into a certification in 2019 and I love sharing my experience with friends. Can anything bring people together better than drinks ?

name: Lovely Home with 2 balconies
description:
A beautiful location, bright apartment, 2 balconies and a charming atmosphere, what more do you want! I am more than happy to offer you a 3-room apartment where you can relax and feel at home.

The space
In the heart of Berlin, you can feel at home in a cozy and a stylishly furnished atmosphere. This charming 861 ft² large apartment with its two bedrooms, a living room/ bedroom, two spacious balconies, a bright bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen offers you an opportunity to relax and enjoy your stay to the full.
The larger bedroom is equipped with a comfortable double bed. Both the smaller bedroom and the living room are equipped with a comfortable convertible sofa. You have access to the larger balcony from both bedrooms. Here you can start the day with a huge breakfast surrounded by the entire family. Every single room has been passionately furnished with great attention to detail to enable a fantastic stay.

neighborhood_overview: The Mitte district is one of the most versatile and most popular area in town. This is where various cultural facilities and entertainment offers are interwoven. The apartment, situated in a quiet side street with an excellent connection to main roads, is located in a charming area. Not only is the apartment bright on sunny days, but the location is also a hub for a number of leisure offers. Have breakfast as in Paris, eat ice-cream as in Mailand or just enjoy a wonderful dinner, all of that you can find in close proximity. Within walking distance you'll find restaurants (Italian, Indian Mexican, plain cooking...), bars, galleries and cafés. And everything else is a few minutes away by public transport.
host_about:
Ich liebe es zu viel Schokolade zu essen, unbeschreibliche Orte zu entdecken, wie ein Wasserfall zu weinen wenn ich filme schau und jederzeit laut zu lachen. 
Glücklichkeitsformel:
Reisen und dabei die Welt entdecken, mit der Familie so viel zeit wie möglich verbringen, den Luxus Freunde zu haben die mit mir das Leben teilen.
Da ich nicht so oft die Möglichkeit bekomme zu verreisen macht es mir um so mehr Spaß ein Airbnb Gastgeber zu sein. Ich finde es super neue Leute kennen zulernen. Es gibt einen das Gefühl, auch ohne seinen Standort zu verlassen, ein Stückchen mehr von der Welt zu sehen.  Ich freue mich darauf dich kennen zu lernen!

name: Quiet, yet centrally located studio >3months
description:
Cosy Appartment only for students or professionals in scenic Neukölln with modern bathroom, nicely equipped kitchen & large double bed handmade from wood provides the best way to rest after conquering lovely Tempelhof airport or amazing galleries, shops & art cafes.

The space
A new renovated single room apartment for two at the 2nd floor (no elevator) in an old house from 1910 combines the 'good old handmade quality' (bed & tables are without any plastic handmade from a carpenter) with modern comfort. View in a green backyard, curtains & rolls to darken the space, fully equipped kitchen & bathroom & flatscreen. The screen can, however, be connected to the PC via a cable. A comfortable armchair, big table & 2 chairs allow you to feel at home and cupboard & wardrobe will be happy to take care of your stuff while you are exploring the city.
Unfortunately there is no space for a washing machine in the apartment. Laundromats: Schnell & Sauber in Karl-Marx-Str
neighborhood_overview: Neukölln- the place to be! Freedom of style & being, where trends are born & contemporary art is developed every second. A area to party crazily but also to enjoy the change in our world by many different projects as urban gardening, up cycling, painting, self-made vegan bio food...creativity in every possible shape. Relax on great Tempelhof Flughafenfeld or explore many little streets around, 2nd hand shops, best turkish food, street music, little galleries & cafes.
host_about: Ich liebe meine Familie & meinen Garten, wo ich mich entspannen kann. Ich lese viel, gehe gerne wandern, segeln & tanzen. Beruflich beschäftige ich mich mit dem Einrichten von Wohnungen, baue Holzmöbel und schneidere.

host_about:
Ich will keine Geschäfte mit der Vermietung von Wohnraum machen. Aber wenn ich im Urlaub bin, finde ich es eine gute Idee, meine Wohnung zum Selbstkostenpreis zu vermieten. Auf diese Weise hoffe ich in meinem Urlaub auch auf Menschen zu stossen, die mir ihre Wohnung zu ähnlichen Bedingungen überlassen. In diesem Sinne finde ich das Konzept wunderbar. 
Leider hat die kommerzielle Vermietung hier in Berlin mit vielen negativen Folgen für die Mietpreise überhand genommen.

I will not do business with the rental of housing. But when I'm on vacation, I think it's a good idea to rent my apartment for the same price I have to pay for in a non-profit-manner. In this way I hope to meet people here who leave me their apartment on similar terms, when I go on holiday. In this sense, I think the concept could be wonderful.
Unfortunately, the commercial rental got out of control here in Berlin with many negative consequences for people who live here.

name: Cozy apartment in Weißensee
description:
The apartment is just a step away from Alexanderplatz and it's really good connected thanks to the tram service (M2,M13,12) with the discricts of Mitte, Friedrichschain, Prenz'l Berg e Pankow.

Nearby the are also many parks and lakes.

The space
This is a 4-room apartment located centrally in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg/Weißensee near to various parks and lakes (Strandbad Weißensee).


The apartment was renovated and furnished in 2013.
It is on the third floor of an old building that will be soon renovate.

The flat can accommodate 4 people.
The living room has a kitchen equipped with induction hob, fridge with freezer and washing machine.
Dish towels, crockery, cutlery and mokka for coffee are also provided.

The corner sofa turns out a queen size bed (152cm x 203cm).

The wardrobe offers plenty of space for all the clothes.

There is also a small table(4 people) that can be extended.
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is situated in a great and strategic location.
It is in a really quiet and peaceful area but just outside the busy city that can easily be reached with the tram connections.
A 5 minutes walk takes you to the M2 stop which will take you to Alexanderplatz (Mitte) in 10 minutes.
Closer there are also the M13 and the 12.
The M13 can take you either to Warschauer Straße (Friedrichshain) or to Virchow-Klinikum (Wedding). The 12 goes from Pasedagplatz (Weißensee) to Mitte through Prenzlauer Berg.

Only 5 stops away with the M13 there is Strandbad Weißensee a nice lake for swimming in the summer. Check it out (website hidden)

Also many supermarkets surround the area.

name: Classy flat in the center of Berlin
description:
I offer my lovely designed flat with a buetiful view over the green "Görlitzer Park".
The 75 m2 flat is located in the heard of "Kreuzberg" and surrounded by a plenty of restaurants, design shops and also historical places like east side gallery!

The space
The flat was refurbished one year ago and is furnished in a mix of classical design and vintage. It's located in the 3rd floor so you can directly look over the treetop of the park.

Guest access
You can use the big living and sleeping room with the park view, the open living-kitchen area and of cause the bathroom. The small room in the back woun't be accessible.

My house is like a green oasis in this lively sourounding. Spots like east side gallery and the Oberbaumbrücke are directly next to my place.

name: Big, bright, cosy room in Neukölln
description:
I'm subletting my big, bright and cosy room in one of the nicest area in Berlin (Neukölln) in a street with a cool coffee place and a beautiful alley tree.
The flat is nice and clean and has a bath with bathtub, a comfortable kitchen and a balcony!

The space
The room is very nice as it is big and has two windows, so that it is always very bright and sunny and it even has a balcony! It is a very cosy room.
The kitchen is smaller but cosy to cook or have breakfast in the sun, as it shines in the kitchen in the morning, and the bath has a bathtub and a back-window.

The flat is shared with another roommate, who is a very friendly and agreable girl to live with.
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is situated in Neukölln, one of the hip area of Berlin. It is located exactly between the subway station 'Leinestraße' from the U8 line, and the subway and Sbahn station 'Hermannstraße', so that you quickly have access to the U8 and the so called 'Ringbahn', which is very practical.
There are lots of nice cafés and bars in the neighborhood - and one in front of the house! The Warthestraße is a very nice street, as it is big, has an alley of beautiful trees, but is still very quiet.
From the flat one can access the Tempelhof in a quick walk, which makes the area very agreable.
host_about: Hi! My name is Jordane, I'm french and currently studying art history and working in Berlin. I'm subletting my lovely room and look forward to hear from you!

The room is very large ( 23 sm), has a large antique wardrobe, king size bed (180cm x200cm), and fresh 100% cotton bedlinen and towels. All bedding is from the White Company, London.
It can be a bit noisy on the weekend, because it is on a main road, 1 min walking distance from the tube/U-bahn station.

In unserer gemütlichen Wohnung befindet Ihr Euch mitten im Herz von Kreuzberg - und geniesst trotzdem absolute Ruhe zum auftanken und zurückziehen.

Die Wohnung liegt direkt am Landwehrkanal - am beliebten Paul-Lincke-Ufer, und es sind auch nur 5 min zu Fuß entfernt vom beliebten Kiez "Kreuzköln". Wer Kreuzberg erleben will ist hier in der absoluten Traumlage - beliebte Plätze gibt es überall rundherum zu entdecken, Restaurants, Shops und Boutiquen und auch das Nachtleben liegt Ihnen hier direkt zu Füßen. name: DESIGN-APT IN HIP CENTRAL LOCATION
description:
Live right in the center the action - in the middle of hip Friedrichshain. In a newly renovated, cozy and comfortable design-apartment. Excellent access to public transport: 10 meters to the bus, 10min to S- and U-Bahns. Exceptional food & drink options (the best in Berlin!) 100+ bars, restaurants, beautiful cozy cafes, music bars and clubs close by! No to mention the beautiful Boxhagener Platz (100m down the street) with beautiful Saturday farmers market and Sunday flea market.

The space
The apartment is newly renovated with all the amenities, stylish designed, with wooden plank flooring, highest quality furniture (Nuts & Woods) and a lovely Smeg fridge. Located on the first floor in the absolutely quiet! backyard of the building.

The place is hidden in the quiet backyard with trees, so although you are right in the middle of one of the liveliest areas in Berlin it's always quiet in the apartment. No noisy neighbours as well. There are trees on both s
neighborhood_overview:
This cozy nest is right in one of the most vibing places in Berlin.
There are lots of restaurants and bars right on your doorstep e.g. Simon-Dach-Strasse & Boxhagener Platz - some of literally the best bars in Berlin are just next door! World renowned clubs like Berghain and Watergate are within 10min walking distance!! Same walking distance to many other clubs and bars near Warschauerstrasse (Suicide Circus, Chalet and, a little further, all of Kreuzberg).
There is great Brunches right next door on Sundays, and many restaurants and very good fast food places otherwise.
It's 4 subway stations from Alexanderplatz; 10 min walk to the Berlin wall and the Spree river full of beachbars.
There is a super Market IN the house, you can literally get your shopping done in your pyjamas! There is also a big Kaisers supermarket within walking distance which is open 24h and 2 Bio Supermarketes even closer! Every Saturday there is a big lovely farmers Market on Boxhagener Platz (
host_about: I usually live and work in Berlin, but travel around a lot too. I've been in love with the city for almost 3 years now, and moved places in Berlin at least 5 times. So I've been seeing and getting to know many nice areas in the process. Settled down in the heart of Friedrichshain now, and had a lot of fun designing this apartment.

name: 17. Floor - Apartment with a view
description:
This vacation apartment in the center of the city offers a bright, open, and youthful ambiance for your stay in Berlin. And all that in an unbelievably good location:
From the balcony, you look directly towards the TV Tower, the Berliner Dom, and Museum Island.

The space
All the sights of the city center of Berlin are within walking distance of your door. Everything for a comfortable vacation to the capital is available within these 164 sq. feet. The apartment includes two rooms, one room is set up as a classic bedroom (bed size 63 in x 78.75 in), the other as a living room with a sleeper couch, an eating area, and in the second room is an open pantry kitchen.
The kitchen is completely set up (refrigerator, stove, toaster, coffee machine, kettle) - the bathroom is equipped with a shower and bathtub.
Geographically and in access to public transit, you are in exactly at the middle of the city, Stadtmitte: this U-Bahn station for the lines 2 and 6
neighborhood_overview: The central location and connection to the public transit network are unbeatable. Both the Tiergarten and the shopping malls are easily reached on foot.
host_about: Ich arbeite als Kulturwissenschaftler in einem Projekt der Gedenkstätte Berlin -Hohenschönhausen, dem ehemaligen Untersuchsgefängnis der DDR-Staatssicherheit. Innerhalb der Woche bin ich in Berlin, an den Wochenenden kann ich mein Apartment an interessierte Berlin-Besucher vermieten. Wie man sich denken kann, begeistert mich Geschichte und Kultur der Menschheit, natürlich auch ausserhalb Europas.

name: Zimmer, Bad und Küche in Berlin-Friedenau
description:
Wir bieten Dir ein wunderschönes Zimmer in Berlin Friedenau!
S und U-Bahn Stationen sind in der Nähe. Die Schloßstraße in Steglitz ist fußläufig zu erreichen. Das Zimmer ist im Seitenflügel gelegen, sehr ruhig. Es hat einen kleinen Balkon und ist voll eingerichtet. Es ist das Zimmer unseres Teenie-Sohnes, der nun ausgezogen ist. Daher sind noch einige Klamotten hier verstaut, sollte aber nicht stören.
Das 140cm breite Bett ist ein Hochbett.
Das Bad und Küche dazu ist auf dem neusten Stand.

Johannisthal ist ein Ortsteil im Bezirk Treptow-Köpenick von Berlin.Treptow-Köpenick ist der größte Bezirk und mit 12,8% Wasserfläche auch das größte Wassersport- und -freizeitparadies Berlins. Mit fast 20 km Spree, der Dahme und Kanälen hat die Region über 150 km befahrbare Wasserwege und ein reiches Angebot für Gäste auf und am Wasser.
Hier ist Berlin besonders grün.
Ein Paradies für Walker, Wanderer und Radfahrer ist das größte Waldgebiet Berlins mit den Müggelbergen am Müggelsee.

name: Schönes Balkonzimmer am Park für Langzeitbuchung
description:
Für Langzeitbuchungen ab 3 Monaten: Schönes helles 24qm Balkonzimmer in Friedrichshain/Lichtenberg (genau an der Grenze) im gepflegten Altbau in toller Lage mit schönem Park vor der Haustür. Grün, ruhig, zentral mit guter Infrastruktur und super Anbindung an öffentliche Verkehrsmittel ( einschl. Ringbahn)- auch für Geschäftsreisende geeignet (Mit der U-Bahn ohne Umsteigen in 20 Minuten am Hauptbahnhof) Vor der Buchung bitte über Stornierungsrichtlinien informieren!

The space
Das 24 qm Altbauzimmer hat einen eigenen kleinen Balkon mit Blick auf den begrünten Hinterhof, ein breites Hochbett ( 180x 220m), einen begehbaren Kleiderschrank, Regale, eine ausziehbare Couch, die auch zum Schlafen genutzt werden kann. Schrank, Schreibtisch, einen Smart TV, der auch als Display für den Laptop genutzt werden kann. Schnelles WLAN. Das Zimmer ist auch für Geschäftsreisende gut geeignet.


Die Wohnung liegt am Rand von Friedrichshain in einem denkmalgeschütz
neighborhood_overview: Diese grüne Ecke gehört eigentlich schon zum Bezirk Lichtenberg aber sie befindet sich genau an der Grenze zu Friedrichshain wie auch zum Bezirk Prenzlauerberg. Eine kleine Oase, die selbst so manchen Berliner noch überrascht ebenso wie die Tatsache, dass man durch die U-Bahnanbindung von hier aus super fix in Mitte ist. Im Stadtpark Lichtenberg, in den man quasi fällt, wenn man das Haus verlässt, kann man spazieren, joggen, Fußball, Handball oder Tischtennis spielen, im Sommer grillen und im Winter können Kinder sogar rodeln. Auch einen  Kinderspielplatz gibt es.  Insgesamt ist es eine sehr ruhige, kinder- und familienfreundliche Wohngegend, die neben einer guten Infrastruktur auch viel interessantes zur DDR- Geschichte und ein bekanntes Kinder- und Jugendtheater  (Theater an der Parkaue) zu bieten hat.

name: Magnificent turn of century flat (legal)
description:
This magnificent turn-of-the-century flat with high ceilings ornaments wooden floors and luxury fitting is located in a trendy area right in the centre of the city. All amenities and public transport in walking distance. Just refurbished!!! This is one of the few legally approved Airbnbs in Berlin.

The space
Two bedroom flat, bathroom, kitchen and balcony overlooking green courtyard. Sleeps 6. Excellent connection to local transport for city west, Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte. Close to local bars, clubs and restaurants. Ideal inexspensive choice to explore.

The flat has been fully refurbished in July 2014. Both bedrooms have been redecorated, the wooden floors have been brought back to their shiny history, a brand new kitchen has been installed and the bathroom has been completely renewed including a rainforest shower now.

The flat comprises of a kitchen, bathroom and two bedrooms with 160x200cm double beds. Both bedrooms get a lot of light as
neighborhood_overview: The flat is only 50m from U+S Wedding station. So it has perfect transport connections to explore the entire city.
host_about: Hi, my name is Seb and I am from Berlin. I have travelled extensively all over the planet and so I think I know what I have to offer to make your stay in this great city a pleasant and unforgettable experience. The apartment has a large bedroom, dining area, full kitchen, bathroom with bath tub, and a balcony. The apartment faces a central garden courtyard that can be accessed from the balcony. name: SOUTERAIN / Terasse (Müggelsee/ Berlin-Köpenick)
description:
Herzlich Willkommen,
die Ferienwohnung mit Terasse liegt im grünen Berliner Stadtbezirk Köpenick. Fußläufig liegt der Müggelsee.
Falls die Souterainwhg. ausgebucht sein sollte, dann gibt es im gleichen Haus das LOFT mit TERASSE nahe MÜGGELSEE. Ich würde Sie auch dort gern empfangen :-)

The space
Die Wohnung hat 2 Schlafzimmer/ Wohnküche/ Bad und kann von bis zu vier Personen belegt werden (Achtung: das Bad ist klein/ geringe Deckenhöhe)! Der Hof steht komplett zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Um die Ecke befindet sich ein Supermarkt und die Bushaltestelle von Rahnsdorf.


The 2-room-apartment with kitchen, bathroom and terrace accomodates up to 4 people. Right around the corner there is a supermarket as well as the Rahnsdorf bus stop. The Berlin city centre is a 30 minutes drive away.

WEGBESCHREIBUNG:
S-Bahn S3 (Richtung Erkner ab Ostkreuz) bis Station RAHNSDORF. Dann Bus161 (Richtung Erkner) 3 Stationen. Mit dem Auto vom
neighborhood_overview:
Liebe Gäste :-),
hier hatten sich schon zu DDR-Zeiten die Künstler (besonders Musiker) niedergelassen.
Ein Spaziergang läd ein NEUVENEDIG kennenzulernen. Die Gegend ist durch kleine Kanäle und Brücken wie eine "Puppenstube" ;-). Im alten Fischerdorf von Berlin-Rahnsdorf legt eine Fähre an und ein öffentliches Linienschiff lässt Sie am Biergarten NEUHELGOLAND aussteigen.
Im Sommer mögen die Leute eine Fahrradtour um den Müggelsee.
host_about:
Ich bin Klavierlehrerin und wer in Berlin neben einem anstrengenden Stadtbesuch auch Ruhe & Erholung sucht, hat mit meinem Haus die richtige Wahl getroffen :-). 
Mein Lieblingsreiseziel ist Italien.

Sono maestra per pianoforte. Se tu cerchi non solamente una visita in centro, invece anche un posto calmo per il riposo, ti piace sicuro mia casa :-).
Io amo paese Italia.

description:
"Gardenroom" in a modern townhouse, located in the heart of Berlin in Mitte and Prenzlauerberg. The house is part of a community of 16 houses nestled on the former death strip of the Berlin Wall. It's central, cozy, modern and convenient. With a little garden.

The space
Independent Room (ca. 20 qm). A large window faces the garden overlooking a magnificent view of the Wall-Memorial park of divided Berlin. Little Garden.

Guest access
Separate entrance. Enjoy the little garden.

Other things to note
This little apartment is perfect for one person or couples. Very small basic bathroom: shower/toilet. Towels, shampoo, soap, minimalist Coffee Kitchen with a little fridge, dishes. Cozy Sleep- and Livingroom.
Our house is in the middle of a tourist hotspot!

neighborhood_overview:
Situated directly to the Wall-Memorial Museum and only a 15 Minute walk to the Museuminsel and the buzzing Hackescher Markt which is full of quirky and shops, bars and restaurants. The neighborhood is the perfect spot for visiting the city. There are several cafés and excellent restaurants within walking distance of our house...
In few minutes walking distance from our house you find the following attractions and things to do : Mauerpark, Prenzlauerberg, Kulturbrauerei, Zionskirche, Kastanienallee, Art Galleries at Auguststrasse and Linienstrasse, Weinbergpark, Friedrichstraße, Museum Island with the Neues and Altes Museum, Pergamonmuseum, Bodemueseum, Museum for Natural Sciences, Kollwitzplatz, and then literally hundreds of bars and restaurant, art galleries here and there.

Bötzowkiez — There’s not really much here for a typical tourist to Berlin, but if you’re looking for a place to stay that’s more local and relatively easy to reach via public transportation,

The "Akazien Residenz Apartment" is located directly in opposite of the Kaiser-Wilhelm-Passage, which offers plenty of shopping nearby. With numerous cafes, boutiques and greenery of Akazienkiez obvious attracts a varied audience to Schöneberg. Families and long-established residents feel at home in the quiet streets with cheap restaurants and small shops just as well as newly arrived students and tourists who want to take a look at the neighborhoods beyond Kreuzberg and Mitte.
The public transport network are well connected. Just 300 meters away is the S-Bahn station Julius-Leber-Brücke and 500 meters away the subway station Kleistpark.
Directly in front of the apartment also many bus lines that allow easy access to all interesting points and corners of the city.

nightlife in Schöneberg is known and loved for all tourists and berlin peoples.

name: Charmant und ruhig mitten in Berlin
description:
Berlin pur und erholsam! Meine Wohnung liegt im grünen, ruhigen, nach dem Mauerfall wiederbelebten und im Jugendstil sanierten "Bötzowkiez" im beliebten Prenzlauer Berg. Es gibt liebliche Geschäfte, Wochenend- und Supermarkt (auch Bio), Bars und viele kleine Restaurants mit internationaler Küche im Viertel und rundherum. Im nahegelegenen schönen Park gibt es extra Wege zum Joggen. Sie können alle Aktivitäten hier oder in der Nähe wahrnehmen (z.B. Sport, Kino, Tanzen, Fahrräder ausleihen usw.).

The space
Meine modern eingerichtete charmante 125qm-Wohnung liegt in der zweiten Etage im Vorderhaus (Beletage) in einer ruhigen Nebenstraße mit Bäumen. Es ist eine großzügige Berliner Altbauwohnung mit Jugendstilstuck an den Decken und dem typischen "Berliner Zimmer" als Schlafraum auf der Hofseite (Nord). Die Wohnräume sind auf der "Sonnenseite". Sie werden sich wohlfühlen!

Guest access
Die Wohnung ist nur von den gemeldeten Airbnb-Gästen zu nutze
neighborhood_overview: Wir haben eine ost- und westdeutsche, teils auch internationale Nachbarschaft. Unser Viertel und unsere Hausnachbarn sind freundlich, hilfsbereit und auch bemerkenswert ruhig, obwohl hier viele Familien mit Kindern wohnen.

name: Sunny and cosy Double Room Prenzl´B
description:
In the heart of pretty Prenzlauer Berg in our throbbing metropolis Berlin with all its cafes, bars, restaurants and fleemarkets you will find our lovely, cosy and bright flat super easily.
A large room delightfully decorated with a lot of details of from Latin Ameriya and the Middle East you can taste the charme of a young people´s Berlin lifestyle flat.
My friend Sophia and me we both love to host people from all over the world and share time for good conversations and maybe a glass of wine.

The space
The tastefully decorated double bedroom with big windows where you get sun the whole day, soft curtains to avoid the sun if you want to work in silence on our 2 meter wood desk or dress up for the evening with your clothes hanged up on the clothes rails, getting ready by the help of an mexican mirror, finding everything you need with our free wifi connection - you will find everything you need for a perfect and comfortable stay in Berlin.

Gu
neighborhood_overview:
Prenzlauer Berg is a very beautiful and nice quarter. It´s very friendly and family-orientated. There´s a lot of new and modern arquitecture next to old buildings from periode of promoterism. In the neighbour street´s you can find everything you want. Really. There are a lot of supermarkets, also bio-supermarkets, cute cafés and different restaurants from all over the world. The most beautiful ones are around "Helmholzplatz" and also close the "Mauerpark" which you can arrive easily by foot.
My favourite street is the very close "Oderberger Straße" between the "Kastanien Allee" and "Mauerpark".
There are a variety of lovely parks within walking distance. During the week but more on the weekend there are a lot of concerts, artists- and fleemarkets in the biggest park called "Mauerpark".
host_about:
I am a young architecture student appreciating and enjoying a free and open minded lifestyle in the metropolis Berlin. I love everything colorful and artistic and it´s always hard for me to decide only between two and three colours in my designs. I spend most of my money for traveling, living abroad and good food. I lived in Latin America and the Middle East and with every journey my room gets one more detail from abroad. 

When I travel I always try to stay with locals because meeting people and sharing ideas and thoughts are the experiences I remember in the future. I had a lot of wonderful experiences and I would love to share my hospitality with you :)

Loft conversion is converting non-residential spaces (most commonly warehouses, docks, former factories or water towers) into habitable homes. This form of loft conversion has its origins in the USA. This form of loft first became popular in the SoHo section of New York City during the 1960s. name: Stay with the cool cats in Kreuzberg
description:
Enjoy this stylish 94 m2 apartment - with your own, private bedroom and your own, private washroom. Relax in a fully equipped & recently renovated home, just a short walk from U-bahn 6 & 7. It is the ultimate base to explore Berlin.

The space
The apartment was redone and upgraded in 2013, including a new kitchen and two, separate washrooms. The electrical system is also completely new, with ridiculous amounts of power outlets in all rooms.

The place is modern, clean, fully equipped and has a very Scandinavian feel to it, with wooden floors, high ceiling, big windows and lots of daylight. Blinds will help you sleep in after a good night out, though :)

The place is tucked away in a very quiet street in an otherwise vibrant neighbourhood. You're sheltered from the usual cosmopolitan 24/7 noise, yet still you're just half a block away from the big city buzz.

The guest bedroom easily accommodates couples, with a big bed (200x220 cm), a
neighborhood_overview:
Stay within walking distance to the best that Berlin has to offer, but still sheltered from the busy main streets. Kreuzberg area 61 is a uniquely quiet place right in the middle of this fascinating German capital, littered with nice restaurants, cool bars and all those weird, little second hand shops you might like to spend some quality time in.

The apartment is situated just two blocks from the well-known Bergmannstrasse, "the main thoroughfare of genteel, stately Kreuzberg", as The New York Times puts it.

Welcome to one of the most happening parts of the city, young and trendy, old and traditional.
host_about:
Hello there, stranger :) 

I firmly believe you choose AirBnb because you want a genuine experience; a stay with that extra something that hotels just can't provide. That extra something I aim to deliver. It can be local knowledge, a trip around the blocks, someone to help you plan your trip before you're here, a host that may recommend and book tables or places, or in other ways improve your stay. I'm here to help, and I want you to have a great time, whatever that entails, or means to you.

I'm a Norwegian journalist - and a freelance foreign correspondent - currently commuting between work in Oslo, Norway and spare time in Berlin, Germany. I've been travelling alone for years - on several continents - and hopefully you'll benefit from my experiences. I do believe I know a few things about what a traveller appreciates on the road. 

I love cooking; healthy, vegetarian or not, Norwegian seafood, anything that might tickle the taste buds. I read Spanish, German and Scandinavian languages too, but please allow me to reply to your message in English :)

I'm looking forward to hear from you. Welcome you are!

Cheers,
Thor

name: Quiet and lovely in central Berlin
description:
Welcome Berlin visitors! I offer my spacious and quiet and light 2-room flat right in Berlin Mitte. It is very centrally located, so you'll get anywhere very quickly - at home you'll have enough space and quietness to relax.

The space
The flat is in one of those typical Berlin Altbau-buildings, constructed around 100 years ago, so it has high ceilings and huge windows, which makes it very light. You'll have a living room and a bedroom (bed of 145x200cm) for you. 55 sqm in sum. It is in the rear building, so as soon as you close the doors, it'll be super quiet. 3rd floor without lift.

However you can quickly jump into the lively atmosphere of Berlin Mitte. The flat is very centrally located, at the end of Friedrichstraße at the crossroad with Torstraße. Some of the most famous sights are in walking distance (Museum island 10 minutes, Brandenburg Gate 20 minutes...)
A small supermarket is downstairs at the street. Nearby are tons and tons of restau
neighborhood_overview: It's very lively and always changing. Hipster and art crowd together with old Berliners - in short: a unique mix.
host_about:
As an open-minded, passionate traveller myself, having also spent some longer time abroad (France and Colombia), I love meeting and hosting people from all over the world.
I enjoy living in Berlin very much - my hometown being Munich - so it is my pleasure to share tips and advice about what to see and explore in the city.

Die Wohnung bietet alles was man braucht. Ideal für ein Pärchen, aber auch für bis zu 4 Freunde.
2 seperate Zimmer mit Doppelbett und einer Schlafcouch

The space
Die Wohnung befindet sich im 4.Stock und ist daher schön hell. Das Schlafzimmer hat ein großes Doppelbett und Zugang zum Balkon. Im Wohnzimmer gibt es eine Schlafcouch zum Ausziehen. Es gibt also Platz für bis zu 4 Personen.

name: Modern Central Studio Work/Study/Play
description:
A modern uncluttered studio situated in one of the best areas in Berlin. Super large windows allow natural light into most of the apartment. Mitte area has a buzz and is rich in history with good transport access. Key Berlin monuments are within easy reach such as the Berlin Wall and the Brandenburg Gate.

Short term let registered for the new Berlin law.

The space
A former renovated East Berlin building contains this architect designed studio apartment that sleeps two guests in one bed. One extra single bed is available on request if two guests cannot sleep in the same bed. It is fully furnished and equipped with plenty of storage space.

A window with a balcony rail allows you to "people watch" below from the kitchen and dining area. It is situated above a coffee shop. This massive soundproof window can be left closed for complete calm or open it to get the sounds of this exciting city. There is an invisible roll up insect net for
neighborhood_overview:
There are a variety of restaurants and bars in the immediate area and two supermarkets within a five minute walk. In the summer, take a river trip or in the festive season visit one of the many Christmas Markets. The nearby outdoor Berlin Wall exhibits are interactive, and remember you can only book your Reichstag viewing area trip on the internet in advance. It is free.

Get on the river! There are a few boat companies that depart just near the bridge that goes from Mitte on the River Spree to Friederichstrasse Train Station.
host_about:
I like sport, travel and food especially champagne and curry.

"Always say what you want".

name: Ferienhaus - 20 Minuten in die City
description:
Zentral und doch ruhig. Haus auf 750 qm Grundstück mit 60 qm überdachter Terrasse.
U-Bahn nur 5 Minuten zu Fuß entfernt.

The space
Tolles Haus mit zwei separaten Schlafzimmern, jeweils 1 Doppelbett (1,60m x 2,20m), 1Wasserbett (1,80m x 2,00m) und ein Wohnzimmer mit einer ausziehbaren Schlafcouch (1,60m x 2,00m).
Alles wurde 2011 neu fertiggestellt. Dazu gibt es noch eine schöne überdachte Terrasse mit Esstisch und Wohlfühlsitzecke mit Tisch. Parkplätze sind direkt vor dem Grundstück vorhanden. Einkauf, Arzt, Essen, Frisör, Metro alles ist in 5 Gehminuten erreichbar. Wozu braucht man da noch ein Auto. Auch mit dem Fahrrad gibt es tolle Strecken ins Grüne und in die Stadt. Ein Haus ideal für die Familie. Sie werden alleine das Haus nutzen- Besuchen sie uns auch auch auf unserer Internetseite. Ferienwohnung-Berlin-Biesdorf.com. Hier finden sie weitere Details zur Ferienwohnung.

Guest access
Das gesamte Haus mit Terrasse und Grunds
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin-Biesdorf liegt nicht weit von der City Alexanderplatz entfernt, man ist in 20 Minuten mit der U Bahn oder dem Auto dort. Obwohl es bei uns richtig ruhig und erholsam ist, findest du alles wichtige in direkter Umgebung.
Ausflüge in den Tierpark, die Gärten der Welt, die Mercedes Benz Arena, an den Badesee oder das Zentrum sind leicht und ggf. mit dem Fahrrad erreichbar. Einfach mal googeln und ihr seht die Entfernungen. Tagsüber shoppen und am nächsten Tag ruhig ausschlafen können, und das in Berlin, einfach super. Ideal für Familien und alle , die Aktion und Entspannung kombinieren möchten. Wir freuen uns auf euren Besuch.
host_about: Wir sind eine nette Familie und freuen uns auf Ihren Besuch.

name: Möbliertes 55qm Zimmer in netter 2er Zweck-WG
description:
Von Ende November 2019 bis Ende Mai 2020 werde ich verreist sein und daher ist meine Hälfte in unserer Zweck-WG frei!
Helles, ruhiges und sehr zentral: Das Zimmer verfügt über einen Balkon, ein privates Badezimmer sowie einen separaten Zugang zu der Wohnung. Durch die besondere Aufteilung des Loft-Apartments sowie die Größe des Zimmers (ca. 55qm) es handelt sich fast um eine separate Wohnung! Geteilt mit meinem Mitbewohner werden den Wohn- und Küchenbereich.

Other things to note
Um uns das gemeinsame Leben zu vereinfachen, respektieren wir ein paar Regeln:
-Keine Straßenschuhe in der Wohnung tragen
-Nur „moderates Kochen“ in der Wohnung erwünscht
-Keine Party oder Sleepover (wir sind gern eine 2er WG!)
-Gäste nach Absprache (wir möchten es ruhig und arbeiten z. Teil von zuhause aus)
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin-Mitte ist das Herz Berlins und somit liegt die Wohnung sehr zentral und gut an den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel angebunden. In ca. 5 Laufminuten sind: U-Bahn, S-Bahn, Straßenbahn sowie Bushaltestellen zu erreichen.
Ausgehmöglichkeiten, Museen, Theater, Galerien sind ebenfalls in 5 Minuten erreichbar.

name: FeWo Willem de Kooning
description:
Wir haben ganz im Stil der historischen Villa, mit großem Garten, eine atmosphärisch, stilvolle Ferienwohnung eingerichtet. Mit italienischen Marmorfliesen, altem Eichenparkett und großem Erkerfenster. Zentral u. ruhig. 7 Minuten zu Fuß zur S-Bahn.

The space
Wir haben ganz im Stil der historischen Villa, erbaut 1907, eine atmosphärisch, stilvolle Ferienwohnung eingerichtet. Mit italienischen Marmorfliesen, altem Eichenparkett und großem Erkerfenster. Die Hochetage ist wie ein Baumhaus gestaltet (Alkoven Deckenhöhe 1.50m).
Die Villa Hufeland liegt ganz zentral in Berlin-Buch und doch sehr ruhig. Unser Haus steht in einer Sackgasse. Deshalb gibt es keinen Durchgangsverkehr. Sichere Parkplätze sind direkt am Haus vorhanden. Bei uns werden Sie nicht durch Fluglärm gestört.
Gehen Sie gemütlich von uns in 8 Min. durch das wunderschöne Hufeland Areal, zur Helios Klinik oder zum Bucher Wissenschafts-Campus. In 3 Minuten sind Sie in der Einkaufspassage mit ei
neighborhood_overview: Ich mag besonders den Schloßpark, den Künstlerhof und die Rieselfelder mit den Wildpferden.

Ich heiße Wolfram Odin und lebe mit meiner bezaubernden Frau Kerstin Ehrlich und drei liebevollen Schmusenkatern: Kuno, Alwin und Lobos in der Villa Hufeland. Die Villa steht in einem romantisch verwilderten Garten mit einem größeren Teich. In der Villa gibt es Malerei und eine fröhliche Gestaltung zu bewundern. Meine Frau ist Yogalehrerin, Tanztherapeutin und Schauspielerin. Wer möchte kann dazu weitere Informationen erfragen. Er wird deutsch, englisch, russisch und die Sprache unserer Tiere gesprochen.

My name is Wolfram Odin and I live with my lovely wife Kerstin Ehrlich and three loving male cats: Kuno, Alwin and Lobos in the Villa Hufeland. The villa stands in a romantically overgrown garden with a large pond. In our villa there is painting and happy design to admire. My wife is a yoga teacher, dance therapist and actress. Anyone who wants, can ask for more information. We speek German, English, Russian and  the language of our animals.

name: Very Central, Calm & Bright furnished apartment
description:
Sehr schöne, saubere und zentral gelegene Wohnung (75 Quadratmeter), die alles für einen gelungenen Berlin-Urlaub bietet. Direkt vor der Tür ist die S-Bahn- und U-Bahnhaltestelle. Die hochwertige, komplett eingerichtete Wohnung ist zudem sehr ruhig.

The space
Die Wohnung ist in einem typischen Berliner Altbau mit hohen Wänden mit Stuck :-) Sie ist sehr hell und ruhig, sehr gut geschnitten. Es gibt ein zum Innenhof gelegenes Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett, sowie ein zum Innenhof gelegenes Arbeitszimmer sowie ein sehr geräumiges Wohnzimmer, die Küche ist eine Wohnküche. Die Unterkunft beinhaltet alles, was man für einen unkomplizierten Aufenhalt in Berlin braucht - Spülmaschine, Waschmaschine, Mikrowelle ist alles vorhanden.

Guest access
Ganze Wohnung
neighborhood_overview: Mitte ist eine urbane Gegend mit verlockenden türkischen/arabischen Geschäften und Bäckereien, diverse Supermärkte und vor allem einer hervorragenden Verkehranbindung (U8 und S Bahn, Tram). Ganz Berlin ist schnell erreichbar (z.B. Prenzlauer Berg in 2 Tramstationen, Gesundbrunnen 10min zu Fuss, Friedrichstr. 10min mit der S-Bahn etc).
host_about:
***For English text please see below****

Die modernisierte Altbauwohnung hat drei Zimmer mit offener Küche, Bad und Balkon. Die Wohnung ist mit einer gemütlichen Couch, Sessel, Kommode, Regalen und Kleiderstange ausgestattet.

Die voll ausgestattete Küche und das gemütliche Wohnzimmer mit hohen Stuckdecke bieten ebenfalls viel Raum. Das Bad ist mit Wanne und Waschmaschine ausgestattet, die jederzeit benutzt werden können. Frische Bettwäsche und Handtücher stelle ich gerne für Dich bereit!

Die Wohnung ist optimal an den Nahverkehr angeschlossen (Tram vor der Haustür, U8 Pankstraße 5 min., S-Bahn Gesundbrunnen 10 min). Die  Nachbarschaft ist sehr lebendig (Bars, Restaurants, Cafés,  Clubs: Stattbad & Panke) und bietet auch ruhige und grüne Seiten in direkter Laufnähe (Radweg entlang der Panke, Volkspark Humboldthain mit toller Aussicht über Berlin).

Der Kiez ist in direkter Nachbarschaft zu Mitte und Prenzlauer Berg und bietet den perfekten Ausgangspunkt, um Berlin zu erkunden. Nach Neukölln und Kreuzberg sind es mit der U-Bahn nur 15/20 min. 

The flat has three rooms, an open kitchen, bathroom, and a balcony. The Appartement is equipped with a comfortable couch, an armchair, a chest, shelves, and a clothes rail. 

The fully equipped kitchen as well as the cozy living room with high stuccoed ceiling offer much space which you can use whenever you like. The bathroom has a tub and a washing machine which you can use as well. Fresh linen and towels are included!

The flat is ideally connected with public transport (tram in front of the house, metro station U8 Pankstraße 5 min walk, train station Gesundbrunnen 10 min. walk). The neighbourhood is lively (bars, restaurants, cafés, clubs: Stattbad & Panke) but also offers green and quite spots nearby (bike route along the Panke, Park Humboldthain with great view over Berlin).

The area is very near to trendy Berlin neighbourhoods Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg and offers you the perfect starting point to experience Berlin. A metro ride to Neukölln and Kreuzberg take only 15/20 min. from the next metro station Pankstraße.

name: Quiet Bedroom in Charming, Convenient 2 BR Flat
description:
Stay in one room of my charming, conveniently located apartment.

The space
I'm renting out one room in my two-bedroom apartment. It's in a pre-war building with wood floors and a balcony.

The apartment has two rooms: the living room features a couch, desk, stereo, flat-screen TV, and single bed. The bedroom has plenty of drawer space and a large double bed.

The bedroom sleeps three people comfortably. It is in a quiet neighborhood and I have it cleaned professionally for every guest.

Guest access
Kitchen, bath, balcony, high speed Internet, flat-screen TV, stereo, Raspberry Pi media center, large DVD collection, washing machine.
neighborhood_overview: Wedding isn't one of Berlin's hip neighborhoods yet, but there are some cool cafes, bars, and art galleries beginning to spring up. Look for Panke Culture bar, DuJardin, Cafe Tassenkuchen, Cafe Pförtner, Ufer-Studios and more. If you like to take walks, you're close to the Panke river as well as Schäfersee and Plötzensee lakes and Schillerpark. Cooler areas such as Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte are only a few subway stops away.
host_about: Jürgen Fauth is a writer and translator who divides his time between Berlin and New York.

name: Lovely two bed room in Schoeneberg
description: Centrally big room in typical Berlin old building surrounded by a lovely neighborhood. To catch up with the berlin lifestyle there is a very good public transport connection. Shopping possibilities are close and a supermarket which is open daily.
host_about:
Hey everyone, 
my name is Chantal and I am a mechanical engineering student from Berlin, Germany. I am an open-minded, nice and tidy person to have around who loves to meet new people with different cultural background. This had already started when I was quite young since my parents used to travel around with me a lot. Which was also the beginning of my travel addiction and longing for more of getting to know different cultures. 
Besides travelling, I love to do various sports starting from kickboxing to table tennis over to football. Though at the moment I am focussing rather on kickboxing. During the rest of my freetime, I love to hang around with friends and discover new places in my city, as well as going to the movies and reading.

My motto in life: Respect every single person and treat them as you want to be treated yourself.

I am looking forward to stay with you. 
Best regs, Chantal

name: URBAN APARTMENT in Friedrichshain
description:
ruhige 2 Zimmer Wohnung im Herzen Berlins

The space
The apartment consists of a hallway, kitchen, bathroom, living room and bedroom. The size is approximately 52 sqm. The kitchen is fully equipped and is ideal for cooking, eating or just for good conversation over a glass of wine. All utensils are at your disposal.
The bathroom is rather small but equipped with sink, shower and toilet and in a very clean condition.
The living room consists of two desks, which are suitable for work. Also located there is also a fridge, two comfortable chairs and a small table, which I like to use as a chill out area,
The bedroom has a large bed (160x200), a large wardrobe, a chest of drawers, a small seating area and a flat screen TV.

Guest access

Broadband WiFi is available.
neighborhood_overview: Boxhagener Platz, Simon Dach Strasse and Revaler Street are nearby. So you're in the middle of Berlin's nightlife and've got a quiet apartment.
host_about: I'm an open minded, easy going, smiling guy who likes to travel, meet interesting people and making new experiences. I like any kinds of sports, going out & having fun, cooking and eating, listen and play music.

name: Downtown room in the best area
description:
Hello there.
I am offering up my room in our beautiful 2-bedroom-flat in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg near Eberswalder Street Station, just 3 stops from the city centre!
The flat comes complete with every amenity (full kitchen, washer, fridge, freezer, bath, etc.).

The space
Our flat is located right on the Helmholtzplatz (plaza), in a beautiful and lively area of Berlin with many charming restaurants, cafes and bars. We are a 15 minute walk away from Mauerpark and less than 10 minute walk from Eberswalder Straße U-Bahn, the Ringbahn (both - Prenzlauer Allee and Schönhauser Allee) and three different trams. In total it takes less than 15 minutes to get to Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße, Warschauer Straße, etc.!

Guest access
The flat has two rooms, a full kitchen and bathroom with a tub.
One room (the bigger one) would be yours.
Matt, a really nice American, lives in the other room.
He is very kind and open and wou
neighborhood_overview: Berlin is a lively city with something to offer all ages. Prenzlauer Berg is full of excellent restaurants and hole-in-the-wall cafes - great for an afternoon coffee or an evening drink. There is also tons of live music on offer.
