name: Sonnige Wohnung in lebendigem Viertel
description:
hell + freundlich, Balkon, renovierter Altbau, ruhiges Wohn- und Schlafzimmer, schnelles Wlan, zentral gelegen im Szene-Bezirk Neukölln, nette Nachbarn, exzellenter öffentlicher Nahverkehr, gemütliche Cafes und Kneipen

The space
- Hell und freundlich im 3. Stock, Südseite mit Balkon, von morgens bis abends Sonne im großen Schlaf- und Arbeitszimmer und freier Ausblick, S-Bahn in diesem Zimmer zu hören, aber durch Schallschutzfenster ok, alle anderen Zimmer ruhig zum Innenhof, sehr freundliche Nachbarn
- Familien mit Kindern willkommen! Families with children welcome!
- Vier Menschen können sehr bequem wohnen. Es gibt ein großes 20qm Schlaf-/Arbeitszimmer mit einem Doppelbett 140x200cm und ein kleines 8qm Schlafzimmer mit einem Doppelbett 180x200cm (die beiden Schlafzimmer sind durch Wohnzimmer und Flur und drei Türen getrennt). Außerdem habe ich noch eine sehr einfache Schaumstoffmatratze zum dazulegen.
- großes helles Bad (11qm) mit kombinierter Ba
neighborhood_overview: Sehr freundliche und hilfsbereite Nachbarn im Haus, lebendige Gegend, nette günstige kleine Cafes, der schöne kleine "Körnerpark" ist ganz in der Nähe, viele Nationalitäten, viele junge Leute, der ehemalige Flughafen Tempelhof ist 15 Min. Fußweg entfernt, ein riesengroßer freier Platz mitten in der Stadt, ideal zum joggen, picknicken und bunte Menschen sehen
host_about:
Ich bin Journalist, Dozent und Coach, hab zwei erwachsene Söhne, die immer wieder in der Welt unterwegs sind, deshalb bin ich gerne selbst auch Gastgeber. Ich war früher nur in Hotels, jetzt verreise ich lieber airbnb-like, weil ich einfach näher an den Menschen und am Land dran bin.
Mein Traum-Reiseziel ist Hawaii; die Inseln und die Menschen dort sind so vielfältig. Und Menschen überhaupt faszinieren mich immer wieder.
I 'm a journalist , lecturer and coach, have two grown sons who are traveling the world , so I myself like to be a host. I used to stay only in hotels, but now I prefer to travel rather airbnb -like, because it get's me closer to the people and the country.
My dream destination is Hawaii ; the islands and the people there are so diverse. And people at all I am fascinated by

name: 1Room Beautiful Flat with Balcony
description:
The studio apartment with balcony is in the middle of west Berlin. Ku'damm, the Zoo and the KaDeWe are only 5 walking minutes away. This apartment is fully equipped. Only for long term-rental.

The space
The apartment is located in the middle of the West-City of Berlin (Charlottenburg-Willmersdrof). Only 5 minutes walk to Berlin’s most famous trademark department store KaDeWe. If you would like to experience all the best parts of Berlin, this is the ideal place to base yourself to explore all the wonderful sites of Berlin.
The flat has been recently renovated and disposes of one big room with one double bed and a couch with sleep function, a fully equipped kitchen, a bathroom and a west-facing balcony where can enjoy the last sunrays of the day, relax and finish off your day.
The flat is fully furnished and can host up till 4 people in 1 comfortable double size bed and a couch with sleeping function.
I will provide fresh bed linen and 2 towels for
neighborhood_overview:
Der Stadtteil Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf ist einer der beliebtesten Stadtteile Berlins. Ob zum Shoppen, Sightseeing oder für einen Ausflug in die Natur hier sind Sie richtig!

Wer sich auch für die kulturelle Vielfalt interessiert, sollte die Museen und Sammlungen rund um das Schloss Charlottenburg nicht entgehen lassen.

Für die Natur begeisterten bietet der Grunewald als auch der Teufelssee eine Vielzahl an attraktiven Anschauungsmaterial.
host_about:
I have been fortunate in my life to travel to many different places in the world. In those travels I had the privilege to be exposed to different cultures, different languages and different perspectives. 
On almost all my journeys I have met many wonderful people, made new friends all over the world and saw amazing places. 

I know how important it is to guide and help my guests if they need any assistance, which will hopefully lead to great experience as well as a long lasting positive memory during your stay.

neighborhood_overview: Wedding is an area that possesses unique and authentic charm. The Panke River is nearby as is Ufa Studios, home of some of the most iconic films of the 20s and 30s.  Only a short walk from the apartment are the independent farmers market held at Leopoldplatz each weekend. The famous and popular Humboldthain Park, Berlin's first public park is also close by, comprising an impressive rose garden in addition to a WWII bunker where beautiful views of Berlin can be seen from its peak. Stattbad Wedding features some of the worlds best DJs on a monthly roster in a venue notorious for its re-appropriation of state-swimming-pool to nightclub-dance-floor.

Der "Bötzowkitz" im Prenzlauer Berg ist lebendig aber auch sehr entspannt. Kleine Cafés, Restaurants mit internationaler Küche, kleine Shops und Boutiquen laden zum verweilen ein.
Der vor der Haustür gelegene Volkspark Friedrichshain lädt zu Spaziergängen ein, bietet eine Vielzahl an Liegewiesen, Brunnen, Spielplätze, Sportmöglichkeiten, die Biergärten "Schönbrunn" und "Pavillon" und in den Sommermonaten ein Freiluftkino.

name: Soak up the Unique Vibe of an Expansive Artist's Loft
description:
At the Recently renovated ‘YES WOW MUSEUM BERLIN’ you can Decompress with a session on the piano at this open studio space created in 1995. Head to the living area next door for some reading and relaxation, then climb the spiral staircase and indulge in a nap in the soothing, blue attic bedroom. Brand new beds and luxurious bedding awaits your stay.
Let us know in advance, if you would like to expand your mind and body in the yoga meditation studio next door.

My space has a unique architecture, that comforts you after your explorations of the city. It is located on the 3rd floor in the backyard, bright and quiet and reaches out to the roof.There are two well equipped kitchens with water filter, dishwasher, pots and pans waiting for you, your friends and your family. There is a studio space with a piano, one luxurious bathroom with shower, big bathtub, washing machine, dryer...another bathroom with shower There are 2 separate sleeping rooms with double bed, one big size
neighborhood_overview:
A safe vibrant, multicultural, area from Artists to street walkers, gallerists, and families on the way to mosque.
Cafés, little shops, and curiosities to discover. The city's most important contemporary art galleries are within walking distance.
host_about:
I am a multidimensional artist, author and adventurer. I love to travel and to meet people.
I offer my studio space to like minded people and wish, that they can profit from the creative spirit my house inherits...and that they get inspired by the incredible city of Berlin.

name: Central Tranquility
description:
Small, excellent apartment in Charlottenburg in an absolutely peaceful location in the inner courtyard of a prewar building in Berlin. Very central in relation to all public transit and to the nearby Lietzensee park.

The space
The studio has a separated entry area with wardrobe and closet, as well as your own small shower room. The room right next to the wonderfully green and quiet back courtyard is furnished with a new, high-quality double bed with comfortable mattress (160 x 200) for 2 people. Additionally, there is internet access via WiFi, a sitting nook, TV, a chest of drawers with mirror, kitchenette with dishwasher, refrigerator, microwave, coffee machine, and kettle
(towels, sheets, fan etc. included)

Guest access
The guests are able to use a separate entrance as well as a separate bath with shower.
WiFi access via a number key.
Non-smoking.

Other things to note
A historic attraction of the d
neighborhood_overview:
The studio is in the western part of the city in a top location the Charlottenburg neighborhood, three minutes away by foot from S-Bahn station Charlottenburg. With this you can reach Friedrichstraße in only about 13 minutes. You can reach the Ku´damm and Lietzensee Park—inviting for a walk—in about 10 minutes on foot, and it is only about 7 minutes on foot to the shopping street Wilmersdorfer Str. (also a U-Bahn station).
The studio is in the borough of Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf in the western part of Berlin´s inner city. This bourgeois quarter is characterized by its renovated Gründerzeit buildings from the late 19th century. The area around the Stuttgarter Platz is known primarily for its numerous cafés and restaurants. The most important and most well-known shopping street is the Kurfürstendamm, ¨Ku´damm¨ for short to Berliners. It stretches eastwards to the famous Kaufhaus des Westens (KaDeWe) department store. In the vicinity, there is the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church, t

Ich lese und reise gern.

name: Big and beautiful Room in Neukölln
description:
The space
Wer Berlin auch abseits des Zentrums kennenlernen möchte, ist in Neukölln richtig!
Hier ist es jung und multikulturell – es gibt Cafés, Bars und jede Menge Essensmöglichkeiten im Umkreis.

Trotzdem habt ihr es nicht weit bis Mitte, zum Alex und das großartige Tempelhoferfeld ist ganz nah!

Wir haben eine 2-Raumwohnung im Hinterhof. Dadurch ist es in der Wohnung sehr ruhig. Die Wohnung hat einen eigenen Eingang, so dass es sich fast anfühlt als wäre es ein kleines Ferienhaus.
Die Wohnung besteht aus meinem Zimmer, dem Zimmer meiner Mitbewohnerin, einer kleinen Küche und Mini-Bad. Alles ist ganz neu gemacht. Wir haben wunderschönen Dielenboden, hohe Decken mit Stuck und schönen Türen und Fenster.

------------------------

If you want to get to know Berlin in a non-touristic way, you will love Neukölln. It is upcoming, young and multicultural. There are a lot of Cafés, restaurants and bars nearby.


W

name: Lovely Berliner Zimmer with en suite bathroom
description:
The space
I rent out my lovely room in Neukölln as I am traveling to Asia for two and a half months. The room is very big (30sqm) and so is the apartment (150sqm). My room has it's own en suite bathroom with separate shower and bath tup. The flat has a balcony as well and is set in a nice street in Neukölln/ Rixdorf.

Guest access
The guest has access to the en suite Bathroom, of course the kitchen, including a big fridge and a dishwasher and to the washing machine. Also the balcony might be used, it belongs to my (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) room though.
neighborhood_overview: The flat is located near Karl Marx Straße. It is a very lively area although in the flat itself it is very quit and you don't hear the street or anything. Just around the house there is lot's going on. Rixbox is just outside, there you can have coffee and lunch, then there is also two art caffee's just around the corner, one has stand up comedy, the other one has Jazz bands playing. There is also a beautiful bar with good drinks. Only three minutes away you find  the Neuköllner Oper and Heimathafen Neukölln. Neuköllner Oper has a picturesque cinema with lot's of movies in English. Heimathafen Neukölln has lot's of events (concerts, readings etc.).
host_about:
Ich freue mich auf nette Gäste aus aller Welt. Bei Fragen wendet euch gerne an mich. 
Seit vielen Jahren wohne ich in Berlin und kenne mich hier gut aus. Kann euch also gerne Tips geben was die Freizeitgestaltung anbelangt.
Zwei Jahre habe ich auch in London gelebt außerdem bin ich viel gereist, war lange in Kapstadt, wo es mir sehr gut gefiel. Ihr könnt also auch gerne Englisch mit mir reden.

name: Charmer in heart of Neukölln!
description:
A big, bright room with balcony to relax and feel right at home! Centrally located in ‘Reuterkiez’ & only minutes from Hermannplatz Ubahn . This cool sweet escape comfortably fits two. Enjoy coffee in the cosy kitchen or wind-down & take a bath.

The space
This 22 square metre room in a shared flat including double-bed, balcony, work space and cozy reading area (reading material provided) is on the first floor of an old style German Altbau apartment.

-double bed 140cm x 200cm (reclinable base for an ergonomic experience)
-wifi
-work space including desk, lamp and adjustable chair
-fresh towels and linens provided
-washing machine and detergent
-hair dryer
-house phone for local calls

Guest access
Please make yourself feel at home! Your room is private and includes balcony. You have access to the shared kitchen and bathroom. The kitchen is well equipped with pots, pans and most appliances. The
neighborhood_overview:
Neukölln is the edgy, creative & multicultural hub of Berlin.
It is a rugged mix of old kneipes (typical old-style german pubs), new stylish cocktail bars, the latest pop-up cafes and fashion stores across from trödels (trash & treasure stores) and long-running family businesses. It is traditionally a turkish neighbourhood & there are several incredible turkish restaurants & grocery stores near-by. Art galleries abound with independent spaces supporting local artists & some of the bigger galleries opening ventures in the neighbour-hood too.
Plenty of music venues in the hood too!

Reuterstrasse is the heart of Reuterkiez, the local neighbour-hood. Sample tasty sudanese Falafel from 'Sahara', delicious coffee from Roamers, or indulge in 'Manti', yummy turkish dumplings, only minutes walk from the apartment.

Near-by landmarks include
- the historical and very beautiful Neukölln Stattbad, a swimming pool and sauna complex.
- Expansive Tempel
host_about:
Hello,

I am a queer film-maker and arts producer originally from Australia who has lived in Berlin, Germany for over 7 years.  I love to cook, watch films, & ride my bike through the city.  I enjoy the changing and vibrant music and art-scenes in Berlin & am always happy to exchange stories and tips on travelling!  
I am a very relaxed host - I will always try to accomodate and help where I can, so if you have any questions, don't hesitate to ask!

I share the house together with Ivan, a queer dancer and performer from Sweden, and Selma, a photography student from Cuba/Russia/US. 

Our house is a queer space where we welcome all genders, nationalities and sexualities.

name: Art apartment Berlin Schöneberg
description:
Apartment of 90 m² on the 3rd floor (without lift) of an old building (1890) near Winterfeldtplatz, in the heart of the lively district of Schöneberg, just a step from Kudamm and at not much distance of the historic center of Berlin.

The space
Apartment of 90 m² on the 3rd floor (without lift) of an old building (1890) near Winterfeldtplatz, in the heart of the lively district of Schöneberg, just a step from Kudamm and at not much distance of the historic center of Berlin.
It gives at the same time on the street and on the raised courtyard and is quiet and very bright.
It has been completely renovated in 2014. The 3 meters high ceiling with mouldings, the wooden floor and the Berlin doors are typical for the Berlin buildings of the late 19th.
The flat consists of a large bedroom with a king-size bed (190 cm) which gives on the courtyard, of a large lounge (30 m²) with balcony and a sofa-bed for two people, of a large kitchen with a table for the
neighborhood_overview:
It is ideally situated near Winterfeldtplatz with its famous market on wednesday and saturday, where you can enjoy a curry-wurst, a grilled fish, a chopped steak or a squeezed orange. The western gay district of Berlin (Motzstrasse) is just a ten minutes walk from the flat. You can also join easily by the subway (Nollendorfplatz) all monuments and museums of Berlin.
The district is one of the most famous of Schöneberg, with its numerous bars (in particular the famous Café M), restaurants and shops.
Marlene Dietrich was born in the district of Schöneberg; Albert Einstein, Christopher Isherwood, Klaus Kinski, David Bowie, Iggy Pop, Billy Wilder lived there.

description:
Die Ferienwohnung befindet sich zentral in Berlin im angesagten Bergmannkiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg (X-berg), in einer Nebenstraße zur berühmten Bergmannstraße. Hier ist man ruhig untergebracht, aber mit ein paar Schritten mittendrin im Leben von Berlin und kann die Kultur, die Sehenswürdigkeiten, Restaurants, Bars und - wenn man möchte - auch das Nachtleben genießen. Auch der Victoria-Park, das riesige Tempelhofer-Feld oder Berlin-Mitte sind in der Nähe.

The space
Das Haus ist ein sanierter Altbau und die Ferienwohnung liegt im Souterrain. Das Appartement ist sehr hochwertig und gemütlich eingerichtet. Das Drei Zimmer Appartement befindet sich im Vorderhaus und besteht aus voll ausgestatteter Küche, drei Schlafzimmern und Wohn-Essbereich. Die Schlafzimmer sind jeweils mit Doppelbetten ausgestattet. Das Wohn-Esszimmer ist mit einem Esstisch, einer Fernsehecke und zwei Sofas ausgestattet, hier können sie den Abend genießen. Ebenso vorhanden sind Waschmaschine und Tro
neighborhood_overview: Eine der besten Lagen Berlins: Das Ferienappartement im befindet sich mitten im Bergmannkiez in Berlin-Kreuzberg (X-Berg) in einer Nebenstraße zur Bergmannstraße. Hier ist neben Restaurants, Bars und kleinen Läden vieles zu finden, was Kreuzberg ausmacht. Ebenso sind der Victoria-Park, das riesige Tempelhofer Feld und auch Berlin-Mitte ganz in der Nähe.
host_about: Hallo, ich bin Elisa. Ich lebe mit meiner Familien in Berlin und reise gerne. Ebenso gern kümmere ich mich um die Ferienwohnungen.

Located in the up and coming Neuköllner Schillerkiez, this room is a great starting point to discover all Berlin has to offer.

The space
The room is located on the second floor of a renovated Altbau Wohnung. The room is facing the promenade, has a balcony and provides more than enough space to relax.

Guest access

name: Spacious apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
Hello,

We are going to be away from Berlin for some days,

The space
Südstern, Kreuzberg!

Very nice, fully furnished apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg (about 65 sq. meters), with one big bedroom, one livingroom, kitchen, bathroom with shower and a beautiful backyard garden for joint use.

The whole apartment is only for you!

We will be away for some time and would like someone nice to take good care of our apartment. Everything you need is here: all kitchen basics, with toaster, espresso machine, etc... you can cook here, there is also a dishwasher! Towels and sheets will also be provided by us, such as other basic stuff like toilet paper, shampoo, etc. There is also a washing machine in the bathroom.
The living room is big, there is a big dining table, a couch and TV. The bedroom is also big and with a double bed. You will also get our Wi-Fi password.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located close to the Metro-Station Südstern, in Kreuzberg. Everything is within a few minutes walk away. The Tempelhofer Feld (an old airport converted into a park), the canal (where you can have a nice walk near the water), there are also many cafes and restaurants nearby.
Saturdays there is a nice Market, where you can have great food and buy some really great food products.

name: Bright & Beautiful in Berlin!
description:
Custom-made with care & creativity! A genuine love of space, texture, & beautiful objects! In one of Berlin's most charming & hip neighborhoods, full of delicious restaurants & cafes, and just one block from the 'Leinestrasse' Ubahn stop.

The space
I've always loved where the functional meets the beautiful, so I've really enjoyed making my space cozy, intimate, sensual, & unique, while still maintaining a practical tangibility & approachability. You will find space-saving tricks such as retractable clothes drying racks, a folding bar, and a custom-made copper cart for the stove & kitchen appliances.

Guest access
Please feel free to make yourselves at home! Help yourselves to coffee & tea, bathroom products, kitchen basics. Empty drawers and closet space is also available for you during your stay. Enjoy cable TV and bring some DVDs to watch if you like.

Other things to note
Please note the apartment is on the 4th
neighborhood_overview:
The Neukölln neighborhood of 'Schillerkiez' is quietly nestled between Templehof and Hermanstrasse, Boddinstrasse and Leinestrasse. There are many new cafes, bars, restaurants, & boutiques, all within walking distance. Herrfurthplatz has a small Saturday farmer's market. Hermannstrase, urban and vibrant, provides a nice counterbalance, with its 24 hour shops, grocery stores open on Sundays, and lots of delicious Kebab, Falafel, Lentil soup & Baklava to choose from.

Templehofer Feld, the former-airport-turned-park, contains some very interesting Berlin history, and is also perfect to enjoy long walks under the big sky, picnics, running, biking, windsurfing, etc.
host_about: I am an Educational & Artistic Director, and I love to travel. I live in Berlin since 2008, a city constantly transforming, shared by a variety of people from around the world.

name: Chic apartment in central Prenzlauerberg!
description:
Stay at an elegant, artistic apartment at the vibrant heart of Prenzlauer Berg near Alexanderpl.
The ap. is fully furnished with everything needed to feel at home!
Quiet because located towards the inner courtyard, but loads of cafés etc. nearby!

It is only 5 minutes walk away from famous Café Anna Blume, 10 minutes away from Kulturbrauerei, Sowohl Als Auch and Oderberger Straße.

Just around the corner you find the organic super market "Dense" and several of Berlin´s famous grocery shops.

The space
The apartment is located at the first floor of a beautiful refurbished art nouveau house with a view to the quiet inner courtyard which in the summer is full of flowers.

The neighbours are mostly families. There is a very nice atmosphere in the house community.

The apartment is artistically furnished with subtle selfmade ornaments and mosaics and contains everything you need to feel at home. There is also an E-p
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is only 1 minute by feed away from a tram stop, 10 minutes by tram to Alexanderplatz or Mauerpark.

The neighborhood is called "Winsviertel", a beautiful quarter of Prenzlauer Berg with small shops, markets and cafés. Mostly artists, freelancers, young families and also some people from abroad live here. So the quarter has a vibrant and international flair combined with local Berlin charme.

Moreover, you have two parks in the neighbourhood: You can chose between the famous Mauerpark, with karaoke, street music and a huge flee market every sunday or go to the open air cinema at "Volkspark Friedrichshain".
host_about:
Hi there!

I have been living in Berlin, while commuting to the city of Jena for several years now. I work as a researcher and artist.

Me, and my mom Athena who often comes to visit Berlin, particularly enjoy the multicultural flair of this vibrant city.
 
Our bouregois-bohéme Prenzlauer Berg is laid-back and yet exciting, a quarter of hipsters, intellectuals, artists and a lot of young families.

I´ll be glad to be of help with suggestions and insider-tips to discover the typical local Berlin-charme!

description:

This conveniently located one room apartment has been freshly renovated and is conveniently situated in Schöneberg at Yorckstraße train station (over and underground train stop).

The space
New holiday house in Katzlerstr./Yorckstr.

This conveniently located one room apartment has been freshly renovated and is conveniently situated in Schöneberg at Yorckstraße train station (over and underground train stop). It consists of a large living room, a fully outfitted kitchen, and also has a bath. The apartment is on the ground floor and opens onto the quiet inner courtyard, meaning that despite the central location, you will be able to sleep easily!

-Double bed – couch (foldout bed, approx 1.40m) –bed linen and towels - large closet – TV – four person dining table – iron and ironing board - vacuum cleaner.

neighborhood_overview:

description:
Our lovely flat is located in central Mitte, right next to the river and Monbijioupark, walking distance from the famous Museum Island and has very good public transportation connections! Spend your Berlin days with comfort, quality and joy in this flat!

Please note that there is no kitchen but a small fridge in the flat and common stairs area is not used.

The space
DEAR PROSPECTIVE GUESTS,

PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION BELOW AND CHECK OUT THE PICTURES OF THE PLACE BEFORE BOOKING IN ORDER TO PREVENT ANY MISUNDERSTANDINGS, THANK YOU! :)

What do you need the most when you are in Berlin? Location Location Location!

Our awesome flat has a great location in central Mitte near Hackescher Markt and Alexanderplatz!

Our 50 m2, high quality, exclusive place has one bedroom, one bathroom and a balcony. The balcony overlooks the spectacular view of the Museumisland and the Monbijoupark.

THE FLAT IS CONNECTED TO
neighborhood_overview:
In 5 minutes walking radius you will find dozens of bars, restaurants and shopping streets. You can't be more central in Berlin than near Hackescher Markt.
And if you want to do sightseeing, the infamous unter den Linden is again in 5 minutes walking distance.
Lastly, if you wanna see Bodemuseum or Pergamon Museum you can just look out from the balcony.
host_about:
Hey!

My beautiful apartment is available for those who want to visit Berlin without giving up the perks of being in the very centre of this cool town.

Cheers, 

Matt

name: Cosy Room in Neukölln * Weserkiez
description:
We are 3 people, living in the famous Weserkiez. Feel welcome and use our stay for a lovely time in Berlin.

The space
I am offering a room in a huge flat shared with 2 other lovely people. The flat is in a typical old house in Berlin's popular district Neukölln, which is right next to Kreuzberg, only 15 minutes to the center (Alexanderplatz) and 15 minutes to walk to the Tempelhofer Feld, a former airport which was shut down and is now used for outdoor sports, live music, gardening and BBQ's. It is THE spot in Berlin in summer! There are plenty of nice bars and coffee shops in the area, but the room is quiet since it is located in a side street of the so called Weserkiez, with plenty of shops, restaurants and supermarkets.

There are a fully equipped shared kitchen and one bathrooms in the flat. The people living here are very open-minded so you can feel free to make yourselves comfortable and at home! There are good parking possibilities in the street

name: Beautiful large sunny room in Berlin Mitte
description:
Instead of the other wonderful sunny room (I rented out until now), from now on the most beautiful room in my large Mitte apartment. In the middle of Berlin's gallery hub, yet peaceful and quiet thanks to its location in the scenic Heckmann Höfe. The French balcony offers a view of the synagogue, TV tower, and Berliner Dom.

The space
The room (35sqm) is bright and airy--as is the entire apartment. And there isn't a piece of furniture that doesn't have a story. (I collected most of the beautiful vintage pieces from old GDR institutions, and many of them I used in my art projects.)

Guest access
There is a large kitchen, bathroom, and the "green salon"--the spacious living room. (With a piano!)

License number
01/Z/AZ/015231-23
neighborhood_overview: Berlin's Scheunenviertel is a neighbourhood abuzz with history--and art. You're right by all the galleries, and just a stone's throw from the famous Museum Island; cute cafés and great restaurants await your visit. And you're close to the river, too, which is lovely for Paris-style walks.
host_about:
I'm a visual artist and experimental filmmaker. I came to Berlin just after the Wall came down, and have been living and working here since, although my projects take me to many places all across the globe. One central aspect of my artistic work is bringing people together at tables, and that's the spirit that I like to bring to hosting guests, too. I'm always happy to provide recommendations on Berlin's vast cultural offerings.

The stunning sunny room is fitted with a French balcony, which is southern exposed, with a view on the Synagogue, the Berliner Dom and the Television Tower, a French-inspired courtyard, a splashing fountain, flowers and birds: 
no street noise, furnished with love and care! 
You are very welcome!

The flat hosts from time to time a very friendly therapy dog (border collie), the famous Marie B., who is part of my artwork and you will inevitably fall in love with.

Hygiene standard high, according to Corona-crisis.

Wlan is free.
I spreak fairly well English + Italian and a little spain. Ask me anything, don´t hesitate!
Please note: in the inserted maps the wrong side of street is shown!

The space
Sunny, cosy and nice furnished room in a 4 room apartment. 3 minutes walk to S-Bahn-Station "Hohenzollerndamm", a station on Ringbahn.
The area is a rather family living one. So, don´t expect a "cool" area.
Due to S-Bahn station you can easily reach Kurfürstendamm or Potsdamer Platz. In front of the apartment is an Italian restaurant, on the opposite corner you find a bakery/café. In the entrance building to S-Bahn is a Turkish Döner snack ba
neighborhood_overview:
Neighbourhood is rather quiet, you are close to parks but central positioned as well.

You have a small choice of restaurants/snack bars here. On the other side of the street there is a fairly good Italian one, a Turkey Döner snack bar you can find close to S-Bahn-Station and a café which serves breakfast is on the next corner, 2 minutes walk.

You can reach Kurfürstendamm within a 15 minutes walk or otherwise by S-Bahn, it´s just one station. Here, but also in Uhland/Berliner Straße, you find restaurants and cafés of a great diversity as well as retail stores for all thinkable needs.
host_about:
Living and working in Berlin-Wilmersdorf. 

Im interested in: culture, travel, politics, environment and architecture.
Especcially I`m caring about environmental matters. I run my household in an eco friendly way.
For satisfying my sense of justice I help underprevileged people. People without lobby.

Humor: maybe it´s about my dutch roots, I love the netherlands and their sense of humor. One example you can find as a video named: "Netherland second!"  It refers to the claim "America first!" You can find it on the usual place, where videos of kittens are often shown. Roaring with laughter! Watch it!

Languages: englisch + Italian fluent; Spain, French, Dutch a little.

name: Sunny and spacious flat with 2 balconies
description:
Sunny spacious flat in north of Friedrichshain / next to Prenzlauer Berg. Huge living room with open kitchen and direct access to a balcony (east/south).
2 separate sleeping rooms with access to another balcony (west/courtyard).
Centrally located but very quiet appartment in Friedrichshain.

The space
Our flat is based in North Friedrichshain next to Prenzlauer Berg and is suitable for up to 3 people. Because we have 2 kids of our own, it is equipped very children friendly (with lots of toys, children bed etc.
We have one big living room which builds the center of the flat. It has an open kitchen, eating area and living area. It faces south/east, so there is morning sun and a big balcony. Then we have two sleeping rooms, one with a big double bed (1,80 x 2,00 m) and one small er children room which has a high bed (single mattress, 90x200) and a children bed (1,60 x 70 m). These rooms both have direct access to the big balcony that faces the court.
neighborhood_overview:
Berlin Friedrichshain is a very lively and international quarter of the city.
It has lots of bars, cafés and restaurants with international cuisine.
However the flat is in a very calm street, but in walking distance to all lively streets (incl Samariter Kiez, Simon-Dach Kiez, Boxhagener Platz etc.) (food and flee markets on the weekend)
Several supermarkets and shops in walking distance.
Attractions close by: Alexanderplatz, berlin wall/Eastside gallery, Volkspark Friedrichshain etc.
All Berlin's places of interest such as for example the Kurfürstendamm, the Friedrichstrasse, Potsdamer Platz, the Reichstag, the Brandenburg Gate, Alexanderplatz, Hackische Höfe and more can be reach by public trains or buses.

N'hésitez pas à nous contacter en francais.
Sie können uns auch gerne auf Deutsch schreiben.

name: Charming apartment green & near the city
description:
Very tastefully decorated vacation apartment in beautiful green surroundings just across from Bürgerpark, near the city. Directly on the [bike path on the site of the Berlin Wall]/former wall sections. Ground floor with garden terrace. Shopping, cafés, restaurants...nearby, near the Florakiez.

The space
The beautiful ground-level apartment is in a monument to the wall. The building´s wall was, during the DDR, in the border zone. Original remnants of the wall have been preserved. ¨History you can touch.¨ A huge panorama window gives you a wonderful view over the green former sections of the wall.
The apartment is very livable and decorated at high-quality. Furnishings include a 1.8 x 2 m large box-spring bed, a 1.3 x 2 m large sleeper couch, a TV. The kitchen is completely equipped with toaster, coffee machine, milk foamer, kettle, dishwasher, stove/oven, diverse cooking utensils, plates, and cutlery. A small selection of coffee, tea, spices etc. is availab
neighborhood_overview: Pankow is a family-friendly, green part of the city with many parks. You can quickly be in Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte, but live entirely surrounded by greenery. The children´s farm ¨Pinke Panke¨ and the beautiful Bürgerpark with a beer garden are direct neighbors. You can reach the Niederschönhausen Palace with its beautiful palace park with a walk. In the nearby Florakiez you will find pretty stores, cafés, restaurants, and child-friendly cafés.
host_about: Ich wohne in Berlin-Pankow, bin Architektin und entwerfe und gestalte gerne Wohnräume.

name: Kreuzberg at the Canal: cosy flat with balcony
description:
Wooden floors, balcony and bathtub in an old, perfectly renovated art nouveau building in the current hotspot of Kreuzberg.

The space
The 1 bedroom apartment with hardwood floors and balcony is located in Berlin Kreuzberg. The apartment is located in a well maintained, renovated Art Nouveau building on the canal in a quiet side street, yet just around the corner of the momentary hotspot Wrangelkiez/ Görlitzer Park with colorful street cafés, bars and shops, the bathing ship and many clubs, such as Berghain, Musik und Frieden, Urban Spree, Festsaal Kreuzberg, Arena, Birgit und Bier, Ipse, Watergate, Astra, Gretchen, Prince Charles and many more. But also parks such as Treptow or Görlitzer Park are just around the corner. You have good metro and tram connections from the apartment.
The apartment is located in the green and quiet backyard of the house. In the living and bedroom area is a comfortable 160 cm wide sofa bed, a writing desk, a chair, several wi
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in the hotspot of Kreuzberg with many clubs, cafes, pubs, bars, international restaurants, galeries, etc..
Right around the corner you find clubs like the Lido, Watergate, Arena and Festsaal Kreuzberg and in the neighbourhood Berghain, Gretchen, Prince Charles, smaller off theaters and many music venues.
Right across the corner you can visit a bathing ship on the Spree. Then there is a canal for kayak or boat trips.
Everything is available in the nearby area: supermarkets, small food shops, clothing stores, bike rentals, laundrettes, books, stationery, CDs, flowers etc..
Cycling is highly recomended. Your bikes can be locked very safely in the backyard.
host_about:
I have been living in Berlin for ages, so I know the city quite well and would be glad to assist you with anything needed.
I like travelling and meeting people from different countries, which is why I am on this page.

Meine Frau ist Yogalehrerin, Tanztherapeutin und Schauspielerin. Wer möchte kann dazu weitere Informationen erfragen. Er wird deutsch, englisch, russisch und die Sprache unserer Tiere gesprochen.

My name is Wolfram Odin and I live with my lovely wife Kerstin Ehrlich and three loving male cats: Kuno, Alwin and Lobos in the Villa Hufeland. The villa stands in a romantically overgrown garden with a large pond. In our villa there is painting and happy design to admire. My wife is a yoga teacher, dance therapist and actress. Anyone who wants, can ask for more information. We speek German, English, Russian and  the language of our animals.

name: Design-Apartment zentral in Berlin-Charlottenburg
description:
Großzügiges (75qm), hochwertig ausgestattetes und ruhiges Design-Apartment in Berlin Charlottenburg für bis zu 5 Personen. Hervorragende Lage, vielfältige Angebote in der Nachbarschaft und sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung sowie eigener Parkplatz.

Zur Messe Berlin 10 Minuten Fußweg bzw. 3 Busstationen und zum Zoo in der City West 15 Minuten mit U-Bahn.

The space
Es handelt sich um ein 75qm großes Apartment mit sehr gutem Schnitt. Das Apartment ist sehr ruhig und dennoch unmittelbar in einen lebendigen Kiez eingebunden. Durch die Südausrichtung ist es angenehm hell und freundlich.

Das Apartment ist konsequent hochwertig eingerichtet mit schönem Echtholz- Parkettboden, Stucco-Lustro-Wandflächen und Design-Beleuchtungssystemen. Ich habe großen Wert auf nachhaltige Materialien gelegt für eine natürliche Wohnatmosphäre – du wirst in dem Apartment ein hervorragendes Raumklima erleben und sehr gut schlafen können.

Die voll ausgestattete Küch
neighborhood_overview: Charlottenburg-Westend ist ein schöner und facettenreicher Kiez mit viel Tradition. Zu Fuß erreichst du mühelos das Messegelände, das Olympiastadion und den lebendigen Theodor-Heuss-Platz. Auch der Biergarten an den Stadionterrassen, der Funkturm, die Waldbühne, die Wühlmäuse, eine Bowlingbahn und jede Menge Geschäfte und Lokale  sowie Imbisse und Cafés sind in unmittelbarer Umgebung. Eigentlich musst du den Kiez daher für die alltäglichen Besorgungen nicht verlassen. Wer in die City will, startet bequem mit dem Bus direkt vor der Tür oder der U-Bahn Linie 2. Wenn du schwimmen gehen willst, wartet mit dem Schwimmbad am Olympiastadion eines der besten Schwimmbäder der Stadt. Für Spaziergänge in frischem Grün und an der Spree wartet der Schlosspark Charlottenburg und die Villengegend bzw. das schöne Altbauviertel vom Westend. Für Kinder gibt es Spielplätze am Fürstenplatz.
host_about:
Ich bin Berliner und seit über 20 Jahren Raumausstatter-Meister.  Mein eigenes  Geschäft Adler Wohndesign liegt direkt neben der Gästewohnung – checkt gerne unsere Website aus und lasst euch inspirieren :)

Ich lebe für Design, für natürliche Materialien und habe in der Wohnung meine besten Ideen verwirklicht. Ich reise viel durch die Welt und nutze Airbnb oft und gerne – auch deswegen freue ich mich darüber, selbst Gastgeber zu sein. Neue Menschen aus der Welt zu treffen und Ihnen etwas bieten zu können, ihnen Tips zu geben und mit ihnen in Kontakt zu kommen erlebe ich als sehr bereichernd. 

Auch für Menschen, die neu in Berlin sind und die Stadt besser kennenlernen wollen, habe ich  gute Tips parat. Fragt mich einfach!

The flat is in a very nice and wellcoming neighbourhood between kreuzberg and neukölln (Kreuzkölln). You have lots of bars, cafes and restaurants when you walk outside. There are three different kind of supermarkets in a destinations from 2 to 6 walking minutes.

Auch wenn es nur nach Brandenburg geht.

name: Room with a view in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
I am offering a room, part of my flat, on the 5th floor (bathroom, without kitchen, own entrance, no lift). The room is quiet and has a great view of the Fernsehturm.

The flat is opposite Volkspark Friedrichshain and located between Prenzlauer Berg and Friedrichshain. The access to public transportation is excellent. Alexanderplatz can be reached in less than 15 minutes.

I moved to Berlin several years ago and would be happy to share my own tips for your trip in Berlin.

The space
This room is on the top floor of a five-storey building. From here, you have a great overview of the city and you can see the sky. We recently renovated this attic and left beams and a brick wall visible. The room is small and cosy.

Guest access
My apartment has two entrances. My family and I use one entrance, the other is only for guests. A door and a wall separate my apartment and the room. We value our privacy and our guests´privacy.

name: Central Stylish Berlin Apartment (registered)
description:
This stylish 50m² (500 sq.ft.) apartment, set in a fully converted commercial unit with 4m high ceilings, has been renovated over three levels to create a unique place to stay at the heart of Europe's hippest city.

The space
Located in the centre of the city, at the meeting point of Friedrichshain, Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte; where exiting day/nightlife and hip neighborhoods are as close as tourist destinations such as Volkspark Friedrichshain, Karl Marx Allee and Alexanderplatz.

Supermarkets, fast food, (Chinese, Pizza, Sushi, etc) Bike Rental, Late Night Grocery Stores, Restaurants and Cafes are just a few minutes walk away. A short stroll along the historic Karl Marx Allee will land you at Berlins famous TV tower and Alexanderplatz.

Underground train via the U-Bahn, 3 Tram lines and Bus lines are just a couple of minutes away making this a great place for access to all parts of the city.

Set on the ground floor of an elegant tu
neighborhood_overview:
Supermarkets, fast food (Chinese, Pizza, Döner, Sushi), Bike Rental, Late Night Grocery Stores, Restaurants and Cafes are just a few minutes walk away.
A short stroll along Karl Marx Allee will land you at Berlins famous 'TV towe'r and Alexanderplatz, in the opposite direction Frankfurter Tor with 'Humana' a huge 4 storey 2nd hand charity clothes store, passing the 'Computer Spiele Museum' on the way.
Also, just 5 min walk away the local park 'Volkspark Friedrichshain', with Football/Basketball/Beachvolleyball courts, half-pipes, trim-trails, huge climbing rock, in-line-skate tracks and playgrounds for all ages. Barbequing is allowed on the fields. Cafes, restaurants at the lake open all year round, and an open air cinema operating during the summer months.

name: Schöne helle Altbau-Wohnung in Kreuzberg
description:
Unsere gemütliche helle 3-Zimmer-Wohnung mit schönen Holzdielen bietet einem Paar, einer kleinen Familie (mit zwei Kindern) oder bis zu drei Freunden Platz. Die Wohnung liegt ganz zentral im belebten und beliebten Bergmannkiez mit vielen Geschäften, Restaurants und Bars sowie in Nähe des Viktoria-Parks und des Parks am Gleisdreieck mit vielen Spielplätzen. Sowohl das Tempelhofer Feld als auch der Landwehrkanal sind innerhalb von 15 Min. Fussweg zu erreichen.

The space
Meine 80 Quadratmeter große Altbau-Wohnung mit schönen alten Holzdielen bietet ein großes Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett, ein Kinderzimmer (oder zweites Schlafzimmer mit Matratze auf dem Boden) sowie ein gemütliches Wohn- und Esszimmer. Küche und Bad bieten alles, was man braucht, inklusive einer Waschmaschine. Die Wohnung ist im 4. OG (kein Fahrstuhl), mit großen Fenstern ausgestattet und daher sehr hell. Morgens scheint die Sonne in Küche und Schlafzimmer, nachmittags in Wohn- und Kinderzimmer.
neighborhood_overview: Meine Wohnung liegt ganz zentral im belebten Bergmannkiez. Es gibt viele diverse Einkaufsmöglichkeiten (von Edeka und Netto bis zu Alnatura und Biosupermärkten sowie der gut ausgestatteten Markthalle am Marheinekeplatz) sowie nette kleine Läden, in denen man hervorragend Schuhe und Kleidung (auch Second Hand) sowie schöne und witzige Geschenke kaufen kann. Cafés, Restaurants und Bars sowie Spielplätze gibt es ebenfalls zur Genüge.  Außerdem sind das Tempelhofer Feld, der Viktoria-Park und der Park am Gleisdreieck (der besonders - aber nicht nur - für Kinder attraktiv ist) fußläufig erreichbar.
host_about: Hallo, ich bin Catherine, Halb-Französin und volle (gebürtige!) Berlinerin! Mein Mann Shasha ist Südafrikaner und wir leben mit unseren zwei Kindern (3 Jahre und 6 Monate) in Kreuzberg. Wir freuen uns, dass das internationale Interesse für diese Stadt so extrem gestiegen ist in den letzten Jahren. Da wir beruflich und auch privat häufiger unterwegs sind, vermieten wir immer wieder unsere Wohnung. Wir erleben regelmäßig die Gastfreundschaft von Menschen in anderen Ländern und hoffen daher, etwas davon hier in Berlin weitergeben zu können!

name: Cy Twombly in the Villa-Hufeland
description:
In our cozy apt. with a own terrace, fully equipped kitchen, with double bed and sofa bed, garden view, you are with S-train in 25 minutes in the centre of Berlin. The train runs every 10 min. Supermarket 3 mins. walk. City and nature in one.

The space
The Villa-Hufeland is centrally located in Berlin-Buch and yet very quiet. Our house is in a cul de sac. Therefore, there is no through traffic. Secure parking next to the building. With us you will not be disturbed by aircraft noise.

Go cozy 8 in minutes of us through the beautiful Hufeland area for Helios clinic or Science Campus. In 3 minutes you are in the mall with a large supermarket. If you prefer bio goods, we have next door an attractive health food store, by noon you can take a warm meal. On the former artist court (now Bucher Stadtgut), 3 min. away from us, you will find the oldest house in Berlin-Buch, the house of the old squire. They have an attractive cafe and regular cultural events. 200

Direct view to the river and sunset-view.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview:
The flat is directly at the spree with a view to the river. On the other side there is the famous "Holzmarkt". An open-air location with nice bars, possibilities to have a drink and hang around. Quite nice.
Within 10 Minutes walk you are at "Oranienstraße", Kind of center of famous Quarter "Kreuzberg" with a lot of bars and restaurants.
With bicyle you are in 10 Minutes at the center at "Alexanderplatz" or "Unter den Linden" with Museum-Island, Friedrichstraße and so on.
There are also a lot of famous clubs around here, like Berghain, Kater-Blau, Yaam-Club and so on.
You will find an actual Lonely-Planet-Travel Guide in English at the appartment for more detailled informations.

The space

name: bohemian artist apartment shop -neukölln
description:
Please read description:
Our artist studio is a very nice 2 room studio flat, which was a former shop and has entry directly from the streets of Neukölln :) Also the main window is directly onto the street.
Its inside of a antique Berlin building and charms you with its super high ceilings and wooden floors...
the kitchenette is very basic and small but works fine for basic cooking.

The space
The space consists of two connected rooms, plus bathroom and kitchenette.
You enter from the street directly into the big living room, which is comfortably furnished with two big sleeping couches (120x200 & 140x200), some sitting furniture and a small square dining and working table.
From the living room you enter the bedroom, which is small and furnished with a sleeping plateau with big bed (180x200) on the top and a chillout and wardrobe area underneath. There is an additional sleeping place on the futon of the chill out.
The space is perfe
neighborhood_overview:
Neukölln is today what Kreuzberg was some years ago.... the neighborhood where the artists are moving to, where small, nice and alternative cafes and bars are opening and where the rents are still payable and therefor the life still authentic.
Close to Tempelhof Park, you can enjoy one of Berlins most amazing outdoor - sights just around the corner: the former airport Tempelhof, which was used to provide west-Berlin with supplies..... go stroll around in the neighborhood... its really lovely!
host_about:
Hi I´m Carol . I am painter, mother, philosopher and mage and live in berlin for 11 years.

name: Ruhige Wohnung im Herzen Berlins
description:
Genieße unsere Wohnung in bester City-Lage, während wir ausgeflogen sind. Die 89 m² Wohnung liegt ruhig umrahmt von zwei großen Hinterhöfen am Spittelmarkt. Fernsehturm oder Brandenburger Tor? – alles nur einen Katzensprung entfernt.

The space
Unsere gemütlich eingerichtete Wohnung bietet Raum für kuschelige Kinoabende auf dem Sofa und ist der perfekte Startpunkt für jedwede Stadterlebnisse. Ob Sight Seeing, Erholung im Tiergarten oder Clubbing – alles ist direkt um die Ecke. Gleichzeitig liegt die Wohnung an einem einzigartig ruhigen Fleckchen zwischen zwei geräumigen Innenhöfen, so dass man selbst bei geöffneten Fenstern seine Ruhe hat und vom Trubel der Stadt nichts mitbekommt, wenn man nicht will.

Guest access
Wohnzimmer, Schlafzimmer, Flur, Bad und Küche sind euer Reich. Allein das Kinderzimmer werden wir verschließen und auch als Raum nutzen, um einiges von unserem Alltagskrempel zu verstecken, so dass ihr euch in den übrigen Zimmern
neighborhood_overview:
Neben all den Sehenswürdigkeiten (Brandenburger Tor, Fernsehtum, Gendarmenmarkt, Alexanderplatz – alles in Laufweite) ist Berlin-Mitte nicht gerade der aufregendste oder gemütlichste Stadtbezirk. Aber es heißt nicht umsonst "Mitte" und die vielen Szeneviertel der Stadt liegen rundum verteilt und sind nur einen Katzensprung entfernt. Kreuzberg und die Oranienstraße sind in 10 Minuten zu Fuß zu erreichen, Friedrichshain oder Prenzlauer Berg in 10 Minuten mit der U-Bahn.

Apropos: Die U-Bahn fährt direkt vor dem Haus in 5 Minuten zum Alexanderplatz, in 7 Minuten zum Potsdamer Platz oder 18 Minuten zum Zoo und Ku'Damm.

name: Villa Kunterbund Berlin
description:
Unser Traumhäschen im ruhigen Charlottenburg, bietet Familien und lieben Menschen ein wunderbares Heim in Berlin. Um das wildfremde Berlin zu entdecken und sich doch wie Zuhause zu fühlen, ist es genau die richtige Adresse im Zentrum.

The space
Das Häuschen, bietet im Winter wie im Sommer ein perfektes zuhause für Gäste aus aller Welt und jeden Alters. Es ist ein romantisches Refugium, ruhig und in guter Lage. Umgeben von Natur, so nah zum Flughafen und Autobahn und zu hören ist nur der Wind wie er durch die Bäume reist. Wir lieben es...

Guest access
Wenn es erwünscht ist, können wir ein Kinderbett zur Verfügung stellen.

Other things to note
We kindly need to inform you, that we have a city tax of 5% in Berlin since 2016. We prefer to collect this on the arrival of our guests.
Wichtig in Berlin kommen 5% Bettensteuer auf den Tages Mietpreis, der vor Ort bezahlt werden muss.
Leider müssen wir 20 Euro Reinigun
neighborhood_overview: Vor dem Haus befindet sich ein kleiner Park und auch zum spazieren ist die Gegend sehr schön. Für Schwimmer ist, das Olympiastadion gleich um die Ecke oder direkt der Wannensee mit viel Grün. Auch der Teufelsberg umgeben von Wald ist schnell zu erreichen.

name: Beautiful & super central apt
description:
Bright designer's apt renovated with all modern comfort and spacious 100 m2. Outstanding location in the heart of Hackescher Markt, a 10 min walk from it all. Trendy shops & restaurants meet the elegance of the Opera.
NB: NO IMPERSONAL REQUESTS. Only open to guests who are not impersonal, have reviews, profile description or put effort in describing their intent. Your request will be declined if these conditions are not met.

The space
Charming design apt in Scandinavian 50’s style located in a renovated 1850 building-- 100 m2 premium apt truly in the heart of trendy and traditional Berlin. An unbeatable location yet a peaceful space with a quiet, sun- filled courtyard. It really does not get more central than this. A 10 min walk to Alexanderplatz, the Museum’s island, the Opera and theatres, Unter den Linden/Friedrichstrasse, or the river Spree. Transportation of all sorts is also within 5 min walk.
My apartment is located on the third floor. NO elevat
neighborhood_overview: Berlin's widest variety is at hand's reach -cultural attractions, food, stores, as is access to the transportation  hubs. You will experience Berlin to the fullest at the very doorstep. If Mitte is a Soho of sorts, my corner is between NY and Paris.
host_about: I currently live and work in Berlin. I have lived in Argentina, Italy, the United States, and Germany. I am a citizen of the world living between continents, to different measure (when research allows). I cherish my homes with the scholar's precision and the housewife's loving care.  I like to say I am "domestic international" . I am an art lover and a plant fiend, as my living space shows, and a bibliophile. I have knack for antiques and vintage design and embrace a modern, mindful, ecologically conscious life open to the world.

name: Stylish 3 room apartment in the best location
description:
This warm colorful and stylish flat is located at the quiet river-shore in the most green, beautiful and hip part of Kreuzberg. Enjoy the comfort of a fully equipped open kitchen in a big living room, 2 brand-new spacious bathrooms and bedrooms.

The space
This lovely decorated apartment is full of charm and color! There are two bedrooms and a spacious living room with a completely calm and cosy atmosphere. The king size-sofa measures 4m and it can be used as a bed, if there are more than 6 people staying. The very well equipped kitchen includes a Nespresso coffee machine and a dish washer. There is a high quality bathroom with a perfect bath tub and an extra bathroom with a shower.
The bathrooms includes enough fresh towels for your stay.
Each of the 2 cosy bedrooms is equipped with a king-size-bed, a single bed, a huge closet and a flat-screen-tv.
All rooms have a very warm lightening and most of the lights can be dimmed.
In the backyard of
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a really nice street by the Spree Canal. You will have the opportunity to enjoy a nice walk, hear some street music and buy fresh fruit and vegetables at the Turkish market a few meters ahead. The nearest subway station is Schönleinstrasse, less than 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Around the neighborhood you will find lots of good restaurants, bars and clubs, as this is one of the most vibrant neighborhood of Berlin.
Familiys can find a beautiful big playground very close.

description:
Das helle und gemütlich eingerichtete Apartment in einem Gründerzeit-Mehrfamilienhaus bietet Ihnen alles was das Herz begehrt und ein attraktives und ruhiges Wohnumfeld mit gehobener Ausstattung. Die Wohnung wird überwiegend von Abenteurern und Geschäftsleuten gebucht, die in Berlin was erleben oder hier arbeiten wollen.

The space

Bedarfs, Dienstleistungs- und  Bildungseinrichtungen, Ärzte, soziale und kulturelle Einrichtungen bieten eine äußerst gute Versorgung und machen Karlshorst zu einem lebenswerten Stadtteil.

Smart 1 bedroom flat in Berlin-Mitte. Quiet, sunny and light flat in the back of the house on the 4th floor. With a southfacing balcony overviewing the yard.

The flat itself has around 75m² and is in a late 19th century building. It has been renovated recently and got beautiful details such as exposed brickwork walls in the kitchen and the livingroom and wooden floorboards throughout the flat.

The kitchen is very spaceous with a dining table for 4. It includes a dishwasher, a washing machine and basic kitchen stuff.

The bathroom is small but sweet. It has got a a shower and lovely mosaic tiles on the walls. There is a hairdryer included.

The bedroom has a queen size double bed.

In the livingroom there is a spacous 3-seater-sofa with more than enough spa

name: Room in the social centre of Berlin
description:
Ground floor room just meters away from numerous bars,restaurants,clubs and parks in the Berlin hotspot of Kreuzberg!The river and metro are also just 1 Min walk away.Perfect location! 14Sqm room with large sofa bed, clothes rack, armchair and work / eating table.

The space
You can't get any more central to the socialising area of Berlin than this! Tonnes of places to eat, drink or dance. You can also take a stroll through the park, next to the river, canal or next to the Berlin Wall. Something for everyone! It's an old, simple, but cute flat. No frills, just like the old Berlin:) .

As for the flat itself, in the kitchen, you can use any plates, glasses, cutlery etc. You can put any food or drinks in the funky blue fridge or use the oven or stove, which are lit by the cooking lighters which you will find on the work surface. Because it is a short-stay offer, I would prefer if you didn't use the washing machine. However, we can discuss this if you a
neighborhood_overview: The neigbourbood is the most vibrant in Berlin.  Full of pretty much everything you need, whether it's sightseeing, eating, drinking, dancing or chilling:) . I can even show you my favourite local bars if you are up for it.  You probably won't need a Taxi with all the action around here.  Luckily, my flat is through the backyard and right at the back building.  Which means a pretty quite night's sleep is also possible.  An Oasis in the Chaos :)
host_about: Hi! I'm Robert, a Musician originally from Wales, U.K, but now enjoying wonderful Berlin.  I'd say that I'm an easy going, communicative and flexible person. Whether you want to simply have the room and go off alone or if you want to join any of my concerts/social gatherings, it's fine by me either way:)

The space
The 2 room-apartment is in a magnificently maintained Berlin building, in the East side of the city 15 min distance from the TV Tower and 10 min from the East Side Gallery by metro.

Bus and train, as well as numerous restaurants, cafes, cinemas, theaters and shops are within 10min distance by metro. Ideal for tourists but also ideal for business travelers because of easy access to the ICC trade fairs and parking facilities. The 60 sqm apartment is a perfect retreat after a day of shopping.

name: Beste Lage in für Kunst in Kreuzberg
description:
Das ruhig Zimmer befindet sich in einer 85-qm-Wohnung im 3. OG mit Aufzug und Blick auf den privaten Garten. Nur 5 Min. zu Fuß bis Checkpoint Charlie, Friedrichstraße oder Jüdisches Museum. Die Museumsinsel und der Alexanderplatz sind fußläufig erreichbar. Drei U-Bahn-Stationen sind in der Nähe und vor dem Haus ist eine Bushaltestelle in Richtung Neukölln und Charlottenburg. Zum Kennenlernen der Stadt die optimale zentrale Lage. Wir sind zur Zeit oft in unserem Atelier, du kannst ungestört sein.

The space
Das helle und ruhige Zimmer hat ein 140 cm breites Doppelbett für eine oder zwei Personen, einen Schreibtisch mit Stuhl, einen großen Kleiderschank, eine Kommode, einen Spiegel mit Ablage sowie zwei Nachttische mit Leselampen. Das Bad mit der Toilette und die gut ausgestattete Küche wird normalerweise mit den Gastgebern geteilt. Zur Zeit sind wir an den Wochenenden oft weg, und du bist ganz allein in der Wohnung . Internetanschluss und Wi-Fi ist vorhanden. Die s
neighborhood_overview:
Zu Fuß sind Sie in 5-8 Minuten in der Friedrichstraße beim Chakpoint Charlie oder beim Jüdichen Museum und der Berlinischer Galerie. Auch die Museumsinsel, das Märkische Museum, das Nicolaiviertel und der Gendarmenmarkt sind zu Fuss sehr gut zu erreichen. Viele Cafés, Restaurants und Kunstgalerien sind in der Nähe.
Ein Paar Minuten mit dem Bus M29 Richtung Herrmannplatz, führen in das Herz Kreuzbergs, den hinteren Teil der Oranienstraße, mit zahllosen Cafés, Bars und Restaurants, sowie dem Görlitzer Bahnhof. Fährt man weiter, erreicht man bequem Neukölln, das ebenso vielfältig und trendy ist. Die andere Richtung mit dem gleichen Bus führt zum Kurfürstendamm zu KDW und unzähligen Einkaufsmöglichkeiten. Nur 2 Stationen mit der U2 zum Alexanderplatz mit dem Fernsehturm, Rotem Rathaus usw. Zum Brandenburger Tor kann man zu Fuß über die Friedrichstraße mit ihren vielen sehenswerten Shops, wie die Galeries Lafayette, hinspazieren.
host_about: Ich bin selbstständige Künstlerin und lebe mit meinem Mann, einem Fotokünstler zusammen, mitten in Berlin. Wir sind beide sehr aktiv und stellen oft unsere Arbeiten aus. Nachdem unsere Tochter ausgezogen ist, freuen wir uns ein extra Zimmer zu haben, um unsere Freunde zu empfangen. Es ist für uns sehr spannend interessante Menschen kennenzulernen und ihnen zu helfen unsere aufregende Stadt zu erleben.

Perfectly connected with the rest of the city from the U-bahn Station of Berliner Strasse at only 3 stops from Zoologischer Garten. The apartment is on the first floor of a residential building. It has one bedroom, a living room, a large kitchen and a modern bathroom and has been completely refurbished. It also has a balcony for the summer days! General information: The maximum number of tenants are 3. Check-in is from 3pm to 9PM, check-out before 12 pm.
PLEASE NOTE THE BERLIN CITY TAX OF THE 5% OF THE TOTAL RENT HAS TO BE PAID CASH AT CHECK-IN
The tax apply for a max
neighborhood_overview:
Kurfürstendamm
All the major Fashion designer can be found here together with the famous Department Store KaDeWe - Kaufhaus des Westens in Wittembergplatz . If you take a walk along the street you will find every kind of store from sport to electronics.

Supermarkets are just few minutes away in Berliner Str.
Reichelt (Great selection)
open from Monday 7AM to Saturday 23PM
Lidl (Cheaper)
Rossmann Drugstore a little further down Berliner Str. on the other side of the street.
Pharmacy (Apotheke) every 50 meters
Flower shops, Bakery, House-ware, Coffee Shops, Restaurants all around.
In Güntzelstr. you can find some more ethnic restaurants.
Important to remember that the Stores are all close on Sunday and the local stores close Saturday in the afternoon.
If you need a Supermarket on Sunday you can try Kaiser in Nollendorf Platz before 12,00.
and Ullrich am U- und S-Bahnhof Zoologischer Garten from 11AM to 10PM.

This charming apartment is located at centre of Auguststrasse, in the heart of Berlin's Mitte/Mitte district. The accommodation is very quiet, overlooking a beautiful green backyard. name: Bright apartment with charm at the heart of it all
description:
This is the place for you if you want to stay somewhere special in Berlin and feel at home. My flat is modern with all amenities but has very much its own charm. It's in one of the famous historic Zuckerbäcker Buildings on Frankfurter Allee, close to great coffee shops, markets, the wall gallery, etc. etc. I occasionally rent out one of the two bedrooms while I am away myself which means you will have the apartment to yourself.

The space
A comfortable bedroom in a bright and newly renovated apartment in Friedrichshain, Berlin. Situated on the sixth floor (elevator available) of one of the famous historic Zuckerbäcker Buildings on Frankfurter Allee, it is pretty much in the centre of everything East Berlin has to offer from great coffee places, independent shops, markets, Stasi Museum, Wall Gallery, RAW area and countless great but affordable restaurants and bars, with easy and fast transport links to both airports (Tegel and Schönefeld approx. 50 mins on public
neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is very mixed with residential streets and relaxed Berlin life but also flea markets, parks and many cafes, boutiques, restaurants, clubs, art-house cinemas. The flat is 5 minute walking distance from different organic supermarkets, Boxhagener Platz and the famous Simon-Dach Kiez as well as 10 minutes from the RAW warehouse complex with food markets on Sundays, a boulder and skateboard hall, a pool and even more bars. It is a very international crowd with many young people from all around Europe and beyond. Like most places in Berlin it is also very LGBTI-friendly.
host_about: After living in different places around Europe and beyond, I've now made Berlin my home for the coming years and I really love the city. I work in for the public administration of the state of Berlin but I travel quite a bit and I enjoy hosting people and to welcome them to my flat which you will mostly have to yourself. Feel free to message me beforehand if you want to be sure.

description:
The flat is located in Berlin-Neukoelln. It is is ideally sized for two adults or a family. It has one bedroom with a double bed and baby bed and a guest room with a fold-out sofa or the children’s room with a bed. Please notice that you can live here with up to 4 persons, if two are children. We rent to 3 adults not four.

The space
The flat is ideally sized for two adults or a family. It has one bedroom with a double bed and he children’s room with a bunk bed.
The living room is furnished with a large table and a comfortable seating area with TV set. This room is the centre of the flat from which all other rooms are accessed.

neighborhood_overview:
The recently renovated new build flat is located in Neukölln-Rixdorf, within the historic working village from 1737, near Richardplatz, not far from S-Bahn station Sonnenallee. Public transport and shopping for daily needs are within walking distance.

There are cafes (e.g. Café Geschwister Nothaft, Schwarzastraße 9, with very good coffee and a huge selection of homemade sweet and savoury treats), bars, shops and supermarkets, international cultural offers such as Neuköllner Oper (Neukölln Opera), cinemas, galleries. Recreation areas such as Treptower Park and Tempelhofer Feld are easily reached (by foot or public transport). Neukölln is very well connected to the city centre and Berlin Schönefeld Airport via car or public transport. There is a direct bus to Postdamer Platz: perfect for Berlinale visitors!

name: Schönes Schlafzimmer mit separatem Wohnzimmer
description:
Die Wohnung liegt in der besten Lage in Berlin. Kreuzberg ist bereits Kult. Die multikulturelle Struktur macht diesen Stadtteil zu einer Weltstadt und zieht jung und alt gleichermaßen an. Zu Fuss sind zahlreiche Frühstückcafes, Restaurants, Clubs und Einkaufmöglichkeiten direkt in der Oranienstrasse zu erreichen.
Bus und Ubahn sind direkt vor der Tür und man ist innerhalb von 10-20 Minuten am Alexanderplatz, Kudamm, Mitte, Friedrichshain, Neukölln...

The space
Es handelt sich um ein 22 qm Schlafzimmer mit einem separaten Wohnzimmer in einer grossen 150 qm Vorderhauswohnung im dritten Stock direkt am Oranienplatz. Die Wohnung ist sehr ruhig und hell mit wunderschönem Ausblick über den Oranienplatz. Das Zimmer ist modern und gemütlich eingerichtet. Die Küche ist liebevoll ausgestattet.

Guest access
Ein 22 qm Schlafzimmer, ein 28qm Wohnzimmer, Flur, Badezimmer, Küche
neighborhood_overview: Es gibt hier sowohl zahlreiche Cafés, Restaurants und Bars als auch tolle Erholungsorte in direkter Nähe, wie zum Beispiel die Spree oder der Landwehrkanal, der preisgekrönte Park am Gleisdreieck, der Viktorapark und das Tempelhoferfeld. Von Kreuzberg nach Mitte in 5 Minuten treffen sich Wirtschaft, Handel und Kultur. Der Checkpoint Charlie, das Jüdische Museum und der Potsdamer Platz – die Mikrolage ist ein lebendiger, kultureller Hotspot.

Hej :)

___***CHECK-IN/CHECK-OUT: The time for check-in is after 16:00 o'clock and Check-out is before 11 o'clock. But please Write us before you arrive, sometimes is can also be flexible :)***___

Me, Cecilie from Denmark, and my boyfriend Mohanad from Syria live together in this appartment since almost 3 years.
We both study at the Berlin artschool Weissensee, Mohanad studies fine art and i study fashion design.
We rent out our guest room which is quiet and sunny.

Best
Cecilie and Mohanad

This announcement is reserved for Ukrainian refugees.

Оголошення для біженців з України. Немає орендної плати, щоб заплатити.

The space
Wir sind eine 3 köpfige WG, die wenn jemand nicht da ist, Platz hat, um Gäste zu empfangen. Es gibt immer ein Doppelbett. Außerdem haben wir noch ein kleines Gästezimmer. In dem steht eine Ausziehcouch.


Die Wohnung verfügt über 1 Gästebad und eine Gästetoilette.
Die Küche steht allen zur Verfügung.

Je nach aktueller Lebenslage haben wir mehr oder weniger Zeit. Wir freuen uns immer Menschen kennen zu lernen, gehen auch gerne mal etwas anschauen oder etwas essen. Wenn ihr Fragen habt, fragt.
Wir sprechen deutsch, englisch, französisch, italienisch, spanisch und giberish.

Das Viertel ist ziemlich grün, hat eine Menge Cafés und ist angenehm zu leben. Es gibt hier eigentlich alles, was man so braucht:
host_about: Schon immer war ich viel unterwgs und habe an anderen Orten nicht nur Ferien gemacht, sondern auch gearbeit. Mein Haus war immer für Fremde offen und soll es auch bleiben.

name: Modern, art apartment Berlin Mitte
description:
This charming, modern accommodation is perfectly located in the heart of Berlin Mitte, one of the oldest borrows of art and history in Berlin. Perfect, if you are searching for a demanding and cultural city trip as a couple ore by yourself.

The space
This charming apartment is located at centre of Auguststrasse, in the heart of Berlin's Mitte/Mitte district. The accommodation is very quiet, overlooking a beautiful green backyard. You will find everything you need for a cozy stay. Bed sheets and towels are provided, the kitchen is equipped with a coffee machine and basic utensils for cooking. The heart of the apartment is the round bed, perfect for relaxing after a day in the city, while the original art pieces exhibited on the wall give this place a very unique touch. Wifi, a 40" flat screen tv and a 3D blu-ray player compleat the set up.
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in one of the most popular streets of Berlin, lined with numerous art galleries, restaurants and fashionable boutiques. You can spend a perfect day strolling around in one of the oldest districts of Berlin, getting inspired by the Berlin art world, have a coffee in one of the nice cafes just around the corner, or lose yourself one of the fashionable urban boutiques.
host_about:
Seid 1995 führe ich erfolgreich eine Galerie für zeitgenössische Kunst in der Auguststraße. Meine Mitarbeiter und ich freuen uns gute Gastgeber zu sein. Wir lieben die kulturelle, gastronomische und internationale Vielfalt unseres Viertels.
Das motiviert uns unser bestes zu geben.

name: Room for 2 in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
We offer you one big, friendly designed room for two people: It's about 20 m² big and you can of course feel free to use the kitchen and the bathroom as well. We're located right at Volkspark Friedrichshain.

The space
We live here for around three years and really enjoy location and quietness of the area, while still being able to reach all vibrant places of Berlin within 10 minutes. The room is pretty spacious and cozily furnished - as devoted travellers ourselves we collected many many souvenirs which now decorate walls and shelves. A comfy bed for two, a few books to read if you like and WIFI for you. There's a kitchen too of course and a bath which you can feel free to use. If you're allergic to dogs, it's not exactly the right place for you - since we do have a Flat Coated Retriever. If you like dogs - perfect for you: enjoy free cuddles :)

Guest access
You'll get some keys
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood itself is pretty quiet. In front of the house you can have nice walks through the Friedrichshain park and climb up the bunker mountains to get a marvellous view over the city. They aren't real mountains btw - but made of all the rubble and the rest of the castle that was demolished after the war. Next to our place you can find one of Berlins party trams - the M10. It brings you to the cozy cafés and hip bars of Prenzlauer Berg and to the clubs of Friedrichshain within less than 10 minutes - and operates all night long. Alternatively you can take the bus 200 which brings you within 10-20 minutes to Alexanderplatz, Brandenburg Gate, Reichstag and Zoo. The district Bötzowviertel, in which we live, is excellent for having a stroll in the evening and enjoying delicious wine in one of the many small bars and cafés.

name: Gemütliche 1 ZI Wohnung in Neukölln
description:
Hallo,

ich kann euch gerne meine gemütliche, recht große, 1 Zimmer Wohnung (43qm/ 3. Stockwerk im ruhigen Hinterhof) untervermieten. Schaut einfach im Kalender welche Tage frei sind.

Bevorzuge Frauen oder ein nettes Paar :-)

The space
Die Wohnung ist aufgeteilt in Wohn- und Schlafzimmer und besitzt alles, was man zum Wohlfühlen braucht:
Großes, komfortables Doppelbett, Couch, Schreibtisch, große Küche, 3 Fenster mit viel Licht, die zum ruhigen Innenhof hinausgehen sowie einem Badezimmer mit Badewanne und Waschmaschine. 

Lage: die Wohnung liegt sehr zentral in Neukölln, auf der bekannten Hermannstrasse. Von der Wohnung aus sind es 3 Gehminuten zur U8 Linie, die einen direkt nach Kreuzberg und Mitte bringt, sowie 8 Gehminuten zum Anschluss S Bahn Hermannstrasse, wo auch der Ring lang geht. Auf der Hermannstrasse selber findet man neben lauter kleinen Bars, Trödelläden und Gemüsehändlern auch das Herman-Quartier mit dm Drogeriem
host_about:
Hallo liebe Leute,

mein Name ist Christina, ich wohne seit 2013 in Berlin und arbeite hier als selbstständige Texterin. In meiner Freizeit liebe ich es meinen Bezirk immer mehr zu erkunden, ich bin ehrenamtlich für benachteiligte Familien tätig und aktiv im Tierschutz. Ansonsten liebe ich Berlin von all seinen Seiten, genieße lange Nächte, die vielen Sprachen und das Gefühl Zuhause zu sein.

name: Gorgeous apartment in central Friedrichshain
description:
I'm renting my beautiful apartment. If you'd like to stay in a home away from home with all the facilities needed and close to all the nice Berlin areas (Mitte, Prenzlauerberg, Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg), let me know!

The space
My place is located in the 3th floor (no elevator) of an over 100 years old building, it's spacious, bright, clean and comfy. You will feel like home in a second. You'll have 2 bed rooms, living room, kitchen and the bathroom all to youself.
There is my bedroom and a guest room, both with double beds, the one in the guest room is only 1,20 m wide though.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is called Friedrichshain, one of the most popular places in Berlin right now. The nice thing is, that I live very central, but not in the middle of the touristy areas. Next to the place you will find supermarkets and some shops, but not so many bars, for that you might walk around 15 min or hop on the train right in front of my building.

name: Well-Designed Shiny Nest in the Heart of Berlin
description:
In my flat, you will find my own clothes, books, objects, furniture and artworks collected over the years from flea markets and local artists. As the flat overlooks a park, when opening the windows you will find yourself immersed in the green. The central location is a 15min metro or tram ride away from Alexanderplatz or the closest lake. Independent stores such as cafes, restaurants, the oldest bakery in Berlin and a cinema exclusively showing Russian films make the magic of the neighbourhood.

The space
The apartment is bright and newly decorated, it is on the 4th floor (there is a lift) of a recently renovated historic building dating to the beginning of the 20th century. In the flat you will find books and guides about Berlin, you can plan your stay ahead by checking the Berlin Welcome Card and Get Your Guide websites. Clean bedsheets, towels and essential toiletries will be waiting for you on-site. During your stay, you will stay green by using recycling bins
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the vibrant & historic neighbourhood of Prenzlauerberg. Mauerpark, the biggest flea market in Berlin featuring the rests of the Berlin Wall, is only a walk away. Weißer See which features a sand beach is only 15min away by bike or 20min away with the tram. You will find plenty of independent stores, cafes, restaurants around the area. Most of them are situated 5min away in Stargarderstraße where you will also find Hokey-Pokey: the best ice-cream in Berlin. The oldest bakery in Berlin Siebert Bakery is a walk away while Bäcker Kroll and Hacker Bäckerei also offer authentic german breads and cakes, DDR interiors are on the house. Only a few minutes away by foot, the UNESCO World Heritage Wohnstadt Carl Legien residential block is an entire complex in early Bauhaus style dating back to the 1920.
host_about:
Hallo! 

I’m Andrea Aimo and I have been living in Berlin since 2014 moving from London and founding my place in this vibrant city full of history. 

I work as a professional on the boundaries between creative and commercial enterprises. I like to explore and keep my options open. 

At the moment im full-time  learning German.

If you are staying at my place, don’t forget to check out the Guidebook of my favourite places in the neighbourhood and beyond. 

Thanks,

Andrea

description:
Beautifully spacious Berliner Altbau flat located in the heart of the trendy Gräfekiez in Kreuzberg. The flat was completely rennovated 2 years ago and is very bright and sunny, with high ceilings.

There are many café, bars &restaurantes in the neighborhood, an superb bakery and shops. The flat is next to a big park (Hasendheide), the Canal and only ten minutes drive by bike to the famous Tempelhofer Feld.

name: beautiful large room in kreuzberg
description: I'm subletting my room in Berlin-Kreuzberg from time to time when I'm traveling. You would live in a private room in a flat with 3 flat mates. From the flat it's a 5min walk to a boulevard, 2 parks and a subway station with 2 lines.
neighborhood_overview: You would live in a beautiful neighbourhood with 2 parks nearby - the Victoriapark and the Gleisdreieckpark - and the Bergmannstraße, a boulevard, just 5 minutes away from my flat, where you can go to a super market (open until midnight), have a drink in one of the bars (the  "Linomandier" is  probably the best place to get cocktails) or get some food in one of the restaurants (my favorit one is the "Felix Austria", a Austrian restaurant with the best Wiener Schnitzel in Kreuzberg, another "must eat" is the cake at "Mr. Minsch"). The "Flugfeld Tempelhof" - the airfield of a closed airport - is about 15 minutes away - if you were always dreaming of doing a  walk across an runway, here is your chance to do it.
host_about:
Hello!
...some hints about myself -
I live in Berlin for 3,5 years, when I started my studies. I enjoy the city very much, love the chaotic mixture of things to listen to and look at, spots to hang out and relax, people to talk with...
At the time I study Media Studies, Musicology, Economics and work at the Institute of Cultural Sciences at Humboldt University. But I am much on the move in the city - once I even succeeded the Berlin Marathon - but moslty just to visit concerts, exibitions, lectures, bars, clubs, etc.
