name: Sunny Luxury Penthouse with 3 Terraces, 3 bedrooms
description:
Our 180 sq meter home + 35 sqm terrace in SO36 has 2 bathrooms/showers, 3 double bedrooms (one of which is a nursery but can have a bed instead) & 3 terraces. Extremely central yet very quiet. Bright and sunny, it is 2 minutes from Berlin's best market, close to public transport (U1/U8/Bus), nightlife, East Side gallery, the river & more. We live in a family building and we like our neighbors so please, no parties. Great neighborhood for foodies! Please, only AirBnBers with at least 1 review.

The space
Our home is in the center of the famous Kreuzberg 36. We have lovely large terraces facing both south and north (with a view of the TV tower) where you can enjoy your morning coffee or evening glass of wine. If you aren't out in the city, you should really be hanging out on a terrace. There is also Markthalle IX within a minute away, which has the best market in Berlin, home to a fantastic bakery and Street Food Thursdays.

This is our home, so if you ne
neighborhood_overview:
Kreuzberg is the best neighborhood in berlin. It has amazing food, fun bars, and is so central that you can walk over into Friedrichshain or Neukölln within ten to fifteen minutes. People come from all over to visit Markthalle Neun, for fresh local produce, great food and especially for "Street Food Thursday", but for you, it will be just across the street.
There are also many, many parks nearby, and we will leave instructions for a day of walking around Berlin from Alexanderplatz to East Side Gallery, including where to eat along the way, which we do with all visiting guests.
host_about:
I'm Tally and I am an American polyglot living in Berlin working in academia and doing a PhD in neurolinguistics. I work in a research lab using brain imaging techniques to study the neurology of language processing and comprehension, and I teach BA students in German Studies about linguistics. Apart from languages, I love cooking (baking bread has been my latest obsession), traveling (especially if it is transcontinental), reading (I even have my own book club! though I secretly mostly read sci-fi), good music (from Arcade Fire to Led Zeppelin), robots (thank you, Assimov) and nice people. I've been in Berlin since 2008, and I've lived in Prenzlauer Berg,  Friedrichshain, and Neukölln before settling in Kreuzberg in 2014. If you let me stay in your home, I promise to handle it with care, and if you stay in mine, please do the same!

My partner is from France  (Brittany) and works in IT. He really loves German beer (especially beer from northern Bavaria), cooking and eating delicious food, Terry Pratchett, reggae music, and traveling with his awesome wife. We have three children who tag along with us on all our adventures and are growing up to be expert travelers themselves.

Situated on the border of the lively Neukölln and Kreuzberg districts, our light, cozy one bedroom Berlin apartment is perfectly placed. Comfortably sleeps 3 and is located on a quiet street. Plenty of cafes, restaurants and bars around the corner!

The space
- Sixth floor, 60m2 apartment with elevator access

neighborhood_overview: This area of Neukölln is great. Easily accessible by public transport and loads of nice places to eat and drink within a very short walk. Pannierstrasse and Weserstrasse are a nice place to start. There are a number of local shops to buy groceries as well as plenty of supermarkets (big and small) within walking distance. Kreuzberg is just a few minutes away - you can reach many of the more popular areas in 20 minutes by foot or travel 2 stops on the U8.

name: Sunlit 2BR Top Floor Apt in Mitte
description:
Enjoy the open atmosphere of our beautiful apartment, with sunlight from all sides, natural oak floors, north and south facing terraces, and a fully equipped open kitchen.

The space
This newly built loft-style apartment atop a classic Altbau (pre-war) building just 100 meters east of the former Berlin Wall has been designed in a unique style with beautiful wide natural oak floors in all rooms, natural stone tiles in the bathroom and natural light flooding the open living space, dining and kitchen area 360º.

90 square meters (970 sq ft).

2 bedrooms, one king-size organic coconut double mattress on tatami frame and one queen-size traditional double bed.

2 balconies, one facing north with charcoal grill and dining table, and one facing south with sunbed and a panoramic city view including the TV Tower. This side gets very warm on sunny days, great for sun-bathing and growing mediterranean vegetables in summer despite our continenta
neighborhood_overview:
Conveniently located in Berlin-Mitte, it's easy to get anywhere. Mitte's best shops, restaurants, bars, galleries, supermarkets are within one station away or less than 10-15 minutes by foot.

Despite its central location, our street is quiet, with hardly any traffic on our street, and is a great choice for guests with children or those who are sensitive to noise. Everything you need is within arm's reach by short walk, bike or U-Bahn, though nothing much directly on our street (hence the quiet). There are some basic shops/cafes on our block, a German restaurant/pub with its own microbrewery (good beer), the nearest supermarket is one U-Bahn stop away. 2 minutes away by foot is the old Berlin Wall "death strip" which was converted into a nice park with volleyball courts, beach bars, rockclimbing area and playgrounds, extending into an outdoor exhibit about the former wall. Nice cafes and restaurants around Nordbahnhof and Oranienburger Tor, all about 10 minutes walking distan
host_about: Concert pianist based in Berlin. Plant grower and food lover.

Bei mir findet ihr eine liebevoll eingerichtete Wohnung und ohne Ende Musikinstrumente! Mein Lebensmotto? Man kann alles, wenn man's kann :)

I jut moved to Berlin. Living in this amazing city, I want to give others the opportunity to get to know the city as well, not spending 120 bucks on an unpersonal hotel.
You'll find my appartement being furnished in a affectionate way and a whole lot of music-instruments as well!

name: Nice room in Berlin Wedding, new apartment
description:
Hey there,

Im renting my room during the time I am away. This is a shared apartment. You'd stay with girls only (f, 21 & 20, both students) who are very laid back. Smoking is allowed only on the kitchen. The entire place is well equiped, spacious and modern. WiFi is available, as well as a kitchen, washing machine and a modern bathroom

The space
There's Charly. Meet Charly, the retarded Chiuauha.
neighborhood_overview:
Wedding is an amazing area as we think. Other than Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain, this is none of the super trendy areas. However, Wedding is very vivid, and it is classic Berlin. When you really want to get an impression of how local life here in Berlin is - this is the place you should visit. Because most tourists don't.
Just ask as, we'd be happy to give you any recommendation to turn your visit into a great time! We have a craft beer brewery just around the corner, we have multi cultural street life and food, it's all cheap as hell. In summer, there is the only lake here which is in the inner area of Berlin.
Still, Wedding is quiet well connected to the public transport of Berlin. Takes you 10 minutes to go to the city center and about 20-25 minutes to go to Kreuzberg.

name: Sunny Rooftop Design Studio XKölln
description:
Newly renovated small Designer Penthouse (sleeps 2) in Berlin's new trendy district Kreuzkölln, located on the 6th floor (with elevator) with a huge terrace, overlooking the Berlin skyline! Furnished with everything you need,your home away from home!

The space
We are traveling a lot, also using Airbnb. We know how important it is to stay in a comfortable and nice environment when away from home. Therefore we have furnished this newly renovated little penthouse the way we would like it to be when staying in a foreign place. We mixed modern design by Kartell and Artemide with very few IKEA pieces and a couple of vintage furniture, creating a stylish but also cozy place.
A wooden oakwood floor and a modern bath with GROHE faucets and Duravit sink/toilet bowl, a modern fully equipped kitchen, lots of technology for business and pleasure and last but not least a really comfortable French doublebed (1.60m) complete the interior.
Located on the 6th floor (elev
neighborhood_overview:
The area you are staying at is called "Kreuzkölln" , a mixture of both Kreuzberg and Neukölln. It is the most international and centrally located new hotspot for cultural interested and open minded visitors and soon-to-be Berliners. Enjoy from here one of the most fascinating cities in the world: Be Berlin!
The so-called Reuter-Kiez (Kiez= small neighborhood) offers you countless possibilities: small and individual shops (second-hand and antique/vintage), lots of small bars, cafés and restaurants as well as a couple of art galleries. The also well known Gräfe-Kiez is just on the opposite side of the park in front of the building. By the way did you know that Berlin is the world's capital of Bitcoins? Especially here in Kreuzkölln you can pay with Bitcoins at a lot of places. A short walking distance away is the Maybachufer/ Paul-Linke-Ufer where you can find a farmer's market every Saturday. Kreuzkölln is a typical multicultural neighborhood with a lot of shopping facilities: su
host_about: We love to travel and always made positive experiences while staying in B&Bs or private apartments around the world. We learn more about the cities, the people and the surroundings and it’s also a great possibility to make new friends. The world has become so small and you never know if you see each other again somewhere else...

neighborhood_overview:
Der Plänterwald und die Spree sind gegenüber, und es gibt einen schönen Fuß- und Radweg am Fluss entlang ins benachbarte Trendviertel Kreuzberg. Häuser aus der Zeit der Jahrhundertwende, viele Bäume, der Park und der Fluß machen das Wohngebiet besonders. Die Wege ins Stadtzentrum mit Bus und S-Bahn sind kurz und einfach.


An urban forest and the river Spree are across the road. There's a nice way along the river (for cycling or walking) to the trendy neighbourhood Kreuzberg. Houses from around 1900, the many trees, the big park and the river do make the area special. Ways into the city centre by train or bus are short and comfortable. We speak German , English , Russian and a little bit of Arabic.

name: Chic, bright top floor flat, ideal for a couple
description:
Beautiful bright top floor flat in the trendy area of north Neukölln (also known as Kreuzkölln), 1 minute away from the Weserstraße and the Landwerkanal.

The space
The flat is located in a very quiet courtyard on the 4th and top floor. The flat is 75 m2 large. You will have full access and private use of the bedroom with a comfortable queen-size bed, a large living room with a comfy sofa and flat TV screen, an equipped kitchen/dining area with induction and a 6 people dining table, a bathroom with a shower and a balcony facing south on which you will be able to enjoy the sun all day long. The flat is so quiet that you can appreciate the sound of singing birds when you wake up.

Induction, multifunction oven, fridge, Bialetti coffee maker, dishes, cutlery, pots and pans, kettle, towels (2 bigs and 2 small towels), dish soap, sponges, bed linen (1 pair even for long stays), hair dryer, hand soap, and vacuum cleaner are the basic equipment of the apartmen
neighborhood_overview:
The location is very central and well connected to the BVG Berlin transport network. BER airport is 40 minutes far from the apartment with public transport and 15/20 min by Taxi/Uber.

You are 1 minute far from the trendy Weserstraße where you can find many restaurants and bars.
host_about:
Hi!
My name is Hélène, I come from France but I've been living in Berlin since 2007. I fell in love with the city and the people from here. I also love travelling, discovering new places and meeting new people from all over the world.

Hallo. Biete meine schöne Wohnung zur Untermiete an.

The space
Meine Wohnung ist mit Liebe und viel Individualität eingerichtet. Man findet hier alles was man zum Leben braucht. Ich stelle gern meinen Computer und auch die Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. Wer eines meiner Bücher lesen will nimmt es sich aus dem Schrank, dasselbe gilt für meine Gitarre.
neighborhood_overview: Wer Natur mag hat die Berliner Spree direkt vor der Haustür, sowie einen riesigen Park und eine Halbinsel. Die Wohnung ist umgeben von vier Elektronik Clubs. (Wilde Renate und About Blanc, Else und Magdalena) Hier kommen Gäste auf ihre Kosten die die Berliner Elektroszene schätzen. Aber keine Sorge: In meinen 4 Wänden ist es ruhig, auch bei offenem Fenster hört man kaum etwas von der Stadt. In nur 10 Minuten zu Fuß findet man sich  zwischen vielen tollen Restaurants und Bars wieder. touristische Orte, wie zum Beispiel die East Side Gallery sind in 15 Minuten zu erreichen.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in Berlin Mitte
description:
Hey Leute,

ihr sucht über die Feiertage ein gemütliches Fleckchen in der Hauptstadt!? Dann seid ihr hier genau richtig!
Shoppen in der Friedrichstraße, ein Besuch am Brandenburger Tor oder Kultur auf der Museumsinsel? Max. 15 Gehminuten entfernt

The space
Die Lage der Wohnung ist aussergewöhnlich gut! 5 Gehminuten entfernt befindet sich die Friedrichstrasse, in der du dich glücklich shoppen kannst. Ausserdem befinden sich Berliner Dom, die Museumsinsel, das Brandenburger Tor und der Reichstag höchstens 15 Minuten von dir entfernt! Du bist also mittendrin!
Für dein leibliches Wohl ist rund um den Gendarmenmarkt ebenfalls gesorgt. Falls du dich aber entschliesst, selbst (in unserer top Küche) zu kochen, kannst du zwischen 3 Supermärkten auswählen, die um die Ecke liege!
Die U - Bahnlinie 2 hält direkt vor der Haustüre und befördert dich in weniger als 5 Minuten zum Alexanderplatz in die eine, und Potsdamer Platz in die andere Richtung!<

name: Bright space in beautiful area
description:
Warm & bright apartment with wooden floor in Berlin´s most beautiful, original and divers neighbourhood. 8 minutes to the canal, in the middle of Kreuzberg. 4 Minutes to Südstern, subway station and Bus M41 to Central Station and Potsdamer Platz. Lots and lots of Cafés & Restaurants, alone 3 vegan places close around!

The space
Nice and warm and big apartment (60m²) with an extra Bedroom towards the quiet courtyard and a good double bed. The spacious and lightflooded living room invites you to relax on the huge sofa (also nice for aditional guests to sleep on). The big window towards south gives you lots of light and a really nice view over.
Seperate kitchen with an extra dining area beside. Bathroom with a shower.

Guest access
Good Wifi and there is a nice kitchen aid for smoothies, a coffee maker, herbs and spices, sugar, coffee, tea, lots of interresting spiritual and philosophical books, a tv, Dvds, CDs, WiFi, towels, bedding - all
neighborhood_overview:
Fantastic neighbourhood. You will need several days to explore in all directions, but to make a beginning, you just start from the street of your place here. A vegan Café called "No milk today" :) with damn good coffee right across, and two more vegan places next street. Also all kind of other places to eat and drink and explore and relax. Habibi, a great Arab fast food restaurant (still very cozy!), one of the best German organic bakeries "Beumer & Lutum", SeeRose, a vegetarian Bufett Restaurant with really yummy stuff, run by a Persian couple etc etc etc
Towards the right you walk to the canal were the scenerie is becoming even more alive and divers. It leads you to the heard of Kreuzberg, Admiralbrücke, Kottbusser Tor, Oranienstr, to name only a few.
You wont be home often.
And: Kreuzberg is still one of the cheapest districts!
host_about:
A real Berliner, in love with the city and in love with life. We, my flatmate, my teenage  son and I, love to have guests and like to connect with people from all over the world. We are both interested in creating a new consciousness and culture in this world, because we think it is high time. We speak German and English and Andreas and I speak  Spanish, too.

When we are at home we rent out one room.
We mostly have vegan food, but are not dogmatic about it. So you will find things like ricemilk and soymilk, coconutoil and whole sugar etc and can give you good hints for the good shops to get vegan stuff.

With the subway U5 you can reach the ALEXANDER PLATZ in 10 minutes, the ROTE RAHTHAUS in 12 minutes, UNTER DEN LINDEN / MUSEUMS INSEL in 14 minutes, the BRANDENBURGER TOR in 18 minutes and the HAUPTBAHNHOF BERLIN in 20 minutes without having to change trains.

bedroom

neighborhood_overview:
The Stasi Museum Berlin is only a 5-minute walk from the apartment

The Stasi Museum is located in House 1 on the former site of the headquarters of the GDR Ministry for State Security (MfS). The house was built in 1960/61 as the official residence of Erich Mielke, who was Minister for State Security from 1957 until the end of the GDR.
On January 15, 1990, demonstrators took possession of the Stasi headquarters.
A week later, the Central Round Table, a committee made up of representatives of the SED dictatorship and civil rights groups, decided that a "memorial and research center for GDR Stalinism" should be set up in Building 1. Since this declaration of intent remained, members of the Berlin Citizens' Committee and other civil rights activists took the initiative and began to secure the historic site. In August they founded the Anti-Stalinist Action (ASTAK) e.V., which opened the "Research and Memorial Site Normannenstraße" on November 7, 1990 with the exhibition

hello I'm Michael from Heliodor Apartments and I'm happy to welcome you to my city.

If you have any questions or problems during your stay don´t hesitate to call me any time of the day. I‘m here to help you enjoy your holidays.

name: Topfloor design-apartment w. roof terrace in Mitte
description:
This very bright and cosy 54 square meter rooftop apartment is located at the highest elevation of Berlin, right between the districts Mitte & Prenzlauer Berg. 2 separate rooms, great views over the city from the roof terrace in the summer, or from the couch behind the big window front in the winter! Stylish black bathroom, fully equipped kitchen, blinds for late risers.

The space

host_about: I work actually as an author for historical documentary films. My interest is valid for painting, politics, history, biology and aviation. I am close-knit since the my studies with the history of Berlin and I would like to give an understanding of this also to my guests. Berlin is an inspiring place. Until 1989 you had to pass the Iron Curtain if you wanted to visit the two halfs of Berlin. After the breackdown of the wall Berlin re-experienced a reincarnation. Creative people from all over the world came to this place and enriched its cultural charisma, also by painting the last pieces of the Berlin wall. But Berlin was also in the centre of two World wars and of the Holocaust. The traces of these historical events of the mankind shaped the character of the town in many ways. Berlin was also a front town during the Cold war. American and Soviet tanks were stationed in the two parts of the now German capital and ready to fight the Third world war. Last but not least Berlin is a world-known cultural centre with famous museums and art galeries. Prominent castles, well known museums, world-famous theaters, historical places, old churches and other buildings belong to these highlights like in other European capitals.  But many attractions of Berlin are situated in the neighborhood and not in the town itself. Some of the German kings and emperors  erected important palaces outside of the capital because they didn' t like the old buildings of their fathers and grandfathers or they had other reasons. At the end of the Second World War most of Berlin was destructed. The victorious Allied Powers needed locations outside of Berlin to discuss and decide the further destinity of Germany. So they went to Potsdam. Last but not least the Berlin wall did not only devide the two parts of Berlin but it also surrounded and confined West-Berlin. Famous "holes in the wall" like the Glienicke Bridge are today part of this neighborhood.

name: Big, calm and cozy Berlin apartment
description:
Based in central Neukölln, one of Berlin's most popular quarters, this flat is nice and cozy, your room spacious and bright. Since your room is the living room, you'll have the balcony and of course you're invited to use the well equipped kitchen and bathroom. The apartment offers everything needed and the room we rent out is perfect for one person, couples or two friends.

The space
This flat is a REAL flat. I live in here and only rent it out from time to time. This means, you will have access to my private space. That's ok for me, but also demands a certain respect. On the other hand, you can live something truly original in Berlin, not a flat that has only been rented for making it a flat to be sublet. You'll see my flat is personalized and not a sterile hospital room but a place to feel really good in.

Sometimes we rent out a second room for up to two people, so when the offer is set to up to 4 people, there will be a big second room with a queen s

host_about: I live and work in Berlin, the capital city of Germany, where I enjoy the many colours of a buzzing life and where I love meeting people and making particular experiences. I adore travelling and, in contrast to fast pace Berlin, I seek the calm and relaxing sides, look and reach out for nature and are much more interested in basic and moderate things. I like the solitude when holidays can provide it and try to find many  moments in everything, especially food and nature.

name: Modern, sunny 130 sqm 3-level  home
description:
Welcome to our very comfortable and sunny home in southwest Berlin. Our corner townhouse is spread over 130 sqm on 3 floors, 3 bedrooms, 1 full & 1 half-bath, a garden, a patio for outdoor parties and a large terrace adjacent to the top floor.

The space
I share my home with my family & sons, 16 & 13 years old. The house is situated in the southwest corner of Berlin. It has a very modern & open floor planning with 3 bedrooms, 1&1/2 baths a large terrace, patio & garden for outdoor fun. Depending on our travel plans, you may also park on my private parking space.

Guest access
There are LAN connections and Wi-Fi access throughout the house. Guests can utilize all of the rooms in the house and of course the garden area. You may use the grill and play in the yard.

Other things to note
If you stay during the warm weather season. Please water the grass and flowers in the garden. Thank you!

License number
neighborhood_overview: My house is on a quiet street that is close to many walking, biking and running paths. The Teltow canal is 1 km away. There is a supermarket, pharmacy, cleaners, bike, lotto & döner shops in walking distance. On Thursdays & Saturdays a local farmer's market takes place in the street. The (loud) church bells across the street ring 2x daily.
host_about: I'm originally from the Northeast Coast of America and have been living in Germany for many years. I love the city of Berlin from a historical standpoint and it has now become a multi-cultural metropolis in Central Europe. An interesting aspect about Berlin is that it is a very large city with each district having a distinct flair. My 'hood, Zehlendorf, is located in SouthWest old villa quarter of Berlin that lends itself to outdoor activities. Being a huge fan of the great outdoors, this is the perfect location for me to enjoy my passion, but also travel to the city center quickly.

name: Homely Room in Friedrichshain
description:
This homely room with large balcony in Berlin-Friedrichshain, right in the city center, is part of a beautiful apartment with three friendly flat mates aged 22 to 25. The area is fantastic and so are the transport connections! See you soon!

The space
Our shared apartment is harmonic and consists of close friends. The apartments has high ceilings with stucco and a beautiful plank floor. Two balconys allow you to smoke outside without leaving the house.

Guest access
You'll have access to all you need: a beautiful room, a large balcony, a nice kitchen, bathroom and toilet.
neighborhood_overview:
Our apartment is perfectly located for any kind of Berlin visitor. Berghain and Watergate, two of the world's most famous night clubs are within easy walking distance. You will also not be disappointed if you're more interested in urban subculture, shopping or sightseeing. Friedrichshain is full of interesting places. The "East Side Gallery" for example, the only remaining part of the Berlin Wall, is just a few minutes by foot away. And the rest of Berlin can easily be reached by public transport which picks you up just in front of the door.

name: Minimalist Loft
description:
Minimal and luminous brand-new Loft situated heart of the trendy area of Neukölln, next to the park Tempelhofer Feld. The room is ideal for a couple who wants to enjoy the charm of Berlin in a modern atmosphere of a contemporary Loft.

The space
It’s in the middle of the new trendy and lively area of Neukölln, that the spacious Loft is located. Once upstairs ( the apartment is on the 5th floor) you can enjoy from the terrace the view and the calm that Berlin’s roofs give.
The really luminous Loft is completely new, the construction work has been ended in January 2015.
The loft has only two closed rooms: the bathroom and the guest bedroom, the rest of the apartment is open-door.
The kitchen is brand-new and offers an gas cooktop, toaster, fridge, freezer, water heater and dish washer.
The dining area is in front of the big plate glass window overlooking the terrace.
The bathroom offers a bathtub and a spacious shower with rain shower a
neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood of Neukölln is considered by many the “hippest” part of Berlin, there are lot of bars ( for example on the Weserstr. / Station: Hermannplatz), new restaurants and shops.
At the end of the street you can find the huge park called Tempelhofer Feld. You can go for a run or to enjoy a beer or a sunbath in the grass, after that you will probably feel like a local!

Moinmoin,
Im fröhlichen Lichtenberg steht euch ein 18m² Zimmer zur Verfügung. Das Wohnzimmer, Küche, und Bad könnt ihr euch mit meinem Mitewohner teilen.
Den Bahnhof erreicht ihr bequem in 10 Minuten. von dort stehen euch die Tore der Stadt offen.

The space
Moinmoin,
wir haben eine 3 Zimmerwohnung im schönen Weitlingkiez. Ausgestattet mit Küche, Bad, wohnzimmer und 2 privaten Zimmern. Eines davon gehört Daniel. Deinem künftigen Mitbewohner.
Die Wohnung befindet sich im dritten Stock und morgens scheint über den großzügen Innenhof die Sonne in Bad, Küche und Wohnzimmer. Die Privatzimmer werden am Nachmittag mit Sonne beglückt.

Die Nutzung von Geschirr, Mes
neighborhood_overview:
Lichtenberg ist schön ruhig, und trotzdem richtig nah am Zentrum. Egal ob ihr feiern und ein Bierchen trinken wollt, Kulter genießen wollt oder einfach durch Kreuzberg ziehn wollt. Alles erreicht ihr von Haustür zu Haustür in 20-30 Minuten.
Zum S-, U-Bahnhof Lichtenberg lauft ihr 10 Minuten von dort fährt die Stadtbahn (S7, S5 S75) tagsüber im Schnitt, alle 3 Minuten. Am Wochenende nachts auch alle 15 Minuten. Der Nachtbus bringt euch nach unter der Woche zu später Stunde ins warme Bett.

name: Casual & Spacious flat in Mitte
description:
Great location: museums, galleries, parks, canals, cafes, restaurants, shopping, nightlife. S-Bahn, U-Bahn and Tram right outside the door. Located in quiet courtyard. Double bed in each room with good quality mattress. Full kitchen. Large bathroom.

The space
2 bedroom 90 square meter flat is located in an Altbau from 1887, in the courtyard of the building, so it is very quiet and peaceful, no street noise at all. It features high ceilings and large windows. The design is simple but comfortable. The living room has a large 8 person dining table as well as a good sound system that you can easily plug any device into. Perfect for entertaining or working. The kitchen is fully equipped with anything a cook may need, including a dishwasher. The flat also has a washing machine and clothes hanger.

Guest access
The whole flat is accessible.
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is awesome; markets, galleries, restaurants, bars, museums, parks, flea markets... It is a few walking minutes from Museum Island, Mon Bijou park and the canal. 2 train stops or a 15 min walk to Brandenburg Gate and the Tiergarten. Trains and trams to anywhere in the city run directly outside of the building. It is just a few stops to Kreuzberg, Neukölln, Charlottenburg, Prenzlauerberg, etc.
host_about: I am a Canadian/American currently living on my farm in Victoria BC, Canada, with lots of dogs, horses and other animals. I also still spend much of my time at my other home in Los Angeles. I have previously lived in Berlin and enjoyed sharing that home with other Airbnb guests. I love Depeche Mode, horror films, and a good martini.

Different supermarkets and convenientstores are just several meters away and offer you the possibility to do some shopping even at nighttime. You also find a huge range of different restaurant and foodpalors in walkingdistance, including the best and most romantic pasta and pizza restaurant in town (Sapporito and Pomodorino) where you can enjoy heavenly food and real italian flair for more than decent prices. With tram M10 you are in downtown Friedrichshain within several minutes where you can enjoy the vibrant Berlin spirit in several bars, cafés, botiques and restaurants. The closeby RAW-Gelände offers partyseekers a variety of clubs and bars for all tastes of music. name: Nice and quiet room in flatshare
description:
The room has some experimental DIY furniture inside and has access to a south-side balcony. It is in a flatshare of 5 other people who would also enjoy hanging out with you. The bed is 1,40 m wide, so two people can sleep in it.

The space
The room has some self-made experimental furniture in it. There is an expandable desk, a shelf made from pallettes and a bed that can be pulled up to the ceiling. Apart from the furniture, the room is empty at the moment, as there is a gap between one person moving out and another person moving in.

There are 5 other people living in the flat. There is a big living room where we like to hang out together. We are between 22 and 27 years old, some of us studying, some of us already working, some of us doing something else. name: kinderfreundliche Whg in Neukölln
description:
Die Wohnung verfügt über ein Wohn- und ein Schlafzimmer, Küche und Bad. Im Schlafzimmer gibt es ein 160 cm breites Bett. Außerdem gibt es eine 90 cm breite Gästematratze auf dem Boden.

The space
Die Wohnung eignet sich für 2-3 Erwachsene ohne Kind oder für 1-2 Erwachsene mit 1 Kind. Es gibt Spielsachen im Wohnzimmer, die (mit Sorgfalt) benutzt werden dürfen. Alle Steckdosen sind kindersicher.

Die Wohnung hat eine Größe von ca. 65 m². Das Wohnzimmer und das Schlafzimmer sind etwa gleich groß. Im Schlafzimmer gibt es ein 160 cm breites Bett. Außerdem gibt es eine 90 cm breite Gästematratze auf dem Boden. Auf der Matratze kann man auch im Wohnzimmer übernachten, das Zimmer ist verdunkelbar, allerdings ist es nicht ganz so ruhig, da es an der Straßenseite liegt. Das Schlafzimmer liegt an der (ruhigeren) Hofseite.

Das Gitterbett und der Hochstuhl, die auf den Fotos zu sehen sind, sind leider nicht mehr verfügbar.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: Ich empfehle einen Spaziergang am Landwehrkanal. Einen großen Kinderspielplatz gibt es in unmittelbarer Nähe, auf dem Weichselplatz.

description:

The space
Unsere Wohnung ist in einem Einfamilienhaus , ruhige Lage , im grünen Zehlendorf. Sie liegt im 1. Stock und hat 2 Zimmer - Küche - Bad. Im Garten haben wir eine Sitzecke für Gäste wo auch gegrillt werden kann. Im Wohnbereich befindet sich ein kostenloser Möbelsafe.

name: Bright, airy apartment w/ balcony
description:
Make yourself at home in my beautiful, freshly renovated apartment located in the conveniently central, yet calm and cozy Schillerkiez area of Neukölln, surrounded by many cafes, bars and attractions, and with great transport links to central Berlin.

The space
My modern, freshly renovated apartment is very spacious and wonderfully bright and airy, with views of the quiet church square in front and extremely conveniently located in regards to restaurants, cafes, bars and local attractions, as well as great public transport connections. There is a king size bed, plus a spare queen size mattress, and the couch folds out into a double bed too.

Guest access
You'll have access to the whole apartment, comprising a spacious living room including a projector connected to an Apple TV with Netflix access, plus a PlayStation 3; big bedroom with plenty of space to store your travel items comfortably; a large balcony perfect for breakfasting in the sun;
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is directly in the centre of the rapidly developing, yet still quaint and neighbourly quarter of Neukölln known as Schillerkiez.

The centrepiece is undoubtedly the Tempelhofer Field, a previously fully functioning airport that has in the past years been converted into an enormous and untouched public space that attracts thousands of wanderers, cyclists and kite flyers, as well as

There's no shortage of wonderfully cozy cafes and bars, as well as restaurants ranging from burgers to Sudanese to Vietnamese to Italian.

There are also several supermarkets in the area, including one just the other side of the square and another specialising in delicious yet affordable Turkish food.
host_about:
I'm Mike, an Australian guy living in Berlin since 2010. I love living in Berlin and what it has to offer; green spaces; so many cozy cafes, bars and restaurants; clubs to dance all night; history, culture and interesting stories everywhere you look.

I love riding bikes, spending time with friends, laughing, music, cooking, technology and science, reading and learning new things. And of course travelling, there are so many places on my list that I'd love to see someday.

description:
Unsere Hotel-Pension bietet dem Langzeitbucher ein gemütliches Zuhause mit allem Komfort

The space
Die „Hotel-Pension am Rüdesheimer Platz“ bietet Ihnen für längere Aufenthalte gemütliche Unterkunft.
Die ruhige und zentrale Lage rund um den wunderschönen Rüdesheimer Platz bietet beste Mobilität. So sind die U-Bahnhöfe Rüdesheimer Platz, Heidelberger Platz, Walter-Schreiber-Platz und diversen Busstationen in wenigen Minuten erreichbar.
Außerdem befinden sich ganz in der Nähe Supermärkte sowie kleine, interessante Einzelhandelsläden, die im idyllischen Kiez zum Shopping einladen. Banken, Post, Friseure, Kosmetik, Ärzte, Restaurants, Cafés und Bistros finden Sie ebenfalls im direkten Umfeld.
Unsere Unterkunft im schönen Rheingauviertel rund um den Rüdesheimer Platz ist raucherfrei. Sie ist komfortabel und geschmackvoll eingerichtet, mit allem was Sie für Ihren Aufenthalt benötigen, natürlich auch Wäsche.
Sind Sie nur vorübergehend in Berlin?

name: Large Sunny Room with Balcony
description:
Large sunny room with balcony in a 110 square meter apartment in the chill and international neighborhood of Rixdorf.

I'm an artist/photographer and I'll be welcoming you to my lovely place.
A great place to relax after a day outside.

The apartment is well located and only a 3min walk to the "ringbahn" ( train with quick connections to the entire city) and hipster bars, cafés, parks and canals are all within a few minute walk.

20 min from BER Airport ( 2 stops to the non-stop Airport Train)

The space
This newly remodeled “1910 Altbau” is ideal for people who are on vacation or looking for a temporary place for remote working.
You will be staying in a large, sunny, bedroom with hardwood floor and a cute balcony.

There is fast Wi-Fi throughout the house and a working space with a table, light, plugs etc.

The apartment receives plenty of light from morning to evening. There are three rooms total: on o
neighborhood_overview:
Great up-and-coming neighborhood for those who like to be close to but not in the middle of the tourist-filled madness. This neighborhood is special because it has both a preserved history and a new one being written.
The apartment is situated right between Tempelhofer Park (3 stops), Körner (1 stop) and Treptower Park (1 stop), all within 5-10 minutes by bike or a few stops with the S-bahn, great for lazy Sundays.

The infamous canals are a walking distance from here, a great place to chill for a beer or a nice walk.
My apartment is also within walking distance of the historical landmark “Rixdorf” and Richardplatz and Böhmischer Platz. The bustling Karl-Marx street is 10 min on foot with access to the U7, shopping malls, and a Turkish mega grocery store, döner, McDonalds, Thai etc.
Grocery stores are all minutes away. There are some local “Kneipen” and “Hipster Bars”, Späti’s (liquor shop), Bakeries, Specialty Cafes, Thai and Turkish spots just around the co
host_about:
Hi guys,
I've been living in Berlin for 6 years now. Before that I was living in San Francisco for over a decade, as well as Switzerland as a kid. Photography, traveling, music, basketball and cooking are some of my favorite things.
I enjoy experiencing different cultures and traditions and that's probably why I've traveled this much and enjoy hosting people at my apartment.
I'm a pretty outgoing guy but I also respect the privacy of my guests, so I tend to just play it by ear. I'm always open to give suggestions on places to see, food to eat and clubs to party in. 
I love Berlin!!! come and join...

Das eine oder andere Event? Kulturelles? Sprecht mich darauf an....
Bleibt gesund und alsbald wieder willkommen in einer tollen Stadt!

Please feel at home in our flat! We have an open kitchen space where we cook and socialise. We cook a lot so you will find most of the utensils that you need, as well as basic ingredients such a oil and spices which you are free to use. In addition we have a washing machine in case you need it, and there is a laundrette nearby for drying. You will find several supermarkets and a Turkish market nearby.

neighborhood_overview:
You will be staying in a very busy area in Berlin, where many things going on. There are many bars (non and smokes) , restaurants, small shops and galleries in the neighborhood..
Just few steps away you already have a great Spanish tapas bar, Asian, Italian, German and the Weserstrasse which is a street full of any other kind.
Great and cheap places to eat which cater to the turkish and arab community.
All just around the corner.
On sundays but also during the week you can explore the cafés, parks and flea-markets which are all in a pleasant walk distance along the canal.
The Warschauer Straße which is famous for its nightlife can be reached within a 20 minutes walk if you are interested in club scene,
but also has a busy sundays flee market and many good places to enjoy a coffee or food.
Kreuzberg is a 20 min walk from here, but also subways and busses can get you there even faster.
The subway can get you fast to the upper town, to all tourist

name: Dreamy apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
A 40 sqm. second floor apartment on a leafy street between U-Bahn Eberswalderstr. and charming Helmholtzplatz. There is a large main room with a double bed, a separate small kitchen and separate bathroom.

The space
The space has a particular hideout charm: on a lively street with bars and restaurants but completely peaceful inside, looking over a green back yard.

Other things to note
There are usual signs of wear and tear in the flat, but everything works well and is kept clean.

This is a legal listing: the flat has the official permission from the district authority to be rented out short term for part of the year. This requires keeping a hotel-style guest book where guests are asked to confirm their name, dates of stay, address and date of birth. The information is used for the sole purpose of fulling the requirement of the district authority.

License number
03/Z/RA/004753-19
neighborhood_overview: The flat is in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. On the one hand, it is an excellent base to explore the rest of the city. On the other hand, you will be tempted to stay within 15 minute walk from the apartment! Countless bars, restaurants, cinemas, shops, Kulturbrauerei and Mauerpark are all within immediate reach.

name: Bright room with Balcony, Neukolln
description:
Great location close to Tempelhof, Korner Park, and many cafe', bars and clubs as well as supermarkets and everything else you need.

The space
It's a beautiful oldstyle Berlin building, with high ceilings, big windows and wooden floors.

Guest access
You will have access to the kitchen and bathroom, and please use our towels and anything you need in the kitchen.
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is a mixture of quiet, with parks in walking distance including Temelhofer Feld (the old airport) and many others, small cafes, busy bars, and nightclubs a few stations/walking distance away ( Griessmuhle, Berghain, Sameheads, Greenhouse, the Ziegrastrasse area for live music and clubs). There's a very reasonably priced Asian restaurant 5 mins away, as well as many other eating options and supermarkets which are very close by.
host_about: Hi! I am a 31 year old artist, musician and bookmaker from England, living in Berlin since almost 10 years. I speak German almost fluently, and am working on some other languages! I travel as much as I can, and enjoy spontaneous trips to the sun or mountains to escape the Berlin winters. I am very respectful of the places I stay, and treat them I would expect my own home to be treated.  I love to meet new people. so meeting the hosts is always an added bonus.  As a host, I am very helpful in giving tips of where to go depending on what kind of trip you want, quickly answering any questions guests may have. My (Hidden by Airbnb) are very welcoming, and we share everything and enjoy sharing our time with guests whether it´s over wine or dinner that we cook together, but do not expect our guests to be tied to staying in the apartment.. you are free to come and go as you please, and feel free to share time with us how you want! We also have a wonderful balcony in summer, which you can get to directly from my room:) I am also currently co-hosting an apartment in Berlin with a friend, so I take care of greeting people on check ins and cleaning the apartment while they´re away.

description:
Im beliebten Kiez Prenzlauer Berg, direkt am Mauerpark, wartet ein Zimmer (Doppelbett) und ein eigenes Bad in einer großzügigen Penthouse-Wohnung (Fußbodenheizung) mit Terrasse auf netten Besuch. Please scroll down for English text.

The space
Please scroll down for English text

Berlin ist nicht leise! Der Prenzlauer Berg ist ein beliebter und belebter Kiez. Im Sommer wird es auf den Straßen auch schon mal nach 22 Uhr gefeiert. Zudem fährt die Tram direkt am Haus vorbei. Wer lärmempfindlich ist, sollte bei geschlossenen Fenstern schlafen, dann ist absolute Ruhe.

English

Es gibt unzählbar viele tolle Bars und Restaurants, zahlreiche Galerien, sowie coole Shops und gemütliche Cafés. Auch touristische Attraktionen wie der Mauerpark, Die Gedenkstätte Berliner Mauer, das Brandenburger Tor / Unter den Linden, die Museumsinsel oder der Alexanderplatz sind gut zu Fuß zu erreichen. Das quirlige Berlin liegt also direkt vor der Tür!

description:
Our lovely penthouse apartment is located in the center of Berlin. In the direct surroundings you can find the Bergmannstraße, four beautiful parks and the Tempelhofer Feld. In the apartment and on its roof, you can enjoy a wonderful view over Berlin.

The space
The apartment is very flexible and open. It is about 80 m² with 2 bedrooms. The apartment has an open kitchen and a bathroom whith satined glass bricks. The fantastic terrace is very big and sunny and because the apartment has a east-west location you can watch the stunnig sunrise an sunset every day.

neighborhood_overview: The neighbours are kind and we have a good relationship to them. The location is quiet in the evenings and at the weekend, because of the school across the street. Therefore you have a wide view from the apartment and won't have any problems to find available parking places. You can easily reach the parks Hasenheide, Urbanhafen, Viktoria Park, Gleidreieck Park and Tempelhofer Feld. Also very close to the apartment is the Marheinekeplatz with the Markthalle and the Bergmannstraße with lots of cafés and boutiques. Nearby is also a indoor swimming pool for the wintertime and a outdoor swimming pool in summer.

name: 3-Lau-Wohnen mit Gemütlichkeit Rüdesheimer Platz
description:
Unsere gemütliche Unterkunft liegt zentral und trotzdem ruhig im beliebten grünen Berliner Rheingauviertel zu dem der wunderschöne Rüdesheimer Platz gehört.

The space
Die Hotel-Pension bietet Ihnen für den längeren Aufenthalt eine gemütliche Unterkunft.
Die ruhige und zentrale Lage rund um den wunderschönen Rüdesheimer Platz bietet beste Mobilität. So sind die U-Bahnhöfe Rüdesheimer Platz, Heidelberger Platz, Walter-Schreiber-Platz und diversen Busstationen in wenigen Minuten erreichbar.

Außerdem befinden sich ganz in der Nähe Supermärkte sowie kleine, interessante Einzelhandelsläden, die im idyllischen Kiez zum Shopping einladen. Banken, Post, Friseure, Kosmetik, Ärzte, Restaurants, Cafés und Bistros finden Sie ebenfalls im direkten Umfeld.
Unsere Unterkunft im schönen Rheingauviertel rund um den Rüdesheimer Platz ist raucherfrei. Sie ist komfortabel und geschmackvoll eingerichtet, mit allem was Sie für Ihren Aufenthalt benötigen, natürl
neighborhood_overview:
Es ist einer der beliebtesten Stadtteile Berlins. Vom Rheingauviertel Friedenau aus ist man in wenigen Minuten in der City, Messegelände, Museen, Grunewald oder im beliebten Steglitz mit seiner Schloßstraße, dem zweiten Kudamm. Der Rüdesheimer Platz ist ein wunderschöner Park. Dort beginnt ab Mitte Mai das jährliche Weinbrunnenfest mit täglichen Öffnungszeiten. Hier können die Gäste ihre eigene Brotzeit mitbringen und sich an köstlichen Rheingauweinen laben.
Der berühmte Botanische Garten ist auch nicht weit und einer der bekanntesten, historischen Friedhöfe ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt.

name: Gartenhaus am Wald
description:
Unser Gästehaus ist im skandinavischem Landhausstil liebevoll eingerichtet, dabei ist die Liebe zum Detail spürbar. Der skandinavische Sommerhauscharme schafft ein angenehmes, romantisches Urlaubsgefühl. Schlichtheit und Einfachheit sind Attribute des Hauses. Die Reduzierung auf das Nötigste schafft eine Passung zur begrenzten Urlauszeit.

The space
Dieses Gartenhaus steht in idyllischer Hinterlage eines 776m² großen Gartengrundstücks in ruhiger Lage direkt am Wald. Davon können Sie ca. 300m² eigenständig nutzen. Ihre Ruhe und Privatsphäre ist gewährleistet.

In unmittelbarer Umgebung finden Sie viele Seen und Möglichkeiten für naturverbundene Aktivitäten und mehr. Der nächste Supermarkt ist ca. 900 m entfernt, ein Bäcker ebenso. Eine schöne Einkaufsstraße ist die 3 km entfernte Bölschestraße, hier gibt es vieles zu kaufen. Zur Innenstadt Berlin-Mitte benötigen Sie mit der S-Bahn 35min, mit dem Auto sind es 45min.

Guest access
Über
neighborhood_overview: Köpenick ist der Bezirk Berlins mit dem größten Grünflächenanteil und der niedrigsten Einwohnerdichte. Die durchschnittliches Lebenserwartung ist im Stadtbezirk Köpenick am höchsten von Berlin - das spricht für die ausgewogene Balance zwischen Stadt- und Landleben in Köpenick, speziell Rahnsdorf. Am Wochenende kommen viele Innenstädter in die Berliner Randbezirke wie Köpenick um die Natur zu genießen. Eine Radtour ins Grüne, gutes Essen und ein Kaffee am Wasser zum Abschluss lassen einen Tag zur Erholung werden. Im Dorfkern Rahnsdorf gibt es den letzten Müggelseefischer mit frischen Angeboten.
host_about: Hallo, wir sind Sandra und Sven wir sind beide im Osten Berlins (DDR) geboren und wohnen im grünen Stadtbezirk Köpenick. Wir haben großen Spaß an der Vermietung unseres Gästehauses. Wir lernen viele neue und nette Menschen kennen und haben somit Eindrücke in verschiedenste Kulturen und Ansichten. Unsere Gäste schätzen die Idyllische Ruhe, die man im Großraum Berlin nur an den Stadträndern finden kann. Wir bieten euch einen Aufenthalt im "grünen" Berlin, eine Balance zwischen Stadttourismus und Landaufenthalt ist bei uns gewährleistet. Lernt Land und Leute abseits der bekannten Touristenströme kennen und lasst euch verzaubern.

name: URBAN WallMemorial Mitte/PBerg
description:
Friendly, sunny, inviting 2 room apartment for your visit to Berlin. 70m² in size. 3rd floor (lift). Big kitchen. Bathroom, shower+extra bath tub. Reliable internet connection, WLAN/WiFi. Quiet and pleasant neighbourhood. Excellent public transport with tram and underground train. Easy, free parking in the street. Alexanderplatz/TV tower 10min away, wall memorial site across the street. Building with stucco, classical style. Green, central, stylish urban surrounding. Park for jogging close by.

The space
Friendly, inviting 2 room apartment for your visit to Berlin. 70m² in size. Big kitchen. Reliable internet connection, WLAN WiFi available.
A view to the TV tower, the spacious and green wall memorial site across the street. Excellent public transport with tram and underground train. Easy, free parking in the street close by.

Guest access
You'll have the whole flat alone for yourself.

Other things to note
Register
neighborhood_overview: The neighbourhood is central, but quiet and pleasant. Located in Mitte, you can get to lots of nice bars, shops and stylish restaurants by foot. The wall memorial park area is accross the street. If you like to enjoy nature, while still being in the middle of the city, you will enjoy taking a walk in the Humboldhain park near by. Also Museum island (Museums Insel) at the river spree is close by (train-station Hackescher Markt). It's only a few minutes to get there by bike. We will be happy to recommend special events and locations to you. Love to dance tango, but don't know where to go? Let us know!
host_about: I'm in my 50th living in exiting Berlin Mitte. My profession is analysis, design and realisation of computer based technical systems. My passion is dancing tango and being in nature going with the flow ;-). If I have time you find me in the kitchen...mediterranean kitchen is my favourite. Culture and humor helps over the day!

description: Nice and clean appartment
amenities: ["TV", "Wifi", "Pool", "Essentials", "Air conditioning", "Dryer", "Elevator", "Washer", "Kitchen"]

name: A refuge of love in Berlin
description:
This apartment is unique. Furnished with love and attention to detail, you will find yourself taken back to another time. The apartment consists of 2 rooms (bed-sit room, kitchen living).

The space
This apartment is looking for the same. Lovingly and in detail you will feel set back to another time. The refuge consists of 2 rooms (living room, kitchen) separated by a curtain. The refuge is located on the ground floor.
It is suitable for 3 persons (double bed 1.40 m, single bed 1.00 m). The kitchen is fully equipped with 2 hot plates, dishwasher, refrigerator. The bathroom has a shower.

Other things to note
- Bed linen and towels: 6 € / person
- Citytax Berlin (visitor's tax): 15 € flat rate
neighborhood_overview:
You will need 150 m to get to subway station Weberwiese (U5 - 4 stops to Alexanderplatz). Ostbahnhof is 5 minutes away by car. Tram line M10 is only 300 m away and takes you straight to the heart of Prenzlauer Berg.
The well-known Karl-Marx-Allee (Stalinallee) is 100 m away where you may find places to eat. The famous Simon-Dach-Straße is the party mile of Friedrichshain. You can get here within 10 minutes on foot.
Parking lots can be found in close proximity and are available without a residents' parking permit. But there is also a parking garage 50 m away, 3 € per day.
host_about: Seit 1992 in Berlin Friedrichshain und immer noch beeindruckt wie schnell sich eine Stadt / Bezirk verändert. Friedrichshain ist mein Wahlbezirk. Bunt, zentral und abwechslungsreich. Kommt vorbei, es lohnt sich.

name: sonnige Maisonette
description:
Maisonette im Dachgeschoss mit großem Balkon zum Hinterhof im Bezirk Friedrichshain.

The space
Die Wohnung befindet sich im quirligen Bezirk Friedrichhain. Von dort aus erreicht ihr in kurzer Zeit viele Sehenswürdigkeiten Berlins. Attraktive und angesagte Ausgehorte sind nicht weit entfernt.

Die Küche ist vollständig ausgestattet und für den ein oder anderen Fleck nutzt gern die Waschmaschine.
Der Balkon lädt im Sommer zum Verweilen ein, einen Kaffee zu genießen und entspannt in den Tag zu starten.

Ich werde oft nach der Größe des Bettes gefragt. Es ist für zwei Personen und 1,40 m breit.

Other things to note
In unmittelbarer Nähe gibt es einen Supermarkt, eine Videothek und einige Spätverkaufsläden. Wollt ihr joggen gehen, so könnt ihr das im Treptower Park, auf dem nah gelegenen Sportplatz oder ihr umrundet die Insel Strahlau.

Für die tägliche Fitness sorgt, dass die Wohnung im 4. Geschoss ohne Lift
neighborhood_overview: Die Nachbarn sind alle ruhig und sehr entspannt.
host_about:
Herzlich willkommen!
Ich bin sicher, dass ihr in Berlin, eine wunderbare Zeit verbringen werdet, denn diese Stadt bietet für jeden etwas.
Viel Freude beim Erkunden wünsche ich euch.

Hey,

my room mate is subletting his room from the 22.04.15(tomorrow!) until monday the 27.04.15. The apartment is in Prenzlauer Berg, 1 minute to the subway station Eberswalder Straße and 10 minutes to Mauerpark.

amenities: ["Heating", "Wifi", "Smoking allowed", "Washer", "Kitchen"]

name: 2-room appartment in Neukölln
description:
This cosy flat is located in Neukölln and is super practical for getting around as it's next to S-Bahn (S41/42) and U-Bahn. The 2room 50m2 flat with high ceilings, a balcony and wooden flors - perfectly comfortable for two (could be used by max.4).

The space
This is a nice and very light place as it's got windows to both, east and west. It's got a great wooden flor and high ceilings. The cosy kitchen facing the backyard and a beautiful chestnut tree. In order to get to the bedroom, you've gotta walk through the livingroom. Through the livingroom you'll get out on the balcony, where you can have a sunny breakfast if you don't mind the sound of cars as it's facing the pretty busy Karl-Marx-Straße. This goes for the bedroom as well. For me it's not a problem at all but if you'd need it to be very silent, this might not be the place for you. The couch in the livingroom could be turned into a double bed.
neighborhood_overview:
The flat is located at Karl-Marx-Straße, which offers lots of shopping options to stroll around. There are great little bars, cultural and nightlife places near by and you can see, how gentrification is very close to reach this part of the city.
The appartment is close to Körnerpark and Richard Platz with great small bars and second hand stores. Also Tempelhofer Feld is not far at all.
host_about: Hi! I'd like to rent out the appartment while I'm out of the city. Feel free to contact me if you've got any questions.
amenities: ["Heating", "Wifi", "Washer", "Kitchen"]

name: Lovely Single Room"Apartment"studio Charlottenburg
description: Hi to everyone!!! Here I rent my Apartment (not sharing room, nobody else live there you will be alone) with separated kitchen and bathroom. the kitchen is provided with everything you will need. enjoy the huge windows french balcony which has sun directly in front in the afternoon :D. the house is really sunny and located in a perfect area. only a few minutes walking from Kurfurstendamm(shops, restaurant, hard rock cafe) and 2 minutes by ubahn 9 and 3. The location is central and really safe
host_about: for any Information, feel free to text me anytime during your stay. cheers
amenities: ["Heating", "Wifi", "TV with standard cable", "Hair dryer", "Free washer \u2013 In unit", "Elevator", "Kitchen"]

name: ruhiges Zimmer mit eigenem Bad
description:
Wir bieten unseren Gästen ein Doppelzimmer mit eigenem Bad im 1. Stock unseres Hauses. Die direkte Umgebung ist sehr grün und sehr ruhig. Der Ortskern mit zahlreichen Geschäften und der Bushaltestelle ist in wenigen Minuten gut zu Fuß erreichbar. Mit dem Expressbus ist man in 40 Minuten in der Berliner City.
Hinweis: Unser Angebot ist aufgrund des Berliner Zweckentfremdungsgesetz den Vorgaben entsprechend beim Bezirksamt Spandau registriert (siehe dazu Registrierungsnummer).

The space
Das Zimmer umfasst 20 qm. Unsere Gäste nutzen ein eigenes Bad (nur für Gäste) mit Badewanne, zwei Waschbecken und Toilette. Die Unterkunft befindet sich in Kladow einem Ortsteil von Spandau und liegt im Südwesten von Berlin direkt am Wannsee. Der Havelradweg ist nur ein paar Minuten entfernt. Ihr Fahrrad können Sie sicher bei uns unterstellen. Kladow zeichnet sich durch seine ruhige Lage im Grünen und durch seine Nähe zu mehreren Seen aus. Das Zentrum von Berlin sowie von P
neighborhood_overview: Die Unterkunft liegt zentral im Ortskern von Kladow (im Südwesten von Berlin, Bezirk Spandau). In der Nähe befinden sich verschiedene Geschäfte und Restaurants  sowie das anthroposophische Krankenhaus Havelhöhe und die Median Klinik Berlin (10 Minuten Fußweg). Weiterhin sind es nur 10 Minuten Fußweg zum Gutshof Neukladow (sehr oft Hochzeiten!) und ca. 20 Minuten Fußweg zum sehr schön gelegenen Restaurant und Biergarten "Bootshaus" am Glienicker See. Wunderschön ist auch ein Ausflug zur Sakrower Heilandskirche (ca. 40 Minuten Fußweg).
host_about: Gemeinsam mit meinem Mann lebe ich seit vielen Jahren in Kladow. Wir haben viel Platz und freuen uns über Gäste. Sie sind bei uns ungestört und werden herzlich empfangen. Gerne geben wir Ihnen individuelle Tipps für Ihren Aufenthalt.

name: Topfloor family flat
description:
Beautiful, 120 qm family flat in the borrough of Prenzlauer Berg. 4 tube stops from Alexander Platz, lively neighbourhood with bars, cinemas, playgrounds. 6th floor, balcony & big garden, elevator, Wi-Fi. Family friendly environment. Parcs & pools close by.

The space
Our flat is part of a co-operative housing project. We are living here with our three children. It is situated in a beautiful, family friendly bourrough

Guest access
You will have the whole appartment: 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, large kitchen/living room, balcony, garden, dish washer, washing machine, Wi-Fi.

Other things to note
Our appartment is in full-on family use. We only rent out while on holidays ourselves. We are not renting out professionally (no hotel standard). So you will find our things in the apartment which youa re welcome to use. The apartment is quite spacious for you to spread out. A visiting family would find card and board games, Lego, P
neighborhood_overview: Our appartment is situated in Prenzlauer Berg a central and very lively borrough of Berlin. Within 10 to 15 minutes walking distance you already find a variety of small cafés with home made cake or ice cream, small shops of all kinds,restaurants with international kitchen from very reasonably priced to higher standards and bars of all kinds. You have small parcs with playgrounds for kids very near by, larger parcs (Humboldthain, Friedrichshain, Mauerpark) that you can reach within 15 minutes with a bike that you could borrow in the bike shop downstairs. (Getting bikes is something I would recommend!). In those parcs you will find a public pool at Humboldhain or the famous flea market at Mauerpark on Sundays. Public transport is very near by and connects you to all major lines: there is a tram stop right infront of the building. „Schönhauser Allee“ tube and overground station is within 10 min. walking distance form the appartment. Taking the U2 it is only 4 stops to Alexanderplatz and t
host_about: I'm a writer and live with my husband and our three children in Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg.

name: 1-Zimmerwohnung Zentral
description:
Die Wohnung liegt in perfekter Ausgangslage um Berlin und Umgebung zu erkunden.
Die Orangerie und das Schloss Charlottenburg sind nur 5 Minuten entfernt. Die Messe Berlin erreicht man mit der S-Bahn in 15 Minuten. 2 Minuten fußläufig zu vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten und zu S-Bahn und Busverbindungen die sie zu Ihren Wunschorten in Berlin und Umland bringt. Ob geschäftlich oder privat ein idealer Startpunkt. Bei Fragen zur Buchung und Buchungsmöglichkeiten bitte direkt über Airbnb kontaktieren.

The space
Die Wohnung besteht aus Bad mit Badewanne, Küche mit Essplatz für 4 Personen und einem Wohn- und Schlafraum mit Doppelbett und Schlafcouch.
In der Küche finden sie alle Utensilien für den täglichen Bedarf. Ausserdem verfügt sie über Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Spülmaschine, Waschmaschine, Kaffemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster und Herd.
Im Wohn- und Schlafraum haben sie einen Fernseher.
neighborhood_overview:
Die Unterkunft liegt direkt gegenüber der Gipsformerei der staatlichen Museen. Sie ist in idealer Lage um Berlin zu erkunden oder einfach nur Berlin zu erleben. Ob mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel quer durch Berlin oder zu Fuß zum direkt anliegenden Schlosspark mit dem Schloss Charlottenburg und der Orangerie, Klausener Platz Kiez, viele Museen wie Villa Oppenheim, Museum Berggruen, Bröhan Museum und weitere.
Geschäfte des täglichen Bedarfs wie Lebensmittelgeschäft, Bäcker, Zeitungsladen, Drogerie und Restaurants/Cafes sind zu Fuß erreichbar.
Es grenzt an eine belebte und befahrene Straße.

name: GREAT PLACE IN THE HIPPEST LOCATION
description:
Newly renovated 2 bedroom design apartment in one of the most upcoming and hippest area of Berlin!

The space
The flat is in a beginning of last century building that has been recently renovated so everything (except the design vintage furniture) is new, from bathroom & kitchen to bed linen and towels.
We have decorated this place with our favorite things , we love midcentury design and we hope you will feel immediately at home.
There are two spacious rooms, one bedroom with a big bed 160 x 200 and a living room with a sofa that transforms to a bed also 160 x 200 (with a real mattress, so it is a lot more comfortable than a normal sofa bed)

The kitchen is equipped with all you need for simple cooking, and of course clean towels and linen will be provided, there is also a washing machine with drying function in case you need it.

Neukölln has become the trendiest place to live in Berlin. Here is where most artists live and it's also
host_about: Hi we are Guillaume and Ana, we are artists and film-makers living in Berlin. We love sharing our space, meeting new people, travelling to different places and we also love movies, art, cats and food! We look forward to get to know you!

name: Calm & spacious 35m² room in Neukölln
description:
Very spacious (35m²) and bright room with high ceilings in Neukölln/Kreuzberg. The flat is perfectly located with lots of nice bars, restaurants and parks nearby.

The space
You'll find a cozy, well looked-after home in a vibrant neighbourhood. It's our own flat and we aim to make it as comfortable and convenient as possible. The entire flat has recently been renovated and the kitchen includes high-end appliances.

The room you are renting has one very comfortable double bed that sleeps two and a sofa bed that sleeps one additional person.

It's a perfect spot to unwind after a long day of exploring Berlin!

Guest access
It's a two bedroom flat with no lounge. Guests have access to the shared kitchen & bathroom. Please note that the flat is on the 4th floor and that there's no lift.

neighborhood_overview: Check out the webpages of "BertaBerlin Walk-This-Way", "stil in berlin" or "cee cee berlin" for things to do in Neukölln or have a look at my Airbnb-guide.
host_about:
Hello, my name is Charlotte and I'm 31 years old. I'm living in Neukölln since 6 years now and have been living in Friedrichshain and Prenzlauerberg for another 4 years. I grew up in southern Germany and after living in Belfast for one year, I moved to Berlin in 2008 to study social work.

I like to travel a lot - far away by plane and train but also to the back country of Berlin, which offers perfect opportunities for hiking and camping. 

Philipp and I live together in this flat and whenever one of us is away, we rent out one of our rooms. You are very welcome to visit us and if you have any questions don't hesitate to ask.

name: Cosy apartment in Berlin Neukölln
description:
My sunny apartment is located in a nice neighbourhood next to a beautiful garden in trendy (they say!) Neukölln. Many shops and bars at street side. Between two S- and U-bahn stations, so you´ll be in any part of the city in maximum 20 minutes!

The space
Hello everybody! I'm travelling away for almost two months and I'm looking for a person to rent my room in Berlin Neukölln. My apartment is very sunny, on the fourth floor. Apart from the bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom there is also a living room and a balcony. I have a housemate, Joachim, you'll be living with during your stay. He's very friendly, and you can rely on him for any thing you might need. He also doesn't stay at home much, and sleeps most of the days at his girlfriend's place. So, in the end, you'll have most of the time the whole flat for you only! I would prefer to have a person for the whole period; also two people, each for a month more or less, could be ok. Hope to hear from you guys!
neighborhood_overview: You should have a look at the Körnerpark, a public garden just 20 meters from my apartment and not very known even by Berliner. And at 10 minutes walk is the Tempelhofer Feld, a huge park where once was the first airport of Berlin, which urban gardens and people cycling, skateboarding or just grilling!
host_about: I'm an italian guy frequently travelling around the world and with a passion for street photography. Hope to meet you soon!

description:
My flat is in Friedrichshain and only a 15 Minute walk to Simon-Dach-Strasse, on of the main areas where you can find plenty of restaurants, bars, clubs etc. The U-Bahn 5 is 7 Minutes away and takes you to Alexanderplatz in 5 Minutes.
The flat itself is on the second floor with a large living room and a small kitchen and bathroom with shower. It's perfect for two people. :)
As I also live in this flat (not when I rent it), I would like to ask anyone to treat all furniture with care.

name: Local Art and Beauty (glutenfree & organic)
description:
Minimum stay 93 nights. Weekly cleaning included. A bicycle is available!

The best way to enjoy contemporary art is to live with it.
Experience contemporary art and a vegan lifestyle.

It's a 1-room-guest space in a two-room apartment.
Suitable for one person. I've my office first floor in my private
gallery where I also renting out two rooms.

The Room is in a charming old fashion building.
This room is front side located.
Normal noises of traffic but muffled by double windows.

The space
My 60 qm specious flat is situated in a charming old fashion building where you will experience creativity and urban simplicity. ENJOY your Berlin stay!

Your room is back side located and very quite. I named it purple room. Any guest who spent time in there so far talked about a kind of magic and special peacefulness and deep sleep like never before.

My kitchen is not just a kitchen! Its meant to be
neighborhood_overview:
peaceful & saftey & green - feels like a little green village just in front of berlin gates.

We have the lake just around the corner. It´s about 200 m walking distance and very enjoyable in summertime. You can take a littel swim, hire boats or cooling you booth down with a cocktails at the beach bar.

name: Charmante Wohnung im Herzen X-Bergs
description:
Kreuzberg ist ein Muss, viel Laufen um überall hinzukommen, allerdings nicht. Unsere weitläufige Wohnung liegt keine Minute von der Ubahn Gneisenaustraße entfernt. Sie ist direkt am berühmten Bergmannkiez.

The space
Mit 83 Quadratmetern, zwei Schlafzimmern, sowie zusätzlichen Matratzen, bietet die Wohnung Platz für 5 bis 6 Personen. Beide Schlafzimmer sind mit breiten Futonbetten ausgestattet, auf denen ohne Probleme zwei Personen zum Schlafen platz finden. Die Küche ist ein Schlaraffenland der Gemeinschaft. Mit ihrer großen Eckbank und zusätzlichen Stühlen steht einem gemütlichen zusammensitzen am Abend nichts im Wege. Und wer danach noch ein Bad nehmen will, kein Problem, die große Badewanne freut sich drauf.

Guest access
Du hast außerdem Zugang zu unserem Büro, gerade wenn du geschäftlich in der Stadt bist, wird das nützlich für dich sein.
neighborhood_overview: Unser Stadteil ist sehr urban, mit kleinen grünen Oasen der Erholung. Wer dem Trubel der Bergmannstraße entkommen möchte, spaziert einfach über einen der angrenzenden Friedhöfe, oder über das Tempelhofer Feld. Kreuzberg ist der wohl vielseitigste Stadteil Berlins.
